dpa' sbyor ba dang / /thams cad lha mo 'dus pas ni/ /ma lus skal ba bzang po kun/ /bde bas so so rjes su 'grub/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lha/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /lha mo bde ba chen mo kun/ /thams

cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /phan tshun du ni rab dga' bas/ /skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed/ /dbang po kun nas byung ba yis/ /mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi/ /bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs rnams kyis/ /thams cad bdag nyid

mchod par byed/ /rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi/ /dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba/ /rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyis/ /rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur 'gyur/ /lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la/ /ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba/ /bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas/ /

bdag la bdag gis rab tu mchod/ /rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yi/ /rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing / /rtag tu myong bar byed pa na/ /shin tu sbyor bas rab 'grub 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi/ /ra sa ya na bde ba des/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang / /

lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang phyug kun

gyi gtso/ /rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /de dag dang ni dga' spyod na/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /lha mo thams cad grub chen po/ /'khor los sgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas par/ /dngos

grub kun gyi bde myos pa/ /de las rgya chen mchog gzhan med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des/ /'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni/ /rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub pa'i/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde myos pa/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi

mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /dbang phyug kun gyi bde myos pa/ /dam pa rgya chen gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des/ /'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni/ /rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub med/ /ces

bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ lha mo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba mchog bzang po dpal rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa ste gsum pa'o// //

'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /skal ba bzang mchog 'dod pa ste/ /yang dag sbyor ba'i bde myong ba/ /'dod chags

ther zug brtan ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang / /dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi reg bde mchog /rang gi spyod par rab spyod do/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa/ /gzungs dang sa rnams de bzhin du/ /dga' bar spyod na lha dang

mi'i/ /skal bzang bud med ci zhig smos/ /lha yi dngos grub dga' ba dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /skal ba bzang po bde myong bas/ /so sor rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad las byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ /skal ba

bzang po'i longs spyod kun/ /rang gi spyod par de spyod do/ /rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang / /'jig rten dang po mchog gi dpal/ /sangs rgyas dga' bas bde dam pa/ /phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed/ /khams gsum dag na ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po

kun/ /rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po/ /mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag /kun nas phrogs nas de spyod na/ /longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan/ /phrogs las

grub dang dran las dga'/ /ngo 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang / /de ni dad la sbyin par byed/ /ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid/ /'jig rten dbang phyug kun dang bcas/ /ngo 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang / /de ni dad la sbyin par byed/ /tshangs

pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi/ /mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag /kun nas phrogs te myur sbyin na/ /longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /de yis mi sbyin ci yang med/ /sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun/ /mi bya ba ni gang yang med/ /sbyin pa dang ni byed pa'ang yin/ /sangs rgyas

byang chub sems dpa' yang / /phrogs nas kyang ni sbyin byed na/ /las mchog dang ni rab 'byam dang / /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /dngos grub mchog ni gdon mi za/ /sde rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po/ /'khor los sgyur ba

rab grub pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che/ /rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'jug /la lar byang chub sems chen po/ /la lar spyod pa mthun par 'gro/ /la lar dga' ldan lha dag las/ /dam pa

shin tu 'pho ba'o/ /la lar skye ba rnam par dag /la lar nges par 'byung bar gsal/ /la lar byang chub chen por gshegs/ /la lar bdud las rab tu rgyal/ /la lar byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya/ /la lar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /la lar pha rol mu stegs rnams/ /

chos dang mthun par tshar gcad do/ /la lar 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba/ /grub pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid/ /la lar rtog pa thams cad mchog /grub pa'i dbang phyug bla na med/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis/ /'dul

ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar/ /rnam par sprul bas dgyes shing rol/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /brtan pa dbang phyug chen po'i bdag /gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin/ /'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing / /de bzhin

gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/ /lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog /rdo rje sems dpar rab tu 'grub/ /sems can khams ni du ma dag /ma lus par ni phyag rgyas 'debs/ /lha dang byang chub dka' ba rnams/ /brtan par sems can dag la smin/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog

gis/ /sems can kun gyi don byed cing / /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sna tshogs thams

cad kyi skal ba bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste/ dpal dam tshig gi rtog pa ste bzhi pa'o// //'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /yang dag

grub pa gcig pu nyid/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar/ /rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la/ /grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog /sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yi/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang / /bde ba thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /

bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul bas/ /sems can kun don rnam 'phrul na/ /myur du shin tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyin re'am yang na zla re'am/ /yang na de bzhin lo re ni/ /ci bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang / /sangs rgyas bde mchog

gar bya'o/ /khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang / /de bzhin srog dang rtsa las 'byung / /rang gi lha yi cha lugs su/ /bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bya/ /dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis/ /slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der/ /mchod

pa byas nas des bsgrub bo/ /de las gzhan yang rtog kun gyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa/ /ci rigs par ni sprul byas pa'i/ /gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog

gis dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste/ /rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba bzhin/ /ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka'/ /cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la/ /las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs

kyis/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /sgyu ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rnam

pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog /sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams/ /sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs phyung ba'o// //'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i

gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson/ /'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas/ /'gags shing yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /

grol ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu bskyed/ /stong pa ma yin mi stong min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /thabs dang snying rje bdag nyid rnams/ /de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal/ /

rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams la/ /sems can don du yongs brtags pa/ /rnam par mi rtog la mos pas/ /thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya/ /brag cha yi ni sgra 'dra ba/ /chos kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te/ /de las theg pa chen po yi/ /yang dag yon tan rgyas pa'i glus/ /dus gsum

pa yi dam tshig gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstod/ /mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ /yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam

med dam pa'i mchog chos can/ /yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de/ /dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bsgrun du yod pa'ang min/ /dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams/ /sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol/ /rtag tu dri ma med pa'i

thugs rje'i shugs las byung / /smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang / /tshad med tshad dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa

brnyes gyur kyang / /khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ /thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur/ /e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ /mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pas/ /khams gsum kun

la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ /mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa/ /dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yang dag yon tan rgya chen te/ /lan cig tsam ni brjod pas kyang / /sangs rgyas

thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid sbyor bas/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyis/ /dus gsum pa yi rgyal ba kun/ /dam tshig gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /sku ni lta bas mi ngoms pa/ /thams cad bdag nyid bstan nas kyang / /legs so zhes nas

dngos grub ni/ /mchog rnams kun ni rab smin mdzad/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang / /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas 'grub pa mchog kun dang / /rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad/ /de nas de yis bsgrub pa dang / /shin tu rtag pa'i

dngos grub dag /gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag thob bshad/ /rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /thal mo legs par sbyar ba yis/ /thal mo lan gsum rnam par brdab/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur/ /de dang

de yi ngo bor bya/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing / /ji ltar mos pa'i chags pa dang / /Sha Da pa la sogs pa yis/ /ci nas yongs su ma skyo bar/ /rtag tu tshad med bzlas par bya/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag

nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas kun tu dngos grub pa/ /rab tu mthong zhing mchog grub pa'o/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan

bsngags pa rgya che ba/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog ni lan cig glur blangs pas/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa rtag pa'i mchog /dngos grub mi zad bde ba'i mchog nyid thob par 'gyur/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /thams cad bdag nyid dbang phyug mchog /

sna tshogs kun gyis rnam 'dul ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun grub ste/ /de bas dam tshig gsum la sogs/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam par grol/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbugs

phyung ba'o// //'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin tu khro gtum gdug par 'gyur/ /shin tu gdug par khro ba yis/ /'o dod 'bod par

lhung bar 'gyur/ /de nas 'phos nas sems can de/ /bag chags kyis ni mtshams sbyor bas/ /shin tu gdug pa chen por gyur/ /blo ni bdud kyis byin brlabs nas/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad/ /phra men ma dang gnod sbyin gdon/ /bdud dang rnam par log 'dren nyid/ /

shin tu gdug pa chen por 'gyur/ /gnas gsum po ni 'jigs byed cing / /sgrub pa po rnams la yang za/ /lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho bar byed/ /bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed/ /de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha/ /tshangs pa'i drung du nye bar dong / /tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang

por bcas/ /'jug sel la yang skyabs su dong / /tshangs dang 'jug sel lha rnams kyang / /lha chen drung du nye bar dong / /tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen yang / /rdo rje can la skyabs su dong / /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje se gol

phyag rgyas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rjer bcings/ /rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu mdzad na/ /de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas/ /'khor dang 'khor lo'i tshogs bcings

pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 'gyur na/ /gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis til 'bru bzhin du rgyas/ /shin tu gdug par gtum po la/ /zhi bas

phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi/ /khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ /khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang / /'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/ /de nas sna yi rtse mo la/ /

yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung / /sna yi dbugs ring dro ba las/ /rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung / /bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor ba/ /rdo rje khro bor gyur nas byung / /dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka /'bar bas thal bas rab tu 'jig /sems dpa' sngon por 'bar ba'i ngang / /

'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar por 'bar/ /'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag /dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra/ /'bar ba chen po sgra 'bar ba/ /thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can/ /'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag /dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs/ /khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa/ /

zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang / /smin ma khro gnyer bcas par 'gyur/ /'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pas/ /gu lang dbang chen nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas/ /gnas gsum dag ni 'bar byas nas/ /thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshig /rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga /

dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis/ /thams cad phab nas slar yang ni/ /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /de yi 'bar ba nyi ma las/ /byung ba'i grib ma mi bzad pa/ /bskyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs/ /gdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus/ /rgyal po de ni de dag dang / /

lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol/ /thams cad rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis/ /shin tu gdug cing khro drag pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam spyangs nas/ /dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod/ /rdo rje 'dod khro

la sogs kyi/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs/ /dpal he ru kas dbugs phyung ba'o// //'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /

'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /log par lta la gnas par gyur/ /shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis/ /'o dod 'bod pa chen por lhung / /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /byang chub sems ni rnam sbyang phyir/ /pad+mo chags par sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje chos

su gnas par 'gyur/ /ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ /de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi/ /nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par dag /'dis ni kun tu gzigs pas na/ /rgyal ba dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur/ /dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /rdo rje

sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /'dod chags thams cad dag pas na/ /mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das/ /'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /sna tshogs pa ni 'dul bar spro/ /kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur/ /pad+mo'i rgyal

po mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des/ /pad+ma gar dbang la sogs kyi/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs/ /dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis dbugs phyung ba'o// //

'das pa'i dus na sngon byung pa/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin tu gdug cing brkam par 'gyur/ /shin du 'jungs par gyur pa yis/ /rnams dang dmyal

bar lhung / /de nas 'phos nas slar yang ni/ /shin tu dbul por skyes par gyur/ /bkres dang skom pa'i skyon rnams kyis/ /de dag phan tshun gsod par byed/ /shin tu gdug pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor de ni bcom ldan 'das/ /dam pa'i don ni nor chen po/ /rdo rje nyi ma byung

bar gyur/ /nam mkha'i snying pos thams cad phyogs/ /kun gyi re ba yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /mkha' las rin chen thams cad 'bebs/ /shin tu gdug cing khro ba la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni/ /

rab tu gdung ba kun bsgrubs pas/ /bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / /dbrog pas kyang ni khyad par du/ /rgyal bar byas nas gnas gsum gyi/ /nor gyi tshogs kun sdud par byed/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings

kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rab tu dgrol/ /dpal rdo rje nyi mas dbugs phyung ba'o// //'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad

ni/ /brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar gyur/ /shin tu brtson 'grus chung ba yis/ /mnar med pa yi dmyal bar lhung / /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag tu/ /rtag mchog dpal ni byung bar 'gyur/ /thams

cad dag par mos pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis/ /shin tu gdug cing khro gtum pa'i/ /sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig /byi ba rkun po chom po yis/ /thams cad rnam par sbyong

bar byed/ /brid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang / /ngo 'thon stobs kyis de bzhin du/ /dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni/ /de tshe 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ /skye 'gro gnas pa 'gro ba rnams/ /mtha' dag btul nas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs

kyis/ /rang gi rgyal srid rtag tu skyong / /g.yem pa rnams la g.yem par 'gyur/ /khro ba rnams la khro ba'i mchog /zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog /drag shul can la drag pos gnon/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /dbang phyug dam pa rab mnan nas/ /lha mo b+hi mo

phrogs nas ni/ /de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /mthu bo che yang rab mnan nas/ /rug mi ni yang phrogs nas ni/ /de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /skye dgu'i bdag po rab mnan nas/ /lha mo rab tu

zhi ba 'phrogs/ /de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /'dod pa'i lha ni rab mnan nas/ /dga' sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma/ /phrogs nas de tshe nye bar spyod/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam

mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ /rdo rje las mchog rnam gnon pa/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas/ /thabs dang rtsal gyi grub pa yis/ /drag shul sbyor bas bsgrubs na ni/ /khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus par/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa des

thob nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mchog /drag shul sbyor bas grub par byed/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /rtsal gyis pha rol gnon pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel/ /lha yi dngos grub dka' ba

dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /go 'phang mchog gi rtag pa dag /rang gis rnal 'byor gyis thob nas/ /sems can khams ni du ma dag /ma lus par ni rgyas 'debs shing / /'chi med byang chub dka' ba dag /sems can rnams la brtan par sbyin/ /rta

mchog rnam par sprul ba yis/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas/ /sems can kun gyi don kyang byed/ /de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams

rnams rab tu bsgrubs/ /dpal rta mchog gis dbugs phyung ba'o// //de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /rang byung rnams kyi gtam gyi rtags/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las gtam

gyi phyag rgya zhes pa rtog pa ste lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang thams cad du/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog 'byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung

ba/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bde/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog /rin chen rgyan la sogs pas spras/ /dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i/ /

bla re dam pa bres pa na/ /rdo rje glu dang mchod la sogs/ /glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul/ /me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang / /mar me dri dang sogs ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bsgrub/ /yang na bdag gi gnas

dag gam/ /skyed mos tshal la sogs par bsgrub/ /der ni dang por gdan bshams te/ /'jam zhing reg na bde 'gyur ba/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs/ /de ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul

bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha/ /de na rnam par 'phrul ba mdzad/ /stan de dag ni thams cad la/ /ci ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma sogs/ /sgo srung dang ni ldan par

byas/ /rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi/ /bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pa/ /skal bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /mi yi mtshal ni grub pa la/ /dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad/ /ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang / /rang bzhin gyis ni de grub pa'o/ /

rdo rje'i chu dang rdo rjer bcas/ /mtshal chen po dag bsgrub pa ni/ /mthu yis rab tu grub pa ste/ /pad+ma'i snod kyi nang du bzhag /chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'/ /

de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang / /mtshal chen po ni bsgrub pa dag /chags pa chen po las byung bas/ /dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad/ /dmar chen dang ni ga bur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar por sbyar ba dag /tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni/ /ra sa ya na kun slong ba/ /rang gi

lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ /srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtses/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na/ /rtag pa yi ni dngos grub thob/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhan/ /nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams

cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /'dus pa der ni zhugs pa dag /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni

bsrung ba byas pas dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid 'grub/ /de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus/ /ci 'byor pa yi gos dang rgyan/ /sna tshogs gos bzang bgos nas ni/ /me tog phreng ldan

kha dri zhim/ /sna tshogs kun gyis skal bzang pos/ /slong bas dal gyis dal gyis su/ /gos dgab pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gi 'byung ba bskul bar bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams/ /shar ba dag ni mthong ba yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing / /bsod

nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /nges pa'i lam dang kun ldan pa/ /rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan/ /brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa/ /kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni/ /stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus/ /nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas/ /bde gshegs

bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /'di dag nyid kyi glur blangs na/ /shin tu mya ngan yongs 'das pa'i/ /shi ba'ang slar ni slongs 'gyur na/ /yang srid pa lta ci zhig smos/ /lam bzhi dang ni ldan pa/ /rnam par

'das pas mdzes par byas/ /sna tshogs 'brang bar rab tu 'grub/ /'jig rten gsum ni rab bsgrub pa/ /'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa/ /'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum la skyid sbyin pa/ /'jig rten gsum po bdag la bsgrubs/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis/ /sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po/ /a ra li ni kun 'grub 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /lha mo kun dang bde myos pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs/ /nyi ma zla ba gsal bar 'char/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'byung / /lan cig dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang / /bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba/ /brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa/ /sna tshogs 'brang bas de bzhin du/ /gan d+harba dang Sha Da ba'i/ /glu dbyangs sna tshogs

glus bsgrub bo/ /de nas de nyid dam pa yis/ /thar ba thams cad rmongs pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dpal/ /glu 'di yis ni bskul bar bya/ /rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i pad+ma ni/ /rnam dag mchod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod byas nas/ /mchog

tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde grub mdzod/ /kye ma'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid/ /mchog tu bde ba shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa/ /rang gi dam tshig skyon med dag la rol cig rol cig ho/ /kye ma mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag po

rang gi dam tshig ni/ /yin pa'i phyir na rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so/ /'gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs ni gsal bar mkhyen/ /dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan dang g.yo ba kun gyi ngo bor gyur/ /rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba mkha'

'gro sgyu ma ho/ /kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu sgrub pa ston/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHe ma'o bde mchog bde bar drongs/ /rnam par sprul hUM snang bar mdzod/ /a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis/ /slob ma dag ni

gzhug tu gsol/ /glu yi rgyal po 'di dag ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas/ /kun gyi sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /glu 'di dag ni len pa na/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul ba/ /ma lus

lus pa med par snang / /rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma'i bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /te na te te hU~M/ rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma

lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam rol sprul cig sprul/ hUM hUM hUM/ rnam pa mang po khro bo'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma

bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /hUM shi b+hiSha /

de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /rang byung rnams kyi glu yi rgya/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la ni gnas/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas/ /thams

cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa dang / /lha mo kun gyis rab bskul nas/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub/ /dbang po kun las byung ba yi/ /mchod pa'i sprin chen rnam bkod pa/ /rab 'byam tshogs rnams

thams cad kyis/ /kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par byed/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid lus/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis/ /bud med dag kyang bsgrubs nas

ni/ /rdo rjer bcas pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin/ /rnal 'byor mar ni rab tu 'gyur/ /de dag rang gi lha rnams dang / /'dra bar byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs nas/ /sngon med rol mo'i sil snyan gar/ /rnam par 'phrul bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri/ /ro dang reg

bya bde myos pas/ /bdag nyid rang gi lhar mthong zhing / /mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ /lha yi mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba/ /skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can/ /rnam pa kun tu skal bzang po'i/ /bde ba yang dag sgrub par byed/ /sangs rgyas sgyu mas byin brlabs pas/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba rnams/ /dkyil 'khor mthong dka' myong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po/ /rang gi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyi gzugs chen dang / /dbyangs dang dri dang ro bde bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du/ /de yis rab mthong mchod par byed/ /mchod pa thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /skal bzang mchog gis 'dod chags can/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi/ /dngos

grub ma lus lus med 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar/ /rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang / /de nas yang dag rab gsang bas/ /bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang / /gar

gyi phyag rgya mchod pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /rab tu dga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod/ /oM hUM/ dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ /oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod/ /

oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod/ /glu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te/ /mchod pa ma lus lus med pa'i/ /rab 'byam las la'ang sbyar du rung / /gang dag grub par ma gyur dang / /mchod pa dag ni mi 'byor ba/ /phyag rgya 'di yis

mchod byas na/ /mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub/ /mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang / /lha mo bzhi po dag gis ni/ /me tog la sogs mchod byas nas/ /slob ma thams cad gzung bar byas/ /dngos grub 'dod pas ci 'dod par/ /snyim pa'i gar ni kun bskyod nas/ /de

dag gdong ni mdzes pa yi/ /ras kyis g.yogs te gzung par bya/ /dngos grub ji ltar 'thob 'dod par/ /slob ma me tog 'thor du gzhug /lha mo gang la lhung ba ni/ /lha de de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas gdong ni bkrol nas kyang / /yon gyi mchog ni blang bar bya/ /

sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas/ /ci lta bar ni dbang bskur ro/ /dmar chen po dang ga pur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar po sbyar ba rnams/ /tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa la/ /g.yon pa mtshan 'dzin rdo rje bcas/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ldan/ /srin lag dang ni mthe

bong rtses/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na/ /rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i tshogs kyis kyang / /rgyas mi thebs shing mi rmongs te/ /de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas mna' ni bsgags byas nas/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa yis/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa/ /dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa/ /ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin/ /lha dag dang

ni mi rnams dang / /de bzhin rnal 'byor grub pa po/ /de dag la ni snying nas/ /snying las khrag chen 'thungs pa bzhin/ /sems can khams ni ma lus don/ /srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir/ /mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis/ /rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya/ /bdag gi ngo

bo yongs spangs shing / /dka' thub gyis ni gzir mi bya/ /ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad/ /'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs/ /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /

grub pa gcig pu gcig la spyod/ /lhan cig spyod dang rjes spyod sdug /sangs rgyas byang chub bla med yin/ /yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu bsten/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /de skad bka' stsal dpal ldan gyis/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /rdo rje

can gyis bka' stsal to/ /rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i/ /bdag gi ye shes rgya bsgrubs nas/ /ci lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed pas/ /slob ma rnams la bde bar sbyin/ /slob ma dam pas de phyin chad/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes bzung nas/ /rnam par snang mdzad mchog

bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag nyid grub/ /de nas ro dang zas dang gnas/ /glu dang sil snyan la sogs pa/ /de dag mgon po rnams la dbul/ /rdo rje bla ma chen po dang / /bdag dang gzhan la 'dod dgus mchod/ /'dod don 'bras bu phun tshogs 'grub/ /de nas

bdag nyid rab bsgrubs nas/ /kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa/ /ci lta'i tshul bzhin 'jug pa yis/ /bden pa'i chos ni brjod par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul/ /rtog pa thams cad rab bsgrubs shing / /rtog pa kun la rab sbyor ba'i/ /ngo bo nyid phyir chen

po'i mchog /sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba dang / /'dul ba'i bdag nyid sna tshogs pas/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /de las gzhan pa'i tshul du bstan/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /thar pa thams

cad rnam sbyang phyir/ /'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro byung bar 'gyur/ /rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis/ /rang gi byin rlabs bsgrub pa'i rgyas/ /phyag rgya ci bzhin rjes mthun pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgrub par bya/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /dam tshig la sdang rnam

sbyang phyir/ /thams cad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang shin tu rnal 'byor pa/ /ma lus pad+ma rnam sbyang phyir/ /skal bzang dam pa mi 'gyur ba/ /pad+ma sgyu ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /

nor gyi mchog gis rnam sbyang phyir/ /nam mkha' kun gyi bdag po che/ /rdo rje nyi ma dpal 'byung 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /drag shul sbyor ba sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rta mgrin pha rol rab gnon pa/ /rta mchog rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rang gi lha dang 'dra

ba yis/ /rang gi byin rlabs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /gzugs brnyan ngo bor sbyor ba yi/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor bas gar bya'o/ /dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /de ltar rnam par spyod na ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'grub/ /kun

tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /sangs rgyas 'phrul ba thams cad kyis/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro/ /kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag nyid rnam

par 'phrul pa ston/ /lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus par/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa grub par byed/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa ston/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma gar byed pas/ /

khams gsum dag ni ma lus par/ /dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /sna tshogs gzugs byed rim pa yis/ /'gro ba thams cad mgu bar byed/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /mjal dum g.yul

'gyed grub pa dag /rgyal srid sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas/ /bya ba thams cad ston par byed/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /bdag rtul phod pas mnan nas ni/ /'gro ba thams cad rab 'joms par/ /rta yi gar gyis ston par byed/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /

chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sna tshogs kun gyi bde mchog gis/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dpal dgyes rol pa rnam 'phrul ba/ /sna tshogs kyis ni rnam par rol/ /

rnam pa sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis/ /'dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can khams ni rab tu bsgrub/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sangs

rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i mchog /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid grub par byed/ /ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa ste drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha/ /rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi

mchog /'khor lo thams cad rnam sprul pa'o/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rjes su bsgrub/ /dben pa yi ni gnas dag gam/ /rang gi skyed mos tshal sogs par/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis/ /

kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa'i rnams/ /ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya/ /rten dang dgon pa gtsug lag khang / /ri yi rtse rnams thams cad du/ /rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa/ /sangs rgyas dgos pa bsgrub par bya/ /dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang / /ma mo'i gnas la sogs

'dug na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgos pa dag /rnam pa du mar 'grub par 'gyur/ /pad+mo'i skyed mos tshal dga' dang / /chu bo dag gi mdo dag tu/ /pad+ma 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams/ /yang dag par ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang / /rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal

dag tu/ /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi/ /rgyal po'i dgos pa bsgrub par bya/ /mkhar ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam/ /rgyal khams gzhan las grub pa ru/ /rdo rje rta ni bsgrub par bya/ /cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs

kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dgos pa la/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs rab tu sgrub/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi pad+ma dmar/ /phyag na rdo rje sna tshogs la/ /'jig rten dbang gi kha dog dkar/ /rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi gser/ /kha dog kun dang ci 'byor ba/ /bla re rgyal mtshan rgyan gyi

rnams/ /thams cad rab tu sgrub pa dpal/ /rta mchog rdo rje can gyi'o/ /gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra dang / /bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang / /'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra bar/ /de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i lha rnams kyi/ /'khor lo mngon sum

mthong ba las/ /bsod nams brtag pa ci 'dra ba/ /phyis bris pa yang de bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor thig btab shes rab can/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgrub cing / /shar nub byang gi phyogs dag tu/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag ci

'dra bar/ /rab tu rtag par su zhig nus/ /rang gis lha yi rang bzhin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor brtag pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rang gis lhar sbyor bas/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang / /nyes pa med de 'grub par 'gyur/ /

kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /kun tu sna tshogs 'khor lo can/ /kun tu sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu sna tshogs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi/ /rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin/ /pad+ma'i dbang gi pad+ma'i dbyibs/ /rin chen mchog gi rin

chen dbyibs/ /ji ltar 'dod pa ci 'byor pa/ /ci lta'i dus dang ci bde bar/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu gnas par dpal/ /rta mchog phyag rgya rdo rje'i 'o/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs shing / /dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dag /gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas/ /bsgrubs kyang

ci yang mi 'grub po/ /srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing / /dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang / /byang chub sems ni mi gtang ste/ /slob dpon skal bzang yong mi gtang / /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang por/ /bdag rang bsgrubs pas skal ba bzang / /bdag med chos

nyid dang ldan pa/ /dam tshig la sdang skal ba ngan/ /srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pas na/ /skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /skal ngan nyan thos 'jig rten na/ /shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /skal bzang phyag na rdo rje

dpal/ /stong pa nyid la rab sbyor bas/ /rang rgyal rnams ni skal ba ngan/ /'dod chags thams cad rnam dag pas/ /skal bzang spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /log par lta dang ldan pas na/ /skal ngan 'jig rten mu stegs na/ /dam pa'i nor mchog sdud pa'i phyir/ /skal bzang

rdo rje nyi ma dpal/ /bdag gi bu yang ma chags pas/ /skal ngan dka' thub spyod pa kun/ /rgyal srid mchog rnams kun bsdus pas/ /rta mchog dpal ni skal ba bzang / /bdag med yongs su 'dzin med pas/ /thub pa thams cad skal ba ngan/ /bde ba thams cad bdag sgrub

phyir/ /kun gyi slob dpon skal ba bzang / /lta ngan dam tshig la sdang pa'i/ /slob ma thams cad skal ba ngan/ /gsang ba'i don ni yang dag nyid/ /'di ni gsal bar shes pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas kun tu 'grub par gyur/ /kun gyi slob

dpon la gnas pas/ /'khor lor 'jug par byed pa na/ /dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i slob ma la/ /gsang ba yang dag mtha' yas mchog /thog ma nyid du gsang brjod pa/ /kye khyod ci la dga' zhes dri/ /skal ba bzang la bdag dga' zhes/ /'jug pa pos kyang smra

bar bya/ /gsang ba'i yan lag 'dir shes na/ /ci ltar 'dod par rab tu gzhug /gsang ba yang dag mi shes te/ /g.yas pa yis ni gzhug par bya/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas/ /de bzhin shin tu yon dbul te/ /gsang ba'i cho ga nyid shes pas/ /mi 'gyur pa yi

mchog 'grub bo/ /kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la/ /yon mchog dag ni dbul bar nges/ /gang la yongs su gtang dka' gang / /de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog /yang na shin tu khyad par can/ /de dang de ni bla ma la/ /de nyid mi zad 'dod

pas dbul/ /yang na de ni 'dod 'gyur ba'am/ /'on te sems la dgos pa dag /de sbyin yang na dgos pa bya/ /de ni chung yang mchog yin no/ /de la gal te mchog bdog la/ /de yang ngan pa'i yon 'bul na/ /kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na/ /de ni rtag tu sdug

bsngal 'thob/ /bu mo shin tu brgyan pa 'am/ /de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag /phul nas rin gyis blu ba ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon/ /ma chen dag ni phul nas su/ /slar yang rin gyis blu ba ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dpal sbyor ba yi/ /'on te mchog gi yon yin no/ /

mu tig bzang dang nor bu dang / /shin tu dkar ba'i ras zung dang / /de bzhin rta ni dkar po dag /pad+ma can gyi yon mchog yin/ /rgyal srid longs spyod gter rnams dang / /gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang / /de bzhin mchod pa thams cad ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no/ /

shin tu brgyan pa'i rta dag dang / /glang po shin tu brgyan pa dang / /shing rta rin chen gang ba dag /rta yi rgyal po'i yon yin no/ /khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang / /srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba/ /mkhas pas rnam pa sna tshogs brtag /

spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang / /'gram pa gnyis dang ltag pa ru/ /sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad kyi/ /dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa'o/ /khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam/ /srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te/ /thod pa rin chen dbu rgyan nam/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gi

nor bu dag /kun tu sna tshogs bla mar ni/ /kun gyi slob dpon kun la bya/ /rgyal srid thams cad rnam dag la/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rin chen ngo mtshar gcig las byas/ /de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dbang bskur bas/ /slob ma

thams cad dbang bskur ro/ /sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje byed/ /rdo rje rigs la rdo rje yin/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi sangs rgyas sku/ /nor bu 'dzin gyi nor bu yin/ /sangs rgyas rin chen pad+ma dang / /rdo rje nor bu de bzhin du/ /thams cad mchog ni rta mchog la/ /rang gi dbang

bskur bsdus pa'o/ /blugs pa dang ni byas pa 'am/ /brdungs pa 'am yang ni bris pa'ang rung / /sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yi/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /

lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog /gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin du/ /skal ldan de bzhin skal ba bzang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no/ /pad+ma rgya gram dpag med tshe'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe bsgrub pa/ /lha mo tshogs rnams thams cad kyi/ /mtshan ma'i

phyag rgya tshogs sgrub bzhin/ /mda' dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo /de bzhin 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / /rdo rje tri shUl phyag rgya'i mchog /dpag bsam shing dang lcug ma dang / /pad+ma rta mgrin 'phang mtho ba/ /rta mgrin ljang gu de bzhin no/ /phag gi mche ba grub pa dang / /zla ba nyi

ma de bzhin no/ /rin chen sna tshogs snod chen du/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi ra sa ya/ /thams cad bdag nyid myong skal bzang / /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs bzhin no/ /gling bu dang ni pi bang kun/ /ku maN+Da dang mu ra dza/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dang / /sna tshogs dri rnams

de bzhin no/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dam pa'i tshogs/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la gnas/ /grub

pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur/ /chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang / /de bzhin du ni 'khar gsil dang / /dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam dag /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no/ /de bzhin rtse yi phyag rgya dang / /cha lang dang ni rnga dag dang / /

rdo rje dang ni rin chen snod/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dang / /me long dang ni rlung yab dang / /rdo rje ser ba sprin dang bcas/ /de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya dang / /rdo rje 'bar ba kha T+wAM ga /thod pa kham phor de bzhin no/ /dmar

chen dang ni snying rje dang / /sha chen po yang de bzhin te/ /rnon po mda' dang de bzhin 'dren/ /chang dang chu dang de bzhin te/ /lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa dang / /ras dang de bzhin me dang ni/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i dpal/ /gdug pa thams cad za ba yi/ /mtshan ma'i

phyag rgya grub pa'i tshogs/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub rab sgrub pa'o/ /pad+ma sna tshogs dmar po dang / /ljang gu de bzhin dkar po dang / /mthing gser po le brgan dag /pad+ma mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun/ /pad+ma smyung po bud med rgya/ /de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang / /gsal

zhing dpal bskyed rdo rje dang / /pad+ma mtshan ma'i tshogs gzhan no/ /gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang / /de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me/ /dbang bskur gter dang rgyal mtshan dag /mchod pa'i mtshan ma bsdus pa'o/ /de bzhin sna tshogs pad+ma dang / /rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin te/ /

mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa yis/ /rgyal srid thams cad 'joms pa ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa/ /dngos po brtan g.yo ma lus kun/ /rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'o/ /de skad bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis gsungs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan dag bshad pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi

lha'i/ /rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs mchog /mchod pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bsgyur/ /dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum du bya/ /sri zhur bcas pa'i steg

pa'i mchog /bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dpal/ /'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta/ /bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pas/ /skad cig gis kyang phyag byed na/ /khengs pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /drag po

dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas/ /btud de rab tu phyag 'tshal nas/ /las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo bsgyur/ /bsam pa g.yos pas phyag byas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa legs byas na/ /ma lus lus pa med

par 'grub/ /smin ma g.yon du 'deg tshul gyis/ /ru lu ru lur bcas bgang na/ /tshangs pa nye dbang drag por bcas/ /khams gsum pa rnams phyag byed 'gyur/ /thal mos pad+mo kha 'bus bzhin/ /rang gi sbyor ldan snying gar bcing / /mthe bo mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhin/ /

rgyas pa btud pa'i phyag kyang bya/ /lus kyi yan lag thams cad ni/ /sa la bsnyal te phyag bya ba/ /snying ga kha dang spyi gtsug tu/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag bya'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'gying ba'i thabs/ /'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag byas na/ /khams gsum pa yang phyag byed na/ /mthu

bsnyems gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /gar gyi rgyun rnams ci snyed dang / /de bzhin bya ba'i tshul ston kun/ /de dag rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya/ /rang gi don rnams grub byed pa'o/ /'gying dang bcas pa'i tshul byas nas/ /ci lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed

cing / /bskor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur bcang / /g.yas pa ba dan gsum par byas/ /phyag rgya 'di yis

btab na ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa dang / /dngos grub chen po mchog kun gyi/ /dbang phyug chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa/ /dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /snyems 'dzin chen por bcas pa yi/ /sbyor bas de nyid bteg

nas su/ /'gram pa'i phyogs su yongs bsgyur nas/ /spyi bo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya/ /thams cad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas/ /gar byas de nas phab nas su/ /skal bzang hUM zhes bya ba'i lus/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par

sbyor ba skal ba bzang po bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur ba'i/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/ /de bzhin g.yon du bsgyur bar bya/ /de ni sbyor bas bteg nas su/ /spyi bo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya/ /skal

bzang zhes bya ba'i glus/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /dpal rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen du dgrol/ /mchod pa'i gtor ma kun gyi tshul/ /dur khrod

cha lugs gar byed pas/ /phyag rgya 'di yis gar byed cing / /skal bzang rdo rje drag por dgod/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i thod pa'i thal mo ste mchod pa'i gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u

chung mdzes bsgyur te/ /g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi thal mo'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te/ /rdo rje rin chen thal sbyar nas/ /mchod pa

thams cad dbul bar bya/ /re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dpal rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs/ /bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa dang / /me tog bdug pa mar me mchog /dri yi mchod pa 'byung ba'o/ /gang ba'am 'on te stong pa'ang

rung / /yang na ci 'byor pa yis kyang / /dam tshig mnyam par bsgrub pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur/ /dngos grub dbang phyug grub bas kyang / /kun gyi bdag nyid mchod

par 'gyur/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /rang 'byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun/ /gang dag de yis ma byas shing / /spel bar yang ni ma gyur pa'i/ /rlabs chen dam pa gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad

mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen dang / /dngos grub las dang bde ba dag /'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med/ /mchod pa rab 'byam grub pa rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang

mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las mchod pa thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba dpal skal ba bzang po dam tshig gi rtog pa ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i/ /kun tu sna tshogs mchog

rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya thams cad rnam sprul pa'o/ /sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /bde ba kun la zhen pa dang / /dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku/ /'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyir/ /chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di/ /dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /khams gsum dag na rin chen gzhan/ /sangs rgyas rin

chen lta bu med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen che/ /dbu rgyan can ni bde ba'i mchog /gzhan gyi nor min 'di mi 'phrogs/ /lha yi chu 'dis dag pa ste/ /mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang / /rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub bo/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang / /sangs

rgyas gtsug gi nor bu can/ /kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten dbang / /mi mjed la sogs de 'grub bo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad 'grub/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma

'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs pas bslang nas ni/ /las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa ni/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /lha mo kun mchog dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /mchog tu dga'

ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing / /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /dpung rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /

dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo / /zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /dngos grub thams cad dag pa dang / /pad+ma'i 'dod chags rnam dag phyir/ /brla yi dbus ni dmar la dkar/ /phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra/ /de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug dang / /bde bar reg

pa'i dbang phyug pas/ /dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang ldan/ /lha rdzas sna tshogs kha dog mchog /'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /pad+ma sna tshogs la gnas pa/ /thams cad dag par rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma la sogs mchog /rin chen sna tshogs

rgyan dang gos/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin/ /mi mjed la sogs brgyan pa bzhin/ /bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / /'phrog pa dag kyang lhag par mdzod/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /yan lag thams cad 'phrog par 'grub/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab

na ni/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /dpal ldan 'dod pa kun la dbang / /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje mda' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags/ /bde

ba'i 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog /dbus kyi lha mchog chen po yi/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /bde chen dbang phyug dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /mchog tu dga'

la rab sbyor ba/ /skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/ /rdo rje khaT+wAM ga bzung ste/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /pad bcas rdo rje rgya gram mchog /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /'dod pa

bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /rnal 'byor kun gyis dbang phyug rgyal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi kham phor 'grub/ /bdag la

'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /dpal ldan tshe dang gzhon 'grub pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor

ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje tshe bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /rang byung phyag rgya sna tshogs rnams/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'bab 'grub 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /gtsug lag ci lta'i rjes mthun pa'i/ /

dpal rdzogs rgya chen gar dag gis/ /mda' bzhi yongs su 'phangs na ni/ /bdud bzhi dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dpal rdo rje mda' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rkang pa 'deg cing phab pa dang / /gshibs te mchongs pa'i stabs dag

gis/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bstod nas ni/ /khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje mthu bo che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / /phrogs pa dag gi khyad par du/ /sna tshogs phyag rgyas gar byed cing / /khams gsum dag ni

bsdu bar bya/ /dpal rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lcug ma gang yang rung bzung nas/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bud med thams cad rtsed na ni/ /dpag bsam shing ltar rtag tu 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje 'dod pa'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /myang

ba btung ba ltar byas pas/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten gsum dag skams par byed/ /dpal rdo rje rta gdong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sna yi myang ba'i rngub pa yis/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje

tshangs bcas pa'i/ /khams gsum yang ni sdud par byed/ /dpal rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mig tshugs zhen par blta ba yis/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed/ /dpal rdo rje

spyan nyi zla zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /thams cad bdag nyid myangs pa yis/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /dpal rdo rje kun gyi bdag nyid khams gsum slar 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /gling

bu len pa'i tshul ston cing / /ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas/ /tshangs dang nye dbang drag por bcas/ /'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed/ /dpal rdo rje gling bu'i dbang byed ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /pi bang len pa'i tshul ston cing / /ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas/ /las

rnams grub par rab 'byam dang / /dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje pi bang bde bas rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /cang te'u tshul ston rnal 'byor pa/ /ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas/ /rims dang gdon dang dug zhen pa'i/ /sdug bsngal thams

cad myur du sel/ /dpal rdo rje cang te'u sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdza rnga'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa/ /ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pa/ /gnas gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /skad cig tsam gyis 'bebs par byed/ /dpal rdo rje rdza

rngas myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad byas na ni/ /rang byung gar gyi mchod pa rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byad/ /phra men gdon gyi gnod pa rnams/ /bskor ba'i gar

rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /skad cig tsam gyis zhi bar 'gyur/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dag /skad cig tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam

dang mi mnyam pa'i/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa/ /rang byung lha mo phyag rgya rnams/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te/ /dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid babs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams

cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gi/ /rab tu grub pa'i glu rnams kyis/ /bla med pa yi dngos grub 'thob/ /de nas phyag rgya ye shes 'di/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mchog gi glu/ /las rnams thams cad rab grub cing / /srid pa shin tu bsgrub pa ni/ /kye kye rdo rje

sems dpa' bde chen skal bzang dpal khyod bdag la bsgrub la rtogs par mdzad du gsol/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog /'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog sgrub pa bdag la grub par

mdzad du gsol/ /a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ /kye bde mchog bde bas zung la rnam par sprul/ /hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol/ a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshogs

mkha' 'gro sgyu mas slob ma gzung du gsol/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /kun tu kun nas thams cad du/ /'di nyid kyis ni myur du 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor gyi dkyil

'khor gyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas/ /'dod dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /btso ma gser gyi kha dog bzhin/ /chags

med la sogs chags chen phyir/ /dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs/ /chos kyi rgyal srid rab bsgrubs pas/ /rin chen chos las lhag pa med/ /de bas theg chen byang chub sems/ /rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen dag /g.yas pa'i mthe bo gung mo gnyis/ /g.yon pa'i

khu tshur bcangs pa yi/ /sor mo kun la reg pa ni/ /rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gsal yin/ /byang chub sems chen skye ba dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /shes rab pha

rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ /rab tu bsgrags par 'gyur ba yin/ /byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ /sangs rgyas nyid du rig par bya/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong

zhing / /rnam pa kun tu mchod byed pa/ /de yi sangs rgyas rtag pa'i mchog /mthong zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang / /chos kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor/ /dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa

yis/ /g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyal/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas na/ /bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo / /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su/ /lag pa g.yon pas bkab pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun blo dngos

grub rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i/ /rdo rje khu tshur chen po dgab/ /dpa' bo 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /pad+mo'i bud med khu tshur ni/ /de bzhin g.yon pas bkab na yang / /byang chub

spyod rab 'grub pa rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rin chen 'dzin pa'i khur tshur yang / /lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni/ /sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su/ /lag pa g.yon

pas bkab na ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni/ /dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rta gdong dpal gyi khu tshur yang / /

lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni/ /thams cad 'gugs par rab grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dpal grub spyan gyi khu tshur yang / /lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni/ /snang ba thams cad rab grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dang po sangs rgyas kun

snod pa/ /gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin/ /gsum pa kun tu bzang po'i 'o/ /bzhi pa mi zad snod yin no/ /sangs rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal/ /de bzhin zhal bzang gzungs ma yin/ /sprin chen mo ni bdun pa ste/ /brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan yin no/ /gzungs ma thams

cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag gi/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i glu mchog ni/ /'grub par 'gyur ba byed pa'i mchog /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /slong bar byed pa brtan sgrub pa/ /de bzhin sna tshogs rgyas pa dag /drug pa'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs

nas/ /de ba ta yi glu blang ngo / /'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs snyed khyab par 'phros pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed pa/ /sprul pa yi ni sku rnams phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed ni/ /srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun

rnam 'phrul sna tshogs kyis/ /rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul mdzod ho/ /rnam snang sbyor ba a la la ho de ring grub par mdzod/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /

grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang / /rang gi yang dag gsang ba yis/ /cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du/ /me tog la sogs mchod pa bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir/ /dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum po la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rnal 'byor bde mchog dam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khros

byung khro bo ni/ /thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te/ /sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar por snang / /gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrogs pa/ /lha rdzas chu yis dgang ba ste/ /'di ni rang bzhin nyid dag dang / /mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub/ /

gos chen po dang blugs pa che/ /sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che/ /dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yi/ /phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog /shin tu khro gdug gtum po yi/ /sems can khams rnams rnam sbyang phyir/ /'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i/ /rdo rje rgyal chen dbang phyug mchog /

thod pa'i phring ba'i dbu rgyan dang / /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag /rgyal srid thams cad rab bsgrub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rdo rje kha T+TaM rdo rjer bcas/ /dril bu dkrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa/ /dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam

sprul pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas de zos nas/ /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /dpal ldan rdo rje he ru ka rdo rje 'bab pa rnam par 'phrul pa/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /se ral kha yi tshul

dag tu/ /kha T+wAM ga la rgyab rten byas/ /lag pa g.yon na thod pa thogs/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya/ /nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor pa/ /nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /dngos po thams cad mkha' las 'byin/ /

phyag rgya 'di yis yongs btab nas/ /bde bar lhag pa'i tshul ston pas/ /nam mkha' las ni kun lhags te/ /bdag gi spyod par de spyod do/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla mkha' 'gro mi bzad tshogs/ /mkha' las sgyu ma kun blags nas/ /lus pa med

par de za'o/ /nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bde bar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas la/ /rkang pa rang gi brla

bsdams na/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas su/ /gar byed cing ni de za'o/ /de nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /de nas bde bar brla bsdams pas/ /legs par bsdams te phyer btags nas/ /rab tu

bkram ste btung bar bya/ /sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis ni/ /de nas brla phrag bskyod pa yis/ /skal bzang lha dang mi rnams kyi/ /bud med kun la de spyod do/ /bde bar reg pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de

nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas pa'o/ /zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog /dga' ba'i gar byed 'gyur bar bcas/ /shi ba ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba'i

phyag rgya rab tu gnas/ /zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang / /gyen du dbugs 'byin gar byed lus/ /lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis/ /me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog /chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang / /ras dang me gtong grub

pa yis/ /khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so/ /rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis/ /sbyor ba'i gnyer ba bde ba sbyin/ /mngon par gtor zhing se gol rdob/ /dal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas/ /g.yon du blta zhing lag pas drangs/ /'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhin te/ /gar

byed rab tu rmongs pa dang / /zad dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang / /tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni/ /de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las rgal/ /de bzhin sa las 'dren pa dang / /rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul ston dang / /dur khrod dag gi gar byed dang / /de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor

dang / /rab tu 'jigs par sreg pa'i me/ /las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas/ /dang po rgyas 'debs ma yi rgya/ /snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o/ /gsum pa shin tu rmongs byed ma'o/ /de bzhin bzhi pa 'degs byed ma'o/ /lnga pa gar byed pa yi rgya/ /drug pa gsod ma'i yin

par bshad/ /bdun pa za ba mo yi rgya/ /brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin/ /de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyi/ /phyag rgya'i lan rnams bla na med/ /phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kun 'joms pa/ /khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje pad+ma slong / /gar dag byed cing byas na ni/ /rgyas btab

rmongs byas zos pa dang / /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sbyor ba'i glu/ /las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub pa/ /khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs

'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog ston kun gsol pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas mnabs su gsol/ /bde mchog ngo mtshar bde ba zhugs/ /hUM a la la ho gnang bar mdzod/ /

rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul/ /dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol/ /nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod/ /ma lus pa dag mnabs su gsol/ /nyon mongs thams cad bsal bar mdzod/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /rdo rje thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /

mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal he ru ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya dpal

du gnas/ /mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir/ /shel sgong shin tu dag pa 'dra/ /'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/ /'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas tshe ni rin chen spras/ /gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sangs rgyas thams cad

'dus pa yis/ /bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur/ /gar stabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /yongs su bsgyur zhing gar byas pas/ /pad+mo'i mtshan mchog pad+mor bcas/ /phyag ni rgya rnams 'khor lo bskor/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /pad+ma

sgyu mas rnam sbyangs nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub par mdzad/ /'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa'o/ /skal ba bzang po dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed mar gnas/ /rgyal po'i skyil

mo krung bcas nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed/ /dpal pad+ma rgyal po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma dmar po ci bder bzung / /rang gi snying gar 'dren pa'i tshul/ /pad+ma 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'o/ /bsnyems pa'i

lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma sngon po ci bder bzung / /rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul gyis/ /bud med phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+mo dkar po ci bder bzung / /'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /

bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma mthing ga ci bder bzung / /g.yas pas rab tu gar byed pa/ /dpal gyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum/ /bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma ser po ci bder bzung / /g.yas pa rab tu gar byed pas/ /chu

srin tshul du bsgreng bar bya/ /bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+ma le brgan mchog bzung ste/ /rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul gyis/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal/ /sgrol ma'i byang chub mchog yin no/ /rgya chen ma yi 'khor

lo bskor/ /khro gnyer ma ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /pad+ma gnas pa'i dpal chen yin/ /'dod pa'i dbang mo'i 'gro ba gsum/ /dpal pad+ma'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i lha mo chen mo rnams so/ /de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di/ /pad+ma rgyal po dpal gyi glu/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub

pa/ /khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin/ /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba/ /kye sems dpa' pad+ma dga' mchog sgyu ma'i dga' ba bstan du gsol/ /a la la la

ho/ /kye gar dbang thar dga' dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bdag tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag /nyi zla bdag lags a la la la ho/ /pad+ma sgyu ma sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i tshul gyis gar mdzad pa/ /pad+mo dam tshig dbang phyug sangs

rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol/ /'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad du ni rnam par sbyongs/ /pad+ma 'dzin pa de yi spyan sngar gar mkhan gar mdzod cig /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /sna tshogs pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /gdon

mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /nor mchog rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/ /dpal ldan nyi ma phyag rgyar gnas/ /nam mkha'i snying po thams cad

phyogs/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /rin chen thams cad mkha' las 'bebs/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum po la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni/ /dam pa'i don du drag por gyur/ /drag pos

'dul ba'i 'jig rten rnams/ /drag po nyid kyis sgrub par byed/ /nyi ma'i gzugs dang spyod lam dang / /tshul dang gzi brjid chen pos ston/ /rdo rje gzhu dang mda' mchog dag /shin tu legs par 'gengs pa ste/ /mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i spyan/ /g.yon

pa 'byed cing gyen du 'deg /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa yi/ /'jig rten gsum po ma lus par/ /drag shul nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad/ /dpal khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje pus mo gnyis

bcings te/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /bdag ni stan la 'dug nas ni/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/ /dpal rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo / /dbang bskur pa dang gter bdag dang / /rgyal mtshan mchog ldan mchod pa che/ /ci lta'i tshul dag ston pa dag /

rang gi don rnams 'grub pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di/ /rgyal po'i sgyu ma mchog gi glu/ /las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub pa/ /khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid sna tshogs mchog gi nor ldan pas/ /mjal dum g.yul 'gyed

rnam mang khyad par sangs rgyas 'dul ba ste/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mjal dum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po bde mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol/ /sems can sprin la byang chub mchog sbyin sna tshogs char 'bebs pa/ /bdag gi re ba kun sgrubs

myur ston a la la la ho/ /mi zad gter gyi dbang bskur khyad par bdag la stsal du gsol/ /khyad par rin chen 'di dag thams cad bud med rin chen rnams kyi phyir/ /rin chen tshogs kun nang na bud med rin chen gcig pu mchog /bud med rin chen dag pa dam

pa'i don du thams cad 'gro/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /rgyal srid thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /drag shul sbyor bas rnal 'byor dpal/ /rta yi phyag rgya rab tu gnas/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /rab tu gdon pa'i rtsal dag gis/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /

'dod chags can la g.yen par ston/ /gdug pa rnams la gdug par ston/ /zhi ba rnams la zhi bar 'gyur/ /drag shul can la drag shul sbyor/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa la rmig pa bzhi/ /rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste/ /dbang phyug dam pa grub

par 'gyur/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyis/ /dpal ldan pad+ma sna tshogs 'dzin/ /rdo rjer bcas shing slong ba sgrub/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /shin tu lhung bar gyur pa yang / /de ma thag tu kun bslangs nas/ /ldang ba thams cad

rab tu 'grub/ /thams cad dag pa mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po/ /dpal rdo rje slong ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /brkyang bskum pa yi tshul byas nas/ /khro bo'i skyil mo krung bcas te/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu bshig /dpal

rdo rje khro bo gnas pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di'i/ /rta mchog dpal dang ldan pa'i glu/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /myos byed stong las lhag par bde ba 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong las

lhag par rab tu 'jigs/ /zhi ba'i sku yang tshangs pa stong pas shin tu lhag par ston/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun 'grub par mdzod/ /thams cad rnam par dag pas ngo 'thon stobs kyis gnon pas non/ /hi he he he he dbang phyug thams cad rab

shig rab tu shig /rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon dbang phyug non/ /sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon mthu chen non/ /mnyam sbyor ru Ta ma Ta snying las dpal mo drongs shig rab drongs

shig /rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon tshangs pa non/ /sbyor chen tshangs las grol ma drongs shig sma ra Ta/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon dga' dbang non/ /mnyam sbyor kun gyi bdag la dga' drongs a la la

la ho/ /gdug cing khro la rab tu gtum pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir/ sgrub zhugs a la la la ho/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M phaT phaT/ /mdza' bo mi la bya'am mi bya yongs rtog de dag med kyang sla/ /de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas de la mdza' bshes su zhig zer/ /rgol

ba la yang bya 'am mi bya yongs su rtog pa med kyang sla/ /de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas de la dpa' zhes su zhig zer/ /glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni/ /rta mchog mnyam par sbyor ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /thams cad

'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /mdzub mos mthe bo mnan nas ni/ /rang gi mthe bos mdzub mo mnan/ /dpal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya ste/ /mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur bya/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas/ /rdo rje spyan ni gnyis dag tu/ /khong stong du ni sbyor bar bya/ /dpal grub

rdo rje'i spyan yin no/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal grub spyan ni grub pa ste/ /sems can thams cad dbang byed pa/ /las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam

rnams/ /ma lus dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /mthe bo'i rtse mo mnyam par gzhag /khong stong mi 'gyur dam pa'o/ /spyi bo'i mtshams su rab bzhag nas/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/ /sangs

rgyas dngos grub ma lus pa/ /lus pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /mthe bo gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs/ /'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma/ /'grub pa

bdud la sogs pa za/ /de bzhin du ni rmongs par byed/ /dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /de bzhin rnam par shes pa sgrub/ /gter rnams 'byin par byed pa dang / /de bzhin nor kun 'phrog par byed/ /ngal bso po ni dpal mnan te/ /dpal mo dag kyang phrogs

nas ni/ /mngag gzhug mar ni byed pa dang / /gnod sbyin ma dang dga' ba spyod/ /gnod sbyin dag gi sde dpon du/ /'dis ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas/ /gung mo mnyam par rab tu bsgrub/ /mthe

bo mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhi/ /pad+ma dri med rab tu rgyas/ /'dis ni sdig rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa byang na rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mngon sangs rgyas//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /dpal ldan pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ /

mdzub mo mnyam par phyir bkug ste/ /mthe bo rdo rje g.yogs pa ni/ /rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu ste/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /nam mkha' thams cad rab 'grub ste/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod/ /rdo rje thal

mo mnyam sbyar nas/ /mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam par brkyang / /mdzub mo rtse mnyam bkug pa ni/ /dpal mchog rta zhes grags pa ste/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'brel na/ /thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpal/ /lha yi skal bzang

smos ci dgos/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /mtshan pa'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpal/ /de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang / /

rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos grub ni/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'dis/ /

mi 'grub 'byor pa mi 'gyur ba'i/ /dam pa rgya chen gang yang med/ /dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i/ /ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs su ldan/ /bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag/ kun gyi bdag la zhugs par bya/ /phyag rgya

'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal pa bzang po'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /chags pa med cing ma
