chags med/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu sbyor 'di/ /gnyis su med pa'i theg pa'i mchog /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /dpal ldan sgyu ma kun gyi bdag /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /sgyu ma thams cad

kyi lha mo'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub pa'o/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum dag

ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du/ /mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur/ /dmigs su yod pa'ang ma yin te/ /de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /bud med la sogs

rin chen mchog /mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod/ /dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas/ /nam mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /shin tu rtag par 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /chags pa'i nyes pas mi

gos pa/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'ang de bzhin du/ /gnas kyi nyes pas yong mi gos/ /shin tu gdug cing drag po la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba ni/ /rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag /thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /

sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du/ /drag shul sbyor bas mnyam sbyor ba/ /'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya/ /sbyor ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sbyor ba ji snyed yod kun dang / /byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya/ /dngos grub thams cad

rab sgrub pa'o/ /byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /chags pa chen po dbang phyug dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal pa bzang po dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / /

khyad par du ni 'phrog pa dang / /yan lag kun tu byed pa yis/ /de ni nor rnams kun kyang phrogs/ /'o byed 'khyud la sogs pa yis/ /khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'debs so/ /thar bar byed cing gsod par byed/ /shi yang mod la sos par byed/ /sbyor ba'i longs spyod

thams cad kyis/ /gnas gsum po ni ma lus par/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas su/ /gar byas nas ni za bar byed/ /sbyor ba kun gyi bde myong bas/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang / /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /sbyor

ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing / /bde ba myong ba rab sbyor ba/ /mdzes par lta ba'i gar byed pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang / /thal

bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma che/ /mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam bsgyur ba/ /rim gror bcas shing steg pa'i mchog /mdzes par lta bas gar byas pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas

ni/ /zos nas slar yang 'tsho bar byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor ba/ /rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum/ /shin tu srid pa yang dag sgrub/ /gsang bar lta la gnas na ni/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /srid pa kun tu kun bsgrubs nas/ /

rigs gsum dag ni sgrub par byed/ /steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan/ /mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam bsgyur zhing / /rim gror bcas shing steg pa'i mchog /steg pa'i lta bas gar byed cing / /mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs rnams kyis/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla

gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten gsum dag sgrub par byed/ /mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i kha/ /khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i bzhin/ /khro la 'gyur bar bcas shing 'dzum/ /gsal bar blta zhing legs par gnas/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla

gshin rje tshangs bcas pa/ /rgyal po sgyu mas rnam rgyal nas/ /khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed/ /'dod chags myos pas g.yem spyo ba/ /mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par bsgyur/ /'di ni bzhin gyi phyag rgya mchog /khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed/ /drag po mche

ba rnon po gtsigs/ /gdug pa za ba 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /g.yas pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis/ /khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum/ /g.yon pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis/ /khams gsum

dag kyang thar bar byed/ /spyi bor rta mgrin gsang mtho ba/ /rta gdong ljang ser kha dog gsal/ /so gtsigs pas ni mchu mnan na/ /'jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /bzhin gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /mdzes pa'i ma mchu sos mnan

te/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed/ /'dod chags bde bas g.yem spyo ba/ /steg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed/ /sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog /

mdzes pa'i ma mchu g.yo bar byed/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed/ /sha chen gyi ni ro myong zhing / /ma mchu so yis mnan pa yis/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed/ /

bde ba kun gyi ro myong zhing / /ma mchu rnam par mdzes byas pa/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog shes pa'o/ /bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba/ /zam zim lta ba rnams bsgyur bas/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas

zos pa yis/ /khams gsum dag kyang 'tsho bar byed/ /bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog /mdzes par blta ba'i gar byas pas/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas bslang nas ni/ /khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par byed/ /sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba/ /lta ba

rab zhi bde bar gnas/ /lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /bud med thams cad dbang du byed/ /smin mtshams khro gnyer 'gyur bcas pas/ /lta ba rab 'bar rnam par bsgyur/ /lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /khams gsum dag kyang 'bar bar byed/ /khro zhing

'gyur bar bcas pas 'dzum/ /lta ba gsal la bde ba gnas/ /lta ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog 'di ni/ /khros pa thams cad rab tu sgrub/ /steg la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan/ /steg bcas lta ba'i gar byed pa/ /lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /khams gsum dag kyang

gar byed 'jug /lta ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /na ma stu sar+b+ba bu ng+d+heb+h+yoH zhes pa'i phyag rgya la gnas na/ /las dang mchod pa ma lus pa/ /lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub/ /rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha' dbyings

kyi mtha' klas pa/ /lan cig brjod pas 'grub pa'i phyir/ /dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis/ /gang dag byas par ma gyur cing / /spel ba dag tu ma gyur pa'i/ /dam pa rgya chen de dag med/ /oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarbAr+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mchog

'di ni/ /sems can thams cad dbang byed pa/ /stobs kyis myur du bkug nas ni/ /bran bzhin du ni byed du 'jug /su b+ha gA sta~M ma hA na de bi hi ri/ mi ri/ ri ti/ ni ri shri ye swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di/ /'dod pa'i bde ba kun sbyin pa'o/ /o~M tAre tu t+tA re tu re swA hA/ chos

kyi phyag rgya la gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs na/ /bud med gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /trI b+ha ba TA TA/ tra Ta tra Ta/ re ba thams cad kun nas rdzogs/ /chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /shrI badzra pad+ma b+haD+Da b+ha mu kha yo gI shwa ra hi hi hi hi hi/

chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig /chos kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /skad kyi gsang ni mthon dman dang / /gre sgyur bcos shing bzlas pa dang / /dus rab zhi ba mchog rnams kyis/ /hU~M la sogs pa'i glu blang zhing / /tshig rnams kun gyis ci 'dod

par/ /ji ltar spro bar glu kun gyis/ /hU~M gi glu yi phyag rgya dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pa'o/ /lha mo kun gyi lha mo mchog /cha lugs bzhin du gar bya zhing / /ka ka la shang b+ha la sogs/ /glu rnams thams cad rjes su blang / /oM gyi glu yi phyag rgya ni/ /tshangs pa'i

dbyangs kyis ci dgar blangs/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /sems can thams cad thar bar byed/ /rdo rje drag po gad mo che/ /mkhur ba'i dbugs kyis rlung 'byin cing / /'brug gi sgra ltar zab pa yi/ /ru lu ru lu'i sgra byung na/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /khams gsum

dag kyang rgyas 'debs shing / /thar par byed cing gsod par byed/ /shi ba mod la 'tsho bar byed/ /rdo rje drag tu bzhad pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /Te zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya/ /thams cad dag par sgrub pa'o/ /hi zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byed/ /ka

ka la l+ye dang tso ra'i dbyangs/ /de bzhin rab tu gdangs snyan dang / /ka ha sha yi glu yi rgya/ /'joms pa thams cad grub pa'o/ /glu yi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang / /de bzhin rgyud rgyud stug dang / /sil snyan phyag rgya bshad pa rnams/ /las

rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /cha lugs bzhin du gar byed pas/ /ma brdungs par yang rab tu 'grub/ /las rnams kun la mchog tu ni/ /brdungs na dpal ni bzhi 'gyur 'grub/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig dang / /bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /rnam par

sel la sogs pa'i thabs/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ /ruT+Taman+Ta/ /smarAraT/ hu lu hu lu/ pra sid+d+h+ya/ Tak+kihU~MdzaH kI ni d+hu ni hU~M truM/ Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ hu lu hu lu/ a la la la ho/ /shud+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya/ da riShA ya sar+b+banaT g+hai g+hai/ TaT g+haig+haig+hai/ Ta g+hai Ta

ke gai gai gai Ta ta kai/ Ta ge/ /hoM ToN/ Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ ge te ge d+ho na/ Tak+ki hU~M truM/ a la la la ho/ /ruT+Ta maT+Ta/ thal mo brdab pa brtag pa'o/ /Ta g+he Ta g+he/ Ta g+he g+he/ Ta ke na Ta/ g+heM g+heM g+heM/ Ta g+heMg+heM Ta g+heM/ rgyun gyi rnga'o/ A~M A~M A~M/ hA~M hA~M hA~M/ bA~M bA~M bA~M/ d+ha~M d+ha~M d+ha~M/ dam

tshig gsum gyi rnga'o/ /d+he k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM/ d+he badzra badzra N+yang / kong kong kong / hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo d+ha~M/ k+hong k+hong k+hong / D+ho/ k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM/ D+NoM kauM kauM kauM/ dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i rdo rje rnga'i phyag rgya'o/ /pad+ma pad+ma hri/ pad+ma pad+ma shI/ pad+ma pad+ma hrang / dpal pad+mo

brdabs pa'i rnga'o/ /trAM trAM trAM/ b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha/ ta Ta tA TA TA TA TA TA/ tAM tA tA tA/ trA trA trA trA trA/ traM Ta~M ke tad+kung tra/ tuT+Ta t+t+ra/ rgyal po'i rnga'o/ /Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ Tak+ki hU~M dzaH Tak+ki hU~M dzaH snyems pa'i 'gros so//trA T+Ta trA trA trA trA trA/ myur zhing rab tu myur ba'o/ /ta Ta b+ha ta/

ba trun/ ta thA ga te/ ba hUM/ ta TA b+ha ta ta b+ha hi na dpal rta mchog rnam par rol pa'o/ /ta tA b+ha Ta Ta b+ha tAng t+t+ra/ shin tu myur ba'i rnga'i phyag rgya ste/ /sil snyan gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas/ /lag gnyis rdo rjer bcings pa yi/ /rdo rje se gol

brdabs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun kyang 'du 'gyur na/ /gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig smos/ /g.yon pa'i se gol brdabs pa dang / /thal mo dal bus

brdabs pas 'grub/ /g.yas pa'i thal mo yin par gsungs/ /gnyi ga kun tu sdud pa yin/ /thal mo'i sbyor ba rab sbyor bas/ /las kyi tshul bzhin 'brang ba dang / /thal mo dal bus bsdu ba dang / /glu dang sil snyan gar byed pas/ /steg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang / /rgod

dang khro dang 'jigs pa dang / /mi sdug ngo mtshar zhi ba yi/ /nyams kyis phyag rgya dang don sgrub/ /steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gar byas pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid rgyar sbyor bas/ /dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /rdo rje sems dpa' steg pa

la/ /dpa' la dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa snying rje la/ /rgod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog /rdo rje nyi ma khro ba la/ /rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa la/ /shAkya thub pa mi sdug pa/ /ngo mtshar la ni a ra li/ /rab tu zhi la sangs rgyas rtag /sdug bsngal thams cad

zhi ba'i phyir/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /nye bar gnas shing byin gyis rlobs/ /lta bas mi ngoms pa yi gzugs/ /thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad/ /legs so zhes bya 'grub pa yi/ /mchog tu gyur pa rab tu stsol/ /thams cad bdag nyid grub pa'i mchog /

re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun tu 'gyur ba'i mchog /rnal 'byor dam pa ster bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya sbyor ba 'di dag gis/ /rang gi mchod pa rab tu sbyar/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i/ /sbyor ba thams cad rnam 'khrul dang / /phyag rgya phyag

rgya'i lan rnams dang / /sna tshogs phyag rgya rnam sprul pas/ /yid la bsams pa kun rdzogs phyir/ /mchod pa dam pa sbyar bar bya/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /kun gyi slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyur/ /kun 'byung la sogs sbyor ba yis/ /rgol ba bdag dang

gar byas te/ /de nas rgol ba ci rigs pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas slar ni rgol ba yang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por bsgyur/ /rgol ba'ang de nas tshul bzhin du/ /pad+ma gar 'byung mchog tu bsgyur/ /de nas slad du rgol ba yang / /

rdo rje nyi ma mchog tu bsgyur/ /de nas phyir yang rgol ba ni/ /rta mchog 'byung bar bsgyur bar bya/ /de nas slar ni rgol ba yang / /bdag nyid 'byung bas rab tu 'grub/ /de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di/ /sdom pa thams cad rab ston pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi glu/ /

khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong las mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par snang / /la lar rab tu 'jigs pa'i nyi ma bye ba phrag dgu'i 'od zer mchog pas 'jigs/ /la lar mdangs bzang gzi che bde dang zhi bar ldan pa rgyal ba'i gzugs

su snang / /la lar 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog ldan par ston/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub phyir 'dul la mkhas pa ma lus bde ba'i mchog rnams las/ /a ra li rnams mnyam sbyor grub mdzod ru Ta ma Te a la la la ho/ /

rnam pa mang po 'dul bar mdzad pa'i tshul la gar mkhan mchog gis gar mdzad pa/ /dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar mdzod a la la la ho/ /rnam mang bde mchog rab tu gar mdzad pa yis thar pa'i bde ba'ang thob par mdzod/ /'di dag glur ni blangs

pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /de ltar rab tu gar byas te/ /de las gang zhig pham gyur pa/ /tshogs la de yis tshogs kyi zas/ /yon dang bcas par dbul

bar bya/ /mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis/ /sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin rtag par bsrung bar 'gyur/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang / /mkha' 'gros gtse dang gdon rnams dang / /bdud dang sems

can dmyal ba'i rnams/ /'di yis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub rnams dang phun sum tshogs/ /dga' dang de bzhin bdag po dang / /sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad dang / /phyag rgya'i mchog rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /gar gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rab tu

dga' ba rjes su rab chags dga' ba'i mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas btab pas/ /rab tu dga' bar sbyor ba'i bde bas myos pa bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod/ /rab tu bde mchog rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang / /rab tu

dga' ba'i dbang phyug tshe mchog grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs ho rta mchog ho/ /rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog la rol cig ho/ /bde bas slong la rnam par rol hU~M snang bar mdzod/ /a la la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis/ /

slob ma rab tu gzung du gsol/ /kye ma'o bde mchog grub par mdzod/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba stsol/ /dam par rab tu zhugs par mdzod/ /bdag la rab tu dgyes par gyur/ /a la la la ho/ e ma'o/ /shi shi zhugs shig zhugs shig /mkha' 'gro bde mchog yongs

bskor kun tu zhugs/ /'di dag glur ni blangs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sdud pa dang / /rdo rje rin chen bla med pa/ /rdo rje chos ni gsungs pa dang / /rdo rje

las ni byed par 'gyur/ /hU~M rdo rje las kyi mda' gzhu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /la lar rab tu drag cing skye

bor drag la drag pa'i bud med sku ltar rab tu snang / /'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir la lar rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku/ /la lar rab tu des zhing zhi ba mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur yang ston par mdzad/ /la lar rab tu 'bar ba'i chags pa pad+ma

rgyal po'i dam tshig bdag la grub par mdzod/ /thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi zad gter mchog bdag la grub pa mdzad du gsol/ /kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng ba'i rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la grub par mdzod/ /la lar mkhas

pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin/ /la lar dus mtha'i dus ltar drag /la lar rgyal ba'i dbang po bzhin du zhi/ /la lar rta mchog sbyor bas 'dod pa sgrub/ /rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /me tog dkar dang dmar ba dang / /mthing ga ser po kun bsdus pa/ /

me tog phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spro/ /rgya skegs mthing ga ljang khu'i mdog /tshon sna bzhi yis btsos pa dang / /dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag /snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub/ /khams las byung ba thams cad dang / /srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin

te/ /rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim pa/ /snga ma bzhin du mnyam par bsgrub/ /tsan+dan gnyis dang gla rtsi dang / /ga pur na ga sha la ki/ /bdug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /gan dar dri dang gu gul dang / /sa rdza ga bur gla rtsi dang / /rdzas 'di dag

las btsos pa'i mar/ /me mar byas na snang ba skye/ /tsan+dan gur gum spr-i ka dang / /ga bur dang ni gla rtsi dang / /bcas pa bdug pa grub pa ste/ /spos kyi phyag rgya spos mchog 'gyur/ /kak+ko la dang sug smel dang / /gla sgang ga bur gla rtsi dang / /'di rnams zhib tu

btags pa ni/ /seng ldeng bu ram dag kyang sbyar/ /shing tsha pa twa lo drA dang / /na le sham dang ga bur sbyar/ /sa ha ka re shing mngar gyis/ /sprus pa kha yi spos yin no/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba'o/ /me tog dmar po sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje can la

sna tshogs pa/ /'jig rten dbang la me tog dkar/ /ser po mkha' las byung ba la/ /tsan+dan bdug pa sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje can la du ru ska/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang ka pi ta/ /ce pog rdo rje nyi ma la/ /mar me phreng ba sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje can la mar me mdun/ /

spyan ras gzigs la mar me brgya/ /stong ni rdo rje nyi ma la/ /sangs rgyas rnams la tsan+dan spos/ /rdo rje can la gur gum yin/ /spyan ras gzigs la tsan+dan dmar/ /ga bur rdo rje nyi ma la/ /me tog kun dang bdug pa kun/ /de bzhin mar me thams cad dang / /spos

rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ /rdo rje rta la dbul du rung / /mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sgeg mo dang ni na chung dang / /myos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang / /gcig tu dpa' dang 'dod chags sra/ /g.yon can bran mo de bzhin te/ /lan tshwa la sogs ro kun dang / /

kha ra la sogs bdud rtsi bzhin/ /bdag nyid kyi ni ro sgrub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /sha dang chang du ldan pa yi/ /bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni/ /dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchog ste/ /tshe yi dam pa rab tu 'grub/ /a mra smin dang rgun 'brum dang / /pa na

sa dang ni ke ra/ /ar ka la sogs 'bras bu yi/ /phyag rgya'i mchog ni 'di rnams te/ /dngos grub 'bras bu thams cad 'thob/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi byugs pa yis/ /a mra la sogs tshig gus byug /sa ha ka ra'i mar la sogs/ /mnyam pa'i dri yis bsku bar bya/ /yungs

dang rgya skegs la sogs pa'i/ /tshon gyis mthun par kha bsgyur nas/ /shun pa gro ba la sogs byas/ /mchod pa'i tshe na dbul bar bya/ /'bras bur bcas pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams la bshos dbul bar/ /sha dang chang ni rnam par spangs/ /glu dang

sil snyan grub pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /sha dang chang du bcas pa ni/ /gtor ma'i mchog ste sna tshogs pa'o/ /bdag gi phyugs chen skal bzang po/ /rdo rje'i las ni dpal grub pa'o/ /bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dang / /pad+ma'i me tog

ldan pa ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bo la/ /phul na dgos pa thams cad 'grub/ /rgyal po'i kha zas sna tshogs pa/ /sha dang chang du ldan pa dang / /glu dang sil snyan skal bzang dag /rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dbul/ /kha zas kun gyi ro rnams dang / /

sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang / /sha yi sbyor dang sha skam dang / /bshos dag rdo rje rta la dbul/ /mchod pa dang gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe bo sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar/ /

lhag ma rdo rje thal mor sbyar/ /sangs rgyas rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ /rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba/ /rgyal srid thams cad ma lus pa/ /lus pa med par myur du 'grub/ /spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang / /'gram pa gnyis dang ltag par ni/ /sangs rgyas kun

gyi rin chen mchog /dbu rgyan kun tu brgyan par bya/ /dbu rgyan bcings pas bcings nas ni/ /'gying zhing mtha' mas dgrol bar bya/ /dar gyi mtha' ma dpyangs pa ltar/ /byas nas thal mo brdab par bya/ /sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /

de yis dgra med sdig med par/ /bdag gi longs spyod nyid du spyod/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub che/ /'khor los sgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /nor bu rin po

che'i dbu rgyan mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol/ /sor mo rtse mo kun sprad nas/ /mthe bo rdo rjes mnan pa ni/ /sna dang mig phugs lta bu ste/ /pad+mo'i rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ /bdag nyid chen por dbang

bskur ba/ /rgyal srid thams cad ma lus pa/ /lus pa med par myur du 'grub/ /spyi bo dang ni dpral pa dang / /'gram pa gnyis dang ltag par sbyar/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan te/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu 'bar/ /dbu rgyan bcings pas bcings nas ni/ /

'gying ba'i mtha' nas dgrol bar bya/ /dar gyi mtha' ma dpyangs pa ltar/ /byas nas thal mo brdab par bya/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra/ /khams gsum dag ni rgyal srid che/ /'khor los sgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ /dpal rdo

rje he ru ka pad+ma nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te/ /lag gnyis nor bu rin chen du/ /ji ltar rigs par mnyam sbyar nas/ /mdzub mo mthe bo rtse mo bzhi/ /yongs su bsgyur te

bteg nas su/ /dpral bar legs par gzhag na ni/ /khams gsum bdag po rgyal ba dag /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yi/ /mdzub mo gnyis pa'i mdud par bcing / /gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo can/ /

rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur/ /yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas kyang / /khro gnyer du ni legs bzhag na/ /rgyal srid thams cad legs 'grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/ /rdo rje las kyi dpal dang 'dra/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab

bsgrubs pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'gyur/ /ma mo dang ni byad ma dang / /mkha' 'gro ma yang lhag par 'grub/ /dur khrod dngos grub thams cad dang / /las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe bo dpa' bo'i skyil mo krung / /

mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar/ /lhag ma rdo rje thal mo'i 'od/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ /rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /'jig rten dbang po dam pa kun/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas

na ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad dpal dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ /mdzub mo bsnyams te phyi rol dgug /

mthe bo gnyis ni rab tu brkyang / /rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya/ /dpral bar myur du bzhag pa ni/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /rgyal srid thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dpal nor bu rin po che dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sangs

rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang / /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang / /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen mchog /rta mchog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgyas rab tu dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mo yin par bshad/ /sor mo

thams cad bsdams pa ni/ /rdo rje bsdams pa yin par bshad/ /rdo rje bsdams pa byas na ni/ /mdzub mo mthe bo'i nang dag tu/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i mtshan ma 'di/ /rtse mo bcug la bsdam par bya/ /dga' chen dpal gyi phyag rgya ste/ /phyag rgya thams

cad rang byung ba/ /rab 'byam las rnams dngos grub ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dga' ba'i rdo rje bcings nas ni/ /gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug /mthe bo mthe'u chung rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad

dang / /de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de las gung mo lcags kyu ni/ /bdag gi snying gar sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya/ /de ma thag

tu phyag rgya 'dis/ /sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /bkug ste dbang du byas nas ni/ /las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed/ /dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni/ /gung mo bcings pa'i nang

du gzhug /mthe'u chung mthe bo rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyar yongs bsgyur na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar yang / /sbyor ba 'di yis mi dka' na/ /dngos grub gzhan dang las kyi mchog /rab 'byam gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi dpal rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las/ /sbyor ldan thal mo khong stong sbyar/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /de ma thag tu 'bebs par byed/ /dpal rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las/ /gung mo de bzhin bkug nas

ni/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes brjod de/ /gung mo nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /dpal ldan 'dod pa kun gyi bdag /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa la gnas

te/ /mthe bo'i rtse mo de bzhin mnyam/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /dag pa kun la rab tu gnas/ /byang chub sems ni mtha' yas mchog /dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje rab tu

gnas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje'i pad+mor byas pa las/ /gung mo bcings pa'i dbus na gnas/ /mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i rtse mo mde'u/ /rdo rje mda' ni yongs su 'phang / /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /tshangs pa nye dbang dga' byed bcas/ /mthu yis myur du brgyal byas nas/ /

khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed/ /dpal rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bcings nas/ /gung mo bcings pa'i phyi rol gzhag /rdo rje sna tshogs dpal gyi rgya/ /ldang ba thams cad rab grub pa'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya thams cad shes pa'o/ /A li kA li mnyam

byas nas/ /mkha' yi thad kar bsdu bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu ri mo rnams/ /yi ge thams cad dgod par bya/ /gug skyed dag gis lcug mar bya/ /yi ge ra ni myu gur bya/ /klad kor zla ba kham pa dang / /tsheg gnyis zla ba gnyis su bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /

phyag rgya mi 'gyur dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas dpal gyi ri mor bshad/ /yi ge dag kyang mi 'gyur mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i/ /bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na/ /sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' dpal sbyor zhes/ /rab tu chags pa'i mtshan bris na/ /sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /chags chen grol ba dpal zhes bya'i/ /chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni/ /sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /grol ba kun la rab

tu gnas/ /snying rje dri med khro dpal zhes/ /bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na/ /sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog kyang 'grub/ /pad+mo chags pa dpal dag ces/ /chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni/ /sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /

dag pa thams cad rnam par dag /rdo rje nyi ma'i dpal mdangs zhes/ /bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na/ /sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /longs spyod kun la rab tu gnas/ /rta mchog pha rol gnon dpal zhes/ /chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni/ /

sdig pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /dbang phyug thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /brjod pa dag kyang de bzhin te/ /las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam dag /ma lus par ni myur du 'grub/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gi/ /slob dpon gang dang gang yin pas/ /de dang de yi mtshan dag ni/ /

dpal gyi tshig dang ldan par brjod/ /slob ma dkyil 'khor btsud nas kyang / /yon gyi mchog dag blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas/ /de bzhin gshegs par de lung bstan/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /rdo rje'i ming du rab

tu gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur/ /bstod pa dang bcas pa'i ming gi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /spyi bor nyug pa gang yin pa/ /phyag 'tshal bar ni ston pa yin/ /dpral bar reg par byed pa ni/ /phyag lan yin par shes par bya/ /smin ma bskul ba gang yin pa/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa'i brda/ /g.yas pas nam mkhar 'gro ba 'grub/ /g.yon pa rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya/ /mig gnyis g.yo bar 'grub pa ste/ /g.yon pa bud med bzang mo yin/ /g.yas pa skyes pa bzang po'o/ /rna ba dag la

reg pa'i brda/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis ka de bzhin te/ /g.yon pa legs par blangs pa'i glu/ /g.yas pa legs par smras pa'o/ /sna yi bu ga gnyis kyi brda/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa ste/ /g.yas pa bdag la bdug pa slong / /g.yon pa bdag la dri slong

ba'o/ /lce ni ldag pa ltar byed pa/ /brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste/ /g.yas pa sha yi phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa chang gi phyag rgya yin/ /mche ba g.yas dang g.yon pa yi/ /bar du ma mchu mnan pa ni/ /g.yon pa bud med reg na bde/ /g.yas pa de bzhin skyes pa'o/ /

lkog mar reg pa'ang de bzhin te/ /brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste/ /theg pa chen po bla med pa'i/ /rtog pa thams cad smra ba'i mchog /snying gar gyen du 'dren pa ni/ /rang byung phyag rgya'i brda grub pa/ /rdo rje thams cad 'dren pa ste/ /'khor ba shin tu sdud pa'o/ /lte ba'i dkyil

du reg pa ni/ /brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste/ /dbu ma'i nan tan bsgrubs pa yis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil/ /rang gi dbang po bsgreng pa ni/ /rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya/ /de las de bzhin bde ba yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /

phrag pa gnyis ni kun bstod pa/ /brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste/ /g.yas pa 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa slad du gtong ba'o/ /dpung pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis/ /bdag la shes rab 'khyud pa yi/ /g.yas pa thams cad 'grub pa yin/ /g.yon

pa dbang phyug thams cad 'grub/ /khu tshur g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis/ /khu tshur bcangs dang dgrol ba dag /g.yas pa rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa mi rnams thong shig pa'o/ /brla gnyis rab tu bsdams pa ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te/ /

g.yon pa 'dod la rab tu brtson/ /g.yas pa chos la brtson pa'o/ /pus mo lha nga'i brda dag kyang / /g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te/ /g.yon pa 'dud pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /g.yas pa rab tu phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /pus mo g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /brda yi phyag

rgyar rab tu gnas/ /g.yas pa bcing ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /g.yon pa thams cad rnam par dgrol/ /rkang pa gnyis kyis sa gnon pa/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te/ /g.yon pa thams cad gnod par byed/ /g.yas pa thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /dngos grub

las dang bde ba dag /'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med/ /rang don las rnams rab grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /a ti b+hu zhes bya ba'i brda/ /'di ni phyag 'tshal ba zhes pa'o/ /pra ti o~Md+hi b+hu zhes pa/ /phyag lan yin

par shes par bya'o/ /sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas phyag rgya bde ba yis/ /e ma'o bde ba yin par bshad/ /e ma'o bde ba dpal gyi mtshan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gang brjod pa/ /sdig pa kun las

thar bar 'gyur/ /bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /bde mchog e ma'o bde ba dang / /sgron ma de bzhin shi shi dag /rgyas 'debs ma dang rmongs byed dang / /za ba mo dang tshe 'phel ma/ /sangs rgyas byang chub chos 'khor lo/ /de bzhin khams gsum rnam par rgyal/ /

'dod pa'i lcug ma thams cad kyang / /phyag rgya brda yi phyag rgya'o/ /rta dang rdo rje'i zhal dag dang / /de bzhin rdo rje snang ba dang / /thal bar rlog pa'i ro langs ma/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no/ /gling bu dang ni rgyud rnams dang / /de bzhin du ni rgyud gcig dang / /stug

po dang ni rdza rnga dag /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o/ /me tog mchod dang bdug pa'i mchod/ /de bzhin mar me'i mchod pa dang / /sbos yi mchod pa gla rtsi dag /longs spyod phyag rgya'i brda yin no/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam

pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /lha mo kun gyi brda yin no/ /smin ma bskyod pa mda' bzhi yin/ /b+ha ga ling ga e ma'o bde/ /thod pa pad+ma yin par bshad/ /kha T+wAM ga yang rgyal mtshan che/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya pad+mar gnas/ /bde ba kun gyi

bdud rtsi yin/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /shi shi sangs rgyas kun tu bshad/ /dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lor bshad/ /de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad/ /lha rnams thams cad tshogs pas na/ /skye bo dam pa kun tshogs pa/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni/ /

mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis/ /de bzhin mdza' bar 'dus par gsungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad yin par bshad/ /lha mo thams cad kun 'dus pas/ /thams cad sna tshogs skal ba bzang / /

rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas kun tu bdag sbyor bas/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen shes pa'i phyir/ /kun gyi slob dpon yin par bshad/ /kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa/ /lha mo thams cad 'dus pas na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog dag gis/ /kun tu

sna tshogs skal bzang po'o/ /de yi slob ma grub pa ni/ /grub pa'i rjes su grub pas na/ /sangs rgyas brda yi gsang ba yis/ /rgyal mtshan yin par rnam par bshad/ /de las gzhan pa'i slob ma kun/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda

dag gis/ /byang chub sems dpa' yin par bshad/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen mchog /dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid mchog /yin par rang byung rnams kyis gsungs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang / /sangs rgyas gtsug

gi nor bu dag /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /dpal gyi pad+ma'i tshul du bshad/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin grub gcig dang / /de bzhin pad+ma'i rang bzhin gcig /thams cad dbang bskur dbang bskur che/ /yin par don kun grub pas gsungs/ /yon gyi dam

pa grub pa ni/ /nor gyi dbyig tu bshad pa ste/ /snying yang nor gyi mchog yin par/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad/ /ga pur tsan+dan dmar po dang / /sbyar ba khrag chen yin par bshad/ /tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa dpal/ /thams cad ldang ba'i ra sa

yin/ /bag zan las ni byas pa'i phyugs/ /tsan+dan dmar pos bskus pa dang / /bag phye'i zan las byas pa'i sha/ /rgyal po'i zan zhes gang bshad pa'o/ /de nas grub pa'i mna' bsgag pa/ /dam tshig ces par gnas pa'o/ /bde mchog bde mchog ces gsungs

pa/ /sangs rgyas bde mchog thams cad kyis/ /phyag rgya'i bde ba mchog tu gsungs//de bzhin e ma'o bde ba dang / /snang ba shes pa'ang rab tu gnas/ /shi shi srid pa'ang srid pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang / /'da' bar bya ba'ang ma

yin pas/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /phyag rgya dam tshig yin par bshad/ /phyag rgya'ang sbyor ba yin par bshad/ /sbyor ba'ang phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad/ /nga ni sna tshogs

dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad/ /de yi nye ba'i longs spyod ni/ /khams gsum thams cad ma lus pa'o/ /de yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri/ /ro dang reg pa bde myos pa'o/ /

gzugs ni ri mo yin par gsungs/ /sgra ni glu yin zhes bshad do/ /dri ni rab tu tshim par gsungs/ /ro ni ra sa ya na yin/ /reg pa bde ba yin par bshad/ /rab tu reg pa dga' ba'i bde/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /chos ni sbyor ba yin par bshad/ /

sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /ji ltar bde bar sten byed cing / /bdag gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyar ba/ /rang gi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin/ /rjes su sbyor bas mchod na ni/ /sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /bde ba

chen po yin par bshad/ /lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'o/ /ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa/ /rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /ting 'dzin rab tu sbyor ba'ang bshad/ /lha mo kun dang mnyam

sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlab bo/ /dga' bar spyod pa grub par bshad/ /rjes su sbyor ba rjes su grub/ /skyes pa ltar byed dga' spyod pa/ /slar yang rjes su grub par mdzad/ /

lha mo kun la bde 'jug pa/ /sbyor ba kun la mos pa ni/ /kun tu sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /ra sa ya na bde bar bshad/ /thams cad ldang ba kun 'gro ba/ /dngos grub dam par rab tu bshad/ /dngos grub chen po ldang ba cher/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad/ /dngos

grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po bla na med/ /sangs rgyas dam pa kun gyi mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yis bshad/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po bde ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde

chen po/ /khrag ni me tog yin par bshad/ /mdangs ni bdug pa yin par bshad/ /sha chen dag ni mar me ste/ /thal mo dag ni spos su bshad/ /chang ni sgeg mo yin par bshad/ /rab tu myos pa sbrang rtsi'o/ /bu ram chang ni myos byed gsungs/ /rgun chang dag ni bdud

rtsi yin/ /bdud rtsi lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no/ /rgun dang sbrang rtsi mchog tu dpa'/ /tshwa ni 'dod chags sra ba yin/ /skyur po'i khu ba g.yon can yin/ /kam+b+hi la ni bran mor bshad/ /chur ba zla ba nya ba yin/ /sha ni sman gyi mchog

yin te/ /dbang phyug dam pa kun gyi mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yis bshad/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /chang ni ra sa ya nar bshad/ /zas ni tshe zhes bya bar bshad/ /bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni/ /sha dang chang du ldan pa dag /dga' ba'i longs

spyod skal bzang po/ /tshe yi dam pa yin par bshad/ /a mra rgun 'brum pa na sa/ /na li ke ra a ru ka /'bras bu chen po'i khyad par dag /bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu yin par bshad/ /a mra smin pa grol bar bshad/ /de bzhin bde bar nyal ba dang / /bde bas rab

tu rmongs pa dag /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no/ /'bras bu chen po pa na sa/ /rgun 'bru'i khu ba khu ba'i mchog /na li ke ra'i dngos grub che/ /dam chos 'bras bu a ru ka /glu yi tshig tu brjod par bshad/ /dar dir dag ni sil snyan yin/ /sangs

rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /gar ni rnam par rol par bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i/ /glu dang sil snyan gar byed pa/ /brda yi dam par bshad pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam sprul pa'o/ /rab tu zhi ba'i sil snyan glu/ /dur khrod glu dang sil snyan

dang / /gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o/ /chags bcas glu dang sil snyan dang / /gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o/ /mi yi dbang po'i sil snyan glu/ /gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sil snyan glu/ /rang gi rtsal gyi gar byas pa/ /rta mchog

rnam par sprul pa ni/ /brda yi dam pa rab tu bshad/ /DI zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro yi/ /khams gsum 'dir ni rnam par brtags/ /nam mkhar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya dag /mkha' 'gro zhes ni rab tu grags/ /kun tu sna tshogs phyag rgya ni/ /thams cad nam mkha' 'gro

ba ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /sgyu ma'i gar dbang grub pa ni/ /a ra li zhes ming du btags/ /mkha' 'gro ma yang a ra li/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /

sgyu ma kun gyi gar byed pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig mchog /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal/ /rdo rje a ra li zhes bshad/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /

sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /de ni skal ba bzang por bshad/ /gang zhig rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan/ /skal ba bzang po zhes brjod na/ /shin tu srid pa kun 'grub cing / /de ni dbang

phyug chen po 'grub/ /Tak+ki 'dod pa yin par bshad/ /dga' ba ki li ki la yin/ /byams pa chu srin yin par bshad/ /'dod pa'i dbang po dbang phyug mchog /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag /dam tshig gsum gyi dam pa yin/ oM dang b+hu khaM kun bshad pa/ /sangs

rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin/ /drangs te bcug nas bcings pa dang / /zhugs nas dbang du gyur pa ni/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHbshad pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no/ /e hi ya hi zhes bshad pa/ /tshur spyon phar bzhud ces bsgrags pa'o/ /ti ha ha zhes gsungs pa ni/ /

longs la drongs shig drongs shig pa'o/ /kha kha khA hi zo shig pa'o/ /a pi zhes pa 'thung zhig pa'o/ /da ra da ra byin zhes pa'o/ /ru ta ma ta rol cig pa'o/ /hu lu hu lu zhugs shig pa'o/ /a ra ra rar skul cig pa'o/ /e ma'o bde mchog ngo mtshar ni/ /a la la

ho zhes bshad pa'o/ /bde mchog rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin/ /e ma'o bde ba rmongs byed ma'o/ /snang ba zhes pa za ba mo/ /hUM shi shi ni tshe 'phel ma'o/ /shin tu brtan dang rab tu brtan/ /kun tu brtan dang cher brtan pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /'jig rten

dbang dang mkha' las skyes/ /shes 'gyur dag 'gyur grub par 'gyur/ /zhugs la dbang du 'gyur bar mdzod/ /oM oM a a kun bshad pa/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin/ /thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa dang / /de bzhin bde bar mkhyen pa ni/ /oM sarba

bid ces bshad pa ste/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin/ /oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa ni sar+b+ba ar+b+ba sA d+ha ni swA hA/ 'khor lo dngos grub mkhyen pa dang / /don dam nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /rnam snang mdzad chen gtso bo ni/ /

sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin/ /skal ba bzang po zhes bshad pa'o/ /ko Ta k+Sha/ ko Ta ba/ ko Ta bash+tsa/ ko TA ri ka /ko la gak+Sha/ ko la ba/ ko la/ ko la bash+tsa/ /ko la b+ha sta thA/ phyag na rdo rje rang don gyi/ /mtshan 'di rnams ni gang brjod pa/ /de la rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /

bran bzhin dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /rgyal srid dang ni longs spyod dang / /gter gyi rnams kyang lhag par ster/ /dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin dgra yang med par byed//mig dang rna ba sna dag dang / /lce dang lus kyang de bzhin te/ /gzugs dang

sgra dang dri dag dang / /ro dang reg kyang bdag gi don/ /rdo rje mtshon cha be di dang / /dgra bo dag tu rab grags pa/ /de yis phyag na rdo rjer 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje zhes kyang bya/ /nyon mongs thams cad gang zad dang / /dgra rnams kyang ni gang zad pa/ /phyag na rdo rjes

'dul ba'i phyir/ /de ni yak+Sha yin par bshad/ /he ru dpal ni rdo rje che/ /thal bar 'jig pa'i mchog yin te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo che/ /brda yis rab tu bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu 'jigs/ /kha T+wAM ga ni rgyal mtshan che/ /thod pa

kham phor pad+ma'i snod/ /khrag chen dang ni sbrang rtsi che/ /dkar mo rku byed rab rmongs dang / /ro langs dang ni sbos byed dang / /gtum mo dang ni sme ma dang / /lha mo bdun ni brda yin no/ /srungs shig myur du rnam rgyal dpal/ /thal ba bzhin du rab tu lhogs/ /ha~M ha~M hri hU~M kun

bshad pa/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin/ /rol cig dgongs shig de bzhin du/ /rol du chug cig gsod du chug /mAr Ta phaT phaT ces bshad pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin te/ /rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dbang phyug dam pa'i rig pa ni/ /sangs

rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /skal ba bzang po yin par bshad/ /rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /'jig rten dbang phyug ces bshad de/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis/ /de yang skal ba bzang zhes bshad/ /dag dang grub dang de bzhin blo/ /rdzu 'phrul

'phel dang 'byor pa dang / /rnam par lta dang sgrol ma dang / /rgya chen ma dang khro gnyer ma/ /pad+mar gnas zhes bya ba dang / /rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma/ /pad+ma lha mo rigs chen te/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyas bshad/ /nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs/ /re ba

thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /skal ba bzang zhes rnam par grags/ /rdo rje nyi ma nor bu che/ /T+wA~M dang ba ba Ta Ta dang / /tra Ta tra Ta kun grags pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin te/ /dbang bskur ba dang gter dag dang / /rgyal mtshan rtse mo mchod chen po/ /sna tshogs

pad+ma thams cad spyan/ /de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad pa/ /byang chub kun gyi sems chen po/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bla na med/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /'jig rten thams cad rab 'jigs pa/ /rta mchog pad+ma dpal dang ldan/ /skal ba bzang zhes brda

yis bstan/ /brda yi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor bas nges pa ni/ /grogs po mkhas par bcas pa yis/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rjes su chags par bya'o zhes/ /cha lugs shes pa bzhin

byed cing / /dngos grub kun la rjes chags pa/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam dag /ma lus par ni myur du 'grub/ /rjes su chud par bya'o zhes/ /cha lugs

shes pa bzhin byed pas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mchog /cho 'phrul dag ni ston par byed/ /rjes su chud par bya'o zhes/ /cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rjes su sbyang bar bya'o zhes/ /

cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas/ /sgrib sbyang thams cad dngos grub rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rjes su yi rang bya'o zhes/ /cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /mchod pa'i las kun myur du 'grub/ /rjes

su gzhom par bya'o zhes/ /cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas/ /rtul phod las rnams thams cad ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /ye shes kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /dbyibs dang gzugs ni ci 'drar ldan/ /thams cad

bdag nyid rgyar sbyor bas/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /pra se na yi dngos grub mchog /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde

mchog gis/ /yang dag bden pa tshul bzhin du/ /mthong ba dang ni thos par byed/ /sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang / /khams rnams kun ni thams cad las/ /thams cad mthong zhing thos par byed/ /rnam par shes pa kun 'grub cing / /kun tu thams cad kun gyi bdag /

'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad dang / /rnam par shes pa'i las kun la/ /thams cad mthong zhing shes par byed/ /pad+mar chags par rjes chags shing / /sna tshogs pad+mar kha 'byed pas/ /pra se na ni sna tshogs pa/ /mthong ba dang ni thos par byed/ /me tog bdug

pa mar me mchog /spos dang mchod pa thams cad la/ /rnam par shes pa kun grub pa/ /thams cad mthong zhing thos par byed/ /reg dang ma reg rdo rje che/ /ral gri me long mda' gzhu dang / /shing dang chu dang 'bab chu brag /gzugs brnyan byung ba'i khyim bdag las/ /

bya dang de bzhin mi bya dang / /stor ba dang ni ma stor dang / /phrogs pa dang ni ma phrogs dang / /de bzhin rnyed dang ma rnyed dang / /gson pa dang ni shi ba dang / /de bzhin rgyal dang pham pa dang / /don yod dang ni don med dang / /de bzhin grub dang mi grub dang / /bde dang mi

bde cho ga bzhin/ /lha yul dag gi don rnams dang / /sangs rgyas zhing gi don rnams kyang / /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bsams pa mthong zhing thos par byed/ /rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ci lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs

ldan pas/ /dur khrod lha yi gnas rnams dang / /ma mo gnas kyi thal ba mchog /thams cad dpral ba'i bsrung ba ni/ /thig le sor ris gsum du bya/ /phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcings na/ /bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje thal ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i

bsrung ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ci lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan pas/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i gzugs chu'i 'gram/ /lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis/ /gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dang / /khrus byas pa dang 'bogs pa yis/ /phyogs mtshams

nam mkha' sa bcings na/ /bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi dri ma med pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ci lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs ldan pas/ /mi yi thod pa'i nang du ni/ /yungs kar bskyed nas blang

bar bya/ /lo ma yungs mar zas su bza'/ /mgo bskus de bzhin 'bras bu yis/ /phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcings na/ /bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o/ /dpal don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ma mchu

so yis legs mnan nas/ /dpal ldan g.yon du 'gying dang bcas/ /gsal bar phyogs su 'khor lo'i tshul/ /bla 'og tu ni byin brlabs na/ /gnas gsum dag ni rgyas 'debs so/ /gzhug dka' bdag nyid ngan pa'i rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor

'grub/ /thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug byin gyis brlabs pa dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /bde bar rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgya

'dis btab ma thag tu ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs 'gyur/ /shin tu byin gyis brlabs 'gyur las/ /sangs rgyas kun dang phrad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang

mnyam pas na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /dpal skal ba bzang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i bsrung ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag sbyor ldan pas/ /phyogs su legs par

'khor lo'i tshul/ /bla dang 'og tu byin brlabs nas/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus par/ /gzhug dka' bdag nyid ngan pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs 'gyur/ /thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug dpal zhes bya

ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /he ru dpal gyis rnam sprul pas/ /thams cad kun tu kun gyi bdag /thams cad bsrung ba mi 'gyur che/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad/ /mkha' 'gros gtse dang gdon rnams dang / /bdud dang ngan khrid thams

cad ni/ /mod la rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje he ru ka dbab pa rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ci lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan zhing / /sna tshogs pad+ma kha 'byed pas/ /sgrib pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /

sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol/ /dag pa thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /dag pa thams cad rnam dag na/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i bsrung ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /'bar ba

blta ba'i tshul zhugs na/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba'i me/ /rab tu 'jigs pa mi bzod 'gyur/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/ /bskal pa yi ni me ltar 'bar/ /'di yis ngan 'gro rnams gsum dang / /khams gsum dag kyang thal bar rlog /rdo rje chen po'i me rab tu

'jigs pa 'bar ba mi bzad pa'i dam tshig chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ci lta'i tshul bzhin byed pa yis/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /go cha bgo ba'i thabs su bya/ /spyi bo dang ni dpral bar gnyis/ /glo gnyis

dang ni rgyab tu gnyis/ /rdo rje phreng ba bcing ba dang / /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag /dar dpyangs thabs su bcings nas ni/ /'gyid dang bcas par mtha' nas dgrol/ /dar dpyangs pa yi thabs byas nas/ /thal mo brdabs pas brtan par bya/ /'di yis bsrung ba

byas na ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra/ /mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa'i/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rab tu 'grub/ /rims nad dug dang dbyig dug nad/ /mkha' 'gros gtse dang gdon rnams dang / /yan lag ma rung byed pa kun/ /'di yis bsrungs na yong mi tshugs/ /dpal

rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bsrung ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /chos sems dpa' yi tshul ston cing / /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dag dang / /zhi ba'i lta bas bltas nas ni/ /rims dang dug rnams thams cad sel/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mthe'u

chung lcags kyu lta bur bcing / /mdzub mo mnyam pa'i rtse mos mnan/ /nad rnams thams cad zlog par byed/ /yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas ni/ /dpral bar bde bar gzhag par bya/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yis/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed/ /dpal rdo rje

smin mtshams lus kyi nad gso ba'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa byas pa las/ /mdzub mo phan tshun mngon phyogs pa/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /zug rngu kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /bu nad lhog rgal skran dag dang / /dmu rdzings la sogs kun las thar/ /'di nyid grub par

gyur nas ni/ /nad rnams kun gyis gnod pa med/ /zug rngu thams cad med par byed pa'o/ /grub pa dpal gyi spyan bcings te/ /'di yis mig gnyis phyis na ni/ /phyag rgya grub pa mchog 'di yis/ /long ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid sbyor bas ldan

byas la/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam po yis/ /drang ba'i tshul du klad pa nas/ /kha phyogs drang zhing btung bar bya/ /rims dang dug dang gdon rnams kun/ /rdo rje khu tshur dpal gyis bzung / /bdag gi lhar ni sbyor ldan pas/ /'thungs na thams cad med par 'gyur/ /klad

pa'i sman no/ /ta thA ga ta gar+b+ha s+t+wa si ho/ /'di na rna bar bzlas pa'i mchog /zug rngu med cing myur du thar/ /zug rngu thams cad sbyin pa po'o/ /g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis/ /sems pa'i gtsug tor bcings na ni/ /byis pa nad med 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /thams cad bsrungs

shing bde ba thob/ /gzhon nu gso ba'o/ /g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yi/ /klu yi gdengs ka lta bur bya/ /'bar ba'i tshul ston 'bebs bcas na/ /dug gi las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /'bar dang 'dul dang bcings pa dang / /za ba'i dug rnams med par byed/ /gdug

pas zin dang lu ta dang / /shi ba sos par byed pa'i mchog /gdengs ka'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bo gung mo gnyis/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yi/ /gung mo la ni reg byas na/ /gdon rnams kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /dug gso ba dang gdon gyi cho ga'o/ /

ba dan gsum po gnyis bcings nas/ /gung mo gnyis ni mdud par bcing / /mdzub mo mthe'u chung rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bcings la/ /yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas su/ /smin ma'i mtshams su bzhag pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro'i las rnams ma lus pa/ /

lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /gnas gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang / /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i khro gnyer zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste ma mo shes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' dpal sbyor bas/ /rta rnams thams cad zhon na ni/ /rta rnams nad med sos pa dang / /nyam skye mthar zhing mgyogs par 'gyur/ /dpal rta mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/ /glang po kun la zhon na ni/ /glang po thams cad nad

med sos/ /nyam skye spro ldan mos par 'gyur/ /shrI badzra satwa s+t+waM si ho/ /'di ni rna bar bzlas pa'i mchog /bya rnams nad med 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /mi yi skad du smra bar 'gyur/ /bya gso ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/ /'byor pa kun la rjes chags

na/ /shing rnams nad med mi bskams shing / /rtag tu me tog 'bras bur ldan/ /shing rnams bskyed pa'i gtsug lag las/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga gang bshad pa/ /phyag rgya 'di yis thams cad ni/ /yid la bsams pa bzhin du 'grub/ /shing bskyed pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /

'khrul 'khor gyis 'phangs ma 'phangs dang / /de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa dang / /'phangs nas slad du bzung ba dang / /stobs su 'gyed pa lnga yin te/ /rang byung rnams kyi dgra cha'i dpyad/ /phyag rgya lnga lnga rab tu gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis bshad/ /dam

pa de dag bshad par bya/ /dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang / /kun tu sbyor dang 'dren mar gyur/ /'gengs dang 'phen dang gsal ba'o/ /rkang pa gshibs pas sa mnan cing / /rkang pa 'gyed pas sa gnon to/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang mnan par bya/ /brkyang bskum gyis

kyang gnas gsum gnon/ /dbyibs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /mi lhod pa dang sran gzugs dang / /mnyen zhing yan lag bstan pa dang / /rgya cher 'gengs shing rnam par dag /lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can/ /'di yis lus la gnon pa dang / /rims dang dug dang dbyig

dug dang / /mkha' 'gros gtse dang gdon rnams kyis/ /nams kyang tshugs par yong mi 'gyur/ /rgya cher 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul du/ /bde blag can gyis gzhu bzung nas/ /g.yas pa rab tu gar byed cing / /mda' 'phangs na ni 'grub

par 'gyur/ /dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa legs bsrang la/ /skyon med pa yis g.yas pa dgug /gzhu rgyud dal bus drangs nas ni/ /'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/ /thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rna drung bar du zlum

por ni/ /ji ltar rigs par legs bkang la/ /yi ge o~M tsam rang gi khar/ /bzung na 'gro ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ji ltar rigs pas drangs nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bzung nas kyang / /der ni cung zad dbye bar bya/ /'gengs pas thams

cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /chang pas 'ben ni 'grib par bya/ /'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta/ /lta ba chang pa la gtad nas/ /myur du 'phangs na dam pa 'grub/ /mda' gzhus rgyal bar bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /gru bzhi pa la rno ba dang / /

de bzhin kun nas bskor bar bya/ /g.yas phyogs nas ni mnga' bskor nas/ /snad de de bzhin bstod pa dang / /rkang pas mnan cing rmig pas gnon/ /'bigs pa bcu yi rgya mchog gis/ /khams gsum rgyal srid chen po dag /bde bar thub nas nye bar spyod/ /

dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /rab tu 'phangs dang mnyam par 'phangs/ /de bzhin glog ltar 'phangs pa dang / /glog ltar 'khrug pa de bzhin te/ /phyag rgya thabs rnams sgrub pa'o/ /thabs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /nyam nga lag dang bde phyogs dang / /

thad ka de bzhin gyen du 'debs/ /'di dag bzlog pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /gnas gsum dag ni bzlog par bya/ /nges par bzlog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /thams cad 'debs dang nges par 'debs/ /kun 'debs gyen du 'debs pa'i gar/ /'di dag

'phrog pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /gnas gsum dag kyang 'phrog par byed/ /'phrog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad kyi/ /rtag tu bdag nyid rnam pa kun/ /mda' gzhu'i dpyad kyi phyag rgya'i mchog /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /dgra cha

thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /srin lag gnyis kyi nang du ni/ /mthe bo legs par gzhag par bya/ /de nas khu tshur bcangs nas ni/ /mdzub mo legs par dgug par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur dpal gyi rgya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas/ /las kyi dngos grub

rab 'byam rnams/ /ma lus par ni myur du 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la/ /bdag gis mthe bo'i nang du gzhug /zhi ba'i las rnams rab grub pas/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

khu tshur ro/ /rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni rab brkyang nas/ /mkha' 'gro'i las rnams thams cad ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o/ /brdeg pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /mthe bo dag la gung

mo bzhag /dpal pad+mo'i khu tshur grub pa ste/ /thams cad dag pa'i las la sbyar/ /dpal pad+mo'i khu tshur ro/ /khu tshur rdo rje rin chen mchog /'bebs pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /rang don las rnams grub pa ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje rin

po che'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur dpal bcangs la/ /sor mo thams cad yongs su bzung / /rtul phod las rnams thams cad ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /las thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang / /bskum nas

bteg pa'i stabs dag dang / /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /gzugs rnams thams cad gnon par bya/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /rnam par snang mdzad dpal mnan nas/ /kun tu byang chub yongs bkug ste/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /

sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal mnan nas/ /kun tu grub pa yongs bkug ste/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang dpal mnan nas/ /kun tu dpal mo yongs bkug ste/ /bdag

gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /rdo rje nyi ma dpal mnan nas/ /kun tu longs spyod yongs bkug ste/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /rta mchog dam pa dpal mnan nas/ /thams cad dbang phyug yongs

bkug ste/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /byang chub pha rol phyin pa dang / /grub dang gzungs dang sa rnams dang / /rig dang phyag rgya rnams mnan nas/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /dbang phyug dam pa mnan nas ni/ /mig

gsum pa las gsum grub bkug /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /mthu bo che yang mnan nas ni/ /snying las dpa' mo yongs bkug ste/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /skye dgu'i bdag po mnan

nas ni/ /mos las grol ma yongs bkug nas/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du/ /rab dga'i dbang phyug mnan nas ni/ /kun gyi bdag las dga' bar bkug /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /'jigs la sogs pa'i lha mo

dang / /ma mo byad ma'i ma mo dang / /mkha' 'gro ma rnams mnan nas ni/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /de bzhin ku be ra la sogs/ /rig pa 'grub pa spyod pa dang / /mi yi rgyal po la sogs kyang / /mnan nas bdag gi spyad pa spyod/ /'gro ba dang ni mi 'gro

ba'i/ /dngos po thams cad ma lus pa'ang / /rnal 'byor bdag nyid des mnan nas/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /dpal rdo rje gnon pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /khu tshur snying gar bcangs pa ni/ /bud med phyag rgyar de bshad de/ /bud med sbyor ba ma lus pa/ /

lus pa med pa'ang thams cad 'grub/ /g.yon pa 'gying ba'i tshul byas nas/ /lag g.yas bdag gi snying gar ni/ /gyen du drang ba'i tshul byas nas/ /bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje 'gying ba'o/ /dpal ldan sna tshogs pad+mo 'dzin/ /g.yon pa brdeg

pa'i khu tshur dang / /g.yas par ldang bar gyur pa dang / /sangs rgyas dbang phyug ting 'dzin bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad du 'phar ba'o/ /g.yon pa dril bu'i sgra sgrogs shing / /g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis/ /rdo rje gyen du gsor zhing bskor/ /sgyu ma thams cad 'byung

bar bya/ /dpal rdo rje sgyu ma'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /g.yon pa g.yon pa'i brla la bzhag /lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yi/ /rtse mos pad+ma dam pa 'dzin/ /g.yas pa'i brla la lag ngar bzhag /mi dge ba thams cad sel ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bdag gi snying gar 'dren

tshul du/ /g.yon pa nor bu rin chen 'dzin/ /g.yas pa re ba kun rdzogs pa'i/ /bud med la sogs rin chen 'dzin/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du/ /pad+ma sna tshogs dam pa 'dzin/ /g.yas pa rdo rje 'gying ba

yis/ /dbang phyug dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las kun tu rnam pa sna

tshogs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rtog pa ste dgu pa'o// //de nas kun tu sna tshogs 'di/ /phyag rgya shes pa'ang grub pa ni/ /kun tu sna tshogs sbyor ba yis/ /kun tu sna tshogs bshad par bya/ /smin ma mig dang so dang mchu/ /kha dang lus dang rkang lag gis/ /cha lugs

bzhin du gar byed pas/ /phyag rgya thams cad yongs su dgrol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/ /lha mo kun dang 'dus pa ni/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /rab tu bde bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis

rlob/ /legs par byin gyis brlabs na ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /so so dag nas grub pa ste/ /blta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku/ /thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad/ /legs so legs so zhes grub pa'i/ /dam pa dag kyang rab tu stsol/ /

bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /grub pa kun mchog nyams dga' ba/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod du/ /thams cad kyi ni bdag nyid stsol/ /dang po kun las byung ba yi/ /mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi/ /bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs rnams kyis/ /

thams cad bdag nyid mchod pa mdzad/ /dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying dang bcas/ /dpal ldan lag pa g.yas pa yi/ /pad+mo khu tshur dpral bar bzhag /bdag gi mig ni gyen du blta/ /'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /gyen du 'phar

ba'i dngos grub dang / /rab 'byam las rnams myur du 'grub/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /khams gsum pa dag ma lus pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang / /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /

kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /dpal rdo rje pad+ma gyen du 'phar ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis/ /rtag tu dpag med tshe dang ldan/ /nam mkha'i dbyings

kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /bden pa'i tshig ni rab tu smra/ /mtha' yas pa dang mu med pa'i/ /rtog pa kun dang 'di yi ni/ /mthu dang yon tan bsngags pa'i mtha'/ /brjod pa dag tu yongs mi nus/ /mthu dang rang bzhin dag gis grub/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu

'grub/ /so sor rjes grub bde ba ster/ /'di ni gsang mchog mchog gi mchog /sems can don phyir las rnams sbyong ba dang / /rnam par dag par rgyal ba yong mi mdzad/ /'di la bgegs med bdud kyang yod ma yin/ /rtog pas mi 'grub thar bar yong mi nus/ /

mi brtan pa dang bdud du nga mi 'gyur/ /brtan par bya ba'i phyir yang nga mi 'doms/ /gang zhig rang gi bde bas nga sgrub na/ /dngos grub mchog gis nga yi bstan par byed/ /kun tu sna tshogs pas ni de skad gsungs/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu dgyes/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' dpal gyis legs gsungs la/ /mngon par bstod cing rab tu dgyes par gyur/ /le'u bcu pa'o// //rnam mang rjes chags dga' ba'i pad+mo rnam dag mchod pa dang / /rta mchog rnal 'byor bde bas gsal bar rjes su mchod na ni/ /rab tu

bde ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa skal bzang dga' ba'i mchog /rab mchog bde ba'i rang bzhin dam tshig bde bas rjes grub 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i

mchog ces bya ba'i rtog pa/ rtog pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chen po bde ba chen po rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba kalpa sa muts+tsha ya nA ma sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra ut+ta ra ut+ta

ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rtog pa thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te/ /ma lus lus

pa med par grub/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sems la ni/ /de kho na nyid nges par gnas/ /sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'dod chags chen po

bde chen po/ /bde chen rdo rje chen po bas/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang lhan cig pa'i/ /bde gshegs mgon mchog rnams kyis bzhugs/ /thams cad mchog 'gyur 'dod chen gyis/ /dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rtog

pa 'dus pas bka' stsal 'tshal/ /rnam par mi rtog chos bdag las/ /rtog pa'i don 'di gang la gsungs/ /ci yi slad du'ang rgyud phyi ma/ /dang po'i sa mchog ji ltar lags/ /gdod ma tha ma med nyid yang / /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin te/ /yig 'bru ji ltar gsungs

pa lags/ /sngags phyung ba yang ci 'dra ste/ /shin tu dga' dang bzang nyid de/ /rdo rje snying po gtso bo gtso/ /sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin yang / /de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'dzin nyid chen po yang / /byang chub spyod pa rnams ci ltar/ /bdud dang bdud las

rgyal ba yang / /sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje gtum po thar byed dang / /phyag na rdo rje yang ji ltar/ /dang po rigs bskyed ji ltar lags/ /'dod pa'i thar pa rnam pa ci/ /mgon po rnam gsum ji ltar 'tshal/ /thams cad yang nyid ji ltar lags/ /

ji ltar dang po snying po 'byung / /nye ba'i snying po de ji ltar/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags/ /dkyil 'khor ji ltar gsungs par gyur/ /de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ste/ /thig gdab de bzhin rtog pa yis/ /dngos grub ji ltar bshad pa lags/ /

gsang ba lnga dang de nyid che/ /gang lags ci 'dra de bzhin te/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnams dang ni/ /rigs rnams kyang ni ji ltar lags/ /thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang / /de nyid tshogs kyi phyag mtshan yang / /thams cad dgug dang mchod chen dang / /rang

gi byin rlabs sogs grub pa/ /de rnams de nyid gsang chen dang / /dam pa dang ni don dam pa/ /dam pa'i yi ge grub don du/ /thams cad mi gsung 'os ma lags/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las

de kho na nyid thams cad nges tshig gi rtog pa ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /rtog pa kun gyi gtso chen pos/ /the tsom kun gyi tshogs gnas nas/ /don dam 'dzin pa yang bka' stsal/ /de la ji ltar rtog pa'i don rgyud yin zhe na/ rnam par mi rtog

chos dag las/ /sems can don du yongs su rtog /de phyir rtog par yang dag bshad/ /rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar rgyud phyi ma yin zhe na/ rgyud ni rab tu 'brel par bshad/ /phyi ma gong du phyung ba yin/ /de nyid gsang ba gsang chen rnams/ /de yang

rgyud ni phyi mar 'dod/ /de la ji ltar dang po nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ nam mkha' kun tu rab gnas pa/ /rdo rje kun gyi dngos po mchog /bde chen dgyes pa chen po de/ /dam pa'i yi ge gzhal yas khang / /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de

la ji ltar gdod ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' yin zhe na/ yi ge ka sogs d+ha yig mtha'/ /nga nya spangs nas 'jug par bya/ /yi ge d+ha sogs Sha yi mtha'/ /phreng ba gnyis pa yang dag bri/ /dbus gnas par ni a yig phreng / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bkod de/ /

thig le zla tshes dang ldan par/ /tsheg drag zla ba gnyis yin te/ /a yig mi 'gyur bsgom par bya/ /dbus su rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas/ /de dbus rtag tu bsgom pa ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ri mo grags pa yin/ /

de las 'gro ba g.yo mi g.yo/ /thams cad yang dag 'byung bas ni/ /nam mkha' las byung mtshan ma'i phyir/ /gdod ma tha ma med mchog yin/ /rdo rje chen po dngos sems ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes 'dod do/ /de la bcom ldan 'das de gang zhe na/ dngos grub chen

po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po rig pa lha/ /rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dam pa yi ge shin tu dga'/ /de la ji ltar yi ge rtog pa yin zhe na/ /yi ge a sogs k+Sha mtha' ni/ /yi ger yang dag bshad pa ste/ /mi zad dga' ba'i rdo rje can/ /de nyid kun don mtshan

nyid phyir/ /de la ji ltar sngags 'byung ba yin zhe na/ /rdo rje sems sogs 'khor lo la/ /gang rnams sngags su cher bshad pa/ /de rnams byung ba'i don du ni/ /rdo rje can gyis yang bka' stsal/ /gur gum la sogs byugs pa la/ /bri sku la sogs rnam brgyan nas/ /

bla re la sogs bres nas su/ /rtag tu re'u mig bzhi brtsams nas/ /gru bzhi gzhal yas khang byas te/ /re'u mig phyogs bzhir 'bar bar byas/ /re'u mig sum cu tham pa la/ /bcu dgu dang ni ldan par bya/ /brgya phyed stan la gnas pa la/ /sde pa lnga mtha' thig

le yis/ /spyi bo gtsug la rtag pa yi/ /ka dang sha zhes bya ba ni/ /dbus kyi re'u mig la bri'o/ /de yi phyi rol gnas brgyad dag /mtshams dang phyogs kyi re'u mig la/ /dbang ldan la sogs rim pa ru/ /ya dang sha yi sde bkod do/ /me mtshams la sogs re'u mig

la/ /ma yi yig 'bru bzhi po dang / /a yig sa bon la brten nas/ /sa bon bcu gnyis dgod par bya/ /dbang ldan la sogs re'u mig la/ /ka yig la sogs rim par dgod/ /de ltar bzhi la rim par ni/ /thams cad rnam par gnas byas te/ /ka sogs

re'u mig bzung nas su/ /yig 'bru dam pa phyung bar bya/ /shin tu dga' chen rgyal po ni/ /sbyor ba thams cad dbang phyug gtso/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa zla phyed gtsug phud zhal/ /de 'og sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ /dga' ba rdo rje can gyis phyung / /re'u

mig bcu bzhi zhes pa las/ /gnas pa tsheg drag dang ldan pa/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /sum cu rtsa bzhi zla dang ldan/ /re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig la/ /gnas pa nga ro thig le ldan/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa tsheg drag sbyor ba bya/ /sum

cu rtsa brgyad sbyor ba yis/ /de ni bzhi par rnam par bshad/ /bde ba chen po rgyal chen po/ /lha mo dam pa brtag pa'o/ /re'u mig bcu gcig la gnas pa/ /thig le nga ror yang dag ldan/ /re'u mig brgyad pa la gnas pa/ /bcu dgu dag ni ldan pa ste/ /

de 'og sum cu rtsa bzhi dang / /thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa tsheg drag sbyor ba'o/ /re'u mig gnyis pa la bkod pa'i/ /thig le nga ro ldan pa'o/ /gling bu ma la sogs btus pa'i/ /sngags phyung ba ni mchog yin te/ /re'u mig

sum cu rtsa brgyad la/ /gnas pa'i thig le nga ro ldan/ /dbus na nyi shu rtsa gcig la/ /dbus nas lnga zla ba can/ /re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig gnas/ /dbus nas lnga zla ba can/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa gcig gnas/ /bcu gcig zla ba dang ldan te/ /lha mo gling bu

ma sogs kyi/ /sngags phyung rmad du byung ba'o/ /re'u mig bcu pa la gnas dang / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin te/ /re'u mig sum cu rtsa gsum gnas/ /bcu drug pa yang de bzhin te/ /me tog la sogs bsdus pa yi/ /'di ni sngags phyung mchog yin no/ /rta mgrin

'phang mtho lcags kyu sogs/ /dang po byung ba'i sa bon nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /sgo la nan tan gyis sbyor ro/ /zhes dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /

re'u mig gnyis pa can kho na/ /zla tshes gtsug dang ldan pa'i zhal/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgyal chen po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug yin/ /re'u mig lnga gnas pa la/ /thig le nga ro ldan pa'o/ /re'u mig bcu dgu la gnas pa/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o/ /re'u

mig nyi shu rtsa lngar ldan/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o/ /dbus nas nyi shu pa nyid la/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o/ /chos gos ma tshogs bzhi dag gis/ /sa bon 'byung ba mchog 'di yin/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o/ /re'u mig

bdun pa de bzhin yang / /dbus nas lnga pa dang ldan/ /thig le nga ro ldan pa ni/ /byang du sil snyan cha lang ngo / /dbus nas nyi shu rtsa gcig la/ /gnas pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa/ /thig le nga ro ldan pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen cher brjod do/ /dbus nas brgyad

pa dag nyid/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor la/ /chos kyi dung gi phyag rgya che/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi re'u mig

la/ /gnas pa nyi shu pa ldan ni/ /khrag 'thung zhes pa'i rgyal po che/ /tsheg drag lhag chad gyur pa'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa 'og na bcu dgur ldan/ /re'u mig nyi shu gnas pa dang / /sbyor ba tsheg drag ldan pa'o/ /tsheg drag dang ni rtsa bzhi la/ /

gnas pa dbus nas bcu gcig ldan/ /re'u mig bcu gnyis pa sbyor ba'i/ /tsheg drag ldan par 'dod pa'o/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa/ /'og gi 'dren pa nyi shu gcig /bcu gnyis pa dang tsheg drag can/ /gsum pa can de bshad pa'o/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi

la gnas pa/ /bcu gnyis pa dang ldan pa la/ /tsheg drag dang ni mnyam sbyor ba/ /lha mo snod chen ma yi 'dod/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa dbus nas gnyis pa can/ /de bzhin thig le nga ror ldan/ /thig le 'byung gnas gsum pa ste/ /dbus nas

bcu pa gang yin pa/ /rtag tu tsheg drag ldan pa ni/ /dmar chen sogs pa'i lha mo yi/ /bzhi po dag ni phyung ba'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /gnas pa'i thig le bcas pa'o/ /dbus las drug pa gang yin pa/ /thig le nga ro ldan pa'o/ /re'u mig de bzhin bcu bdun

pa/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o/ /re'u mig bcu dgu la gnas pa/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o/ /lha mo mda' rnon 'dzin sogs kyi/ /sa bon byung ba de ngo mtshar/ /lha mo me tog ma sogs kyi/ /sa bon byung ba sngon bstan yin/ /gang dag sgo srung bstan pa yang / /

gzugs mi mthun pa kho na'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa bcu dgu'i gdan la

gnas/ /nyi shu tsheg drag sbyor ba ni/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug yin/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa'i/ /tshig gnyis lci ba de bzhin no/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas nas dbus nas dgu pa ldan/ /rtag par thig le dang ldan ni/ /gnyis pa yi ni yongs

grags pa/ /re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig la/ /gnas par nga ro thig les brgyan/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa dbus nas bcu gsum ldan/ /tsheg drag can ni bzhi pa yi/ /khro gnyer ma yi rgyud las grags/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir ldan/ /dbus

nas dgu pa'i thig ler bcas/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /dbus nas lnga dang ldan no/ /re'u mig bcu gcig la gnas pa/ /tsheg drag gis ni sbyor ba'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /sum cu rtsa brgyad pa dang ldan/ /tsheg drag mnyam por sbyor ba

ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang mchog yin no/ /lha mo gling bu ma sogs nyid/ /de bzhin lha mo me tog sogs/ /lha mo lcags kyu ma sogs kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor la ni bskyed pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ /

pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /dbus nas nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /bcu gcig pa dang ldan pa ste/ /bcu dgu zla ba gtsug lnga ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma 'byung ba yin/ /dbus nas bcu gsum gang yin pa/ /zla tshes thig le

gtsug gi zhal/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa/ /re'u mig nyi shu gnas dang sbyor/ /tsheg drag ldan pas gnyis pa'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /dbus nas bcu gsum pa dang ldan/ /tsheg drag lhan cig can dang ni/ /gsum pa

yi ni grags pa yin/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /bcu gcig dang ni thig le ldan/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa/ /tsheg drag ldan pa 'dod pa'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /dbus gnas dgu dang zla ba'o/ /re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig gnas/ /

thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /dbus nas bcu gsum pa dang ldan/ /tsheg drag mnyam par ldan pa ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma lha dag yin/ /lha mo gling bu ma sogs kun/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor sbyor skyes yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje

sems dpas gsungs te/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun zhes sbyor ba ste/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug can ni/ /yul 'khor thams cad 'dul ba'o/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi

la gnas pa/ /bcu dgu pa dang ldan pa ste/ /nyi shu tsheg drag sbyor ba ste/ /sna tshogs pa yi brjod pa yin/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /gnas pa tsheg drag ldan pa 'dod/ /rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje rgya gram zhes grags so/ /zhes

bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ rta mchog gi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i rtog pa

ste bcu dgu pa'o// //ri mo gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/ /de yi nang du rnal 'byor pas/ /a yig tshogs kyang bri bar bya/ /shar phyogs 'dab mar ka yi sde/ /lho phyogs 'dab mar tsa yi sde/ /nub phyogs 'dab mar Ta yi sde/ /

ta yi sde ni de bzhin byang / /sde pa lnga yi dbus su ni/ /yi ge k+Sha dang lhan cig 'dod/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma nas brtsams te/ /ya ra la wa rnam par gzhag /dbang ldan 'dab ma'i phyi rol du/ /yi ge Sha ni 'jug par bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma'i phyi rol du/ /

yi ge sha ni 'jug par bya/ /bden bral 'dab ma'i phyi rol du/ /yi ge sa ni 'jug par bya/ /rlung mtshams 'dab ma'i phyi rol du/ /yi ge ha ni 'jug par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dbus kyi

mtha' ru gang yin pa/ /thig le dang ldan yi ge oM/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa gang / /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la/ /'og tu sgra yig u sbyor ro/ /shar gyi 'dab ma gnyis pa ni/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin no/ /lho nas de

bzhin dbu ma la/ /me mtshams 'dab ma de bzhin no/ /bden bral phyi rol gnas pa gang / /de nas byang gi dang po'o/ /dbus nas dbu ma'i sbyin gnas su/ /de tshe 'od kyi gong bur 'gyur/ /o yig tsheg drag dang ldan pa/ /de yi mtha' ru de tsher 'gyur/ /lho nas dbus ma

gang yin pa/ /tsheg drag dang ni ldan pa'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gang yin pa/ /u yig thig le sbyor bar bya/ /dbus kyi dbu ma gang yin pa/ /thig les mgo nas mnan pa dang / /rlung mtshams phyi rol gang yin pa/ /o yig tsheg drag sbyor bar bya/ /bden bral

mtshams kyi phyi rol du/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor ba ste/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gang yin pa/ /byang gi dang por de bzhin yang / /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /byang gi dang po pa yang yin/ /dbus nas dbus ma bzung nas su/ /'od kyi gong bu mtha' ru 'gyur/ /

de nas thig le sbyin byas nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /lho nas dbu ma gang yin pa/ /tsheg drag dang ni ldan par bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma de bzhin du/ /lho nas dbu ma yang

yin no/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa/ /rtag tu brjod par 'gyur ba yin/ /byang nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /me mtshams dang ni shin tu sbyor/ /sgra yig a dang sbyar nas su/ /rtag par zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /me mtshams phyi rol bzung nas su/ /nub kyi

dang po ldan par bya/ /sgra yig i dang sbyar nas su/ /'od kyi gong bu lnga pa yin/ /bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la/ /sgra yig a dang ldan par bya/ /de bzhin dbang ldan 'dab ma dang / /sgra yig i ni sbyor ba'o/ /shar gyi dang po pa dang ni/ /de nas dbu ma'i tha ma

dang / /nub kyi dang po pa bzung nas/ /a med rtag tu 'gyur bar bya/ /de dag bzlas pa byas pa yis/ /mda' ru rab tu grub pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor bar
