bya/ /thig le nga ro gnon nas su/ /de nas dbus nas dbu ma'o/ /lho nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /me mtshams pa dang sbyor bar bya/ /shar nas dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig e dang ldan par bya/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa gang / /sgra yig e ni sbyor

bar bya/ /shar gyi dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'o/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya/ /thig le nga ros mnyam sbyor na/ /skal bzang skal bzang 'gyur

ba yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de bzhin gnyis pa dpa' bo ma/ /kun tu bzang mo gsum pa ste/ /bzhi pa zad med snon ma'o/ /dpa' mo sangs rgyas sku ldan ma/ /de bzhin gzungs ma zhal mdzes ma/ /sprin chen ma ni bdun

pa ste/ /brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan ma'o/ /gling bu la sogs bsdus pa dang / /sgo srung ma sogs yang bsdus te/ /me tog ma sogs bsdus pa ni/ /dang po'i dkyil 'khor la bskyed 'dod/ /ces bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpas

gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /yi ge e yis ldan pa yi/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa dang / /me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa nyid/ /sgra yig u dang

sbyor bar bya/ /shar las dang po de bzhin du/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las tha ma pa yang bzung / /dbang ldan

'dab mar gnas pa nyid/ /yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la/ /tsheg drag gis ni mnyam par ldan/ /de ni bcu par yongs grags te/ /bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can dang ldan/ /dbus las dbu

ma 'gyur nas su/ /byang las dbu ma de bzhin te/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya/ /me mtshams phyi rol pa de bzhin/ /nub las dang po pa dang ldan/ /bden bral phyi rol pa la yang / /dbu ma'i mtha' yang de yin te/ /dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa nyid/ /yi

ge u dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /dbus las tha ma pa 'gyur nas/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa/ /byang las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /'dren pa a yig dang lhan cig /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /me mtshams stan dang ldan par bya/ /dbus

las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /thig le dang ni yang dag ldan/ /lho las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /shar las dang po pa yang yin/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig ldan par bya/ /dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /nub kyi dang po a med

par/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol bzung nas su/ /thig le u yig dang ldan te/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu ma pa 'gyur te/ /shar las gsungs

pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig u dang ldan par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la/ /sgra yig e yis brgyan pa ste/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma'i gdan can ni/ /lnga par yongs su grags pa ste/ /bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /

byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can dang 'dra/ /dbus las tha ma yang yin te/ /dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya/ /shar las gsum pa gang

yin pa/ /sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa gang / /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa ni/ /me mtshams gdan dang ldan pa ste/ /tsheg

drag yi ge i ldan pa/ /dang po yongs su grags pa'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la/ /thig le yi ge u sbyor te/ /mkhas pas lan gnyis brjod par bya/ /dbus las dbus ma yang bzung ste/ /lho las dbu ma de bzhin la/ /me mtshams 'dab

ma can dang ldan/ /lho las dang po bzung nas su/ /thig le dang ni mnyam por ldan/ /nub nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /yi ge e dang mnyam ldan bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol gang yin pa/ /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /

sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /shar las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /nub las dang po bzung nas su/ /dbus nas dbu ma ldan pa ste/ /thig le a yig ldan par bya/ /bcu par yongs su grags pa ste/ /shar las gsum pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar

bya/ /dbus las tha mar gzung nas su/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang / /yi ge a dang ldan par bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma gzung nas su/ /lho las gsum par 'gyur byas te/ /me mtshams gdan ni sbyor byas nas/ /shar nas dang po bzung nas su/ /

yi ge a yig ldan pa yi/ /dbus las dang po 'gyur byas te/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig e dang sbyor ba yi/ /dbus las tha ma yang yin te/ /shar nas dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig u yis sbyor bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas

pa la/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor ba ste/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig u yis brgyan byas te/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa yang / /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig u yis brgyan pa ste/ /

bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa ni/ /gnyis brtsegs yi ge u dang ldan/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la/ /byang las tha ma ldan byas te/ /tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa la/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas

gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yis sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang / /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho nas dbu mar 'gyur bar bya/ /byang las tha ma bzung nas su/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /

me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig a yis brgyan par bya/ /dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig i dang ldan pa yi/ /nub kyi tha mar 'gyur bar bya/ /lho yi dbu mar de bzhin du/ /lho las bzhi pa gang yin 'byor/ /tsheg drag yi ge i

ldan pa/ /'dus pa gsungs pa yin pa'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yis sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin yang / /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho yi dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig

gnyis pa ldan pa yi/ /byang gi dang po yang yin te/ /shar las dang po bzung ba la/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /lho las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /tsheg drag yi ger ldan pa'o/ /zhes rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le

u yig sbyor byas te/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang / /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung ba la/ /me mtshams stan dang ldan par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /de 'og me mtshams

pa yin te/ /nub kyi tha ma de bzhin du/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las tha ma yang yin te/ /nub las dang po bzung nas su/ /a yig med par gyur pa'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yis sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de

bzhin te/ /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu mar 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /thig le yis ni brgyan par bya/ /de bzhin dbus nas dbu ma yang / /lho nas dbu ma de bzhin te/ /me yi mtshams pa mnyam par ldan/ /yi ge a yis

bsdu bar bya/ /nub nas tha ma bzung nas su/ /sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbu ma'i tha ma dang ldan par/ /me mtshams lan gnyis brjod nas su/ /nub nas dang por ldan 'gyur bya/ /rtag tu a med brgyad pa ni/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM 'dzin ma

yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag o ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams pas ni ldan pa yin/ /lho nas dbu mar 'gyur ba'o/ /shar nas dang po bzung

nas su/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbus nas tha mar bzung nas su/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dbu ma gzung bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma la gnas pa/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang nas dang po bzung

nas su/ /yi ge a dang ldan par bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma sbyor nas su/ /thig le nga ros bsdu bar bya/ /sna tshogs pad+ma lha mo che/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha yi yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje mtshon cha dang /

rdo rje rol ma dang / rdo rje dran ma dang / rdo rje snying po ma dag rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi yin no/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /e yig thig le yang dag ldan/ /dbus la tha ma bzung ba dang / /yi ge u dang ldan par bya/ /byang nas de bzhin bzhi pa'o/ /

dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /lho nas dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang sbyar nas/ /sgra yig i dang a bsdu bya'o/ /shar nas bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /thig le u dang ldan bya ste/ /nan tan du ni lan gnyis bzla/ /rtag tu dang po'i 'gyur

ba yin/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /dbu ma las ni dbu ma yang / /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i/ /lho nas dbu mar 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus nas tha ma bzung byas te/ /sgra yig e dang sbyor bar bya/ /shar las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig e dang sbyar ba'o/ /

shar las gsum pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor ba'o/ /bden bral 'dab ma la gnas pa/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor ba ste/ /nan tan lan gnyis bzlas pa'o/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /u yig me mtshams pa dang ldan/ /thig le nga ro gnyis pa'o/ /

o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa/ /tsheg drag dang ni mnyam por ldan/ /dbang ldan phyi rol la gnas dang / /me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin/ /byang nas gsum pa gang yin pa/ /dbus las dbu mar gyur par bya/ /lho nas dbu

ma pa la yang / /me mtshams 'dab ma can dang ldan/ /sgra yig i dang ldan sbyor ba/ /e yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /lan gnyis gsum ni brjod byas te/ /lha mo gsum po'i kho na'o/ /sngags 'byung bar ni grags pa yin/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /shar

nas gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal/ /dbus nas dbu ma de bzhin du/ /lho nas dbu ma pa la yang / /me mtshams 'dab ma can sbyor dang / /dus rnams thams cad sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa de bzhin/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /

de nyid phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig i dang ldan byas te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa yi/ /sgra yig i yis brgyan par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor byas te/ /lan gnyis gsum du brjod pa'o/ /de ni dpag bsam shing

sogs lha/ /rdo rje snying po ma dang / rdo rje sred med kyi bu mo dang / rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang / 'dod pa'i lha mo rnams shes pa lha mo bzhi yin no/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /yi ge e yis sbyor bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa/ /me mtshams

'dab ma can de bzhin/ /yi ge e yis mnyam ldan pa'i/ /byang nas dang por 'gyur byas te/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can sbyor ba'i/ /lho yi dbu ma pa yang de/ /yi ge e yis mnyam ldan bya/ /dbus las dbu ma ldan 'gyur dang / /

bden bral 'dab ma la gnas pa/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor byas te/ /bden bral phyi rol la gnas pa/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor byas te/ /byang nas tha ma gang yin pa/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang nas dang po gang yin pa/ /me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan/ /

nub nas dang po gang yin pa/ /rtag par a med 'gyur bar bya/ /gdod ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /lha mo rdo rje pi wang ma'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa nyid/ /sgra yig i dang ldan byas te/ /

byang nas dang por 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /lho nas dbu ma gzung bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang sbyor nas/ /bsdu bar bya ba yang yin te/ /shar nas gsum pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang nas dang po bzung nas

su/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor byas te/ /nga ro bzhi po dang ldan pa/ /rtag par lan gsum brjod bya'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma pa la yang / /sgra yig e ni sbyar bar bya/ /byang nas dang po 'gyur

bar bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can lhan cig /lho nas dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /de bzhin bden bral phyi pa la/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'i phyir/ /rlung mtshams

phyi rol pa nyid ni/ /lan gnyis ched du brjod par bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /thig le e yig sbyor bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog la/ /rnga chen lha mor grags pa yin/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /

me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa yang / /byang nas dang po pa bzung ste/ /sgra yig i ni ldan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang sbyor ba'i/ /lho nas dbu ma pa dang yang / /byang nas mtha' ma bzung byas te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma ldan

byas nas/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang nas dang po bzung byas te/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma can sbyor nas/ /de tshe de ni yang brjod de/ /de bzhin dbus las dbu ma yang / /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po de bzhin du/ /de ni lan gnyis brjod par

bya/ /lho nas bzhi pa bzung nas su/ /nga ro a yig ldan par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdza rnga ma zhes grags pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /gling bu ma dang pi wang kun/ /rnga chen de bzhin rdza rnga kun/ /rdo rje

sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /grwa yi lha mos mchod 'grub pa'o/ /a yig dang po byas nas su/ /dbus nas dbu ma pa la yang / /me mtshams 'dab ma can ldan par/ /lho nas dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dang po de bzhin du/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya/ /

me mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dang po yang yin te/ /e yig dang ni mnyam por ldan/ /dbus nas me tog ma phyung ngo / /a yig dang por byas nas su/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i/ /lho nas dbu ma

yang yin te/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /rdo rje spos me rnam grags so/ /a yig dang po byas nas su/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can ldan pa'i/ /lho las

dbu mar 'gyur bar bya/ /yi ge a las mnyam ldan te/ /bden bral 'dab ma gnas pa la/ /sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya/ /shar gyi dang po de bzhin du/ /e yig ldan par gsungs pa'o/ /a yig dang po byang nas su/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin yang / /me

mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan par/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /shar gyi gsum pa de la yang / /thig le dang ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang nas bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /yi ge e yig lhan cig 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas rdo rje me tog

ma dang / rdo rje bdug spos ma dang / rdo rje mar me ma dang / rdo rje dri chab ma zhes bya ba phyi'i lha mo bzhi gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang lhan cig /lho las dbu ma 'gyur ba ste/ /a yig

thig le mnyam gnon par/ /rtag par brjod par bya ba ste/ /shar las dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa ni/ /lho las dbu mar 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes

bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /me mtshams pa dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma pa yang ste/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /

dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal don yod shin tu dga' ba'i sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus

las dbu ma 'gyur ba byas/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can ldan zhing / /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le nga ros brgyan byas te/ /shar gyi dbang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig e dang mnyam ldan zhing / /bden bral 'dab

ma can du 'gyur/ /dpral bar thig les brgyan pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can lhan cig /lho nas dbu ma 'gyur

bar bya/ /shar las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /thig le nga ros rnam par brgyan/ /nub las dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag dang ni mnyam ldan zhing / /o yig lhan cig 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bcom

ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rta mgrin 'phang mtho'i lcags kyu ma dang / phag mgo mche zhags ma dang / nyi zla lcags sgrog ma dang / shi ba gso ba'i dril bu ma zhes bya ba sgo srung ma bzhi gsungs pa ste/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i

dkyil 'khor la sngags kyi tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /tsheg drag u yig ldan pa ste/ /shar las gnyis pa can pa yang / /thig le nga ro gnon pa ni/ /thub chen rnam snang mdzad kyi'o/ /o yig

thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /byang nas dang po pa yang ste/ /dbus nas dbu ma pa ldan pa/ /dbang ldan phyi rol la gnas pa/ /thig

le dang ni ldan pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang lhan cig /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin/ /byang las dang

por 'gyur byas te/ /byang las tha ma dang ldan pa/ /mjug tu me mtshams 'dab ma can/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma par 'gyur te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can

lhan cig /lho las dbu ma yang yin te/ /byang nas bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste/ /me mtshams pa yi mgo gnon bya/ /dbus las tha ma gang yin pa/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig

thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /shar las dang po bzung nas su/ /me mtshams can gyis gnon pa yi/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang 'dod/ /byang las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /zla tshes

thig le gtsug gi zhal/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung ste/ /thig le nga ro ldan par bya'o/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung ste/ /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan pa'i/ /byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dbu

ma de bzhin du/ /i yig me mtshams ldan pa ste/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /lho las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /thig le e yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams 'dab ma

ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas shing / /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid/ /byang las dang po de bzhin du/ /byang las tha ma dang 'byor pa/ /sgra yig e dang sbyor ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal don yod shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /

byang nas dang po bzung nas su/ /thig le me mtshams yang dag ldan/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams pa dang ldan pa la/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /byang las dbu ma yang yin te/ /dbus las tha ma dang ldan la/ /yi ge lhan

cig 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /thig le nga ro ldan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /sgra yig i ni sbyar byas te/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dbu ma pa dang ldan

de bzhin dbus las dbu ma yang / /i yig me mtshams dang ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma pa 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dang po sangs rgyas dbyangs ma dang / /dbang ldan phyi rol can nyid la/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /

bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa yang / /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /shar las gsum pa gang yin pa/ /e yig me mtshams pa dang ldan/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /thig le i yig ldan par bya/ /byang las dbu ma phul nas su/ /de nas dbus nas tha ma ste/ /nub

kyi dang po rtag tu ni/ /a yig med par brjod par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu ma

'gyur bar bya/ /shar las dang po gang yin pa/ /sgra yig e yis brgyan pa ste/ /dbang ldan phyi rol gang yin pa/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /lho las dang po gang yin pa/ /gnyis pa ru ni sbyor byas la/ /thig le e yig ldan par bya/ /de yang drug par 'gyur ba ste/ /byang

las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /dbu ma'i tha ma yang yin te/ /nub las dang po rtag tu ni/ /a yig med par 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le e yig ldan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung

ba dang / /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /yi ge a dang ldan par bya/ /dbus las tha ma bzung nas su/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa yang / /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa nyid la/ /sgra yig e

dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las tha ma bzung nas su/ /nub las dang po yang bzung ste/ /a yig med par byas pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi grags pa'o/ /gau rI tsau rI pra mo ha/ /bai tA lI zhes bya ba bzhi/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dag yin/ /puk+ka sI dang tsaN+Da lI/ /g+hasma khrag 'thung 'dra ba bzhi/ /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dag yin/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig e dang ldan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid/ /sgra yig i dang ldan pa yi/ /byang

las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dang po de bzhin du/ /thig le yang dag ldan pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /thig le nga ro yang dag ldan/ /dbus las tha ma bzung ba dang / /yi ge a dang ldan pa yi/ /

rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas par 'gyur/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid/ /byang las dang po yang yin te/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang bzung / /e yig me mtshams dang ldan pa'i/ /lho nas dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag o yig

sbyor bas so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa'i/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can ldan pa'i/ /dbus las dbu ma 'gyur ba'o/ /o yig dang ni ldan pa yi/ /bden bral 'dab

mar gnas de bzhin/ /lho las dang po de bzhin du/ /yi ge i yig ldan pa yi/ /byang las tha ma yang yin te/ /dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /

me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal/ /dbus las tha ma yang de bzhin/ /sgra yig a dang sbyor ba yi/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur te/ /dbang ldan phyi rol gnas nyid la/ /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa ste/ /sgra yig o dang sbyor bar bya/ /bzhi

par yongs su grags pa yin/ /dbus las dbu ma pa nyid dang / /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor nas su/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa yang / /sgra yig i dang sbyor byas te/ /tsheg drag lhan cig 'dod pa'o/ /de dag

mda' rnon 'dzin ma la sogs pa grwa'i srin mo la sogs bzhi rnams kyi'o/ /me tog ma sogs 'dus pa dang / /sgo srung ma sogs 'dus pa ste/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs pa med pa'i

shin tu dga' ba'i rgyal po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor la/ sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung byas te/ /bden bral phyi rol pa la sogs/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang

yin pa/ /sgra yig a dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang / /dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa la/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /rtseg mar de bzhin lci bar 'dod/ /dbus las dang po bzung ba dang / /byang nas dbu ma yang yin te/ /

dbus las tha ma dang sbyor ba/ /brgyad par yongs su grags pa yin/ /byang nas tha mar de bzhin du/ /o yig me mtshams dang ldan pa/ /byang nas dang po yang yin te/ /dbus las dbu ma dang sbyor te/ /dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa yang / /me mtshams 'dab ma bzung nas su/ /rlung

mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la/ /me mtshams pa stan ldan byas te/ /tsheg drag i yis sbyor bas so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /bden bral phyi rol gnas pa yang / /me mtshams pa yi gnon pa yi/ /dbus

las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /byang las dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig a dang ldan pa yis/ /byang nas gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /shar las gsum pa gang yin dang / /byang nas dang po yang yin te/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /byang nas dbu ma pa la yang / /dbus las tha ma dang sbyor

te/ /yi ge i dang gcig par 'dod/ /lho nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /tsheg drag lci ba kho na'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma pa bzung ba/ /me mtshams pa stan

ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /byang nas dbu ma pa la yang / /dbus las tha ma dang sbyor la/ /sgra yig i dang ldan par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /

sgra yig e dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung ba dang / /byang nas dbu ma pa la yang / /dbus las tha ma pa sbyor la/ /sgra yig i dang ldan par bya/ /de ni lan gnyis brjod byas te/ /dbus las dbu ma 'gyur ba la/ /thig le nga ro ldan byas la/ /de ni drug por

yongs grags so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag o yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas ni/ /byang las dbu ma dang ldan pa'i/ /dbus kyi tha ma bzung ba dang / /nub las tha ma bzung

ba la/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /me yi 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig a dang sbyor bar bya/ /lho las dbu ma bzung nas su/ /thig le nga ro ldan par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rnam par gzigs ma dang / sgrol ma dang sa 'dzin ma dang khro gnyer

ma zhes pa'i pad+ma'i gtso mo'i lha mo bzhi gsungs pa'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung ba dang / /byang nas dbu ma gang yin pa/ /dbus las tha ma dang sbyor te/ /de ni rtag par lci bar 'gyur/ /lho las dang po bzung nas su/ /

thig le dang ni mnyam por ldan/ /nub nas dbu ma pa nyid la/ /i yig dang ni ldan par bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dbu ma dang sbyor bya/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid/ /sgra yig u yis rnam par brgyan/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang / /yi ge u dang

mnyam ldan la/ /thig le nga ro yang dag ldan/ /dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /a med nub kyi dang po'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las tha ma bzung ba dang / /sgra yig e dang

ldan pa yi/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur te/ /dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa la yang / /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung ba dang / /byang nas dbu ma pa la yang / /dbus las tha ma dang sbyar te/ /

de ni rtag lci la gyur pa/ /de bzhin dbus las tha ma yang / /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /e yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i/ /byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung la/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma

can gyi stan/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbu ma'i gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /nub kyi dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /de la a yig med ces pa/ /bdag gis thams cad du ni bshad/ /ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /

rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /me mtshams pa yi stan dang ldan/ /tsheg drag i yig ldan pa ni/ /dang po par ni yongs su grags/ /dbus las dang po bzung ba dang / /byang nas dbu ma yang yin la/ /dbus las tha ma dang sbyor te/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor ba yi/ /mkhas

pas lan gnyis brjod par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang / /thig le u yig gis brgyan te/ /tha mar yi ge a la yang / /thig le dang ni ldan par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag

o yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung ba dang / /byang las dbu ma pa la yang / /dbus las tha ma dang sbyar te/ /sgra yig a yis brgyan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma nyid la yang / /dbang ldan phyi rol

pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dbu ma dang sbyar te/ /sgra yig a dang ldan pa ni/ /rtag par lci bar gyur pa yin/ /shar las dang po bzung nas ni/ /me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan/ /dbus las tha ma bzung ba la/ /sgra yig a dang sbyor bar bya/ /shar las dang po bzung nas su/ /

me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan/ /dbus las tha ma pa yang yin/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /lho nas dbu ma de bzhin du/ /tsheg drag lci ba can ldan no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas pad+ma'i na bza' dang / rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang

phyug ma dang / pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang / sna tshogs pad+ma zhes bya ba pad+ma rigs kyi lha mo bzhi gsungs so/ /gling bu ma tshogs 'dus pa dang / /sgo srung ma tshogs 'dus pa ste/ /me tog ma tshogs 'dus pa yang / /pad+mas mtshan ma 'dzin par zad/ /dang po'i dkyil 'khor tshul

gyis ni/ /ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs te/ dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la sngags byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /sgra yig i dang ldan pa'o/ /bden

bral phyi rol pa la yang / /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /tsheg drag u yig sbyor bar bya/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig i yis brgyan pa ste/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbang ldan

'dab ma can dang ldan/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /de bzhin dbus las dbu ma la/ /tsheg drag dang ni mnyam por ldan/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbang ldan 'dab

ma can dang ldan/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa yi/ /dbus las tha ma pa dang ldan/ /de bzhin bden bral phyi rol pa/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan/ /dbus las bzhi pa

gang yin pa/ /yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur bya/ /de bzhin dbus las dbu ma yang / /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma de bzhin dang / /byang las dang po sbyor ba yis/ /byang las tha ma 'gyur

bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /lan gnyis par ni brjod par bya/ /de bzhin nub kyi dang po yang / /lan gnyis par ni brjod par bya/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa/ /byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /thig le a yig ldan pa yi/ /nor chen rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /

zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung nas su/ /me mtshams 'dab ma'i stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /bden bral phyi rol gnas pa dang / /dbus las dbu ma sbyor ba dang / /tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa yi/ /

lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin/ /byang

las dang po sbyor ba yi/ /byang las tha ma 'gyur bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la/ /thig le u yig sbyor ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang / /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma

'gyur bar bya/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin dang / /me mtshams 'og tu ldan pa yi/ /dbus las tha ma 'byung bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /thig le dang ni mnyam ldan no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /

me mtshams pa yi gdan sbyor ba'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /shar las dang po bzung ba dang / /me mtshams pa yi mgor sbyor ba'i/ /dbus las tha ma 'gyur bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag e yig sbyor ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal

rdo rje 'dzin pas dbang bskur ma dang / mdzod gter ma dang / rgyal mtshan mchog ma dang / mchod chen mo zhes bya ba lha mo bzhi gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /i yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i/ /dbus las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /yi ge e dang mnyam ldan

pa'i/ /byang las dang po yang yin te/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin dang / /e yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /nub nas tha ma bzung nas su/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las tha ma bzung nas su/ /nub

kyi dang po de bzhin te/ /rtag par a med 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /i yig me mtshams

pa ldan pa'i/ /dbus las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /byang las dang po yang yin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa/ /tsheg drag yi ge i dang sbyar/ /de ni 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /ces bcom ldan 'das

dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan dang / /thig le e yig ldan pa yi/ /lho las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /de nas byang gi dang po ste/ /dbus las tha ma de bzhin du/ /i yig dang ni sbyor ba yi/ /nub kyi tha

ma 'gyur bar bya/ /tsheg drag o yig dang ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol par gyur pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las

dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las tha ma de bzhin du/ /yi ge e dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /me mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur te/ /de bzhin dbus nas tha ma dang / /yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol 'gyur bar bya/ /thig le u yig dang ldan pa'i/ /me

mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas mda' gzhu 'dzin ma dang / rdo rje kha T+wAM ma dang / rdo rje nyi ma mo dang / rdo rje bsreg bya za ba mo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje nyi ma'i lha mo bzhi gsungs so/ /gling bu ma sogs 'dus pa dang / /sgo srung ma sogs 'du

ba ste/ /me tog ma sogs 'dus nas kyang / /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la bskyed 'dod/ /ces bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las/ sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /o yig thig le

dang ldan pa/ /de bzhin bden bral phyi rol pa/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin dang / /yi ge i dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /byang gi tha mar 'gyur bar bya/ /yi ge u yig dang ldan pa'i/ /bden bral phyi rol pa yin te/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang

yin dang / /thig le u yig dang ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur te/ /rta mchog rgyal po chen po yis/ /thams cad dus su bzla bar bya/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub pa ni/ /'joms pa las grub dran las dga'/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo

rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /de bzhin dbus las dbu ma pa/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol de bzhin te/ /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu

ma yang yin te/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin dang / /me mtshams pa yi mnyam gnon pa'i/ /dbus las tha ma 'gyur ldan bya/ /lho las dbu ma yang yin te/ /tsheg drag i yig ldan pa ni/ /sna tshogs pad+mo zhes su grags/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems

dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /i yig dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dbu ma ldan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho

las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /bden bral phyi rol bzung ba dang / /dbus las dbu ma ldan pa yi/ /byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /tsheg drag dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa yang yin/ /rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zhes grags so/ /

gang dang gang gi dbus la ni/ /rta mchog 'di ni gzhag bya na/ /de nyid de yi dkyil 'khor yin/ /yul 'khor thams cad 'dul ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das thogs med shin tu dga' ba dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung

ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sngags 'byung ba'i rtog pa ste nyi shu pa'o// //de la ji ltar shin tu dga' ba nyid yin zhe na/ skyon med rtag pa gtan du ni/ /'dod chags thams cad

rjes chags phyir/ /de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan 'das/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che zhes so/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yin zhe na/ gtan du dga' ba kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /byang chub sems

mchog cho ga'o/ /de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso bo yin zhe na/ dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje dbang chen thugs kar bsgyur/ /rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso/ /dam pa'i dang po skyes bu'o/ /de la ji ltar

bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems nyid yin zhe na/ bsam med rgya chen zab pa ni/ /dngos grub thams cad zad med bde/ /kun gyi dri ma med pa ni/ /byang chub sems bdag bstan pa yin/ /de nas de'i yongs su las kyi khyad par ni/ /sems brtan nyid kyis sems dpa' ste/ /

ting 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa sems dpa' ste/ /rdo rje nyid yin rdo rje las/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa 'byung ba'o/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs ni/ /nyon cig rdo rje gang gsungs pa/ /zla ba 'dra bar yang dag blo/ /rdo rje zhes su rnam par bshad/ /de la ji ltar bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yin zhe na/ ting 'dzin la sogs rnam bzhi yis/ /gang gi bskyed pa yod bsgoms na/ /bsgoms na thams cad bdag nyid du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs sbyor yang / /rang byin brlab 'di grub mchog

ste/ /de nyid nyin re grub pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob bo/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yin zhe na/ gsungs pa/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pa yang / /ci phyir sems can don du 'gyur/ /de phyir kun tu bzang po yi/ /ci bzhin byang sems

spyod ces 'gro/ /de la ci ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba yin zhe na/ sems de kho na bdud yin te/ /sems de kho na de bzhin gshegs/ /rang sems 'dul ba'i don du ni/ /bdag ni bdud nyid nye bar 'gro/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das/ /mngon

par byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor 'bigs pa ni/ /byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid/ /de nyid de las de sangs rgyas/ /rang byin brlabs mchog bsgoms phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum mo mthar byed dang / phyag na rdo rje yin zhe

na/ /dbyer med so sor 'bigs pa ni/ /sdang ba thams cad nges par gnon/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ni/ /byang chub sems rnams brtan pa yin/ /brtan pa thams cad 'grub don du/ /rgyal ba bdag gis kun bzang gi/ /phyag la phyag mtshan de byin te/ /des de phyag

na rdo rje yin/ /de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs 'byung ba yin zhe na/ ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste/ /'dul phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /skye ba bdag ni rigs yin no/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i thar pa yin zhe na/ dngos grub thams cad rjes

chags phyir/ /'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /kun grub zad med bde ba yin/ /bde ba chen po zhes 'dod do/ /gsang ba khrag 'thung zhes bya ste/ /phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i phyir/ /mchog ni pad+ma 'dzin rgyal po/ /dam tshig dam pa shes ldan phyir/ /dgyes pa dam pa

nyi ma ste/ /sbyin pa la sogs mchog sgrub phyir/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /rdo rje rta mchog las nyid phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ste/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas phyir rnam snang mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po/ /ye shes rdo rje 'dzin mchog

phyir/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum nyid yin zhe na/ 'jig rten gsum dag mtha' yas phyir/ /'dul phyir srid gsum mchog gsum bdag /thams cad nyid phyir dkon mchog gsum/ /'jig rten gsum bdag khams gsum yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom

ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe na/ sems can bsod nams cher 'phags phyir/ /mi g.yo thams cad kho na bdag /sems 'du 'bral phyir g.yo ba ste/ /kun byed thams cad kho na'i phyir/ /mkha' 'gro ma bdag lha mor gsungs/ /thams cad mdzad pas skal ba

bzang / /rnam par rtog pa skal ngan par/ /brda yis mtshan mar gsungs pa'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dang po'i snying po dbyangs 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyu yin zhe na/ /gtan du srid pa yang dag 'grub/ /dbang phyug chen po 'grub don du/ /dpa' bo'i dngos grub kun don du/ /

bskal pa'i dang po bcom ldan gsungs/ /'dod chags chen po'i phyir bcom ldan/ /dam pa zad med shin tu dga'/ /gsang nyid phyir na snying po'i dbyangs/ /hU~M yig dam pa zad med pa'o/ /de la ji ltar nye ba'i snying po de nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ dkyil 'khor dag ni dman pa

dang / /dam tshig dag ni spangs pa dang / /de nyid gsang ba mi shes pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa min/ /'dod pa bcom ldan sems dpa' ste/ /de kho na ni 'dod chags yang / /rdo rje phyag na rdo rje ni/ /chags bral de dang 'grub pa min/ /ling ga 'greng bar rang 'byung ste/ /brla yi

steng du bzhugs byas nas/ /ling ga mchod rten byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje dbyings ni rang bdag 'gyur/ /ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su/ /ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gnod med skye/ /ling ga 'greng ba rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du

bzhugs nas su/ /ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ /khrag 'thung zhes bdag sngon skye'o/ /ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su/ /ling ga pad+mar byin brlabs te/ /dag pa'i chos bdag sngon skye'o/ /ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs

nas su/ /ling ga rin chen byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje nyi mar bdag sngon bskyed/ /ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su/ /ling ga sna tshogs byin brlabs te/ /rta mchog dag ni sngon skye'o/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug byas te/ /der ni kha~M yig bsgom par bya/ /rnam

par snang mdzad gzugs dag 'od/ /sku gnyis ldan pa spro bar bya/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/ /de la hU~M yig bsgom par bya/ /shin tu dga' 'dra'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan pa'i spro bya'o/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/ /de la hrI yig bsgom par bya/ /khrag 'thung 'dra ba'i

gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/ /de la b+ha yig bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma 'dzin 'dra'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan pa spro bya'o/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/ /de la tra~M yig bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma 'dra ba'i gzugs dag yod/ /sku

gnyis ldan pa spro bya'o/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/ /de la hU~M yig bsgom par bya/ hU~M mdzad 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nyid gsang ba gsang chen yang / /snying po yongs su grags pa yin/ /

snying pos rjes su 'grub pa ni/ /nye ba'i snying por yongs grags so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las gsang ba bsgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dang / rdo rje don yod pa'i dam

tshig gi rgyud yin zhe na/ kun 'grub zad med bde ba ni/ /de ni rdo rje 'grub pa ste/ /don yod dam tshig 'da' dka' yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi don yin zhe na/ ji ltar gnas su gang 'khor lo/ /de ltar sde dang 'gro ba bzhin/ /'khor dang yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i

dkyil 'khor skyed mchog yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam smin gyi rgyu yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' sogs lha yi/ /dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las/ /ci 'dra brtag pa'i bsod nams su/ /phyi ni de bzhin bri bya'o/ /de la ji ltar thig gdab pa'i cho ga shes pa yin zhe na/ mkhas pas

dkyil 'khor bri bya na/ /mtshams kun mnyam por 'dren par bya/ /shar dang nub dang byang sogs phyogs/ /thig skud bzhi pa re'u mig brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi/ /rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin/ /pad+ma pad+ma'i tshul yin te/ /rin chen tshul ni rin chen gyi/ /sna tshogs kyi ni zlum

por gsungs/ /ci ltar 'dod pa ci bde bas/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ /re'u mig brgyad par 'dod pa'o/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor du ni 'dod/ /re'u mig brgyad kyi dbus gnas pas/ /gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa yin/ /zhes

dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar rtog pa'i dngos grub dam pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar bden par dkyil 'khor bdag /gang gis rtogs par nus pa ni/ /gang gis yi dam lhar sbyor bas/ /grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ldog pa yin/ /bris sku bris pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /

rang sems bris par sbyor ba yin/ /lhag chad cho gar gyur na yang / /bsgrubs te skyon du mi 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar gsang ba lnga'i de nyid yin zhe na/ sems dpa' gdod ma tha ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso/ /gdod ma

tha ma med phyir yang / /dam pa'i dang po zhes 'dod do/ /'khor lo kun gyi gtso phyir ni/ /dam pa dam pa'i dbang phyug yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gang lags ci 'dra ba yin zhe na/ 'dod pa chen po kun gyi mchog /yid bde bas ni 'dzum pa che/ /rtag par 'dzum pa'i bde ba des/ /

dam pa bcom ldan 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas de yi zla mdog ni/ /dam pa yig 'bru grub nyid phyir/ /chos rnams thams cad dag phyir dang / /gsang ba de nyid rnam dag phyir/ /rdo rje 'dzin de zla ba'i mdog /de nas de'i sna tshogs dmar ba'i 'od 'bar ba ni/ ci phyir bcom ldan 'dod chags che/ /'dod

chags kun la rjes chags phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid kyang / /sna tshogs dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /de la ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i shes pa yin zhe na/ thod phreng dbu rgyan las gzhan ni/ /khams gsum la ni dbu rgyan med/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag mngon bskyed/ /

khams gsum las ni rin chen gzhan/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'dra ba med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen ces/ /dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin/ /de nas ji ltar sems dpa'i skyil mo krung yin zhe na/ yan lag g.yas pas mnyam gnon pas/ /g.yon pa'i yan lag gzir nas

su/ /de yi sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ /rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso/ /de nas ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi shes pa yin zhe na/ kun mchog shin tu 'bigs pas na/ /dngos grub thams cad bde ba'i mchog /kun mchog rnam rgyal bkra shis pas/ /thams cad dbang

phyug che ru 'phags/ /grub rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs/ /dga' ba de bzhin gtso mo bdag /rdo rje lha mo tshogs phyag rgya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin/ /de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i de nyid lnga yin zhe na/ me long khrag 'thung zhes bya rnams/ /

mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang mchog /so sor rtog la nyi ma ste/ /bya ba la ni rta mchog dang / /chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas ni/ /thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya de bzhin yang / /

rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni/ /de rnams de bzhin nyid kyis bsnyen/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'byung ba yis/ /rgya cher dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas ji ltar phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i yan lag gi shes pa yin zhe na/ 'phrog byed ma

dang 'dzin byed ma/ /gzung thar ma dang tshe sbyin ma/ /nam mkhar 'gro dang lha mo dag /mkha' 'gro ma drug rab tu grags/ /gang gis skra ni bstan gyur na/ /de la dpral ba bstan par bya/ /mig la ston pa gang yin pa/ /de la lte ba bstan par bya/ /gang gis lte ba bstan pa na/ /de la mchu ni rab

tu bstan/ /gang gis ma mchu rab bstan na/ /de la so ni rab tu bstan/ /gang gis lce ni bstan 'gyur na/ /de la gsus pa bstan par 'gyur/ /gang gis b+ha ga bstan gyur na/ /de la ling ga bstan par bya/ /gang gis rje ngar bstan na ni/ /de la brla ni bstan par bya/ /gang gis brla ni bstan

gyur na/ /de la rkang mthil bstan par bya/ /gang gis rkang mthil bstan na ni/ /de la sen mo bstan par bya/ /gang gis mchan khung bstan gyur na/ /de la smin ma bstan par bya/ /gang gis sgra sgrogs byed gyur na/ /de la cho nges bya ba'o/ /gang gis kha yang bstan na ni/ /de la zhags

pa bstan par bya/ /gang gis gsal shing bstan gyur na/ /de la mdung thung bstan par bya/ /gang gis sen mo bstan na ni/ /de la nu ma rab tu bstan/ /gang gis khu tshur bstan na ni/ /de la mtshams su bstan par bya/ /gang gis lce ni bstan gyur na/ /de la bshang gci bstan par bya/ /

gang gis mi sdug gzugs byed na/ /de la mdzes pa'i gzugs bya'o/ /gang gis he skad byed gyur na/ /de la lag pa bstan par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan ma yin zhe na/ nad pa'i mig gi 'bras

'dra ba/ /dpral bar tri shUl te mdung thung / /phyin log mig dang khro gnyer can/ /nu ma dag ni mi sdug pa/ /sna ni rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /gtsug gis bskor ba shes byas te/ /ri mo gsum gyis yongs su bskor/ /de yi khyim gyi mtshan ma ni/ /tri shul tshung nge me long dang / /ral gri

tshul dang rgyal mtshan dang / /rtse gcig khyim gyi mtshan mar bstan/ /'gro bar gyur na mkha' 'gro ma/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan ma bstan par bya/ /glo bur mi dga' bya ba dang / /don med par yang 'jug pa'o/ /rkang pa la yang ral gri 'gyur/ /tri shU la dang 'dra ba'i tshul/ /skad dang bya rog

'dra ba yi/ /de ni rtag par 'gyur ba'o/ /mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa/ /dam pa'i mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgyu yin zhe na/ rtog pa thams cad gsang chen po/ /rdo rje lcags kyu

dril bcas pas/ /bkug nas de nas bya ba nas/ /dril bu rjes su dkrol ba'o/ /de la ji ltar mchod pa chen po thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/ rtog pa thams cad gsang chen gyi/ /gang gis dga' nas mchod pa ni/ /rjes su mchod pa dang gzhan yang / /dbyangs dang sil snyan gar gyi

yin/ /de la ji ltar rang gis rig pa'i lha thams cad bsgrub pa chen po'i rgyu yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya kun/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo 'gyur ba ste/ /rang gi yi dam lha sbyor nas/ /thams cad de ni 'grub par bya/ /de nas ji ltar thams cad rjes su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin

zhe na/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin 'gyur nas/ /bzlas pa'i dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /rtog pa thams cad rjes grub pas/ /mchog gi dang po 'grub pa'o/ /de la ji ltar rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bsgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin zhe na/ o yig thig le dang ldan pa'i/ /nub las

dang po yang yin te/ /shar las dang po bzung nas su/ /lci bar i yig ldan par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /lho las dbu ma bzung ba la/ /tsheg drag yang dag ldan par bya/ /the tshom med par de las 'dis/ /rjes su sbyor bar

ldan par 'grub/ /lho las dang po bzung nas su/ /gnyis pa la ni ldan par bya/ /nan tan gyis ni i yig sbyor/ /skad cig ma las gcod 'gyur ro/ /de nyid thig le dang ldan pas/ /byang las dbu ma yang yin te/ /de nyid lan gnyis brjod par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang / /thig le

u yig ldan par ni/ /drug par yongs su grags pa yin/ /dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /nub las dang po yang yin te/ /de ni a med shes bya ste/ /skad cig mas ni bdud rtsi 'grub/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /yi ge u yig mnyam ldan pa'i/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa yang bya/ /me

mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa/ /shar gyi dang po ldan par bya/ /tsheg drag u yig ldan pa yi/ /dbus kyi tha ma ldan par bya/ /thams cad kyi ni sgrub byed pa/ /khrag 'thung zhes pa 'byung ba'o/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bsgrub bya 'grub/ /de nas phyi na ci 'dod par/ /ci

'dod 'dod pa bya ba yis/ /kun bzang kun byed de bzhin te/ /langs pa'am ni 'dug pa'am/ /'gro ba yis sam 'greng ba'am/ /bzhad pa dang ni smra ba la/ /gang dang de ru ci de bzhin/ /gang gang dbang po'i las nyid pas/ /gang gang de de'i rang bzhin du/ /rang gi mnyam gzhag med sbyor bas/ /

rang gis rig pa'i lha 'dren no/ /de nyid sbyor ba de yis ni/ /thams cad kho na 'grub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni/ /rtag tu mthong na rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog /de ni nyes pa rnam grol te/ /dngos grub thams cad dbang

phyug 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de ltar sna tshogs rjes su chags pa'o/ /dga' ba pad+ma rnam dag che ba yis/ /gsal bar rjes su gtsang ba dam pa rtag par

sbyin pa yis/ /dam pa bde ba'i dngos pos dam tshig bdag la bde ba rjes su bsgrub/ /dam pa'i dga' ba shin tu sbyor ba skal bzang dam pa shin tu dga'/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rang bzhin dag pa rtag tu rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin dngos/ /dam pa dga' ba la sogs sbyor ba'i skal bzang dam pa shin tu

dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'grub pa'o/ /dag pa rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin kho na so so rjes su grub pa bde ba las dam pa'i gsang chen rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di yongs su rdzogs so// //bdag gi 'di ni dang ba'i snying po mchog /bde ba chen po mchog gi mchog 'gyur mthu chen po/ /kun mchog 'byung

ba'i sems can rtag pa ci yi phyir/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang po nyid ni sbyor ba po/ /mtha' yas thob med thogs pa med pa'i phyir/ /tshul chen po yi chen po thams cad kyi/ /mkha' dang 'dra ba'i mchog gi dngos grub 'phel ba sbyin/ /gdod ma tha ma med pa gang dag gis/ /rdzogs byed med pa nus pa ma yin no/ /

sems can le lo can dang nyung tsam 'dod pa dang / /mi dad pa dang lkog smra ba dang ma dag pa/ /rtag tu rjes su chags dang chags bral dga' ba dang / /de rnams phan pa'i don rdzogs pa'i don 'di yin no/ /gang gi khyim du gzung bar gang gis gyur pa dang / /bdag gis ji ltar ston pa sgrub par byed pa'am/ /

mthu yis thams cad so sor mngon du gyur pa ste/ /dngos grub mchog gis rgyas pa'i las dag mi 'grub pa'o/ /gang gis grub pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes sogs pa dang / /gzugs sogs thams cad 'di la ji ltar mos pa bzhin/ /yi ge hU~M yang ji ltar rab tu 'dod par bris byas na/ /des ni rang 'dod dngos grub

cho ga bzhin du 'thob/ /sems can don du las dag byed pa ma yin pas/ /rgyal ba dag gis rnam par dag pa 'di la ni/ /bgegs med de bzhin du ni bdud kyang med pa ste/ /rtog pa yis kyang dngos grub 'phel stobs byin gyis rlobs/ /gang gi rtog pa mchog chen 'di

sgrub byed pa la/ /bdud nyid du ni mi 'gro mi brtan nyid kyang min/ /brtan pa'i rgyu ni bdag gis ston par mi byed de/ /myur bar mchog gi mchog nyid 'grub phyir bstan par 'gyur byed do/ /gang gis bdag gi snying pos bdag la rtag tu grub byed ni/ /mchog chen dngos grub dang ni rtag

par bde chen dang / /chags dang shin tu dga' dang brtan dang rgyas pa dang / /yig chen yang ni rtag par bdag gis 'grub par byed/ /de nas mchog skyes rgyal ba thams cad dga' nas su/ /'dzum pa chen po thams cad khyab par rnam par 'byed/ /kun bdag dbyings kyi rdul phran

mchog chen gzugs dag gis/ /kun nas de la legs pa'i sgra ni dbul bar byed/ /bdag gis dbyings kun rjes su che mchog gzugs kyis su/ /pha mchog gyur pa sangs rgyas kun gyis legs so legs/ /mchog gi rdo rje las byung khyod ni legs so legs/ /dam pa'i chos

nyid chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs/ /dam pa'i las can mchod pa'i bdag nyid legs so legs/ /rtogs pa'i byin rlabs mdzod cig mnyam par byin brlabs kyis/ /don yod dngos grub rtag tu yig 'bru chen po yi/ /grub pas phyi na mi 'dul ba yi dus su ni/ /de dag gi

yang ji ltar dam pa'i bder 'gyur phyir/ /de ltar ngag chen zhus nas su/ /sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis/ /gsungs pa la ni mngon par bstod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba khri

brgyad stong pa las rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brgya bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po smri ti dz+nyA na kIrti nyid kyis bsgyur/ yon bdag bod kyi mkhan po gzhon nu grags pas zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tan+t+ra rA dza shrI la g+hu sam+ba ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal bde mchog nyung ngu zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/ /mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min/ /dpal

he ru ka yang dag sbyor/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /

'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin/ /sgra yi tshul las nges 'byung rnams/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas/ /bsrub bya srub byed yang dag sbyar/ /ji lta ba ni de

bzhin du/ /sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan/ /sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni/ /rnal 'byor bla na med pa yi/ /rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis/ /dbugs 'byin bar ma mchog dag dang / /dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang / /rnal 'byor pas dus khyad par du/ /

rigs ldan rtag tu mchod par bya/ /pho nya lhan cig skyes grub ma/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste/ /yid ni nang du chud pa yis/ /'dod pa yi ni dngos grub bya/ /rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /thos pa

'am ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba/ /de lta nyid du the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog /dag byed sdig pa 'joms byed pa/ /gsang sngags zlos dang bsam gtan dang / /bde bas kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig rtag tu bskyang

bar bya/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag sgrub pa pos/ /dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du/ /dbang bskur dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang ga pur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar po dang sbyar ba/ /tshogs kyi nang du bzhag pa ni/ /thams cad rdor mtshan mtshan ma 'dzin/ /ming

med mthe bo rtse sbyar bas/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu spyad/ /myangs pas zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin/ /dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni mi 'chi bcu phyed 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed yin/ /mchod bzhi dpa' bo chen po ni/ /yid la 'dod pa

byed pa ste/ /dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi/ /snyoms par zhugs pa'ang de nyid 'dzin/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba ni/ /bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /de lta bur ni byed pa yi/ /bcu drug char ni mi phod do/ /ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs sam/ /chu bo che rnams ngogs dag dang / /

gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //der ni lci ba ma lhung bas/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug /dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang / /bdud rtsi lnga dang

bcas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nyer byugs te/ /der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag brtsam/ /gnas de ru ni bsgoms pa yis/ /dur khrod du ni kun tu brtag /ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang / /dur khrod so phag ldan pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya/ /slob

dpon dge ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes/ /khro med gtsang shing mkhas pa dang / /sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro/ /thod pas spyi bor brgyan byas shing / /yan lag thal bas byugs pa dang / /gug skyed

dag gis lus brgyan cing / /rus pa'i phreng la sogs pas brgyan/ /dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang / /rus pa'i phreng ba rnam par 'phyang / /kha T+wA~M ga ni lag na gnas/ /bdag nyid khrag 'thung dpal byas nas/ /de 'og khrag 'thung dpal dran bya/ /'khor lo 'di ni snying gar dgod/ /

bdag nyid de ltar go bgos nas/ /ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod/ /'og tu yang ni mtshon cha dgod/ /'khor lo mtshon cha'i phreng ba dag /steng du mda' yi dra ba nyid/ /slar yang bdag nyid mkha' spyod du/ /gur byas de ni go char 'gyur/ /de ltar go cha de bgos nas/ /skabs

gsum pas kyang mi phyed do/ /de ltar bdag nyid rab bsrungs shing / /sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas/ /dngos grub chen po rab ster ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas sems med srad bu'am/ /ru d+hi ra ni chen pos brlan/ /he ru ka dpal grong khyer

mchog /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya/ /khru gang khru bzhi 'am khru brgyad pa/ /sgo bzhi kun nas zur bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam par spyad/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog mchod/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma ni/ /'dab

bcas lte ba 'bar dang bcas/ /ge sar yang dag ldan par gzhag /lte bar dgod bya dpa' bo ni/ /'jigs byed kyang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar/ /ha ha zhes pa'i sgra cher bzhad/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /bzang po spyan gsum

zhal bzhi mnga'/ /glang bo'i pags pa rnam par bgos/ /smin ma bzang po rdo rje dbyes/ /phyag na kha T+wAM mi thod bsnams/ /brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni/ /rdo rje phag mo rab 'jigs ma/ /he ru ka dpal che la phyogs/ /spyan gsum drag

po'i gzugs can yin/ /ka pA la ni an+t+ras bkang / /kha nas ru d+hi ra 'dzag cing / /lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/ /phyogs kun tu ni sdigs mdzub byed/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /phag mo yi ni rigs las byung / /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams dang / /'khor

lo'i dbus su mchod par bya/ /de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' bo yang / /'khor lor yang dag gnas pa mchod/ /sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod/ /gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya/ /de nas bum pa bya ba ni/ /rtsa ba nag po la sogs med/ /mu tig gser dang rin chen dang / /byi

ru dngul dang zangs ma ste/ /bza' ba kun gyis legs bkang ba'i/ /snod ni steng du gzhag par bya/ /mgrin pa srad bus dkri ba dang / /kha ni 'dab mas brgyan par bya/ /gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa/ /brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod/ /gos zung gis ni legs

dkris pa'i/ /bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhag /gser ram dngul lam rin chen nam/ /mu tig rnams kyis mdzes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen dang / /gser gyis mdzes par spras par bya/ /grong mchog yid 'ong mchod na ni/ /grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /

bdag nyid kun nas zhal la ni/ /dri yi chu yis legs par gdab/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /mar me brgya ni dbul bar bya/ /nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /yid kyis thams cad steng du dgod/ /sa steng mkha' 'gro ma gang yin/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu dgod

par bya/ /gang yang sa 'og mkha' 'gro ma/ /de ni sa 'og rnams su dgod/ /ma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni/ /phyogs mtshams rnams su dgod par bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dri dang me tog de bzhin spos/ /cho ga bzhin du de bzhin mchod/ /mar me brgya yang

dbul bya zhing / /dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gnas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod/ /rgyal mtshan dmar dang de bzhin ser/ /dkar dang nag dang ser skya dang / /me tog phreng ba du ma dang / /de bzhin gos ni sna tshogs dang / /bla re dang ni yol ba dag /mdzes pa ji lta de

bzhin te/ /de bzhin bza' bca' btung ba yis/ /rab mnyam bzhag ste mchod par bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las 'khor lo mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas sgrub pos dngos kun gyis/ /dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya/ /grub 'dod shin tu

mnyam bzhag pas/ /ci nus pas ni bla ma mchod/ /dril bu sgra ldan dpyangs pa dang / /me tog spos rnams kyis brgyan cing / /shin tu sgra snyan dril bu dkrol/ /sgrub pa po yis rnga brdung zhing / /ha ha zhes ni brjod par bya/ /de ltar cho ga bzhin dkyil 'khor/ /'dod pa kun ldan mchod nas ni/ /

bu sdug de dag gdong pa la/ /dar ras legs par bkab nas su/ /thal mo me tog gis bkang ste/ /yang dag par ni zhugs pa dag /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /de nas bskor ba byas nas ni/ /blo bzang yid ni mnyam bzhag pa/ /pho brang nyams dgar gzhug par bya/ /

lho yi phyogs su lus bstan la/ /thal mo'i me tog de nas dor/ /dkyil 'khor steng du dor bar bya/ /gang du me tog de lhung ba/ /shrI he ru ka'i gnas sogs bstan/ /de yi rigs ni rnam bstan te/ /de ni rigs de'i ming 'gyur bar/ /slob dpon gyis ni ming bstan no/ /de nas

slob dpon legs par ni/ /mnyam par bzhag ste phyag rgya mchod/ /de nas slob ma phyi de nyin/ /las ni yang dag spyad par bya/ /mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis/ /de rnams su ni thig le bya/ /slob ma yi ni gdong phye la/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /lha gang gi

ni gnas gang yin/ /der de yang dag bstan par bya/ /slob dpon dang bcas pho brang la/ /de nas slob mas rab btud nas/ /phyir yang g.yon nas brtsams pa yis/ /de nas bskor ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la/ /ji bzhin cho gas phyag bya'o/ /de nas bla ma dag

la yon/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dbul/ /gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang / /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang / /glang po rta dang yul 'khor dang / /rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang / /mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang / /gser

las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs/ /chung ma bzang dang bu mo nyid/ /bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams/ /phyag btsal nas ni dbul bar bya/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin slob ma ni/ /blo dang ldan pas bla ma la/ /dngos po kun gyis bdag nyid ni/ /de bzhin du ni dbul bar bya/ /deng nas

brtsams te bran du bdag /khyed la bdag gis phul ba lags/ /de nas sgrub pos rab nges par/ /de ltar cho ga byas na ni/ /de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnal 'byor ma mo rnams mnyes 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /khaN+Da ro hA gzugs can ma/ /sgrub po

mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig /de dang rnam spyod kun tu 'gro/ /thams cad sgrub po de yi ni/ /ci bgyi byed par the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni sgrub 'gyur na/ /'jig rten gsum du mi bzlogs shing / /mi snang phug dang nam mkhar rgyu/ /rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len/ /

sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis/ /rtag par rgyun du bskyed par 'gyur/ /gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang / /nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyang khyad par du/ /skad cig de la sbyor bskyed de/ /'gro ba rnams kyang nges gnon par/ /lan cig

bltas pas rnal 'byor pas/ /sngags pa dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod/ /mkha' la khu tshur gyis brdeg dang / /smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thungs dang mtshungs/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang / /sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin/ /gang zhig rtag tu 'dod

gyur pa/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams te/ /'di dag zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ /rgyud 'di ru ni dbang bskur bas/ /thams cad kyi ni sgrub pa po/ /rgod dang lta dang lag 'dzin gyis/ /'khyud dang gnyis sprad la sogs la/ /dbang bskur bar ni gyur pa yin/ /thams cad

rgyud las dam pa'o/ /'di ni lha mi zil gnon 'gro/ /de nyid bsdus pa'am sdom pa'am/ /gsang ba'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung / /de kun he ru ka la gnas/ /

dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las yon tan dang bcas pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /gnas na rnam par 'gying ba ste/ /brtson chen 'khor los sgyur ma dang / /stobs chen ma dang rab dpa' mo/ /'khor lo'i

go cha chang 'tshong ma/ /khaN+Da ro hA 'khor lo'i shugs/ /bya gdong ma dang rta rna mo/ /shin tu bzang mo ljang lha mo/ /chang 'thung ma dang rlung shugs ma/ /de bzhin 'jigs byed chen mo dang / /sa srung ma dang shing grib ma/ /lang ka'i dbang phyug mi'u thung ma/ /dpa' bo'i blo

ma sna chen ma/ /'od ldan ma dang gtum mig ma/ /rab gtum ma ste sgrub byed yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /'di dag sngon nyid grub pa yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbus su ni/ /ji ltar phyi rol nang de bzhin/ /rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni/ /mthar ni hU~M hU~M

phaT sbyar te/ /rnal 'byor rab mchog 'di mthong na/ /me ste gzhan dag sog mar mtshungs/ /o~M ni kun la gsal byed de/ /grub stsol 'dod pa thams cad byed/ /dpa' bo nyid 'gyur grub pa ni/ /khyim du dkyil 'khor mthong ba yin/ /de nas de rtag bsgom par bya/ /dngos

grub de bzhin gshegs gsungs bzhin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma gnyis su med par dgod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas thams cad chos 'byung bar/ /sna tshogs lte bar mi shigs dge/ /sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri/ /

chos kun gcig tu bsdu bar bya/ /'dir sngags tshig ni 'di yin te/ /A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /sde tshan la ni yongs bsdoms pa/ /bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas la/ /thub pa mchog gi re mig la/ /der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa'o/ /

bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ /bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang / /sum cu pa ni yang dag blang / /

de bzhin nyi shu drug pa nyid/ /de dag thams cad legs bsdus la/ /de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed yang / /de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gzung / /dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /dang po yi ni gsum pa dang / /sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa yi

ni lnga pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi dang po gang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /dang po yi yang dang po dang / /de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid dang / /de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa/ /gsum

pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /bzhi pa'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /uSh+ma NA yi gnyis pa nyid/ /dang po'i dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo / /dang po yi ni gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /de bzhin sum

cu rtsa gcig blang / /lnga pa ni nyid dag dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / /uSh+mA NA yi tha ma nyid/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni

gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /uSh+mA NA yi gsum pa dang / /gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /an+tas+thA yi dang po dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /an+tas+thA yi gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin yang ni sum cu pa/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /uSh+mA NA yi dang po nyid/ /

de bzhin yi ge d+ya nyid dang / /bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /uSh+mA'i dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ /dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang / /gsum pa'i dang po nyid dag dang / /dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gang yin dang / /an+tas+thA

yi gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /yi ge byA ni de nas blang / /dang po yi ni bzhi pa dang / /de nas brgyad pa nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa'i lnga pa nyid dag yin/ /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /slar yang nyi shu

rtsa bdun pa/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga yang dag blang / /sum cu rtsa gsum nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /bzhi pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /an+tas+thA yi bzhi pa dang / /

de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /uSh+mA NA yi gnyis pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o/ /dang po'i dang po nyid dang ni/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po nyid/ /drug pa yi yang gnyis pa'o/ /dang po yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas gnyis pa de bzhin

te/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi yang lnga pa la/ /bzhi pa yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la/ /bzhi pa yis ni gdan du bya/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /

'og tu me yi gdan dang ldan/ /uSh+mA NA yi gsum de bzhin/ /mthar gnas pa yi dang po yang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po nyid/ /me yis gdan du byas pa'o/ /bdun pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /drug pa yi yang dang po gang / /ka Shar grags pa'i dang po gzung / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi

pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi dang po gang / /de bzhin yang ni ril po nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /bdun pa yi yang dang po dang / /uSh+mA NA yi bzhi pa gzung / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /rdo rje sems dpas phye ba dag /uSh+mA NA yi bzhi pa nyid/ /'od byed gdan du

byas pa'o/ /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /'og tu yang ni me yi gdan/ /tsheg drag dang ni yang dag ldan/ /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa nyid/ /drug pa yi ni gnyis nyid dang / /de bzhin bcu gcig par ni nges/ /slar yang nyi shu rtsa gnyis gzung / /

gsum pa yi ni dang po dang / /bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+mA NA yi bzhi pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /nyi shu gcig pa de nas btu/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi ni dang por nges/ /gnyis las drug pa'i yi ge'o/ /

lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /de bzhin ka Shar grags nyid dang / /nyi shu bzhi pa de nas btu/ /slar yang ril po ji bzhin dang / /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+mA NA yi gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /slar yang 'od byed sbyin par bya/ /

yi ge nyi shu'i 'og tu ni/ /bcu drug pa ni gdan du bya/ /'og tu me yis gsal byas la/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /nyi shu lnga pas khyad par dbye/ /

bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /nyi ma'i bu yis khyad par dbye/ /uSh+mA NA yi bzhi pa dang / /'og tu lnga pa yi gdan/ /dang po yi yang gsum pa dang / /de nas me yis gdan du bya/ /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /'og tu lnga pa yi gdan/ /

uSh+mA NA yi gsum pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /bcu drug pa yis gdan du'o/ /de nas nyi shu gcig pa blang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi ni

bzhi pa dang / /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /dang po yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+mA NA yi gsum pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /'od byed mnyam par gnas pa'o/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /me yis

steng nas gsal bar bya/ /mthar gnas pa yi dang por gsungs/ /de nas yi ge bcu drug 'og /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /spyi bor me yi yi ges mtshan/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug nyid/ /dang po yi ni dang po dang / /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /gsum pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /

bcu gsum pa yis mnan pa'o/ /dang po'i dang po de bzhin te/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /gsum pa yi ni bzhi pa yi/ /steng du bcu gsum pa nyid dang / /uSh+mA NA yi bzhi pa la/ /nyi shu bdun pas gdan du bya/ /ya yig brgyad pa'i sa bon la/ /'od byed kyis ni gsal

byas pa/ /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /lnga pa yis gdan du bya/ /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /gsum pa'i lnga pa la ni bskyon/ /ka Sha'i sa bon btus nas ni/ /nyi shu lnga pas gdan du bya/ /ril po mdzes pa btus nas ni/ /yi ge ma yis gdan du bya/ /uSh+mA NA yi

bzhi pa nyid/ /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang / /de bzhin sum cu gsum par nges/ /lnga pa'i bdag nyid yongs btus la/ /yang ni de la gnyis par nges/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /de bzhin sum

cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /drug pa'i gsum pa de bzhin te/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /drug pa yi ni gsum pa ste/ /gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi yin no/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags te/ /bya ba thams cad rab

sgrub pa'o/ /'di las shin tu mchog gyur pa/ /'jig rten gsum na yod min te/ /he ru ka dpal sngags shes na/ /me ste gzhan dag sog ma 'dra/ /rtsa ba'i sngags su rab tu grags/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u

ste lnga pa'o// //gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis/ /snying po nye snying yi ge bdun/ /ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang / /de bzhin gug skyed bcu gnyis kyi/ /yi ge bar ma dor byas la/ /yan lag drug ni he ru ka /dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /yi ge re rer yang

dag gnas/ /o~M na maHswA hA bau ShaT/ /hU~M hU~M phaT dang yang dag ldan/ /sgrub pos snying por shes par bya/ /dang po snying ga nyid du ste/ /gnyis pa spyi bor shes par bya/ /gsum pa spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar/ /bzhi pa go cha nyid du yin/ /lnga pa mig tu gyur pa ste/ /drug pa

mtshon cha zhes byar 'dod/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dpa' bo drug gi go cha btu ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum nyid/ /yi ge gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig yang dag ldan/ /yi ge drug pas brgyan

par bya/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pa nyid kyang ni/ /yi ge bdun pa nyid dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ /mkhas pas yi ge brgyad dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan par/ /yi ge dgu pas brgyan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge

bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni/ /yi ge nyi shu gcig pa gzung / /mkhas pas yi ge bcu bzhi pa/ /yi ge nyi shu pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge lnga pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig lngar yang dag ldan/ /yi ge

bcu drug pa mdzes bya/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa'i/ /yi ge bcu bdun pa ru 'dod/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge brgyad pa ru sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge nyi shu gcig par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge nyi

shu gsum par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa nyid ni/ /yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar/ /sde tshan dang po blangs nas ni/ /yi ge nyi shu lnga par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan par/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug 'gyur/ /nyi shu brgyad pa nyid dag ni/ /dbyangs yig

lnga pa dang sbyar/ /gsum pa'i dang po yang dag ldan/ /'og ma'i cha ni me dang bcas/ /de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /dbyangs yig

bcu gsum pa dang sbyar/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum pa/ /nyi mar yang dag ldan par bya/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge sum cu bzhir ldan pa/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag ni/ /sum cu bdun par yang dag ldan/ /mkha' 'gro

ma rnams sgrub byed yin/ /sum cu brgyad pa 'di dag ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid la/ /'og gi char ni sgrub pa pos/ /me dang sbyar ba bya ba nyid/ /bzhi bcu gsum pa nyid

dag ni/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang sbyar/ /yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa ni/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag kyang / /bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa ldan pa/ /dpa' bo thams cad rab mchod yin/ /bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa

dang sbyar ba/ /'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis/ /mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /lha rnams thams cad sgrub byed ni/ /'di nyid

yin par the tshom med/ /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang sbyar/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs yig drug pa dang yang sbyar/ /dgra rnams nges par gsod byed yin/ /an+tas+thA yi bzhi pa dang / /dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar bar bya/ /

de bzhin lnga pa dang sbyar/ /dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yin/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa gcig nyid/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /'di nyid mchog ni yin par bshad/ /de bzhin drug cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum par

sbyar ba ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mchog tu 'dod/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa gsum nyid/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig yang dag ldan/ /mdzes pa'i yi ge kun mchog nyid/ /de bzhin drug cu rtsa lnga pa/ /rdo rje sems dpas phye ba dag /sa bon 'di ni lha rdzas mchog /grub sbyin thar

pa sbyin chen po/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang yang sbyar/ /bya ba kun la grub sbyin par/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa bdun pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba kun/ /'di

nyid yin par the tshom med/ /drug cu brgyad pa nyid la yang / /der ni yi ge pa sbyar ba/ /sa bon yi ge 'di yi ni/ /'og gi char ni brtag par bya/ /yi ge bdun cu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge kun la mdzes pa ni/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom

med/ /bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba dag /gdod nas grub pa yin par ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs/ /yi ge bdun cu lnga pa nyid/ /ma mo drug pa dang ldan pa/ /'di ni rnal 'byor rab mchog ste/ /bya ba kun la dam

pa yin/ /bdun cu rtsa drug pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing / /nyi ma yis ni dbye bya ste/ /yi ge pa ni der sbyar bya/ /mchog tu mdzes pa gzhan yod min/ /yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun pa/ /der ni d+ha dang sbyar bar bya/ /sa bon 'di ni lha rdzas mchog /mkha' 'gro

ma yi mdzes par 'dod/ /bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing / /sa bon 'di ni mchog bzang po/ /rgyu yi mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' yi khyad par byed/ /gdod nas grub byed 'di yin te/ /dngos

grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o/ /yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar bya/ /ma mo rnams las lnga pa nyid/ /de bzhin yi ge brgyad cu brgyad/ /ma mo dag las lnga pa nyid/ /yi ge brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa/ /ma mo rnams las lnga pa nyid/ /

de bzhin yi ge dgu bcu pa/ /ma mo dag las lnga pa dang / /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa/ /ma mo rnams las gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs dag las ni gnyis pa dang / /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa/ /gdug pa rnams ni skrag byed cing / /sngags pa

rnams la bde 'byung byed/ /dbyangs rnams kyi ni bcu gsum pa/ /yi ge gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /dbyangs las bcu gsum pa nyid dang / /yi ge lnga par yang dag ldan/ /gdug pa rnams ni zad byed cing / /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bde 'bab pa'o/ /dbyangs rnams
