rdul de nyid ni blangs nas su/ /lcags phye dang ni rnam par bsres/ /dur khrod ras la btums nas ni/ /lan bdun bzlas la bzhi mdo ru/ /sor brgyad tsam du sa brkos la/ /dgra yi ming dang bcas par ni/ /gang gi ming smos sbas gyur pa/ /de ni myur du gnon par 'gyur/ /phye ma de nyid

bzlas nas su/ /'bad de ba yi 'o ma yis/ /de ni slar yang gsos gyur na/ /'grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /phye ma de ni blangs nas ni/ /myos byed lnga dang ldan pa ru/ /de ni dur khrod ras kyis bcing / /dgra yi ming yang bri bar bya/ /bzlas brjod lan brgya byas nas ni/ /dur khrod du ni

nges sbas na/ /bsgrub bya smyo ba nyid du 'gyur/ /bton pa nyid kyis thar bar 'gyur/ /bton nas ba yi 'o ma yis/ /'bad pas de bzhin bkru bar bya/ /slar yang gso ba de dag ni/ /'grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma drug gi yi ge bdun gyi

las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas las kyi rab mchog ni/ /ngag gi dngos grub byed pa'o/ /ka ra bI ra'i me tog dmar/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni blangs nas su/ /'bad de ba yi 'o ma dang / /bzlas brjod brgya yang bya ba yin/ /lan re bzlas pa'i me tog gis/ /ling

ga'i spyi bor bsnun par bya/ /de ltar shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /nyi ma bdun du bya ba yin/ /de nas nyin zhag bcu gcig par/ /me tog dag ni blangs nas su/ /chu bo chen por song nas ni/ /re re nas ni chu la dor/ /de dag thams cad rim bzhin du/ /lan re bzlas nas rab tu bya/ /

chu bor me tog tha ma ni/ /rgyun las bzlog ste rab 'bab na/ /chu dang bcas par blangs nas ni/ /sos ma reg par de 'thungs na/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las byung ba yi/ /sgrub po'i tshig ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas skye gnas brgya bcings la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni/ /sngags

pa bsgrub byar mngon phyogs na/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i lto bar gnas/ /de la yid kyi gnas bzhin du/ /blo ldan thun gsum mthe'u chung bskyod/ /bram ze gsod pa dag gis kyang / /zhag bdun brgya byin sogs nges 'gugs/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul las ni/ /bsgrub par bya

ba'i gzugs byas la/ /tsha ba gsum gyis lus la bsku/ /spra tshil gyis kyang rab tu byug /sgrub pa po yi gsang gnas su/ /zangs ma'i khab kyis phug nas ni/ /seng ldeng mdag me du med la/ /mkhas pas nyi ma bdun du bsro/ /lan brgya bzlas te bzlas pa'i mthar/ /mi yi

bdag po mdun na 'don/ /btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /nges par 'gugs par byed pa yin/ /mi yi bdag po 'khor bcas pa/ /gro ga'i 'dab mar bri bya ba/ /gi wang dag gis bris nas ni/ /ming dang spel nas gang la ni/ /mngon par phyogs te brgya bzlas nas/ /seng ldeng me la

de gdungs shing / /dur khrod me steng grub phyir bshad/ /ji srid spra tshil ma zhu'i bar/ /bsros par gyur na rgyal po ni/ /'khor los sgyur dang bcas par yang / /nges par 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes las/ /tsan+dan dmar po nyid dang ni/ /dur khrod lhag ma thal

bas spyos/ /sgrub pa po yis gcig bsdus la/ /seng ldeng me ni du med la/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsro bar bya/ /rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ /mnyes nas sbyin sreg byas nas ni/ /ji srid du ni bsregs pas 'grub/ /rdul de blangs nas ma yengs par/ /dbugs mi 'byin

par sbas na ni/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral 'dra la/ /rmongs shing nyon mongs pa nyid dang / /rlung gi shugs kyis 'ongs nas ni/ /sgrub pa po yi steng du lhung / /phyugs sam yang na pho nya mo/ /mkhas pa yis ni dbye ba yin/ /de nas las kyi pho nya mor/ /bya ba 'di ni 'dzin pa nyid/ /ka ra

bI ra'i lcug ma ni/ /rlan bcas dpung pa'i tshad mnyam blangs/ /'bar 'gyur ro bsreg me la dor/ /ji srid de ni ma tshig pa/ /myur du song ste de blangs la/ /rig pa lan bdun bzlas nas ni/ /gang zhig bzlas te bskor na ni/ /de ni de yi skad cig la/ /skyes pa'am bud med rang gzugs can/ /

rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/ /ka ra bI ra'i me tog dmar/ /brgya bzlas rgyal gyi sbyor ba las/ /sgrub pos gi'u wang gis byugs la/ /me tog chu la gnas pa la/ /chu bo chen por zhugs nas ni/ /lte ba man chod chur bcug ste/ /lag pa sbyar ba'i dbus gnas la/ /rig pa

stong du bzlas nas ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis phyer brlags te/ /chu dang bcas par btung bar bya/ /de nas sgrub pa po de yis/ /tshig gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'am rgyal po'i chung ma ni/ /yid kyis nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/ /lhar bcas lha min mi rnams ni/ /myur du dbang

du byed par 'gyur/ /khros pas tshig gis gsod 'gyur zhing / /dbye dang bskrad pa nyid kyang byed/ /sgrub pa po yi tshig nyid kyis/ /tshar gcod par ni byed par 'gyur/ /tshig tsam gyis ni chu bo dang / /shing rta 'khrul 'khor rgya mtsho dang / /glang po rta dang de bzhin sprin/ /skyes bu'am yang na bya yang gnon/ /

yid kyis yid la gang 'dod pa/ /tshig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /dgug pa yi ni sbyor ba dag /bud med thams cad rmongs byed pa/ /kar bI ra'i me tog ni/ /dmar po yang dag blangs nas su/ /rig pa lan brgya bzlas pa dag /skye gnas dbus su gzhug par bya/ /me tog de ni kha sbyar byas/ /

gsang ba'i gnas su nges par sbyar/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor ldan/ /sngags pas brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas/ /skye gnas dbus kyi me tog de/ /sgrub pa po yis gcig blangs la/ /me tog gis ni gang bsnun pa/ /de ni mod la dbang du 'gyur/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang / /yan lag

tshigs kun gzhan dbang ste/ /mngon 'gyur sems ni zlog pa ru/ /skad cig gis ni dbang du byed/ /'di ni yid ches dngos grub ste/ /don yod dbang du byed pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma drug dang tshig gi dngos grub lung bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga

pa'o// //de nas yi ge ha lnga ni/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub byed pa/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /myur du dngos grub rab 'jug pa'o/ /haM hau ho hai haH yi ge ha lnga lag pa yis/ /bskul dang ldan pas mnyes na ni/ /kha nas kyang ni khrag 'dzag cing / /dgra bo de yi mod la 'chi/ /rang gi

khrag ni thod gnas pa/ /srin lag gis khrag mnye bar bya/ /ji srid skams kyi bar du ste/ /des ni bsgrub bya rnam par 'jig /gal te khro bo 'bar ba dang / /mig dmar ba yis bzlas na ni/ /dpung tshogs bzhon par bcas pa yi/ /rgyal po myur du 'chi bar byed/ /byi la dang ni ne'u le dang / /khwa dang wa

dang chu skyar ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma la stobs can sbyar/ /'di dag myur du 'grub yin par/ /rgyud 'di la ni the tshom med/ /ri bong la sogs spu las ni/ /srad bu byas te lan stong bzlas/ /gang gi mgul du bcings gyur pa/ /de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /lag par bzlas brjod stong byas te/ /ka ra bI ra'i

me tog dang / /yi ge re re mngon bzlas la/ /sbrum ma la ni reg gyur na/ /mngal ni rnam par 'pho 'gyur te/ /gtang na thar bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gang la sdigs mdzub byas te 'chi/ /slar yang 'tsho bar byed pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las yi ge ha lnga'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug

pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro kun gyi snying po ste/ /'di ni brjod pa tsam gyis kyang / /dngos grub thams cad skyed byed yin/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i rig pa chen po bzlas na rigs thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas pas ni dpal chen po

bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /mi rus kyi rgyu la phur bu sor drug pa byas la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas gang gi sgor sbas pa de'i rigs rgyud rnams gcod par 'gyur ro/ /zhing dang ra ba dang ma he dang glang po che dang / rta'i gnas su brkos te sbas na thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro/ /de nas

rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod na rgyal po'i sgor sa las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa byas la mkhas pas bzhag nas nyin zhag dang po la ma tu lung ga'i me tog dang 'bras bu rnams dang ku su ma bsres pas sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /sngags 'di nyid

kyis dgug pa dang / gnon pa dang / skems pa dang / rmongs pa dang / rmugs pa dang / tshig 'phrog pa dang / long bar byed pa dang / dig pa nyid dang / slar gtong bar byed do/ /de nas skyes pa bud med du bya bar 'dod na skyes pa'i ro'i me tog dang / ka ga an di ka'i 'bras bu dang / khwa'i sen mo dang /

rkang pa'i 'og gi pags pa cha mnyam par byas la ri bong gi khrag dang btags te/ ril bu bcu gcig byas la grib ma la skam mo/ /de bzhin du zhag bzang po la lag pa la bcings te nyi ma bcu gnyis pa la gang gi spyi bor phye ma bzhag pa de bud med du 'gyur ro/ /de nas skyes pa khyir bya bar 'dod na

rgyal gyi lcags ne'u le'i mgo bor bzhag la mtshan mo bdun gyi bar du brgya stong sbyin sreg byas la nyin zhag brgyad pa la gur kum dang / mnyam por sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas phye ma'i sbyin sreg byas la de'i thal ba gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de khyir 'gyur ro/ /slar gso ba ni

mtshan mo'i dus su mkha' 'gro ma rnams la mchod pa chen po byas te/ gtor ma byin na de'i 'og tu rnal mar 'gyur ro/ /rdzas rdzas ma yin par bya bar 'dod na/ gser shing gi 'bras bu sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na rdzas ma yin par 'gyur ro/ /a ru ra'i sbyin sreg byas na rnal mar 'gyur ro/ /

de nas smyo bar bya bar 'dod na bya chen po'i gnas kyi sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun pa la smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /slar bzlog pa ni 'bras kyi phub ma'i sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /byi la'i spu zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe bsdus la gang gi ming nas smos nas sngags kyi sbyin sreg byas nas thal ba de gang gi spyi

bor bzhag pa de byi lar 'gyur ro/ /slar bzlas na rnal mar 'gyur ro/ /bya rog gi rgyus pa la srad bu byas pa bzung la mngon par bzlas te gang gi mgul du bcings pa de bya rog tu 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang gi rgyus pas srad bu byas pa la mngon par bzlas te mgul du bcings pa de de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin du khwa dang thi ba dang rma bya dang chu skyar dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang bya rgod kyi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /ba lang gi spu las srad bu byas la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te mgul du bcings na de ba lang du 'gyur ro/ /rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa gang dang gang gi spu las srad bu byas la mngon

par bzlas te mgul du btags na de de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /bkrol na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras so ba la bzlas la nor gyi bdag po chen po'i khyim du bcug la lhag mas bdag nyid dbang bskur na mtshan bdun gyis so ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par

brjod pa las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags kyi las thams cad kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro kun gyi dge ba gang / /snying po rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa'o/ /gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis

ni/ /'jig rten gsum po g.yo byed cing / /rjes su dran pa tsam gyis kyang / /yang dag dngos grub rim gyis so/ /hA swA Tapha hU~M hU~M ye nI r+NaN badzra ba ye nI ki DA d+d+ha bu rbas o~M/ sngags 'di bklags pas 'grub pa ste/ /las rnams kun byed dge ba yin/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / /khaN+Da ro ha lA

ma sogs/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyi/ /sngags ni 'di nyid yin par grags/ /sa 'og yang na mtho ris sam/ /de bzhin mi yul dag tu yang / /las ni gang dag yod pa dag /sngags kyis de dag thams cad bsgrub/ /dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba/ /

'di las shin tu mchog gyur med/ /'jig rten gsum na ci yang med/ /gang phyir 'di ni bla na med/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni kun gyi gnas/ /mdor bshad rgyas par ma yin no/ /me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis/ /ri bo bzang po bri bya zhing / /de yi steng du rtag bsgom pa/ /

mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang / /khaN+Da ro ha rnal 'byor ma/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi dpa' bo nyid/ /ha ha he he zhes bya ba/ /dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang mdzad/ /de bzhin pad+ma gar dbang dang / /shrI he ru ka nyid dang ni/ /mkha'

snying dang ni rta mgrin nyid/ /rin chen rdo rje stobs po che/ /mig mi bzang dang 'jigs byed dang / /rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang dang / /rdo rje hU~M mdzad dpa' chen po/ /de bzhin rdo rje ral pa can/ /myu gu can dang rdo rje'i lus/ /rdo rje'i 'od ni nyid dag dang / /'od dpag med dang lha yi dgra/ /de bzhin mche ba

rnam gtsigs dang / /keng rus keng rus chen po dang / /thong pa'i dum bu la sogs pa/ /dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad khyab/ /dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rab gtum sogs/ /bya ba kun la sgrub pa pos/ /'khor lor bzhugs

par blta bar bya/ /grub 'dod shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /'khor lo'i bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom/ /sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog brjod/ /'khor lo chen po grub kun gnas/ /de bzhin dngos grub kun gyi gzhi/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba dang / /dpa' bo bye

bas legs par gsungs/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni re re yi/ /'khor ni bye ba dag tu 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma ni mkha' 'gro nyid/ /gzugs can ma dang dum skyes ma/ /de bzhin lA ma la sogs ni/ /dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro

ma thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /ji bzhin cho gas phyugs bsgrub bya/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o/ /sngags pas 'bras kyi phye ma las/ /rim bzhin

du ni phyugs gzugs bya/ /mi dang ru sbal rnga mo dang / /bong bu spyang ki rta la sogs/ /de ltar sna tshogs phag dag ste/ /phyugs 'di dag tu shes par bya/ /mtshan nyid ji ltar gyur pa dang / /'di rnams las ni bshad par bya/ /skye ba gcig dang skye ba gnyis/ /gsum mam bzhi 'am lnga

nyid dam/ /skye ba drug dang bdun gyur pa/ /phyugs rnams su ni gdon mi za/ /gang gi kha yi dri zhim zhing / /mig mi 'dzums par rnam par blta/ /bden par smra zhing mthong na dga'/ /rtag tu dam chos dgar 'gyur zhing / /rang gi skye ba shes pa dang / /lus kyi dri ni rtag tu zhim/ /mtshan

nyid 'di dag ldan par ni/ /skye ba bdun du 'byung ba yin/ /de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha yi gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /mnams pa'am reg pa tsam gyis sam/ /gang zhig thig le byed pa de/ /mod la 'grub par 'gyur ba ste/ /'di ni rang dga'i gzugs 'chang 'gyur/ /de yi snying

ka'i ro tsa na/ /mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas ni/ /snying po'i sngags ni bzlas nas su/ /de yi thig le bya ba yin/ /sems can gang dang gang gi ni/ /gzugs su byed par 'dod pa na/ /de dang de yi gzugs su ni/ /thig les 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mkhas pas shing lo khu ba ni/ /

ro tsa nar bcas blangs nas su/ /dpral bar thig le byas na ni/ /de gzugs 'gyur bar the tsom med/ /phyugs nyid kyi ni ba spu yis/ /lag pa spyi bor bcing bar bya/ /de yi yan lag lngar ldan zhing / /de yi spu dang rnam bsres pa/ /lag pa spyi bor bcings na ni/ /de yi gzugs 'gyur the tsom

med/ /rnal 'byor pa ni bsgoms shing zlos/ /mi rnams nus pa ldan yin yang / /dka' zhing nyon mongs la dga' ba/ /dngos grub lam ni 'gog pa yin/ /glang po rta dang bong bu dang / /ru sbal rnga mo phag dang wa/ /khwa dang 'ug sogs bya rgod dang / /khrung khrung khra dang sa ra la/ /gzugs bzang

ba dang gzugs ngan dang / /lha yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor dpa' chen rang dga'i gzugs/ /skye 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/ /'di bas shin tu mchog grub pa/ /'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las skye ba bdun pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i

gzugs yongs su brje ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas sbyin sreg cho ga ni/ /nges par dbang du byed 'gyur ba/ /yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad/ /go mAng sa ni myos byed bsre/ /lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg byas/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni

dbang 'gyur na/ /phran tshegs mi ni smos ci dgos/ /kha chu so shing dag dang ni/ /de bzhin rang gi lus mnyes pa/ /myos byed ming dang bcas pa yis/ /khams gsum dag ni dbang du 'gyur/ /zla mtshan gyi ni khrag dang ni/ /zos nas rlon pa'i zas dag dang / /mi yi skra dang ldan pa yis/ /

mod la 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin/ /rang gi lus las skyugs pa 'am/ /mkhas pas rang skras sbyin sreg bya/ /nim pa'i shing la rab sbyar na/ /mod la dbye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mnyam par bzhag pas d+ha dur me/ /yungs mar tshan der bsgres pa yi/ /bya rog gshog pas sbyin sreg byas/ /

'phral du 'chi ba'am skrod par 'gyur/ /nyal dang ma nyal 'dug pa'am/ /zas dang sbyor ba sogs rnams la'ang / /mkhas pas rtag tu zlo byed na/ /de la bgegs ni yod ma yin/ /wa yi sha yis bsregs blugs brgyas/ /yang dag bsregs blugs byed pa'i mi/ /de ni zla ba gsum rjes la/ /

rigs kyi dbul ba 'jig par 'gyur/ /sha chen dag gis la la zhig /myos byed ldan pas sbyin sreg byed/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni/ /sgrub pa po ni thun gsum byed/ /ma lus sa rnams spyod pa dang / /zla ba drug gis dbang du 'gyur/ /tshim 'gyur mkha' 'gro ma de la/ /rgyal srid ster

bar gdon mi za/ /lha rnams thams cad bsgoms nas ni/ /thun gnyis bar du sbyin sreg byas/ /rang gi lus ni de nyid kyis/ /mkha' la 'gro ba nyid thob 'gyur/ /go mA yu dang sha chang gis/ /phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg bya/ /myur du de yi lag tu 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'jug /

sngags kyi bzlas brjod mtshan mo bzlas/ /yul 'khor yang ni 'gugs par byed/ /de ltar nyin re byas na ni/ /rgyal po nyid du de byed 'gyur/ /'di las rab mchog gzhan dag ni/ /'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin/ /rnal 'byor chen po rang dgas 'chi/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin

cing rol/ /bil ba de bzhin pa la sha/ /u dum bA ra nyid dag ni/ /sbyin sreg 'bum byas myur du ni/ /nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur/ /go mAng sa dang myos byed bsre/ /rgyal srid 'dod pas sbyin sreg bya/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes byas na/ /dbul po nyid du ga la 'gyur/ /

go mA yu ni bsreg byas pas/ /ci bde bar ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /go mA yu yi sbyin sreg gis/ /myur du nor bdag mnyam par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs gtsang sbra med na yang / /bstan pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /lhag pa'i tshe dang kuSh+maN+DaM/ /mut+ga mA Sha tsa na ka /sbrang rtsi gtsigs

ma ske tshe dang / /khyim gyi ta ma la 'dab blangs/ /kha bcing bar ni 'gyur ba yin/ /ci rung spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gang du dga' ba der gnas so/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sa dang gnas/ /he ru ka dpal rgyu yan lag /thams cad brtan g.yo'i bdag

nyid can/ /gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med/ /zhing 'dir 'od byed shes par bya/ /nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba/ /ts+tshan+do ha ni mngon 'gyur nyid/ /nye ba'i ts+tshan+do sbyang dka' ba/ /'dus pa ring du song ba yin/ /nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba/ /dur khrod legs

pa'i blo gros nyid/ /nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/ /shrI he ru ka gzhung spyod pa'i/ /'di ni nang gi bdag nyid sa/ /pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi brda yi skad/ /mtho ris sa steng sa 'og tu/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag /pul+lIr la sogs gang

bstan pa/ /phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che/ /'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing / /thams cad du ni spyan zhal dbu/ /kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na/ /thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas

dngos grub bsgrub bya ba/ /bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dbang gi sbyin sreg dang gnas la sogs pa'i sa bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// //de

nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste/ /dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni/ /nga yis rgyud du sbas pa yin/ /gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /shes rab yan lag phur bu dra/ /A li kA li zhes brjod pa/ /rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro ba/ /'jug pa

sgra la sogs pa nas/ /ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan pa/ /bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das/ /lag pa'i mchod pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /go cha chen pos yang dag srung / /sngags rnams kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni

bshad pa yin/ /mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa 'thob cing / /skye dang skye bar bde gshegs kyi/ /rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur/ /ji ltar sngon bsags sdig pa yi/ /mtshan nyid thams cad dman

pa ste/ /gang zhig 'di ni rtag sgom pa/ /sa la 'dod pa kun dbang phyug /dper na mar gyis gang ba'i snod/ /me yi dbus su bzhag na ni/ /mar sar steng du zhu 'gyur zhing / /snod kyi dri ma 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin shrI he ru ka yi/ /mtshan gyis sdig pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /bsam

gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam/ /klog cing kha ton bris pa yis/ /mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba'am/ /yang na 'khor los sgyur ba 'thob/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ khrag 'thung dpal sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs/ /rgyal mtshan ba

dan sna tshogs dang / /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa yis/ /'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog 'di/ /mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed/ /de 'dra'i dpa' chen rnal 'byor ma/ /sa stengs na ni rnyed par dka'/ /dpal ldan he ru ka'i rgyud chen/ /gang zhig shes

nas ma dad pa/ /dbul po sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par/ /de la rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mgul rgyan gdu bu dpung rgyan dang / /rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / /do shal mgo bo'i phreng ba dang / /ske rags sil sil sgra sgrogs pa/ /ri stengs sna tshogs pad+ma yi/ /lte bar A li kA

li skyes/ /dkar mo bdag po rnam gnon cing / /rdo rje dril bus sku la 'khyud/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyed ldan pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang / /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che'i/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i/ /'khor bcas dbus su sbyor

ldan pa/ /thams cad dgyes shing gnyis med 'gyur/ /'byin dang sdud par mdzad pa yin/ /mos pa du ma'i sems can la/ /spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad de/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis gdul bya ba/ /thabs ni sna tshogs ston pa yin/ /zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la/ /gal te mos par ma gyur

kyang / /smod pa dag tu mi bya ste/ /chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya/ /gang gis 'dir bdag yul min pa/ /gang gis chos nyid mi shes yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de'i sras ni/ /bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur tam/ /ma byung na yang

rnam kun tu/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i chos nyid ni/ /'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin/ /de ltar rnam par bzhag nas kyang / /'jig rten pa kun yong mi smad/ /de yi bgrod pa bsam yas shing / /sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab/ /mdo sde bya ba spyod pa rnams/ /rnal 'byor gsang

mtha'i dbye ba nyid/ /sems can mos pas 'jug pa rnams/ /de dang de la dga' ba bzhin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa 'bum pa'i nang nas phyung ba grub pa'i rtog pa rmad du byung ba ngo mtshar dang bcas par byed pa bstan bcos thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal he ru ka dpa' bo chen po

bklags pas 'grub pa gzhan thams cad kyis mi thub pa gdod nas grub pa'i bla ma yin no/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// //grags pa yid 'ong

rgyal mtshan mtho ldan pa'i/ /rin chen dang mtshungs rin chen bzang po yis/ /mkhas pa pad+mA ka ra'i zhal sngar ni/ /rig pa'i 'byung gnas kha che'i dpe las bsgyur/ /lhag pa'i tshul khrims dri yis bsgos gyur cing / /dri med bka' don 'thad pa dang
bcas par/ /rtogs pa dang ldan grags pa'i zhal sngar ni/ /sgra sgyur dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti dang / /mar pa sgra bsgyur chos kyi dbang phyug gis/ /mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas yul dbus dpe dang gtugs// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi d+ha na ut+ta ra tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji srid 'gro ba drug gi mthar/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par 'byung / /rdo rje sems dpa'

yis ni byed/ /chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ /sku gsum ye shes lnga yi dngos/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lor bzhugs/ /'gro ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ji srid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun du rtog pas bcings pa gcad/ /

'jig rten bya ba rab tu 'jug /de srid rtag tu phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po la rnam par bzhugs

te/ der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma'i

bla ma snying po ngas bshad kyis/ lag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i bdag po 'khor sna tshogs pas rnam par 'phrul pa rgyas par bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig /de la bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te thal mo sbyar ba btud pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/

de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min/ /dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma ni/ /mngon par brjod pa'i phyi ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ thams cad bdag

nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin/ /thog ma med pa'i tshul chen 'di/ /b+ha gar sid sgra gzugs skyes gnas/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/ /

thog mar dbus mthar dri ma med/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /srub dang bsrub par yang dag sbyor/ /gang la de la ji ltar bzhin/ /rang bzhin dag pa 'od gsal ba/ /gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba yin/ /rtag tu nyes bral zhi ba ste/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa/ /

spro dang sdud pa byed pa yin/ /rang bzhin dag pa rang byung ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba ster/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan ldan pa dang / /sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes kyi/ /de dag rgyud las gsungs pa dag /gsang ba'i bdag po rab tu nyon/ /dbugs 'byin bar ma mchog dag dang / /

dri yi chu dang bcas pa dag /mkhas pas ril bur byas nas ni/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag la mchod/ /'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad par la/ /pho nyas lhan cig skyes pa 'grub/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste/ /mthar thug dngos grub thams cad 'byung / /dga' ba yid la 'dod pa

yi/ /dngos grub kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /rang dang gzhan yang mchod par bya/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /thos pa dang ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol

'gyur te/ /de ltar 'di la the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog /dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan dag pas kyang / /skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig la 'jug pa'i gsang

ba sbas pa bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dngos grub thams cad kyi gsang ba gsungs pa/ chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral

ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ dpa' bo chen po gzugs rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po tshor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du shes rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po

'du byed rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po rnam par shes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po gti mug rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rna ba rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po sna rdo rje

dang / dpa' bo chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po phrag dog rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po sa rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chu rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po me rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rlung rdo

rje dang / dpa' bo chen po mkha' dbyings rdo rje dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phro ba'i gsang ba'i snying po 'byung bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'dus pa gsang ba gsum gyi dam

tshig gi 'khor lo dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje thod pa'i dum bu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lha dgra dang / dpa' bo chen

po rdo rje dpag med dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'od dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje myu gu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rab bzang dang /

dpa' bo chen po rdo rje bzang po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mig mi bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje stobs po che dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rin chen dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje nam mkha'i snying po dang /

dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpal he ru ka chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams

thams cad yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi gsang ba'i dam tshig gsang ba'i b+ha ga las 'byung ba rnal 'byor ma dang / dpa'

bo'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo ltung byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gsod byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'gugs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo

gar gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo pad+ma'i dra ba mo zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje lA ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje

gzugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab gtum ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gtum mig ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sna chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dpa' ba'i blo gros ma zhes

bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo mi'u thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo lang ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo shing grib ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sa srung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jigs byed chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal

'byor ma chen mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sngo bsangs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzang ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rta rna ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo

bya gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'tshong ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i go cha ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo

rab dpa' mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo stobs chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor los sgyur ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo brtson 'grus chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pas nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar

thug par hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ gar sna tshogs byed cing rang gi dam tshig dang 'khyud pa dang / tsum pa nas snying rje chen po'i ro yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis gang bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas zhugs te/ dpa' bo'i mchog rnams kyis dam tshig rjes su

dran no/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje phag mo'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyi rigs dang gsang ba gsungs pa 'di lta ste/

rdo rje ma mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo 'ug gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje bsreg ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje pho nya mo zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje mche ba

ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje 'joms ma zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta bu'i ma mo'i tshogs kyi phyogs thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang ste/ rigs kyi bdag po rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba dpal he ru ka shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig chen po rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig yin te/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po med/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung / /'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rnal 'byor

gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje he ru ka dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / rigs drug po de ni yan lag drug tu dgod pa ste/ bsrung ba gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi mchog de ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las

byung ngo / /rnal 'byor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo ya mi ni dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rmongs byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo g.yo byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo skrag byed ma dang /

rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo tsan+Di ka ste/ 'di lta bus yang nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yang dag par bsrung ba'i sbyor ba'i thugs gsang ba chen po ste/ de lta bu sna tshogs du ma'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lag pas khrag dron mo mchog

gis mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ mos pa mchog gis spyi bos gtugs so/ /de nas dam tshig chen po rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas sems dpa' sna tshogs spros te phyung nas gdul ba du ma la

thabs sna tshogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang bar byas te/ sna tshogs pas mdun gyi nam mkha' yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sna tshogs pa'i snying rje chen po'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing sems can rnams la phan pa'i

phyir/ gnyis su med pa'i ro dga' ba sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed dang mnyam pa bstan te/ khams gsum gyi bdag pos gsungs pa/ chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / dbang chen gyi steng du sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab sna tshogs pa rin po che sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid

kyis mdzes pa/ de'i steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpas chos kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po phyung nas spros te/ rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal por sprul pa la kun tu bzang po chen po byung ste/ rdo rje 'khor dang lhan cig byung nas brtan par bzhugs so/ /

phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa/ dril bu dang / rnga yab dang / rgyal mtshan dang / g.yer ka'i dra bas mig ris su bris pa/ rdo rje dam tshig gi srad bu chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug

pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon dang / ma rungs pa dang / shin tu gdug pa dang / ro langs dang / ro dang / ro sreg pa

dang / khyi dang / ce spyang dang / ce spyang mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i sgra pheM dang / a la la'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dril bu dang cang te'u'i sgra sgrogs pa/ mgo bcad pa gar byed pas nye bar brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pa

can/ dge ba'i las kyis sgrol ba sems can thams cad la snying rje'i ros phan 'dogs pa/ rnam par 'khor bas bskor ba pad+ma'i gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa lag pa'i thal mo sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i dum bu'i chos kyi mchog zab

mo'i tshul dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod pa ston pa/ sku lus chen po 'dzin pa/ zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma chen mo nye bar 'byung ba/ mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i dra ba can/

chos sna tshogs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i ston pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba ster zhing ston par byed pa sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las zhu ba'i le'u ste gnyis

pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ snying gar zla ba bsgoms nas ni/ /rdo rje phra mo'i rnam 'phrul ba/ /bde gshegs thams cad gsang ba ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /

der ni gsang ba byin brlabs pa/ /snying po mchog ni legs par nyon/ /bla ma yi yang bla ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ o~M badzra shud d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA badzra shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M yo ga shud

d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M dz+nyA na shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA dz+nyA na shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M sa ma ya shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA sa ma ya shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta shU n+ya tA a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ o~M sarba ta thA ga ta pra kr-i ta su bi shud d+hA d+harma d+hA tu badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ o~M man+t+ra

shud d+hAH sarba d+harmA man+t+ra shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M kro d+ha shud d+hAH sarba d+harmAHkro d+ha shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M tsit+ta shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA sh+tsit+ta shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M bAka shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA bA ka shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M kA ya shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHkA ya shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M dz+nyA na a mr-i ta shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA dz+nyA na amr-i ta shud d+ho\u0f85haM/

o~M nA nA sa ma ya shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA nA nA sa ma ya shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M tsAr+ya na ya shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAr+ya naya shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M tri yo ga pa ri shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA s+t+ri yo ga pa ri shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M a b+hi She ka shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA a b+hi She ka shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M pU dza shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHpU dza shud d+ho\u0f85haM/

o~M sarba ta thA ga ta a dwa ya pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ maN+Da la shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA maN+Da la shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M a d+hi pa ti shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA a d+hi pa ti shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ bI ra shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA bIr shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M yo gi ni shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA yo gi nI shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M ta twa shud d+hAHsarba

d+harmA sta twa shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ he i ti he twa pa ga taHsarba d+harmA he twa pa ga to\u0f85haM/ ru i ti ru kA rA pa ga taHsarba d+harmA ru kA rA pa ga to\u0f85haM/ ka i tin kwa tsi ta s+thitaHsarba d+harmA na kwa tsi ta s+thi to\u0f85haM/ o~M dz+ha Ti ta ka ra shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA dz+ha Ti ta ka ra shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M b+ha ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA b+ha ba shud d+ho\u0f85haM/

o~M dza pa shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA dza pa shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M A hA ra shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA A hA ra shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M b+ha k+Sha shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA b+hak+Sha shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M a sa mA hi ta shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA a sa hita shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M swa sa ma be da na shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa sam bde na shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M dwe

Sha shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA dwe Sha shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M mo ha shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA mo ha shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M rA ga shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA rA ga shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M mA na shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA mA na shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M Ir+Sha shud d+haHsarba d+harmA Ir+Sha shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M kha badzra shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHkha badzra

shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M tri tsakra pa ri shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAs+t+ri tsakra pa ri shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M DA ki nI shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA DA ki nI shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M shang+kul shud d+hAHsarba d+ha rmAHshung+ku la shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ /o~M mA tri shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA mA tri shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ o~M pi tr-i shud d+hA+aiHsarba d+harmAHpi tr-i shud d+ho\u0f85haM/ /

'di ltar ji srid nye ba'i dur khrod kyi bar thams cad rnam par dag par shes par bya'o/ /pu dza au a go rA de mA ka o tri ko ka la ka hi pre gri sau su na si ma ku/ sa bcu rnam par dag pa'i bdag /pha rol phyin bcu'ang de bzhin te/ /shes pa bcu yang rnam dag bdag /

bcu po de dag rnam par bsgom/ /'khor lo gsum yang yongs dag phyir/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid dge/ /dus dang tshos rnams rnam grol bas/ /rnal 'phyor ma yi yid dga' ba/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don/ /mngon mthe he ru ka las byung / /mngon brjod rgyud

ni bla ma'i bla/ /gsang chen mchog gi dam pa'o/ /g.yon dang g.yas su bskor ba yis/ /dgod cing mchod dang bskor bar bya/ /gang gis de nyid shes pa yis/ /brda ni lnga po bstan par bya/ /gang yang dbang bskur med pa la/ /gzhan du de nyid ma bstan cig /

mngon brjod rgyud la bla ma yis/ /dbang bskur slob ma ngag la sbyin/ /gzhan du slob ma smyo ba dang / /brgyal dang rmongs pa dag tu 'gro/ /mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang / /ngan pa der ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /glegs bam bshes min la ster ba/ /ngan pa de ma thag tu 'chi/ /

phol mig rims dag dug dang nad/ /mkha' 'gro gdon gyis gtses par 'gyur/ /mi srun bgegs dang tshogs bdag gis/ /gsod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/ /ji srid 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /bla ma slob mas rim bzhin du/ /de nyid rtag tu spas nas ni/ /myur du

sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /bla mas thams cad rim bzhin du/ /mngon brjod rgyud kyi rim pa bzhin/ /lha yi rnal 'byor la sbyor ba/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'gyur/ /de ma thag tu byang chub ste/ /mchog ni nges par rnyed par 'gyur/ /mi yi bu mo 'di 'dra spang / /bdag

gi dam tshig mi shes shing / /drag cing log lta rang bzhin ngan/ /mi srun snying rje med pa dang / /brkam chags ser snar ldan pa dang / /spyang zhing ngan la phrag dog can/ /skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang / /rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang / /'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spang bar bya/ /sbyor

pa'i dngos grub ring ba yin/ /puk+ka sI ni mdzes sdug blang //gzugs sdug gzhon pas rnam par brgyan/ /sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sems/ /brtul zhugs brtan zhing dam tshig shes/ /dpa' zhing chags bral ngo tsha med/ /nga rgyal med cing ser sna med/ /sngags pa rang gi spyod

pa ste/ /rig ma brtul zhugs khyod kyis long / /phyag rgya lnga ni rtag tu 'chang / /mgo la thod pa'i rgyan yang byas/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /thal ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs/ /rtag tu ma hA mAM sa bza'/ /thams cad btung bas myos pa dang / /ro yi gdan la 'dug

pa dang / /pags pa chen po gos su gyon/ /rjes su mthun pa'i bza' ba za/ /zhag dang khrag gis tshim pa dang / /grong ngam dgon pa dag tu yang / /gang zhig yul du 'gro ba na/ /rtag tu chags pas mi gnas shing / /rtag tu dur khrod spyod byed la/ /yang na tshong 'dus gnas

pa dang / /nyan thos 'jig rten skal med pa'i/ /mi shes gti mug gis khyab pa/ /nyan thos yongs su longs spyod pa'i/ /gtsug lag khang du gnas mi bya/ /ji ltar skyes bu dbul po bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gnas/ /rdo rje gar gyis rnam par rol/ /rtag

tu dur khrod la gnas shing / /dri chen sha chen zas su bza'/ /myos byed btung bar ldan pa yi/ /dpa' ba'i gtso bos rtse gcig pa'i/ /sems kyis rab tu bsgom par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po ma rnyed na/ /g.yeng ba thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/ /de ni ye shes 'byung gnas

te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin las byung / /gzung dang 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i/ /gnyis su med pa nyid la gnas/ /rtse gcig sems ni byas nas kyang / /bsgom pa'i spyod pa la gnas na/ /bde la dga' ba'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho

ga'i rim/ /phyag rgya che dang des par rol/ /sgom pa mngon du gyur pa yis/ /rnam grol sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur/ /g.yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste/ /g.yas pa de bzhin thabs yin no/ /sgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni/ /

sum cu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed/ /rnal 'byor ma ni dngos grub dang / /gnod sbyin klu yi bu mo dang / /gzhan yang sna tshogs dri za mo/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod dag la spyod/ /de nyid gsang ba'i mchog gyur pa/ /A li kA li rtag tu bsgom/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor

ba yis/ /thams cad de bzhin rnams par brtag /dpa' bos brda rnams bstan pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi lag g.yon gyis/ /brda rnams la ni 'jug par bya/ /dpa' bo'i gnas su gyur pa 'di/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /'gro kun g.yon las byung ba yin/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bong nyid/ /mdzub mor rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs/ /gung mor pad+ma gar dbang gnas/ /srin lag dpa' bo dngos grub can/ /tha ma la ni mi zad sku/ /sen mo'i ngos la rta mgrin gnas/ /g.yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni/ /dpa' bo thams cad yin par

bshad/ /lag mthil pho nya 'dus pa'i mchog /rgyab tu shin tu nges byas te/ /brda ni lnga po bstan par bya/ /sgrub pa po yis shes par gyis/ /sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad/ /chu khams mA ma kI ru bshad/ /me ni gos dkar mo ru bshad/ /rlung ni sgrol ma dag tu grags/ /

'o byed ma ni stong pa ste/ /de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin/ /dbus kyi dpa' bo thams cad ni/ /mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol/ /gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan zhing / /rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya/ /de ltar brda yis dpa' bo rnams/ /de dang lhan cig bza' ba bza'/ /

dpa' bos thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin/ /phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs brda ni bshad par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid dang / /pho nya rnams kyi mtshan nyid dag /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /de dag thams cad

bshad par bya/ /ras ris dang ni sku gzugs dag /'dri na de bzhin dam tshig dang / /sku mdog gi ni khyad par gyis/ /gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa/ /sna tshogs sngags kyis mdzes pa yi/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /lha yi dam tshig yid 'ong ba/ /

rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs mchog /dpa' bo sna tshogs yid 'ong ba'i/ /rnal 'byor ma ni yang dag 'dus/ /mkha' 'gro ma yang yang dag 'dus/ /rang rigs sna tshogs mchog dam pa/ /bla ma brgyud pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /bdag

po'i las la shin tu mkhas/ /sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs/ /gzhan yang cho ga'i rim pa dang / /mngon brjod bla ma'i las la mkhas/ /phyugs kyi mtshan nyid sngags pas rtog /sna tshogs rigs kyi khyad par dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi spyod pa dang / /mkha'

'gro ma yang de bzhin te/ /phyi rol ma mo'i phyag rgya dag /phag mo yi ni rigs las byung / /dpa' bo kun gyi spyod pa dang / /'khor lo'i spyod pa shin tu bslabs/ /phyi yi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ /mtshan nyid spyod pa dag la mkhas/ /he ru ka dpal rigs las byung / /dge ba'i

spyod pa dag la bslabs/ /yul gyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang / /slob dpon spyod pa dag la mkhas/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud spyod dang / /rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgya che ba/ /bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbye ba'i rim/ /thams cad rgyud rnams rnam par shes/ /'grub pa'i lung dang bstan bcos dang / /

mdo sde skyes rabs de bzhin te/ /bla na med pa'i spyod pa dag /shes rab pha rol phyin las byung / /phyi rol bstan bcos yongs la mkhas/ /phun sum tshogs pa slob dpon mchog /sbyor ba'i sgom par ldan pa dang / /yid gnyis med pa nyid kyis ni/ /bza' ba thams cad bza'

bar bya/ /yi ge brgya pas thams cad du/ /gsang sngags brtan par bsgoms nas su/ /rang gi ming dang ldan par ni/ /gcig tu spel nas bzlas par bya/ /rtag tu phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzla/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/ /

mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /gsang sngags btus pas go cha dang / /snying po dang ni nye snying dang / /gsang sngags btus pa rjes su bsrung / /dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes pa la/ /yi ge'i dkyil 'khor legs bkod nas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bskyed/ /

'di ni gsang sngags thams cad do/ /ma mo rnams kyi dam pa mchog /gsang ba dga' ba sbas pa ste/ /gsang sngags thams cad bsdus pa yin/ /gsang sngags kun gyi gnas yin no/ /'gro ba 'byung ba'ang ma mos khyab/ /de nyid 'di ni mi bstan te/ /dngos grub 'joms

par 'gyur ba yin/ /sgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med/ /skye 'gros 'di ni bsgoms tsam gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed/ /byams pa'i go cha bgos pa ste/ /snying rje chos kyi go cha yin/ /shes rab mtshon char ldan pa yin/ /nyon

mongs bdud ni rnam par spangs/ /phyir bzlog chen mos srung ba dang / /rdo rje zhal bzhis rnam par mtshan/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /kha sbyar gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan/ /thams cad mchog gi srung ba che/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /bka' yi 'khor lo

srung ba che/ /phur bus bgegs med dngos grub 'gyur/ /srung ba mchog ni 'di dag gi/ /sgrub pa po la byang chub stsol/ /rdo rje phur bus ra ba dang / /rdo rje'i sa dang dra ba dang / /steng gi gur dang bla re yis/ /gdug pa'i bdud ni bskrad byas nas/ /mi gsod gsod pa med pa

yin/ /gang gis rang sems thul ba yis/ /bdag gi sems ni bcings pa yin/ /gang la gang gis gsod pa yod/ /mnyam pa'i sems ni dri yin te/ /gru bzhi pa ni byug pa yin/ /tsan+dan dkar po lus yin te/ /mnyam par gnas pa nyid yin no/ /me tog bzod pa

rnal 'byor pa/ /'bad pas gtor ba yin par bshad/ /rang bzhin dag pa bdug pa ste/ /mnyam pa'i sgom pa bdug pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen po las de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

mkha' 'gros de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba gsungs pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla/ /bla ma brgyud pas bshad pa bzhin/ /phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog dam pa/ /rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med/ /'jigs

pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /tshes grangs med cing skar ma med/ /bslab pa'i cho ga'ang yod ma yin/ /gtsang sbra med cing mi gtsang med/ /dag pa'i bya ba'ang yod ma yin/ /dus dang tshod las rnam par grol/ /dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs/ /rang gi sngags rgyud sbyor

ba shes/ /sems can kun gyi don yang byed/ /ri sul dang ni ri rtse dang / /chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag dang / /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang / /shing gcig dang ni dge ba'i gnas/ /ma mo'i khyim mam dur khrod dam/ /sna tshogs dam pa'i ldum ra dang / /lha khang dang ni

mchod rten nam/ /khyim mam bzhi mdo dag tu ni/ /sgrub pa po yis sbyor bsgrubs na/ /'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster/ /gnas ni brtag pa byas nas kyang / /yid ni gang du dga' ba der/ /sna tshogs bde mchog dam pa ni/ /de ru bsgrubs na dngos grub 'gyur/ /sems

sbyor med pa nyid las ni/ /du mar dbye ba'i bsgoms pa yis/ /ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis ni/ /sa ni byug pa byas nas kyang / /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yi/ /me tog 'bad pas dgram par bya/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong gdan/ /mnyam par bzhag pas rgya cher bya/ /

rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa bsgrub/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas te/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po bya/ /dge ba bcu yang dmigs nas ni/ /sems can kun gyi don yang bya/ /phyi dang nang du bltas na ni/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa

yin/ /byang chub tshogs kyi mchog dam pa/ /sems tsam la ni rab tu gnas/ /rang gi snying ga mkha' dkyil du/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas par bsgom/ /de steng de nyid mchog gyur pa/ /ye shes lnga po zhi ba yin/ /sna tshogs 'od zer gsal ba yi/ /rnam par

'phro bas kun tu khyab/ /sngon grub pa rnams bskul nas ni/ /byin gyis brlab pa'ang byed pa yin/ /nam mkha'i khams ni bsgom dga' bas/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba yin/ /til gyi gang bu lta bu yi/ /lha dang khro bos khyab par mthong / /sangs rgyas byang chub sems

dpa' dang / /byang chub sems dang bla ma'i gtso/ /lha mo sna tshogs mthong nas ni/ /bdag gis mchod cing rjed par bya/ /sangs rgyas spros te sprul pa'i tshogs/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rnal 'byor mas/ /'gro ba ris drug sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas gnas su dgod par byed/ /

nam mkha'i dkyil ni kun khyab pa'i/ /mchog de mthong nas bsdus nas su/ /thams cad gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /byang chub mthar thug bar du ni/ /sems can ma lus gyur pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang de la bzhag /de la sgrub pa pos gsol gdab/ /dge

ba'i las las byung ba la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /rmongs pa'i gzugs can nga rgyal dang / /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnam shes de bzhin no/ /o~M bru~M a~M hrIM ho hU~M/ de ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / /rdo rje nyi ma gar dbang phyug /rdo rje rgyal pos

khyab pa yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog de bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /he ru ka dpal rdo rje'o/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ /lce dang rig pa yid de bzhin/ oM hU~M trA~M A~M kha~M ha~M/ gti mug dang ni zhe sdang dang / /de bzhin phrag dog 'dod chags dang / /

ser sna dang ni rmongs pa nyid/ /skye mched dag ni thams cad la/ /dbang phyug rdo rje nyid yin no/ /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag go/ /lA~M mA~M pA~M tA~M khA~M/ ltung byed ma dang gsod ma dang / /'gugs byed dang ni gar dbang dang / /pad+ma'i dra ba mo lha'o/ /mkha'

mnyam nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /de ltar phung po khams dang ni/ /skye mched rnams ni rnal 'byor pas/ /tha mal dngos po'i rang bzhin ni/ /yongs su dag par shes par bya/ /tha mal chos kun yongs dag ste/ /bdag kyang yongs su dag pa yin/ /de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ /

sngags kyi sku ru 'gyur ba yis/ /he ru ka dpal bdag gyur nas/ /sems can kun gyi don yang byed/ /he ru ka yi go 'phang mchog /thob nas sems can ma lus pa/ /'di la 'jog cing 'god par shog /o~M swa b+hA ba shud d+hAH sarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ lan gsum

bar du bzla bar bya/ /dngos med mdun sogs phyogs bcu ru/ /snying po'i phreng ba spro bar bya/ /des na snying po de mthong nas/ /dra ba ra ba de bzhin te/ /rdo rje sa sogs byin gyis brlab/ /bla re mda' yi dra ba dang / /rdo rje me ni 'bar bar bskor/ /phyi rol ring nas dgod par bya/ /

o~M me di nI badzrI b+ha ba badzra ban d+ha hU~M/ o~M badzra prA kA ra hU~M ba~M hU~M/ o~M badzra pany+tsa ra hU~M ba~M hU~M/ o~M badzra bi tA na hU~M kha~M hU~M/ o~M badzra sha ra dzA la trA~M sha~M trA~M/ o~M badzra dz+wa lA na lA rka hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he ru ka yi bka' 'khor lo/ /gtso bo brgyad po 'bar ba dag /de mthong nas ni legs pa ru/ /nyi

ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /dag pa'i shel dang zla mdog 'dra/ /phyag rgya che dang mnyam par ldan/ /shes rab skyil krung legs par bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng 'dra ldan pa'i dbu/ /mi bskyod

pa ni dbu rgyan bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /thams cad mtshan mas mtshan pa yin/ /dpe byad kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing / /rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin mdzad cing / /dpa' chen bde ba'i

go 'phang bzhugs/ /dkar zhing ser la ljang khu ste/ /zhal gdong gnyis po rnam par 'gyur/ /lugs su 'byung dang bzlog tshul gyis/ /de yi khro bo brgyad dag spro/ /rdo rje drag po na lArkaM/ /rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin de/ /thab sbyor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / /rdo rje nag po

stobs po che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba/ /khro bo 'di dag rnam par dgod/ /sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar/ /ljang khu du ba'i mdog can te/ /dkar zhing nag la gur gum mdog /rab 'jigs thod pa'i dbu rgyan cing / /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /

thams cad na ra'i rus pa yi/ /rgyan gyis spud pa rab tu 'bar/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i nang bzhugs shing / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po dag /zhabs kyis mnan par rnam par bsam/ /thod pa dang

ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'chang / /thams cad dril bu cang te'u/ /shes rab bde bas legs par 'khyud/ /dmar ser dbu skra dag gis brgyan/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /'jigs pa'i phreng ba'i

rgyan can te/ /des ni bdag nyid rgyan du byas/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad rnam par bsgom/ /khro zhing 'bar la g.yo ba dang / /drag cing 'jigs la rnam par 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /lcags kyu zhags pa kha T+wAM 'chang / /

dril bu rdo rje thod pa 'dzin/ /mgo yi do shal sku la 'chang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i ska rags can/ /gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og mnan/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam par ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom par bya/ /khro bo gnyis po rnam

par bsgom/ /steng du gtsug tor 'khor sgyur te/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par bsgom/ /'og tu rdo rje sa 'og go /dkar la sngo ba'i mdog can yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /'khor lo dang ni mdung 'dzin cing / /zhags pa lcags kyu dril rdo rje/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi

gnas pas bzhugs/ /phur bu khro bor byas nas su/ /de ni phyogs bcur rnam par spro/ /de la bka' lung bsgo ba ni/ /bgegs ni myur du med par gyis/ /gsang sngags rjes su dran nas su/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu mnyam par gzugs/ /mthe bong sdigs mdzub sbyor

ba yis/ /phyogs bcu dag tu se gol brdab/ /o~M suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ shar du'o/ o~M gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ /byang du'o/ o~M gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ nub tu'o/ o~M A na ya hoH b+hag bA na badzra hU~M hU~M phaT/ lho phyogs su'o/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /

bgegs kun gyi ni klad pa la/ /rdo rje phur bus dgod cing mnan/ /lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yin/ /o~M g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAM big+h+nAn hU~M phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra kI

la ya hU~M phaT/ phur pa rdo rje khro bo ru/ bltas nas yongs su brtag par bya/ /lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis/ /dngos grub rdo rjes brdung bar bya/ /o~M badzra hU~M mung+ga ra badzra kI la A ko Ta ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ mkhas pas rdo rje khro bo'i tshig /gsang sngags tshig ni

drag tu bzla/ /o~M kha badzra d+h+r-ika badzra hU~M kA ra badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra tsaN+Da badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzrA na lArka badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzroSh+NI Sha badzra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kuN+Da li badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra yak+Sha badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra ka rA la badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra ma hA ba la badzra hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra b+hi Sha na

badzra hUM phaT/ o~M badzroSh+NI Sha tsakra brti badzra hUM phaT/ o~M badzra pA tA la badzra hU~M phaT/ bka' 'di dag ni bsgrubs pa yis/ /de ma thag tu bgegs med 'gyur/ /mAM sa rkang dang zhag kha chu/ /shu kra rak+ta lhan cig sbyar/ rnal 'byor pa yis ril bur byas/ /zos na dngos grub

nges par 'gyur/ /sngo zhing ser la ljang khu ni/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad rang byas te/ /ser zhing gnag la ljang khu dang / /dud kha ser la ser skya dang / /dkar zhing ser la ljang khu dang / /dmar zhing ser la ljang ba dag /de ltar bzhi ni bdag po bzhin/ /mi bskyo dbu rgyan dam

tshig tsan/ /bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin pa dgyes/ /'di ltar khro bo thams cad kyang / /dam tshig las ni 'gal ma byed/ /'di ltar sna tshogs du ma yi/ /gtso bo'i bka' ni blang bar gyis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gar gnas pa/ /bgegs rnams thams cad med par mthong / /

gcer bu'am yang na mi gcer ba'am/ /skra grol thal bas yan lag byugs/ /'di ltar ji srid ma ngal bar/ /'khor lo dag gi bzlas pa bya/ /stong pa'i ye shes rdo rje ni/ dad pas dran zhing mnyam par bzhag /o~M shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ o~M a ni

mit+ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ o~M a pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ smig rgyu tsam gyi ye shes ni/ /sems tsam du ni rnam par brtag /'di ni mkha' dang mnyam pa yin/ /chos med chos min pa yang med/ /nam mkha' gos pa med pa ltar/ /dngos po med cing

dmigs su med/ /gang gi snying gi kha sbyar dbus gnas gsal/ /phra bar lta ba rang byung myong ba'i sems 'jug pa/ /khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba/ /gsal ba chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dngos po'i g.yo ba rta kun nang du

nges sbyor ba'i/ /ye shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur pa/ /khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba'i/ /mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra bar dri med dpal du gyur/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /chos rjes dran

pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos kyi sku ni rang 'byung 'gyur/ /dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes/ /ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyis/ /shin tu bsgoms pa'i goms pa las/ /'bar ba 'di ni the tshom med/ /rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi/ /thig le gcig pu yi ge med/ /

skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na/ /ye shes skye bar gyur pa mchog /sems dpa' rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis/ /sems dpa' rjes su dran par bsgom/ /sems dpa' rjes dran chos kyis ni/ /chos kyi sems dpa' khyad par 'byung / /bdag ni snying rjes phan 'dogs pa/ /

smon lam dbang gis mthong ba dang / /mthong nas ji srid 'og tu ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' kun mkhyen dag /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /sngon po yi ni zhal dang bzhi/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam/ /yi ge ya~M las yang

dag 'byung / /sngo ba'i mdog can gzhu lta bu'o/ /rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan par bsgom/ /dud pa'i phreng ba khyab par dmigs/ /de yi steng du yi ge ra~M/ /me yi dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa/ /gru gsum pa la dmar ba'i mdog /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bar bas khyab/ /nyi ma

bye ba 'od mtha' yas/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya/ /de yi steng du chu nyid de/ /yi ge ba~M mchog las byung ba/ /du sha ra yi mdog 'dra ba/ /zlum la 'od zer phreng ba can/ /de yi steng du sa dkyil 'khor/ /la~M las byung ba ser po ste/ /zur bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan/ /'od

zer ser po khyab par 'khrigs/ /rnal 'byor de steng bsgom pa ni/ /ri rab lhun po mchog gyur pa/ /zur bzhi pa la rin chen bzhi/ /rtse mo brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes/ /yi ge su~M las legs par byung / /'od zer gzi brjid mchog dam pa'o/ /de yi steng du bsam pa ni/ /

bru~M ni dkar po las byung ba/ /de steng 'khor lor bcas pa dag /khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bsam/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis mdzes shing / /ba dan phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo dang

sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing / /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /de yi nang du 'khor lo ni/ /brgyad po dkar po'i mdog can la/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma che/ /sna tshogs 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ /lte ba ge sar gyis khyab pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rig mar bcas/ /dkar po ser po de bzhin te/ /dmar dang ljang khu zhal bzhi pa/ /zhi zhing rgod dang khro ba dang / /rnam par 'gyur ba shin tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan/ /mdung dang dgra sta cang te'u dang / /gri gug thod pa kha T+wA~M

ga /tshangs pa'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dag /phyag ni bcu gnyis de bzhin te/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan can/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dpe byad mtshan dang yang dag ldan/ /

thugs kyi ye shes dam tshig can/ /cod pan rdo rje 'dzin pa yin/ /ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab de/ /phyag rgya lnga po byin gyis brlabs/ /rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mchog /bde ba chen po'i thabs sbyor bas/ /sku ni gnyis su

med par thim/ /mnyam pa nyid las byung ba'i sku/ /mkha' 'gro'i 'khor ni dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang bcas par byung / /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs/ /dkar sngo ser dmar zhal mdog ste/ /'khor lo dril bus 'khyud pa'i phyag /sngar

gyi rdo rje sems sogs pa'i/ /phyag mtshan rim pa 'dzin pa yin/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ni/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba rlon pas spud/ /zla ba phyed pa rab 'dzin pa/ /zhal bzhi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha

zhabs kyis gnon pa na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan can/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can/ phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa bgos pa/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro mas pang du 'khyud pa/ sku la thod pa dang gdug pa la sdigs mdzub kyis 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ byin

pa gnyis kyis 'khril ba/ bde ba dang dgyes pas myos pa/ khams dang phung po dang / skye mched rnams byin gyis brlabs te sa'i khams ni la~M ste ltung byed ma'o/ /chu'i khams ni ma~M ste gsod byed ma'o/ /me'i khams ni ra~M ste 'gugs byed ma'o/ /rlung gi khams ni ya~M ste gar gyi

dbang phyug ma'o/ /nam mkha'i khams ni kha~M ste pad+ma'i dra ba ma'o/ /ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / dud kha dang / sngo ba'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad/ o~M mdog dkar po/ tshor ba'i phung po rdo rje rin chen te a~M gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu/ 'du shes

hrI ste pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po/ 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po ste ho ljang khu/ rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa' ste hUM dkar po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni dpal he ru ka ste hi mdog nag po/ mig bru~M ste gti mug rdo rje dkar po/ rna ba hU~M ste zhe

sdang rdo rje nag po'o/ /sna ni kha~M phrag dog rdo rje ste ser po'o/ /ngag chags pa rdo rje ste a dmar po'o/ /reg pa ni ser sna rdo rje ste ha~M ljang khu'o/ /skye mched thams cad dbang phyug rdo rje ste ha~M dkar po'o/ /lus ni hU~M ste dkar po'o/ /ngag ni AHste dmar po'o/ /yid ni oM

ste sngon po'o/ /de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi bar byin gyis brlab cing dmigs so/ /de la shar gyi 'dab ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog sngon po'o/ /lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la lA ma ni ljang khu ste/ sngo sangs so/ /nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la dum skyes ma dmar mo/ byang gi 'dab

ma la gzugs can ma gser gyi mdog ser skya zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ phyogs kyi gos 'chang ba/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ 'jigs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / cang

te'u dang / gri gug 'dzin pa/ zhal gdong rjes su chags pas gnas pa/ dgyes pa'i chags pas lta zhing reg pa'o/ /mtshams bzhir bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa'i steng du byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i snod bzhi gzhag go /shar du pre ta pu rir stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i

shugs can ma nag po/ byang du gri ha de ba tA ra rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma ser po/ nub tu sau rASh+Tar rta mgrin dang / chang 'tshong ma dmar po'o/ /lhor su bar na dwI bar nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ljang khu'o/ /mer nA ga rar dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa'

mo dmar po'o/ /bden bral du sin+d+hur pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste zla ba dang ser skya'o/ /rlung phyogs nam rur rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los sgyur ma dud kha'i mdog can/ dbang ldan du ku lu tAr rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo dkar

po'o/ /stobs po che la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ phyag gnyis la 'khor lo dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ phyag gzhan la kha T+wAM ga dang cang te'u 'dzin pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs

pa'o/ /'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo ni gdong gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ thod pa dang / sdigs mdzub 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum pa/ drag po'i gzugs can/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu gnyis su med par sbyor bar

mnyam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi gos can ma mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgul rgyan dang / mgo'i phreng ba dang / g.yer khas 'og pag byas pa/ shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i sgor khwa gdong

ma dang / 'ug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma rnams so/ /me dang / bden bral dang / rlung dang dbang ldan du ni gshin rje sreg ma dang / gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma rnams so/ /ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma

bzhi ni khwa gdong ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba yang de bzhin no/ /mtshams kyi lha mo gzugs gnyis pa/ yid 'phrog pa'i tshul can/ kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ drag po chen po thugs rjes sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang dpral

bar 'khor lo'i phreng ba can no/ /'di dag ni sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og na gnas po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor la bzhugs te/ dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa chags pa'i mig gis lta zhing / sna tshogs ro bcud bde ba ste/ /chags pa'i bde ba chen

po ni/ /de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed/ /a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /bde ba chen po de nyid yin/ /bde gshegs lha ni shin tu mdzes/ /glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni/ /dga' bas srid pa dag las grol/ /bde bar gshegs pa dag pa che/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rnam

par brtag /mngal skyes glu yi dbang gyur par/ /rnal 'byor kha cig 'dod pa yin/ /mngal skyes sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bltas nas ni/ /mchod dang bstod pa byas nas gzhug /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par

bsgom/ /rnal 'byor pa yis ma nor bar/ /bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum du bzla/ /skye ba can gyi lus grub ste/ /mkha' la spyod par the tshom med/ /o~M shrI ka ya/ DA ka ru ru lu bru~M hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba raM swA hA/ snying po'o/ /o~M b+hU~M ha~M ho b+hU~M hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M bud+d+ha

DA ki nI bai ro tsa nI ye b+h+ru~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM b+h+ru~M sar+b+ba bud+d+ha DU ki nI ye/ hU~M bru~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M k+Sh+mA ma hA ba la k+Sh+lA~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsakra be ge hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ha ya grI bA hrI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shau N+Di nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/

o~M hU~M A kA sha gar+b+ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsakra warmi NI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ki li shrI he ru ka ki li hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su bI re hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M si li pad+ma na rte shwa ra si li hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA ba le hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hi li bai ro tsa nI hi li hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsakra warti nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ /o~M d+hi li badzra sa twa

d+hi li hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA bI r+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kA kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M u lU kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shwa nA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sU ka rA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma dA D+hi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma daMSh+Ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma ma tha ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M DA ki nI hu~M hU~M phaT/ /o~M lA me

hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rU pi NI hu~M hU~M phaT/ mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma sogs la/ /thog ma pad+ma la gnas nas/ /mchod pa bya zhing sngags kyang bzla/ /rtag tu bdag nyid lnga po dag /'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /zhi ba dang ni dbang nyid dang / /rmongs

par bya dang gnon pa dag /sku yi mkha' 'gros byed pa ste/ /dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig can dag langs dus su/ /yan lag drug tu bsgom bya ba/ /rnam dag ye shes mig gis ni/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams blta/ /o~M haHsnying ka la/ na maHhi

mgo bo la/ swA hA spyi gtsug la/ o~M bau ShaT he go cha'o/ /hU~M hU~M ho mig la'o/ /phaT haM yan lag kun gyi mtshon cha'o/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar pa dang / /sngo dang ljang khu dud kha dang / /yid kyis mdog drug rnam par bsgom/ /o~M baM sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ste lte ba la'o/ /

haM yoM ya mi ni ste snying ga la'o/ /hriM moM rmongs byed ma ste kha la'o/ /hriM hrIM g.yo byed ma ste mgo bo la'o/ /hU~M hU~M skrag byed ma ste spyi gtsug la'o/ /phaT namaHtsaN+Di ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ /mkha' 'gro rnams ni bzhugs

nas kyang / /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad 'di yis rnam par brtag /'chi med ye shes lnga bza' shing / /ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya/ /rdo rje dam tshig can mchod nas/ /dus bzhi dag tu bsnyen pa bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sku'i sdom pa'i

cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnams bsgoms te/ /sngar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /rtsibs brgyad dmar po'i mdog can la/ /nang gi 'dab ma snga ma bzhin/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' yongs gyur pa'i/ /gsung gi mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /zhal bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro mas 'khyud cing / /rtag tu bde ba che la bzhugs/ /pad+ma dril bus yang dag 'khyud/ /dbang

phyug chen po'i mgo bsnams shing / /dbang phyug chen po'i pags pa ni/ /bshus pa phyag gnyis kyis brkyang 'dzin/ /lhag ma ni snga ma'i rim pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor rnams ni/ /zhabs kyis gnon par blta bar bya/ /dmar dang sngo dang de bzhin ser/ /

g.yon pa dkar ba spyan gsum pa/ /ral pa'i dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la mdzes/ /zla ba phyed pa 'chang ba dang / /cod pan sna tshogs pad+mar ldan/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / /'jigs pa'i zhal ni rnam 'gyur zhing / /sgeg pa la sogs

nyams dang ldan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba can/ /mgul rgyan gdu bu rna cha dang / /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags/ /de dag pha rol phyin drug ste/ /phyag

rgya drug gis rgyas btab pa'o/ /de yi pang gnas bcom ldan yum/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rang mdog /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba ste/ /dum bus brgyan pa'i ska rags can/ /gdug pa'i bdud kyi khrag ldan pa'i/ /thod pa phyag

g.yon bsnams pas 'khyud/ /pad+mar ldan pas phyogs kun tu/ /gdug pa kun la sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar/ /khrag 'dzag pa la rtag tu dgyes/ /byin pa gnyis kyis rnam par 'khyud/ /bde ba chen po'i thugs rje'i bdag /dngos

grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs sngar bshad rnams/ /pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas su dgod/ /sngar bshad dbyibs dang kha dog ste/ /'on kyang mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo/ /dum skyes ma ni de bzhin gnag /lha mo gnyis po mdog de bzhin/ /phyag

g.yon kha T+wAM thod pa dang / /g.yas na cang te'u gri gug 'dzin/ /mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang / /bum pa'i nang du 'chi med lnga/ /byang chub sems kyi snod kyang gzhag /gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar du kA ma rU par myu gu can dang sa srung ma dkar po/ byang du o drer rdo rje ral

pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo dmar po/ nub tu tri sha ku nir dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma nag po/ lho ru ko sa lar rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang chang 'thung ma nam mkha' ltar sngo sangs/ me'i phyogs su ka ling gar rab tu bzang po dang sngo bsangs ma ser skya/ bden bral du lam

pa kar rdo rje bzang po dang rab bzang ma dkar mo/ rlung gi phyogs su kany+tsir 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma ljang ku dbang ldan te hi ma lar mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs so/ /gsung gi 'khor lo sa la spyod pa'o/ /myu gu can la sogs pa'i dpa'

bo ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan dang / dar dpyangs dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis na pad+ma dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag na kha T+wAM ga /g.yas na cang te'u/ phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs

pa'o/ /e rA ba ti la sogs pa/ lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa thod pa dang ldan pas 'khyud cing pad+ma dang ldan pas sdigs mdzub byed pa/ mgul rgyan dang gdu bu dang dpung rgyan dang rna rgyan dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang ldan pa'o/ /thod pa'i phreng bas

mgul brgyan cing / /g.yer ka sgra sgrogs sku rags ldan/ /khwa gdong la sogs dbye ba yis/ /sngar bshad sgo srung la sogs bzhin/ /gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams/ /mtshams bzhi 'di ltar shes par bya/ /dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang / /dpral bar pad+ma'i

phreng ba can/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams kun/ /sku gsung thugs su rnam par brtag /sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin/ /yi ge rnams ni dgod cing bsgom/ /thugs ni AHste dmar po yin/ /gsung ni o~M ste dkar por bshad/ /rdo rje sku ni hU~M yin te/ /nam mkha'

zla ba lta bu'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang / /thams cad sbyor zhing bsgoms nas su/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /dbang bskur bas ni gzhug par bya/ /thams cad byung ste thim nas su/ /thams cad bsgom zhing bsam par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi

rim pa yis/ /spro bsdu dag gi sbyor bar bya/ o~M shrI bA ka a A ro lig hU~M phaT/ haM DA ki nI dzA la saM ba raM swA hA/ snying po'o/ o~M a ro lig hrIHhU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M pad+ma DA ki nI ye hrIHhuM hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po'o/ o~M sarba pad+ma DA ki nI ye a hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i

snying po'o/ o~M DA ki nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M lA me hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rU pi NI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M phaT ang+ku ri ka hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ai rA ba tI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M da ha badzra dza Ta li da ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA bai ra ba hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pa tsam hA bI ra pa tsa hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bA yu be ge hu~M hU~M

phaT/ o~M b+ha k+Sha badzra hU~M kA ra bak+Sha pa sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba la m+bai ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sur b+hak+Sha ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M gr-ih+na su b+ha dra gr-ih+na sa p+ta pA tA la g+ha ta b+hu dzang+ga sarbaM bA/ tardzas ya tardza ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M A kaDa D+h+ya badzra badzra b+ha dra A ka Da D+h+ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su b+ha dre hu~M hU~M phaT/

o~M hrI ma hA b+hai ra ba hrI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ha ya kar+Ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M dz+NauM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kha gA na ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kA kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M u lU kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shwA nA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma dA D+hi ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma dU ti ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma daMSh+Ti

NI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma ma tha nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ rdo rje dam tshig gis mchod nas/ /bzlas pa'i cho ga rab tu bya/ /dgug pa dang ni rgyas pa nyid/ /sna tshogs las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /chos can yid 'ong gyur pa ste/ /ngag gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchog dang

bar ma thams cad dang / /tha ma thams cad mthar gnas la/ /de la thams cad gnas pa ste/ /sna tshogs gdul ba'i mchog dam pa/ /'dod pa'i chags pas rjes su chags/ /'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa dag /bdag nyid chen po sgrub pa po/ /de yi dbang du gnas pa

yin/ /sna tshogs pad+ma mdzes gnas nas/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod/ /b+hur b+hUH'dod chags chos kyi bdag /bde ba che la rnam par bzhugs/ /langs pa'i dus su dam tshig ni/ /dri chen rdo rje chu bza' zhing / /chos kyi phung po rdzogs gyur nas/ /rig pa'i

rgyal po la sogs 'grub/ /o~M haHsnying ka la/ na maHhi mgo la/ swA hA hu A ro lika spyi gtsug la/ bau Sha Ta he go cha/ hU~M hU~M ho mig la'o/ /phaT haM mtshon cha'o/ /chos kyi rdo rje dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang rdo rje nyi ma

dang rta mchog ste/ dmar ba dang / ser ba dang / dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / gur gum gyi mdog dang / ljang khu ste bye brag go/ /o~M ba~M pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ lte ba la'o/ /ha~MH yoM pad+ma ya mi ni dang / hrIM moM pad+ma rmongs byed ma dang / hriM hrIM pad+ma g.yo byed ma dang /

hU~M hU~M pad+ma skrag byed ma dang / phaT phaT ha~M pad+ma tsaN+Di ka ste/ snying ga dang / mgo dang / spyi gtsug dang / mig dang / chos kyi mtshon cha rnams so/ /dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / ljang khu dang / dud kha'i mdog can no/ /bzlas pa'i dus su dgod pa ste/ /ji ltar

bde bar spyad par bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /go 'phang gnas ni bzhugs pa yin/ /mnyam par gzhag pas drod 'byung ba/ /rtse gcig dmigs pas blang bya ste/ /gsung gi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /chos rnams thams

cad rab tu brtag /rdo rje chu dang rnam snang dang / /sbrang rtsi mar dkar lhan cig sbyar/ /lce yi dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /snying po'i ye shes de nyid do/ /bdag po dbu rgyan la bsgoms la/ /ci bde bar ni bza' ba bza'/ /lha yi gzugs su gyur nas su/ /'dod pa'i lha yi

bdag por skye/ /bza' ba 'o ma'i btung ba yis/ /nad dang rga ba rnam par spangs/ /sems can rjes su chags pa yi/ /lha mo glu 'dis bskul ba yis/ /byang chub chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /sems can don ni bla med mdzad/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yis/ /

thugs rje bskyed cing bstan par mdzad/ /gsang ba'i chos ni bstan nas kyang / /ngag gi dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji lta bar ni bstan pas grol/ /de nyid rnal 'byor mas bskul nas/ /sna tshogs du ma mang po yi/ /dam tshig

mchod pa ngo mtshar rmad/ /mig phye nas ni bstod pa ni/ /A pa ra ta ru su ra ta su khwA bA hA su kha me twa sau khya ma ya/ sa ma ya ra ma ra ma ho/ su ra ta sau khya ya tre sa ma tsa ri taM/ su ga ta sAn+ta ma ya pra bi kur ba bi kur ba/ su ra ta di ya pad+ma dza le/ pra bi ba dzaMm pa/ sur tod

su kha pad+ma dza le/ pra bi nan tan ra ta su kha sa da na pad+ma dza le/ pra bi marda marda su ra ta ma bi sa bi shwa dza le ho ha hU~M ha ha ho/ dza ya ma hA su kha su kha te dze ma ya ra ma ra ma ho/ /su ra ki tu su kha ba hU~M bi ti d+he dza mu kra dza ya te dza ra/ ha na ta ho ba rA ha/ sa su kha ho hU~M ho ho sur to tA rA ga su kha

ra ti rI dzi na pa ra ma shrIr ti ho/ pa ra ma he tu ma hA su kha ho/ su kha ma nu yo na ra pa ra me shwa ra ho/ ho b+ha ga bAn ma hA su khaM hU~M ho/ ba hU~M bi ti bi ti bi shwa dzA la ra ti bi shwa ma ho/ su ra ti su khaM ga tsid tra par ma ma hA su kha ho/ su kha ma nu gr-i h+dz+ya ho/ su ra ta ud ta ma san di

su khaM a A ro li ka a ma hA su kha gr-i h+dz+ya ho/ glu 'di dag ni blangs tsam gyis/ /dga' zhing bde ba yang dag 'dus/ /bde ba chen po yid 'dod pa/ /dngos grub kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /'khor tshogs chen po byin brlabs nas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dgyes pa che/ /

pad+ma dra ba'i sdom pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gsung gi sdom pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /gzhal yas rtseg ma'i dbus dag tu/ /'khor lo mchog ni dgod par bya/ /sngon po'i
