'phang mchog /bdag med chos dang lam dang ni/ /dkyil 'khor mchog la rab tu bzhugs/ /shes rab pha rol rnal 'byor ma/ /rnal 'byor las ni ngal bsos nas/ /mtshan med go 'phang gnas nas su/ /mtshan med la ni mnyam par brten/ /chos rnams

med cing mtshan ma med/ /chos min chos can dag kyang med/ /rten 'brel chos kyang mkha' dang mnyam/ /dngos po med cing mtshan ma med/ /de nyid gzhi la 'dir gnas na/ /ye shes mig gis mthong ba yin/ /gnas sogs 'khor lo nges par yang / /nyi zer rdul dang mnyam

par mthong / /skra yi rtse mo 'bum gshags pa'i/ /cha yang yongs su rtogs shing mthong / /b+ha ga'i dbus na bzhugs pa yi/ /he ru rnal 'byor ma lhan cig /'khor los sgyur ba rab sbyor ba/ /khwa gdong la sogs phyi rol dgod/ /he ru ka dpal bdag po ni/ /mkha' 'gro

bzhi yis yongs su bskor/ /phan tshun bdag po bya ba ni/ /rdo rje sems sogs sbyor ba ni/ /rnal 'byor ma dang thun mong 'grub/ /sbyor ba gsum ni dam tshig mchog /khams gsum bdag po chen po ni/ /rnam par spyod par mthong ma gyur/ /mi 'grub 'khor los sgyur ba dang / /

khams gsum bdag po'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /'grub na de na rnal 'byor che/ /srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'thob/ /de bzhin cho ga'i sbyor ba yis/ /stobs kyis shi ba bza' bar bya/ /mtshams med pa ni byed pa dag /bkug la mkhas pas byin gyis brlab/ /gzhan

du dngos grub 'jigs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'tsho ba'i 'bras/ /phyugs gsad pa yi sbyor ba ni/ /rnal 'byor ma la zhus te bya/ /lha bshos bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /ma dang sring mo lhan cig tu/ /mchog dang bar ma de bzhin te/ /gzhan du bu mo lhan cig tu/ /

dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba/ /mnyam pa mchog gi bsgrub pa'o/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /'dod pa lnga ni spyad par bya/ /phag mo ru ni bdag bsgoms te/ /lte bar sdigs mdzub bzhag nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'khor lor bzhugs/ /lha mo rab tu dad

byas nas/ /sgo dgu la ni zhugs nas kyang / /snying po pad+ma phug nas ni/ /rnal 'byor ma ni brgyab tsam gyis/ /rma skyes mchog ni btung bar bya/ /bsnun pa de yis zos na ni/ /sangs rgyas 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rnal 'byor

ma'i gnas bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor dpa' bo'i cho ga dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi gnas 'byung ba/ /'dus pa bdag gis bshad par bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ /

bla ma'i bka' las gzhan du min/ /thams cad mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /nges par legs pa stsol bar 'gyur/ /re'u mig dgu pa dbus su ste/ /phyi rol du ni bcu drug bri/ /re'u mig dbus kyi dkyil du yang / /shin tu mdzes pa'i pad+ma bri/ /sna tshogs pad+ma brgyad

pa ste/ /lte ba dang ni ge sar bcas/ /de dbus zla ba blta byas te/ /a la sogs pa rnam par sbyar/ /A li kA li mnyam byas te/ /hU~M ni nang du chud par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpas kun khyab pa/ /he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom/ /zhal lnga phyag ni

bcu pa ste/ /phag mo yis ni yongs su brgyan/ /dkar zhing sngo la de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu ser po steng du ste/ /spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid/ /shin tu myos pas zhabs 'og

gnon/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pas mdzes/ /sna tshogs rdo rje cod pan can/ /ral pa'i dbu rgyan dbu la bcing / /phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing / /sku la rdo rje'i rgyan gyis spud/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /bde ba chen po'i bde

ba mchog /rtse gsum dang ni cang te'u 'dzin/ /rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te/ /thod pa kha T+wAM tshangs pa'i mgo /dgra sta dang ni zhags pa'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag la ni/ /na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /zhabs gnyis mnyam par 'khril ba ni/ /phag mo yis ni

kha sbyar byas/ /de mdog phyag dang bzhugs stangs can/ /dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu ste/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyis ska rags can/ /drag po'i thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos/ /shar gyi 'dab la mkha' 'gro

ma/ /byang du lA ma mkha' 'gro ma/ /nub tu dum skyes ma yin no/ /lho ru gzugs can mkha' 'gro ma/ /gnag dang sngo bsangs dmar ser skya/ /phyogs kyi gos 'chang g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /skra grol gnyis su med pa ste/ /zur gyi cha

ni thams cad du/ /byang chub sems kyi snod kyang gzhag /thod pa kha T+wAM dril bu dang / /cang te'u gri gug mgo bo thogs/ /zhal gsum spyan gsum bzhin rnam bsgyur/ /drag po chags pa'i chags pas myos/ /bcom ldan bde bas gzigs nas ni/ /bde ba che

la rjes su chags/ /mgo bo'i do shal 'chang ba yis/ /he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom/ /'di ltar re'u mig dbus dkyil du/ /mchog de dag kyang bsgom par bya/ /de yi shar gyi re'u mig la pul+lI ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste ser po'o/ /byang du dzA

lan d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste sngon po'o/ /nub tu auD+Di yA na na keng rus can dang 'od ldan ma ste dkar po'o/ /lho ru ar bu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste ljang gu'o/ /me'i phyogs su go dA ba ri na lha dgra dang dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste

dmar po'o/ /bden bral du rA me shwa ri na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma ste pad+ma'i mdog can no/ /rlung phyogs su de bI ko Ta na rdo rje'i 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste dud kha sngon po'o/ /dbang ldan du mA la ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste ljang gu dang mu tig lta bu'o/ /

phyag na rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa'o/ /de la re'u mig gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su kA ma rU pa na myu gu can dang / sa srung ma ste dmar po'o/ /byang du o tre na rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo ste ljang gu/ nub tu tri sha ku ni na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste sngon

po'o/ /lho phyogs ko sa la na rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste dkar po'o/ /me'i phyogs su ka ling ga na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo ste nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /bden bral du lam pA ka na rdo rje bzang po dang rab bzang ma ste dmar po'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su kAM po tsi na

'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma ste ser po'o/ /dbang ldan du hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste sngon po'o/ /pad+ma dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o/ /re'u mig gsum pa'i shar du pre ta pu ri na stobs po che dang 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste nam mkha' dang ser skya'o/ /

byang du gr-i ha de ba tA na rdo rje'i 'od dang / dum skyes ma ste ser po'o/ /nub tu sau rASh+Ta na rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma ste dmar po'o/ /lho phyogs su su bar+Na dwI pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste sngon po'o/ /me'i phyogs su nA ga ra na dpal khrag 'thung dang rab dpa'

mo ste dud pa'i mdog can no/ /bden bral du sin+d+hu na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma ste ljang gu'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su ma ru ta na rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor los sgyur ma ste sngon po'o/ /dbang ldan du ku lu tA na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson

'grus chen mo ste dkar po'o/ /'khor lo dang dril bu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa'o/ /gzhan yang thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga dang cang te'u dang gri gug dang mgo bo 'dzin pa/ phyag drug pa/ zhal gsum pa ste/ zhal ni man ngag gi rjes su 'brang bas bstan/ spyan gsum g.yas

brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /rdo rje phreng dang pad 'khor lo/ /ji lta'i rim pas dpral bar brgyan/ /lha mo skra grol gcer bu ste/ /byin

pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab ste/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya legs khyab pa/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa/ /dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo'i gzugs can

la bkod nas/ /ci ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag /'di ltar phyi yi 'khor lo yi/ /de la sgo srung rnams kyang dgod/ /mtshams dang zur du lha mo rnams/ /mkhas pas bri bar bya ba ste/ /cho ga du ma thos nas ni/ /'bad pas gcig tu bsdus pa yin/ /shar gyi sgor ni khwa

gdong ma/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni/ /bya rog chu skyar zhal yin te/ /mi'u thung la mi sdug zhal/ /byang gi sgor ni 'ug gu dang / /'ug pa byi la rnam mdzes te/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong gi/ /lce bskyod 'jigs

pa'i gzugs can ma/ /nub tu b+ha ba gi zhes pa/ /khyi dang seng ge'i gdong pa can/ /g.yon pa dang ni g.yas pa yi/ /lce bskyod shin tu mdzes pa'o/ /lho phyogs sa 'dzin lha mo ni/ /phag gdong ma he'i gzugs can te/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni/ /zab

cing drag la 'jigs pa'o/ /thog ma khwa gdong zhes bya ba/ /gnyis pa 'ug pa de bzhin te/ /gsum pa khyi yi gdong can la/ /bzhi pa dag ni phag nyid do/ /sngo dang dud kha dkar po'i gdong / /ljang gu ser po dmar po ste/ /ser zhing dmar la sngo ba'i zhal/ /dkar dang sngo dang ljang

gu'i mdog /dang po me nas dbang ldan bar/ /gshin rje sreg ma pho nya mo/ /gshin rje mche ba 'joms ma nyid/ /dmar dang ser dang ljang gu dang / /sngo dang ser dang ljang gu dang / /dud kha ser dang ljang gu dang / /dkar dang ser dang ljang gu ste/ /de dag zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ /

spyan gsum g.yas pa brkyang bas bzhugs/ /phyogs kyi gos 'chang gsus pa 'phyangs/ /dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rgyas btab cing / /'khor lo dag ni thams cad kyang / /steng du rnam par bzhugs/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma dang / /zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ /zhags pa lcags kyu cang te'u dang / /mgo bo gri gug phyag na 'chang / /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /dga' zhing dgyes pas rnam par myos/ /rjes su chags pa'i zhal gdong ni/ /'jigs pa'i sdang mig 'gyur

ba'o/ /de nas gshin rje sreg sogs sgo/ /khwa gdong la sogs mtshams su ste/ /rang gi thabs dang mnyam par bzhag /sbyor ba'i rim pa bsgoms nas ni/ /'khor lo dpa' bo thams cad kyang / /ji bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/ /snga ma'i rjes su thams cad kyang / /mkha'

'gro ma sogs kun de bzhin/ /ji bzhin bla ma'i bka' bzhin du/ /ji ltar 'dod pa gnas de bzhin/ /ji ltar sems kyi khyad par gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /bum pa sna tshogs sbyor ba yis/ /thod pa yis ni yongs su brgyan/ /'o mas bkang ba'i thod pa ni/ /

bum pa'i steng du gzhag par bya/ /phyi rol yongs su bskor ba ste/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma gnas pa/ /glu dang gar ni nyer ldan pas/ /sna tshogs rol mo rnam par sprul/ /me tog bdug spos mar me dang / /dri dang gos mchog dam pa ste/ /sna tshogs dam tshig ro yi zas/ /

sna tshogs bza' ba chang gis mchod/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mchog dam pa/ /phyi rol kyis yongs bskor/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par bsgom/ /bla ma'i man ngag bka' bzhin du/ /rdo rje pad kor 'khor lo ni/ /zur bzhi bar ni rab tu gnas/ /

mtshams su rdo rje phyed pas mtshan/ /rdo rje ka ba'i mdun dbus su/ /re'u mig rdo rje ldan par bya/ /sna tshogs pa yi cho ga mchog /gnas sogs rim pas dgod par bya/ /khams dang phung po de bzhin te/ /skye mched drug kyang rnam par dgod/ /ye shes rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /

sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba na/ /ar+g+ha zhabs bsil dag gis mchod/ /dam tshig sna tshogs mchog dam pa/ /sna tshogs pa yi khyad par gyis/ /mAM sarak+ta dag gis mchod/ /go cha gnyis po sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya ye shes

mchog dam pa/ /ro gcig ma lus bsgoms na ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /reg pa yi ni khyad par gyis/ /mkhas pas sbyor ba gsum du sbyar/ /bsgoms pas rnam par dag pa'i don/ /mkhas pas sum cu rtsa bdun te/ /ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor

ba yis/ /dam tshig gsum gyi mchog gis bza'/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bzlas pa'i sgom pa rnam par bsgom/ /dus bzhi dag tu dam tshig can/ /gnas sbyor mkhas pas bsrung bar bya/ /sa steng du ni mthong ba kun/ /thams cad he ru ka dpal

gzugs/ /'gro ba drug po'i srid pa sbyangs/ /sems can don ni gzhal med byas/ /thams cad zhugs te zhugs sbyor bas/ /'dir ni thams cad gzhug par bya/ /'di ni sbyor ba nges pa ste/ /nges pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dung chen phreng ba dag gis ni/ /

dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa bya/ /tshogs kyi cho ga'i rim pa bzhin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sngags mchog bzla/ /o~M shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M hrIHha ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M sarba bud+d+ha

DA ki nI badzra bar+Na nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ phag mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M ka ra ka ra khaN+Da ka pA li hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pra tsa tsaN+De hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ku ru ku ru ma tA kad+kA la hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsaN+Dapa k+Shi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ban+d+ha ban+d+ha kad+kA la hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pra b+ha ba ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M trA sa ya trA sa ya bi ka Ta daMSh+ki Ni hu~M hU~M

phaT/ o~M ma hA nA se hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya su ra bai ri Ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bI ra ma hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hrauM hrauM a mi tA b+he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kharba ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hraHhraHbadzra pra b+he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M lang+ke shwa ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pheM pheM badzra de he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M dru mats+tshA ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M phaT phaT ad+ku ri ko

hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ai rA ba ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M da ha da ha badzra dza Ti la hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA b+hai ra bi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pa tsa pa tsa ma hA bI ra hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bA yu be ge hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha badzra hU~M kA ra ba sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba laM bi ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su ra b+ha k+Shi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M gr-ih+na gr-ih+na su

b+ha dra sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarbaM pA tar+dz+dza ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sh+yA ma de bi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M A kaT+D+h+ya A kaT+D+h+ya badzra b+ha dre hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su b+ha dre hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su b+ha dre hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hrAM hrAM ma hA b+hai ra bi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ha ya kar+NeN hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M dz+NauM dz+NauM bi rU pA k+Shi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kha gA na ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM

ma hA ba le hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsakra be ge hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hAM hAM rat+na badzra hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hIM hIM ha ya gri ba hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shauN+Di ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hU~M hU~M A kA sha gar+b+he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M cakra warmi Ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ki li ki li he ru ka hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su bI re hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sa

li si li pad+ma na rte shwa re hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA ba le hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hi li hi li bai ro tsa ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsakra wa rti ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M d+hi li d+hi li badzra satwa hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA bI r+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M lA me hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rU pi Ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M

kA kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M u lA kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shwA nA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sU ka rA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma dA D+hi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma daM Sh+Ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma ma tha na hu~M hU~M phaT/ rnal 'byor cho ga bzlas tsam gyis/ /rdo rje bkug cing gnas nas su

'khrug cing rab tu g.yo ba ste/ /lus las 'od 'bar dgod pa dang / /de yi mig ni 'bar ba dang / /tshig 'jam pa dang 'bar ba dang / /rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas tsam gyis/ /rdo rje 'jug pa mthong ba dang / /sngags pa mnyam bzhag bzlas nas ni/ /dam

tshig spyod pa ldan byas nas/ /srog dang rtsol ba bsngam byas te/ /gsal byed hU~M ni brjod nas kyang / /chos kyi dbyings su spro bar bya/ /sems can kun la phan pa dang / /gdul dka' ba dag gdul ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams mdun du spro/ /khro bo'i gong phang

de mthong nas/ /khams gsum dag tu bsdu bar bya/ /lus ngag yid la bcug nas kyang / /sa steng du ni spyod pa spyad/ /mnyam bzhag min pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /snying rjes brlan pa nyid kyis ni/ /sems can thams cad mthong ba na/ /srid pa gsum po he ru ka/ /

sngags pa ci dang ci za ba/ /dam tshig mchog ni bsgom sa nas kyang / /thams cad chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas/ /dam tshig can ni langs dus su/ /bla ma mchod pa rjes dran nas/ /byang chub sems kyi chus khrus bya/ /yid 'ong phyag rgyal

gnas nas/ /khro bo sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /go 'phang du ni byin brlabs nas/ /yid 'ong mchod pa dag tu bshad/ /mkha' dbyings dkyil 'khor khyab pa la/ /smon lam dag ni bya ba yin/ /de ma thag pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /

rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba na/ /rang bzhin dag pa bcom ldan 'das/ /rang bzhin yang ni dngos med byas/ /sems can rang bzhin dag pa ste/ /srid pa mchog tu byas pa yin/ /rdo rje phag mo bla med pa/ /phyag rgya ru ni byin brlabs nas/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad

'di ltar rab tu brtag /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las re'u mig dgod pa dang / /gnas bsdu ba bstan pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /gnas dang 'dus pa mchog yin pas/ /dngos grub kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /

mnyam par 'dres pa bcud du 'gyur/ /gnyis med blos ni mnyam bzhag ste/ /'khor lo gsum mdog ldan par ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i dbus dag tu/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo mchog /de yi dbus su pad+ma che/ /sna tshogs pad+ma legs par mdzes/ /'dab

ma brgyad pa lte bar bcas/ /ge sar dag gis nye bar mdzes/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /phreng ba dang ni phreng phyed brgyan/ /mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /A

li kA li zhu gyur las/ /ye shes lnga ni rnam par bsgom/ /de yi yongs su 'phel 'gyur bas/ /rdo rje he ru ka rnam bsgom/ /dus mtha'i me chen 'chol ba yis/ /gdul dka' thams cad rab tu gsheg /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /zhabs kyi 'og tu rnam gnon

cing / /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs/ /sku lus dag ni sngon po las/ /sngo zhing 'bar ba'i sku yang sprul/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sangs rgyas lngas ni byin gyis brlabs/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba

phyed pa rnam par mdzes/ /zhal drug dpa' bo mi sdug pa/ /sgeg pa dang ni bzhad pa dang / /drag shul 'jigs pa'i sku lus can/ /phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab cing / /sku ni sna tshogs rgyan gyis spud/ /phag mo dang ni yang dag ldan/ /byin pa dag gis gnyis med 'khyud/ /

g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs gnas shing / /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /ha ha mdzad cing hU~M hU~M mdzad/ /hi hi mdzad cing 'jigs pa can/ /hU~M hU~M mdzad cing phaT phaT can/ /aT+TAT+TA yi sgra chen smra/ /sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dkar po de bzhin

te/ /steng gi zhal gdong gdug pa che/ /zas su gdug pa longs spyod cing / /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /lha mo dag gi nu ma 'tshir/ /drag po'i pags pa'i gos mnabs shing / /khrag rlon 'dzag pa rab gsol te/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /mdung dang gri

gug lcags kyu dang / /zhags pa dang ni mgo bo 'dzin/ /gdug pa gtum zhing cang te'u dang / /mdung ni 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can/ /dpral ba dag tu nye bar mdzes/ /de lta'i phyag dang sku mdog bzhugs/ /dbu skra grol cing gcer bu ste/ /'di lta'i phyag rgya rnam

par bsgom/ /dum bu'i ska rags kyis brgyan cing / /phag mo yang ni 'di 'drar bsgom/ /rnal 'byor som nyi spangs nas ni/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam ldan pas/ /thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba yis/ /sems can don gyi phyir byung ste/ /snying rje chen pos brlan pa yi/ /

nam mkha'i sbyor ba'i longs spyod kyis/ /thugs rje chen po'i bcud bde bas/ /'gro drug srid pa rnam sbyangs nas/ /sems can don ni mchog nyid mdzad/ /stong pa'i ye shes las byung zhing / /rtog pa med pa'i gnas gzhi la/ /rang bzhin med cing mchog tu phra/ /thig le

sgra ni rnam spangs pa/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig mthong nas ni/ /phyi dang nang gi mchog gyur pa/ /snying po ye shes dam tshig ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /der ni phyag mtshan mdog mthong nas/ /zla ba'i rdo rje sa bon ni/ /de 'dir snying po bsgom bya ste/ /bsnyen pa'i

rnal 'byor dag tu brtag /mkha' 'gro la sogs rim pa yis/ /pad+ma dag ni dgod par bya/ /shar du mkha' 'gro dgod par bya/ /byang du de bzhin lA ma ste/ /nub tu dum skyes ma yin no/ /lho ru de bzhin gzugs can ma/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang / /ser te de bzhin

bzhi po ni/ /bzhin rnam bsgyur zhing spyan gsum gdug /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can yin/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rgyas btab cing / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /g.yon gyi dpung pa la brten cing / /cang te'u gri gug mgo bo ni/ /mkha'

'gro ma yi dam tshig mchog /byang chub sems kyi chus gang ba'i/ /thod pa bum pa'i steng du gzhag /'khor lo dgod par bya ba ni/ /sngon du grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /byin gyis rlab sogs rim pa yis/ /shar phyogs byang gi rim pa ste/ /pul+lI ra ma ya na thod pa'i dum bu

dang / rab gtum ma ste nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /dzA lan d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste mdog ser po'o/ /au Di yA na na keng rus can dang 'od ldan ma ste mdog ljang gu'o/ /ar bu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste mdog nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /go

dA ba ri na lha dgra dang dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste mdog ser po'o/ /ra me shwa ri na 'od dpag med dang mi'u thung ma ste mdog ljang gu/ de bI ko Ta na rdo rje'i 'od dang lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /mA la wa na rdo rje'i lus dang shing grib ma ste mdog ser po/ kA ma rU pa na

myu gu can dang sa srung ma ste mdog ljang gu/ o tre na rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo ste nam mkha' ser skya/ tri sha ku ni na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste mdog ser/ ko sa la na rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste mdog ljang gu/ ka ling+ga na rab

bzang dang sngo bsangs lha mo ste nam mkha' ser skya/ lam bA ka na rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang mo ste mdog ser/ kAM tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang rta rna ma ste mdog ljang gu/ hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma ste nam mkha' ser skya/ pre ta pu ri na stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i

shugs can ma ste mdog ser po/ /gr-i ha de wa tA na rdo rje rin chen dang dum skyes ma ste mdog ljang gu'o/ /sau rASh+Ta na rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma ste nam mkha' ser skya'o/ /su war+NaN dwI pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste mdog ser/ nA ga ra na he ru ka dang rab dpa' mo ste mdog

ljang gu/ /sin+d+hu na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste nam mkha' ser skya/ ma ru tA na rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor los sgyur ma ste mdog ser/ ku lu tA na rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson chen ma ste mdog ljang gu/ yang na sku gsung thugs kyi ni/ /ci 'dod mdog ni dbye ba bya/ /

g.yon gyi rim pa ji lta bar/ /sgo rnams dag ni bya ba ste/ /shar du khwa gdong ma/ byang du 'ug gdong ma/ nub tu khyi gdong ma/ lho ru phag gdong ma/ sngo ba dang ljang gu dang / dmar ba dang ser po'i mdog can no/ /me'i phyogs su gshin rje sreg ma mdog dmar po/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su gshin rje

pho nya ma mdog sngon po/ rlung gi phyogs su gshin rje mche ba ma dud kha'am char sprin gyi mdog lta bu/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su gshin rje 'joms ma mdog dkar po'am ser skya'o/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rab gtum ma la sogs pa 'dra bar gdong gcig

pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ stag gi pags pa mnabs pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ lha mo'i zhabs kyis 'khyud pa/ gcer bu mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas dpral ba brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang

dril bus 'khyud pa/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i mnyam pa dang ldan pa/ lha mo'i nu ma 'tshir ba/ thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ cang te'u 'chang ba/ yang na rigs gsum dbye bas rtsa ba'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa/ thams cad phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing / /lha mo skra grol gdug pa mo/ /

khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can la/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba'i se ral brgyan/ /thams cad phyag rgya lnga yang 'chang / /'dod pa'i

chags pas rab tu myos/ /rang gi thabs dang lhan cig tu/ /mi g.yo ba dang de bzhin sbyor/ /lto ba 'phyang zhing lag pa 'phyang / /sku lus 'jigs shing gdong yang bsgyur/ /rab 'jigs nyi ma pad+ma yi/ /steng du bsgrub par rab gnas nas/ /gang zhig ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /

rjes su chags pas zhal nyid ni/ /de lta bu yi bsam pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /cang te'u gri gug mgo bo 'chang / /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kun/ /la ni bzhugs par bsgom/ /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi dkyil

'khor la/ /nye bsnyen rjes su rnal 'byor te/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag sbyor ba yis/ /bsgrub pa lhag pa'i snyoms par 'jug /sen mo dang so dag ni thod pa'i dum bu'o/ /skra dang spu dag ni keng rus chen po'o/ /pags pa dang dri ma dag ni keng rus can no/ /sha ni mche ba rnam par gtsigs

pa'o/ /rtsa rgyus ni lha dgra'o/ /rus pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /mkhal ma dag ni rdo rje 'od do/ /snying ni rdo rje sku'o/ /mig ni rdo rje myu gu can no/ /mkhris pa ni rdo rje ral pa can no/ /glo ba ni dpa' bo chen po'o/ /rgyu ma ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad do/ /gnye ma ni rab tu bzang po'o/ /lte ba ni rdo rje bzang

po'o/ /lgang pa ni 'jigs byed chen po'o/ /skra mtshams ni mig mi bzang ngo / /bad kan ni stobs po che'o/ /rnag ni rin chen rdo rje'o/ /khrag ni rta mgrin no/ /rdul ni nam mkha'i snying po'o/ /tshil ni dpal he ru ka'o/ /mchi ma ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go /mchil ma ni rnam par

snang mdzad do/ /snabs ni rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /pul+lI ra ma la ya ste mgo bor ni rab tu gtum ma'o/ /dzA lan+d+ha ra ste spyi gtsug tu gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/ /oDi yA na ste rna ba g.yas par 'od ldan ma'o/ /ar bu da ste spyi bo'i rgyab tu sna chen ma ste gnas so/ /go dA ba ri ste rna ba

g.yon par brtan pa'i blo can ma'o/ /rA me shA ri ste smin ma'i dbus su mi'u thung ma'o/ /de bI ko Ta ste mig tu ni lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /mA la ba ste phrag pa gnyis su ni shing grib ma ste nye ba'i gnas so/ /kA ma rU pa ste mchan khung dag tu ni sa srung ma'o/ /o tre ste nu ma gnyis su

'jigs byed chen mo ste zhing ngo / /tri sha ku ni ste lte bar ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /ko sa la ste sna rtser ni chang 'thung ma ste nye ba'i zhing ngo / /ka ling+ga ste khar ni sngo sangs lha mo'o/ /lam bA ka ste mgrin par ni shin tu bzang mo ste 'dus pa can no/ /kAM tsi ste snying gar ni rta rna ma'o/ /hi ma la ya ste mdoms

su ni bya gdong ma ste nye ba'i 'dus pa can no/ /pre ta pu ri ste mtshan ma la ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /gr-i ha de ba tA ste bshang ba'i lam la ni dum skyes ma'o/ /'dus pa can no/ /sau rASh+Ta ste brla gnyis su chang 'tshong ma'o/ /su bar+N+Na dwI pa ste byin pa gnyis la 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /nye ba'i 'dus pa can no/ /nAg

ra ste sor mo rnams la ni shin tu dpa' mo'o/ /sin+d+hu ste rkang pa'i bol la ni stobs chen ma ste 'di dag ni dur khrod do/ /ma ru ste mthe bong dag la ni 'khor los sgyur ma'o/ /ku lu tA ste pus mo gnyis la ni brtson 'grus ma chen mo'o/ /'di dag ni nye ba'i dur khrod do/ /sa'i khams ni ltung byed ma'o/ /chu'i khams

ni gsod byed ma'o/ /me'i khams ni 'gugs byed ma'o/ /rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /nam mkha'i khams ni pad+ma'i dra ba ma'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /'du shes kyi phung po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go /'du

byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni dpal he ru ka'o/ /mig gnyis ni gti mug rdo rje'o/ /rna ba gnyis ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o/ /sna gnyis ni ser sna rdo rje'o/ /kha ni 'dod chags rdo rje/ reg bya

ni phrag dog rdo rje/ skye mched thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje/ yid ni mi 'khrugs rdo rje/ ngag ni dpag med rdo rje/ lus ni rdo rje rnam snang ngo / /'di dag sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yin/ /rang snying lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas su/ /de dag sprul cing bkod nas

ni/ /ji lta'i rim pas dbang yang bskur/ /zhugs par gyur nas bcing bar bya/ /dgyes pas rjes su chags pas sbyor/ /rang gi ngo bo gcig gyur nas/ /de la go cha gnyis po dgod/ /o~M ha snying ga la rdo rje sems dpa'/ na maHhi mgo bo la rnam par snang mdzad/ swA hA hu spyi gtsug

la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug /bau ShaT he phrag pa gnyis la he ru ka/ hU~M hU~M hoHmig gnyis la rdo rje nyi ma/ phaT haM lus thams cad kyi go cha ste rta mchog go/ /o~M ba~M lte ba la rdo rje phag mo/ ha~M ya~M snying ga la ya mi ni'o/ /hrIM ma~M kha la rmongs byed ma'o/ hreM hreM mgo la skyod byed ma'o/ /hU~M hU~M spyi

gtsug la skrag byed ma'o/ /phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ /mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar/ /mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar/ /de ni dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas/ /bskor zhing bskor bar kun tu sbyar bar bya/ /rkang pa phyed mnan steng du blta/ /

gyen du pheM gi sgra sgrogs shing / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bkug /dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ sbyor bas bkug nas gzhug pa dang / /bcings nas dbang du bya ba yin/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis/ /mkha' dkyil yongs su gang mthong

nas/ /ye shes chu yi bdud rtsi yis/ /gang ba'i bum pa blangs nas ni/ /lag pas de la dbang bskur bya/ /glu dang gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /dbang bskur dag ni dbul bar bya/ /de la sngags ni o~M sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hU~M hU~M/ glu 'di blangs pas bskul ba'am/ yang na

mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rnams thugs dgyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes par gyur te/ dbang bskur rol mo'i bde chen po/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po/ /dgyes chen gsol ba'i bde chen po/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po/ /gsal mdzad bde ba chen po ste/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde

chen po/ /a la la hoH/ /mchog tu gyur pa bde chen po/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde chen po/ /a la la hoH/ /bde chen ye shes dgyes nas ni/ /dam tshig dam tshig can la bzhugs/ /ye shes ro gcig bsgoms nas ni/ /ro gcig 'khor lo'ang de bzhin bsgom/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i

dbu rgyan can/ /ye shes lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /rtsa ba'i sngags sogs dpa' bo gang / /tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs brtag /rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gang yin/ /mgul nas mgul du rnam par brgyan/ /lha mo'i snying po'i sngags kyis ni/ /phreng ba brgya phyed kyis brgyan cing / /

gsang sngags yi ge bdun pa yis/ /nor bu rna cha legs mdzes shing / /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /pags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /rnal 'byor ma drug gsang sngags kyis/ /ska rags rgyan du byas pa yin/ /go cha drug po dag gis ni/ /phyag rgya lus ni rab tu

mdzes/ /'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma'i/ /sngags kyi btung ba'i thod pa yin/ /rnam snang mdzad ma sngags gang gis/ /thod pas spyi gtsug rgyan du byas/ /dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis/ /lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag /de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams te/ /tsham ngam sngags

kyis legs par bsrung / /tshangs par spyod pa brtag gyur nas/ /rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod/ /'jigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te/ /de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid bsam/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i ye shes bsgom/ /snyoms 'jug ye shes bzlas pa bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po

sgrub chen po/ /rdo rje khro bo'i thig le las/ /khams gsum du ni spro bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sna yi rtse mo 'bar/ /spro bya nam mkhar thig le las/ /rdo rje phra mo mthong gyur pas/ /ba spu'i khung bu'i bar dag nas/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu bar/ /khro bo sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro/ /

rnam par dag pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rim pa yin/ /lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni lA ma'o/ /chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o/ /sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o/ /'dun

pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab gtum ma'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum mig ma'o/ /dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o/ /sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o/ /dad pa'i dbang po ni dpa' ba'i blo gros can ma'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi

dbang po ni mi'u thung ma'o/ /dran pa'i dbang po ni lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o/ /shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srung ma'o/ /dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung

ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs lha mo'o/ /shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o/ /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o/ /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i

shugs can ma'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dum skyes ma'o/ /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chang 'tshong ma'o/ /dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shin

tu dpa' mo'o/ /yang dag pa'i lta ba ni stobs chen ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor los sgyur ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i ngag ni dpa' bo chen mo'o/ /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni bya rog gi gdong can ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug pa'i gdong can ma'o/ /yang dag

pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi'i gdong can ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gi gdong can ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa ni gshin rje sreg ma'o/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni gshin rje

pho nya ma'o/ /mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spong ba ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o/ /mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o/ /dam tshig gi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'i bsgom pa'o/ /de nas dam tshig 'khor lo dag /mnyam par

bzhag ste bzlas par bya/ /ha ha/ hU~M hU~M/ hi hi/ phaT/ hU~M hU~M/ a a/ o~M shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hU~M hU~M phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba raM hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M hrIHha ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+NaN hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/

lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M DA ki ni hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M lA me hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M khaN+Da ro he hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M rU bi Ni hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M khaN+Da ka pA li ni ka ra ka ra hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M pra tsaN+De hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA kaM kA la ku ru ku ru hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M tsaN+Da k+Shi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kang+ka la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hu~M hU~M phaT/

o~M pra b+ha ba ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bi ka Ta dAMSh+Ti Ni trA sa ya trA sa hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA nA se hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su rA bai ri Ni k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bI ra ma ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M a mi tA b+he hrauM hrauM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kharba ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra pra b+ha hraHhraHhu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M lang+ke shwa ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra de

he pheM pheM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M dru mats+tshA ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ang+ku ri ke phaT phaT hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ai rA wa ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra dza Ti li da ha da ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma dA b+hai ra be hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA bI ra pa tsa pa tsa hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bA yu be ge hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra hU~M kA ra b+ha k+Sha b+ha k+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba lam+bi ni hu~M hU~M

phaT/ o~M su ra b+hak+Shi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su b+ha dre gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hU dzi ga sarbaM pA tardzadza ya tardzadza hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sh+yA ma de bi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra b+ha dra A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su b+ha dre hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA b+hai ra ba hrIM hrIM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ha ya kar+NeN hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bi rU pA k+Sha dz+NauM dz+NauM hu~M hU~M phaT/

o~M kha gA na ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA ba le k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsakra be ge hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rat+na badzra hAM hAM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ha ya grI ba hIM hIM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shau N+Di ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M A kA sha gar+b+he hU~M hU~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsakra warmi Ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M he ru ka ki li ki li hu~M hU~M

phaT/ o~M su ra bI re hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pad+ma na rte shwa re si li si li hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA ba le hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bai ro tsa ni hi li hi li hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsakra wa rti ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra satwa d+hi li d+hi li hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA bI r+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kA kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M u lU kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shwA nA s+ye hu~M

hU~M phaT/ o~M sU ka rA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma dA D+hi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma dU ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma daMSh+T+ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma ma tha ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /dung chen phreng ba blangs nas su/ /lag g.yon mthe bong srin lag gis/ /gsang sngags dag ni bzlas

pa bya/ /dus bzhir ji ltar 'dod pa ru/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas pa bya/ /bsgom pa rtse gcig bya ba ste/ /dam tshig dang ni dam tshig sbyor/ /bza' dang bzlas pa bsdus nas su/ /cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyin/ /dkyil 'khor la ni ci bde bar/ /gcer bu skra grol 'dug

pa yis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin/ /rkang pa g.yas brkyang gnas nas su/ /mnyam par bzhag ste phyag rgya bcing / /mdzub mo mdung byas gung mo nges par sbyar/ /mthe bong rdo rje brtan por rab tu sbyar/ /dpral ba'i dbus kyi phyogs su rab gzhag nas/ /gcu zhing

gcu zhing bskor nas 'di brjod do/ /o~M A ra l+li hoHdzaHhU~MbaM hoHbadzra DA ki nI sa ma ya s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya hoH/ 'di ni gsum dang bzhi dang ni/ /lnga yi bar du brjod par bya/ /skra grol gcer bur byung ba yis/ /rnal 'byor mtho ba'i gnas nas langs/ /lho phyogs kha bltas gnas pa yis/ /

mtshan phyed du ni gtor ma sbyin/ /ci lta'i las kyi rjes 'brang nas/ /de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas/ /gsang sngags 'di dag rab tu brjod/ /o~M kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa/ b+h+ru ta/ pre ta/ pi shA tsa/ un mA da/ a pa smA ra/ DA ka DA ki n+ya

dayaH i maM ba liM g+h+r-ih+NaM tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu ma ma sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tshan+tu ya thai baM/ b+huny+dza tha/ bi pa tha dzi g+h+ra tha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ ma ma sarba kA ra tA ya/ sad su khaM bi shud+d+ha ye/ sa hA yi kA b+ha wan+tu hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ /bde chen mtshan gyis gar

mdzad cing / /bcom ldan sku gsung thugs la bzhugs/ /A li kA li mnyam byas te/ /der ni re pha'i sbyor ba yis/ /steng du 'bar ba'i re pha ni/ /'og tu 'dzag par byed pa yin/ /'dzag pa'i khu ba'i tshul can ni/ /'chi med thigs pa'i gzugs su 'gyur/ /srub dang bsgrub pa

yang dag sbyor/ /ye shes me la las kyi rlung / /rab tu bskyod par byas pa yis/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dud pa 'byung / /'od zer dag ni 'bar bar byed/ /dam tshig 'khor lo des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dag bsregs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

longs spyod kyi 'khor lor song ste/ /thabs des lan gsum du skor ba byas nas/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas gnad 'byed pa'i sgo las 'das te/ byung nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa la ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsi blangs te/

spyi bo'i gtsug gser sgo dzA lan d+ha ra zhes bya bar zhugs te/ so'i mtshams kyi bu ga'i nang du song nas longs spyod kyi 'khor lor ngal bsos nas bsregs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /des skra'i rtse mo 'bum

du gshags pa'i cha tsam yang 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa ma mthong ste/ dga' zhing ji ltar bde bar gnas so/ /rang lhag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /thams cad 'di ltar rab tu brtag /bsam pa med la bsam pa ste/ /sems kyang mtshon par bya ba min/ /bsam du med pa'i sgom pa yis/ /

dngos dang dngos min rnam spangs yin/ /sems kyis bsam pa'i sems de ni/ /rnyed pa gang yin gzung bar bya/ /kha T+wAM ga ni lha yi sku/ /Da ma ru sgra shes rab yin/ /nyin mo bcom ldan dpa' bo ste/ /mtshan mo rnal 'byor ma ru bshad/ /dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni/ /phag mo dag gi

gzugs su bstan/ /shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te/ /he ni rgyu tshogs rnam par spangs/ /ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba/ /ka ni gang na'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /rnal 'byor sems ni ngal bsos la/ /mya ngan 'das zhes bstan pa yin/ /rnal 'byor 'pho ba'i dus kyi

tshe/ /he ru ka sogs dpal rnal 'byor/ /lag na me tog sna tshogs bsnams/ /sna tshogs rgyal mtshan ba dan can/ /sna tshogs rol mo sgra sgrogs shing / /sna tshogs glu yis mchod par byed/ /'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su 'khyer/ /mngon

par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i gnas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /ma mo'i bsgom par dbye bar bya/ /gsang sngags kun gyi gnas sbyor ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /thams cad

mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad/ /bde ba chen pos kun la khyab/ /mgon po sangs rgyas kun bdag ste/ /sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /a~M A~M/ iM IM/ u~M U~M/ e~M ai~M/ o~M auM/ a~M AHhU~M/ 'di ni bcom ldan de nyid kyi/ /he ru ka ni dbang phyug mchog /mkha' la dri

med zla ba yi/ /lte ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /r-i~M r-I~M/ l-i~M l-I~M/ mkha' 'gro ma ni pad 'dab bzhugs/ /ka~M kha~M ga~M g+ha~M nga~M / tsa~M tsha~M dza~M dz+ha~M nya~M/ Ta~M Tha~M Da~M D+ha~M Na~M/ ta~M tha~M da~M d+ha~M na~M/ pa~M pha~M ba~M b+ha~M ma~M/ de yi thod pa'i dum sogs dang / /gtum mig ma la sogs kun gyis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ /

dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ya~M ra~M la~M wa~M/ sha~M Sha~M sa~M ha~M/ de yi khwa gdong la sogs dang / /gshin rje sreg sogs kun gyi'o/ /yi ge k+ShaHyi bdag nyid ni/ /bde ba chen po'i shu kra'i gzugs/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas

yin zhing / /kun la khyab cing rtag tu stong / /brjod du med cing phra ba'i dbus/ /'di ni chad med rtag pa'i thugs/ /rang gi gzugs ni mkha' lta bu/ /'di ni bdag nyid bcings pa ste/ /'di ni dgrol la mkhas pa yin/ /'di ni lte ba'i dbus bzhugs shing / /shu kra'i gzugs

kyis bde chen gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo gsum gyi dbus su dgod/ /'di ni gsang ba mchog yin te/ /gang la yang ni bstan mi bya/ /sngar bshad phyag dang phyag mtshan dang / /go cha yang ni de bzhin te/ /sngar bshad bzhin du bkod nas kyang / /

phung po khams dang skye mched dag /dpa' bo'i yan lag rnam dag nyid/ /byang chub phyogs kyang de bzhin te/ /lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis/ /sngar bshad 'khor lo rnam par dgod/ /thams cad dkar ba'i mdog can la/ /'khor lo gsum ni bcu drug go/ /

dpa' bo yang ni so sor dgod/ /rnal 'byor ma yang so sor te/ /rang gi thabs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa yin/ /dpa' bo'i rang gi rig pa dang / /gnyis su med par gnas pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro sogs dang khyi gdong sogs/ /rang gi thabs

dang gnyis med gnas/ /de ni rdo rje snying po'o/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dam pa ste/ /mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa dag /rdo rje snying pos zhus nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dpal he ru ka dang / mkha' 'gro

ma dang / dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgoms pas bskyed pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dang po'i las kyi bsgom pa ste/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog gyur pa/ /cig car du ni bskyed pa dag /rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa yin/ /phyag

gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam sgyur/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /g.yas brkyang ba yis mgo la mnan/ /rgyan drug sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo

bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga bsnams shing / /de ni rdo rje mchog kyang gsor/ /phag mos kyang ni rnam par 'khril/ /de yi mdog dang phyag gis gnas/ /byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud/ /thod pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub kyis/ /

phyogs su bsdigs shing skra grol ba/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa ste/ /phyag rgya lnga ni mnyam par sbyor/ /spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs/ /thams

cad gdan la bzhugs/ /sgom pa mchog gi bsgom pa'o/ /dbus su khrag 'thung rdo rje ni/ /sngo ba'i mdog can bde ba che/ /pad+ma'i dbus su bsgom pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang / /mkha' 'gro

ma yi khyad par ni/ /dpa' bo mdog ni nag po la/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar ba nyid/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni/ /dmar po'i mdog can cher 'bar ba/ /mkha' 'gro'ang de bzhin nag po ste/ /sku mdog gnyis su rnam par bsgom/ /sku yi

'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni/ /zla ba ser skyas legs brgyan pas/ /de la mkha' 'gro ma yang dmar/ /ci 'dod gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /khwa gdong la sogs kun ljang gu/ /gshin rje sreg sogs kun dud ka /de ltar mdog gi bye brag gi/ /sgom pa'i

mchog gis shes par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma thod kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u gar gyis rnam par bzhugs/ /thams cad dbu skra grol ba ste/ /phyogs kyi gos can bzhad pa'i zhal/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams/ /rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud/ /rnal 'byor ma

ni thod rdo rje/ /sdigs mdzub dang ni lhan cig bcas/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams/ /pad+ma dril bus rnam par brgyan/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thod pad+ma/ /sdigs mdzub dang ni lhan cig bcas/ /sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams/ /'khor lo dril bu rab tu 'bar/ /

rnal 'byor ma 'khor sdigs mdzub can/ /thod pa rkang gis gang ba'o/ /khwa gdong la sogs lha mo ni/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /gri gug dang ni sdigs mdzub bcas/ /gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo ni/ /cang te'u mgo bo sdigs mdzub dang / /thod pa'i phreng

ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /skyil krung phyed pas gar dang bcas/ /dpa' bo g.yas brkyang gnas pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi byin pas 'khril/ /gnyis su med par mnyam ldan pa/ /thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba che/ /ye shes 'khor lo mnyam ldan pas/ /bde ba'i

bde ba gcig tu 'gyur/ /chos kyi ro las yang dag 'byung / /rang ming sa bon dang bcas pa/ /phreng ba'i sngags dang mnyam par sbyar/ /gsal byed mnyam par sbyar nas su/ /hUM gnyis phaT dang yang dag sbyar/ /dpa' bo'i gsang sngags yang dag sbyar/ /

rnal 'byor ma yang de bzhin bshad/ /rang gi ming gi sa bon dbus/ /gsal byed dang ni mnyam par ldan/ /hu~M hU~M phaT kyang de bzhin te/ /sngags pas 'di ltar sbyar bar bya/ /dbus su khrag 'thung rdo rje ste/ /gsang sngags 'di ni mkhas pas bzla/ /

o~M shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hrIHha ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M badzra bA rA hi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /dus bzhi dag tu cho ga bzhin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bzlas pa bya/ /

mdun du ba spu'i khung bu las/ /chos dang longs spyod rnam par spro/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bstang par bya/ /'gro ba rigs drug grol nas ni/ /bla med gnas su 'jog par byed/ /sngags pas ji ltar 'dod sbyor ba/ /

rigs lnga rnams kyi dbus su yang / /gang gis rigs gsum dbus khyab pa/ /khams gsum gyi ni bdag po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'dus/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las las dang po pa'i sbyor ba'i

bsgom pa bstan pa ste le'u bcu drug pa'o// //rdo rje snying pos rab bshad pa/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa ste/ /phyag bzhi po yi cho ga yis/ /dbang po bar ma rnam par bsgom/ /cig car skyed pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgom pa dag ni rnam par bsgom/ /

phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnon/ /sku lus mi mgo'i do shal can/ /thod pa'i dbu rgyan mchog can te/ /zla ba phyed pas mdzes pa yin/ /

sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par mtshan/ /phyag rgya drug po drag po'i gzugs/ /sku mdog dkar po 'jigs pa/ sngo zhing ljang gu dmar po ste/ /steng gi zhal gdong rnam par bsgom/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje dril bu cang te'u dang / /rdo rje phag mo mnyam par ldan/ /

lha mo'i ku tsa 'tshir ba ste/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /skra grol dum bu'i ska rags can/ /de phyag zhal dang mdog gis mtshan/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni sngo la ser/ /lA ma ljang dang ser po ste/ /dum skyes ma ni dmar la

ljang / /gzugs can ma ni ser la dmar/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /gri gug mgo ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /cang te'u'i sgra ni du ma sgrogs/ /gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste/ /thod pa dag gis cod pan byas/ /spyan gsum pa la drag po'i zhal/ /rang gi mdog dang phyag de

bzhin/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar can te/ /bdud bzhi zhabs 'og gnon pa dang / /'dod pas lta zhing rtog pa ste/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni/ /sngo dang ser bar rnam par bsgom/ /de bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'ang / /dkar zhing sngo bar rnam par bsgom/ /thod

pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud/ /cang te'u yi ni sna tshogs sgra/ /rdo rje sgra ni yongs su rdzogs/ /thod pa dang ni sdigs mdzub dang / /gri gug dang ni mi thod 'dzin/ /lha mo'i phyag rnams de bzhin te/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /g.yas

brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /'jigs pa chen po bzhin rnam sgyur/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i cod pan byas/ /dpa' bo rdo rjes mtshan ma'o/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo gang / /dmar zhing gnag la 'jigs pa ste/ /pad+ma'i dpa' bos rnam par khyab/ /rang gi phyag mtshan

'dzin pa ste/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ /ljang dang dkar ba'i sku lus can/ /sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo yang / /ser dang ljang ba'i sku lus can/ /'khor los dpa' bo yongs su khyab/ /'khor los sgyur ba'ang ster bar byed/ /'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ /dkar dmar

dang ni yid 'phrog pa/ /rang gi mtshan dang yang dag ldan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /khwa gdong sogs bzhi mkha' 'gro ma/ /sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrog pa'o/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /gri gug mgo bo cang te'u 'dzin/ /gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo ni/ /dud kha

dmar po de bzhin no/ /gshin rje dbyug to gri gug go /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /'khor gyi ma sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /gdan la rnam par bzhugs/ /byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dgyes pa che/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing / /thod pa'i

phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'dzin cing / /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor/ /spyan gsum drag po rnam sgyur ba/ /dpa' bo 'dod pa'i zas la rol/ /chags pa'i ming gis rnam par blta/ /sngar bshad cho ga'i rim pa bzhin/ /gsang sngags rang ming sa bon dang / /

dpa' bo gsang sngags 'di ru bshad/ /mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin te/ /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid ni/ /gsang sngags mchog kyang de bzhin no/ /o~M shrI badzra he he ru ru ka~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ /o~M hrIHha ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ /o~M badzra bA rA hi ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ /o~M badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ thams cad bsgoms

te mthong ba na/ /bdag po dang ni 'khor la sogs/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /legs par dbang bskur gzhug par bya/ /bsgoms pas gcig tu byas nas ni/ /bdud rtsi mchog gis tshim par bya/ /ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo tshogs mchog spros nas ni/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro

mthong ba na/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yis/ /dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa bya/ /'khor sogs dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma/ /'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te/ /don dam bzlas par bshad pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dbang po bar ma'i bsgom pa bstan pa ste le'u bcu bdun pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje snying po'i gsang ba ste/ /gang yang de nyid rim pa dag /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /dbang po rnon po'i bsgom pa bshad/ /skyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dag /sgom pa de yis bsgom par bya/ /thams cad

mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / /lam gyi rnam mkhyen ye shes so/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba/ /bdag nyid he ru kar yang bya/ /mgon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum rnam par bsgyur ba'i zhal/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /'jigs byed

dang ni dus mtshan gyi/ /mgo bo la ni zhabs kyis gnon/ /na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sku lus phyag rgya drug gis btab/ /rdo rje phag mo mnyam par

ldan/ /gnyis su med par sbyor ba yi/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /thod pa yi ni phreng ba ste/ /snying rje'i bde bas rnam par myos/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa/ /'dod pa'i chags

pas bde bar dgyes/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /ral gri dang ni cang te'u 'chang / /tshangs pa'i mgo bos phyag gzhan la/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /de yi sku mdog zhal phyag mtshan/ /'on kyang gri gug 'dzin pa yin/ /gnam mdog ser skya dmar

dang dkar/ /rnam thar gsum dang sku gsum dang / /thams cad 'khor sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mkha' 'gro/ /thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs/ /gdan la brtan

par gnas/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar sngo dmar/ /lA ma ljang khu sngo la dkar/ /dum skyes ma ni dmar dkar sngo/ /gzugs can ma ni ser sngo dmar/ /'di dag ni spyan gsum pa/ gcer bu skra grol ba/ kyi steng

du g.yas brkyang pas bzhugs pa/ thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gri gug dang mgo bo dang cang te'u bsnams pa'o/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams la shar du thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste sngo ba dang dkar

ba dang dmar ba'o/ /byang du keng rus chen po dang gtum mig ma ste dmar ba dang dkar ba dang sngo ba'o/ /nub tu keng rus can dang 'od ldan ma ste dkar ba dang dmar ba dang ljang khu'o/ /lho ru mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste ljang khu dang dkar ba dang dmar

ba'o/ /me'i phyogs su lha dgra dang / dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste dmar ba dang sngo ba dang dkar ba'o/ /bden bral du 'od dpag tu med pa dang / mi'u thung ma ste ser ba dang / sngo ba dang dkar ba'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste sngo ba dang

dkar ba dang dmar ba'o/ /dbang ldan du rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste ljang ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'o/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su myu gu can dang sa srung ma ste/ dmar ba dang sngo ba dang dkar ba'o/ /byang phyogs su rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed

chen mo ste sngo ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'o/ /nub tu dpa' bo chen po dang rlung gi shugs can ma ste ljang ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'o/ /lho ru rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang chang 'thung ma ste ser ba dang sngo ba dang dmar ba'o/ /me'i phyogs su rab bzang dang / sngo sangs lha mo ste ljang

ba dang ser ba dang dmar ba'o/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang ma ste sngo ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste dmar ba dang sngo ba dang ser ba'o/ /dbang ldan du mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma ste dkar ba dang sngo ba dang

ljang gu'o/ /sku'i 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste dkar po dang / sngon po dang ser po'o/ /byang phyogs su rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma ste ser ba dang / sngo ba dang ljang gu'o/ /nub phyogs su rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma ste dmar ba

dang sngo ba dang dkar ba'o/ /lho phyogs su nam mkha'i snying po dang 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste sngo ba dang dmar ba dang ljang gu'o/ /me'i phyogs su khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo ste ljang gu dang ser po dang dmar po'o/ /bden bral du pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen

mo ste dkar ba dang sngo ba dang ljang gu'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor los sgyur ma ste ljang ba dang / dmar ba dang ser ba'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo ste nam mkha'i mdog can sngo sangs dang ser ba dang ljang gu'o/ /

shar phyogs kyi sgor khwa gdong ma ste sngo ba dang ser ba dang dmar ba'o/ /byang du 'ug gdong ma ste ljang gu dang / dmar ba dang dkar ba'o/ /nub tu khyi gdong ma ste ser ba dang sngo ba dang ljang gu'o/ /lho ru phag gdong ma ste dmar ba dang sngo ba dang ljang gu'o/ /me'i phyogs su gshin rje

sreg ma ste dkar ba dang sngo ba dang ljang gu'o/ /bden bral du gshin rje pho nya ma ste sngo ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su gshin rje mche ba ma ste dud kha dang dmar ba dang / dkar ba'o/ /dbang ldan du gshin rje 'joms ma ste dmar ba dang sngo ba dang dkar ba'o/ /

thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dang / rab gtum ma la sogs pa rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan pa ral gri dang / cang te'u dang / mgo bo dang thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ pad+ma pad+ma'i dril bu dang / /'khor lo 'khor lo'i dril bu ste/ /sku gsung dag ni gnyis po yang / /thugs

kyi 'khor lo ji lta ba'o/ /lha mo cang te'u ral gri dang / /gri gug yang ni de bzhin te/ khwa gdong la sogs pa ni ral gri dang / cang te'u dang gri gug dang thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bo dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa ni thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga dang ral

gri dang lcags kyu dang / cang te'u dang dril bu dang mgo bo 'dzin pa'o/ /de thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ na ra'i pags pa mnabs pa/ dpa' bo rnams ni g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ rang gi rigs kyi

cod pan can/ kyi steng na bzhugs pa/ rnal 'byor ma'i byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril ba/ gcer bu skra grol ba/ dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ khwa gdong ma la sogs pa dang / gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni gcer bu skra grol

ba/ kyi steng du g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ gsus pa rlo ba/ skye gnas ring ba/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ thugs rje'i chags pa'i ros rnam par myos

pa/ 'jigs pa'i g.yo bas 'jigs su rung ba/ 'di ltar ma lus bsgoms nas ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba na/ /ye shes chu sogs arga dang / /dam tshig mchog gis mchod par bya/ /mthong ma thag tu dbang yang bskur/ /mchod nas thim par byas nas

ni/ /ye shes bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /btab nas 'thor 'thung rab tu bya/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub thob pa yin/ /dam tshig 'khor lo bzlas byas nas/ /'chi med ye shes lnga lhan cig /gsang sngags khro bo'i tshig gis bzla/ /

bde ba'i dngos grub ster bar mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad bya/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga bzhin/ /rnal 'byor bzlas pa don chen ster/ /rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dpa'/ /mngon sum du ni mchog kyang stsol/ /

o~M shrI badzra a he he ru ru kaM hu~M hU~M phaT/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM aHhU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M hrIHha ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M sarba bud d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra war+NaN nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ dpal khrag 'thung dang / phag mo'i

snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M DA ki nI DA~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M lA me lA~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M khaN+Da ro he NI ye rU~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ka ra ka ra ka~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pra tsaN+De hu~M hU~M phaT/ /o~M ku ru ku ru ma~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsaN DA k+Shi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha kaM hu~M hU~M

phaT/ o~M pra b+ha ba ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M trA sa ya trA sa ya ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA nA se hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya su~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bI ra ma ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hrauM hrauM AM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M khar ba ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hraHhraHba~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M lang+kai shwa ri hu~M hU~M phaT/

o~M pheM pheM ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M dru mats+tshA ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M phaT phaT a~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ai rA ba ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M da ha da ha ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA b+hai ra ba hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pa tsa pa tsa ma~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bA yu be ge hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M b+ha k+Sha b+ha k+Sha baM ba sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba laM ba ni hu~M hU~M phaT/

o~M su ra b+ha k+Shi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na suM sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarbaM bA tardzadza ya tardzadza hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sh+yA ma de bi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su b+ha dre hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hriM hriM ma~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ha ya kar+NeN hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M dz+NauM dz+NauM ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kha gA na

hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM sa~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsakra be ge hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hAM hAM tra~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hIM hIM ha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shauN+Di ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hU~M hU~M ha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsakra wa rmi Ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ki li ki li heM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su bI re hu~M hU~M phaT/

oM si li si li ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA ba le hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hi li hi li ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsakra warti ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M d+hi li d+hi li ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA bI r+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kA kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M u lU kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shwA nA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sU ka rA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/

o~M ya ma dA D+hi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma dU ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma daMSh+Ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma ma tha ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /bzlas dang bsgom pa byas nas ni/ /ye shes bdud rtsi bsgom byas nas/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor bas gnas/ /mngon par

brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dbang po rnon po'i sgom pa rjes su bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// //rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa/ de nas mchog gi dam pa bshad/ /mnyam par sbyor ba'i sdom pa dag /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /

mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa mchog /cig car 'jug pa mthong nas su/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms nas spro/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /he ru kar ni bdag nyid byas/ /ser dang sngo dang ljang gu ste/ /steng ni dkar po zhi ba'o/ /dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan can/ /

spyan gsum thugs rje drag po ste/ /phag mo yis ni rnam par brgyan/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi/ /mgo la g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs/ /drag po gdul dka' gdul mdzad cing / /bgegs rnams thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/ /zla ba phyed dang

ral pa 'chang / /sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par gnon/ /sku la phyag rgya drug gis mtshan/ /phyag rgya sdom pa mchog yin te/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje phag mo dmar mo ste/ /gcer bu skra ni grol ba yin/ /de yi

sku dang zhal dang mtshan/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /mchu dang mchu ni pi di dam/ /g.yer kha yi ni sku rags can/ /rigs kyi dga' bas rnam par myos/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /phag mo yi ni ku tsa 'dzin/ /

thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'dzin/ /tshangs pa'i pags pa brkyang nas ni/ /mgo bo'i steng du phyag gis 'dzin/ /cang te'u'i sgra ni snyan pa dag /chos kyi sgras ni rab tu 'gengs/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyi thad du ni/ /mkha' 'gro bzhi

po rnam par bsgom/ /g.yas phyogs mkha' 'gro ma lA ma/ /byang du dum skyes gzugs can ma/ /sngo dang ngur smrig dkar la ser/ /spyan gsum rnam bsgyur drag po dang / /dkar sngon ljang dmar ngur smrig ste/ /de ni rab tu cher 'bar ba'o/ /g.yas pa'i phyogs su

bsgoms nas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /g.yon phyogs dmar dang sngo dang ljang / /dkar po steng gi zhal de bzhin/ /ljang dang dmar po ser po ste/ /steng gi sngon po bde ba'ang de/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog

'chang ba dang / /skra grol ba ni 'jigs pa ste/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og gnon/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje mdung ni phyag na bsnams/ /na ra'i pags pa gos

su mnabs/ /dril bu cang te'u de bzhin te/ /mgo bo'i gri gug phyag na bsnams/ /g.yer kha'i ska rags sgra sgrogs pa/ /rkang rgyan ru lu ru lu'i sgra/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs te/ /gdan gcig la ni rnam par

bzhugs/ /snying la dam tshig ye shes ni/ /de mdog phyag dang phyag mtshan te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka/ /mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can/ /thams cad de ltar bsgoms nas ni/ /mtshan dang dpe byad dang bcas pa/ /ye shes gcig tu byas nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro

ma yi sdom pa bzla/ o~M AHshrI badzra he he ru ru kaM DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ /o~M hrIHha ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M AHbadzra bA rA hi h+ye baM/ DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ /o~M badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ dpal khrag 'thung dang phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /

o~M badzra DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra lA me hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra rU pi Ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /bzlas pa dang ni bsgom pa bya/ /dus bzhi'i rjes 'brang rim pa yis/ /dam tshig sdom pa gnyis med pa/ /mar me lnga yang bza'

bar bya/ /rtag tu dur khrod nang du bsgom/ /nub bdun du ni sbyor ba yis/ /mi snang dngos grub nges par 'grub/ /mthong bar byed par yang kun 'gro/ /sna tshogs gzugs can bde ba che/ /bza' ba rnams ni bza' bya zhing / /skom gyi btung ba'ang de bzhin te/ /

phyogs kyi gos can gang gis ni/ /myos shing myos pa lta bur gnas/ /grib ma yang ni med pa ru/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod/ /ma hA ru d+hi ra bcas pa'i/ /dri chen chu ni mnyam ldan pas/ /mAM sa sna tshogs du ma dag /rtse gcig pa yi bza' ba bza'/ /nang

gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /rtag tu zhen pas 'gro bar bya/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba'i bdag /ye shes mig gis mthong ba yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i sbyor ba'i sdom pa'i cho ga ste le'u bcu dgu pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /cho ga bzang po bzhin du ni/ /zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug /yang na zhal ni bcu gnyis te/ /phyag ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /yang na sna tshogs phyugs kyi zhal/ /phyag ni brgya dang ldan par bya/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /

byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang gzungs dang ni/ /pha rol phyin pa'ang de bzhin te/ /phan tshun bye brag can gyi zhal/ /mdog gi bye brag sna tshogs dang / /phyag ni stong dang 'bum gyi bar/ /sna tshogs phyag mtshan 'dzin pa dang / /sna

tshogs pa yi zhal ldan pa/ /sna tshogs pa yi gar mdzad cing / /g.yas brkyang ba yi g.yengs pas bzhugs/ /'jigs byed chen po dang / dus mtshan la sogs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang dang / drag po dang / khyab 'jug dang / kun 'gyed

gzhon nu dang / kArti ka dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / sna tshogs pa'i bdud dang / bgegs thams cad kha sbub tu zhabs kyis mnan par rnam par bltas te/ 'jigs su rung

ba/ bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba/ drag po mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ bzhad pa/ mi sdug pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa/ dpa' ba/ sgeg pa/ rngam pa/ smin ma rnam par g.yo ba/ snyems pa/ zhi ba/ g.yo ba/ mig g.yo ba/ zhal rnam par gdangs pa/ rnam par

rol pa/ ljags rnam par skyod pa/ sna tshogs pa'i nyams kyis mchog ster bar mdzad pa'o/ /thod pa'i phreng ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' spyi gtsug brgyan/ /spyan gsum stag gi

pags pa mnabs/ /mgo rlon phreng bas sku lus brgyan/ /phyag rgya drug po sku la rdzogs/ /phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spud mdzad pa'o/ /sku la phag mos 'khril mdzad cing / /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /dum

bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub thod pas 'khyud/ /byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud/ /dga' bas khyab cing rnam par myos/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan/ /lha mo'i ku tsa 'tshir ba dang / /thod pa

dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /glang po'i pags pa brkyang ba ste/ /lcags kyu zhags pa dgra sta dang / /mdung rtse gsum pa mgo bo nyid/ /cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang / /mda' dang gzhu yang de bzhin te/ /thod pa'i dbyug to mdung thung dang / /sdigs mdzub dang ni gtun shing dang / /

'khor lo ral gri rin chen dang / /pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /dbyug to yu ba rdo rje can/ /ga da mdung dang pa ti sa/ /gshin rje dbyug to chu gri dang / /dung dang rwa dung pa Ta ha/ /pi wang gling bu rdza rnga che/ /rdza rnga mtshon cha phyag mtshan bsnams/ /rtse mo rno bar bltas nas su/ /

sna tshogs phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'byung / /ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs de bzhin te/ /cho ga sna tshogs de bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'khor rnams dang / /dpa' bo dag ni thams cad dang / /rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs dag /mdog ni mtha'

yas sna tshogs mdog /phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin pa yin/ /phyogs kyi gos 'chang skra grol zhing / /sna tshogs nyams kyi bde ba can/ /'jigs rung drag po ha ha bzhad/ /sna tshogs gar gyis longs spyod cing / /glu dang rol mo nyams de bzhin/ /sna tshogs

dam tshig zas rnams dang / /me tog sna tshogs yid 'ong ba/ /dri dang bdug pa de bzhin gos/ /mar me phreng ba yid 'ong ba/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i mchod pa rnams/ /mdog ni sna tshogs mchog dam pa/ /'di ltar sngags pas bsgoms nas ni/ /rnal 'byor

mchog gis rdzogs byas nas/ /der ni phreng ba sngags kyang bzlas/ /yi ge nyi shu gnyis bsres nas/ /lha mo rdo rje phag mo ni/ /'di ltar de bzhin bsgom par bya/ /zhal gdong sna tshogs legs mdzes pa/ /phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/ /phyogs kyi

gos can skra grol ba/ /byang chub pha rol phyin pa ste/ /sa 'dzin thams cad de bzhin no/ /'di ltar cho ga byas nas ni/ /phreng bas gsang sngags bzla bar bya/ /o~M shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha

ya/ hrauM hrauM/ hraHhraHpheM pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+ha k+Sha b+ha k+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi ra/ an+t+ra mA lA ba laM bi ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaMg sarba ma pA tar+dz+dza ya tardzadza ya/ A kaD+h+ya A kaD+h+ya/ hrIM hrIM/ dz+NauM dz+NauM/ k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM/ hAM hAM/ hIM hIM/ hU~M hU~M/ ki li ki li/ si

li si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di ni snying po mchog yin te/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ /dpa' bos sa bon rang ming dang / /rnal 'byor mos pas rtag bzlas na/ /ma lus lus pa med

'grub cing / 'gro ba'i gnas su 'gro bar byed/ /dus ni de ma thag tu yang / /sdom pa mchog ni grub pa yin/ /rdo rje phag mo'i gsang sngags 'di/ /'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad stsol/ o~M badzra bA rA hi pro tang+ge pro tang+ge/ ha na ha na/ pra NA na/ king+ki Ni/ khing+khi

Ni d+hu na d+hu na/ badzra haste/ sho Sha ya/ sho Sha ya/ badzra ka pA la/ kha T+wAd+ga d+hA ri Ni/ ma hA pi sha te/ mA na sA sha ni/ mA nu Sha an+t+ra prA br-it+te/ sAn+ni d+h+ya na ra shi ro mA lA gran thi ta d+hA ri Ni/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+he/ ha na ha na prA NAn/ sarba pA pa satwA nAM/ sarba pa shU nAM/ ma hA mAM sats+tshe da

nI/ kro d+ha mUrte daMSh+TA ka rA li ni ma hA mu dre/ shrI he ru ka de ba s+ya/ a gra ma hi Shi/ sa ha sra shi re/ sa ha sra bA ha be/ sha ta sa ha sra A na ne/ dz+wa li ta te dza se/ dz+wa la mu khe/ piM ga la lo tsa ne badzra sha rI re badzra A sa ne/ mi li mi li/ ti mi li ti mi li he he ha ha hU~M hU~M kha kha/

d+hu d+hu ru ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ a dwai te/ ma hA yo gi ni pa Thi ta sid+d+he/ dreM d+haM dreM d+haM/ graM graM he he ha ha b+hI me ha sa ha sa/ bI re/ hA hA ho ho hU~M hU~M trai lo kya bi nA shA ni/ sha ta sa ha sra ko Ti ta thA ga ta pa ri bA ri te hU~M hU~M phaT/ siM ha ru pe khaHga dza rU pe gaHtrai

lo kyo da re/ sa mu dra me kha le/ gra sa gra sa hU~M hU~M phaT/ bI rA dwai te hu~M hU~M hAHhA/ ma hA pa shU mo ha ni/ ma hA yo gI shwa ri twaM/ DA ki nI sarba lo kA nAM/ ban+d+ha nI/ sad+yaHprat+ya ya kI ra Ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ b+hU ta trA sa ni/ ma hA bI re pa ra ma sid+d+he yo gI shwa ri phaT/ hu~M hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/

rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /'di ni rdo rje phag mo mchog /snying po mchog tu grub pa yin/ /gang gis bzlas dang bsgom pa yis/ /de yis las rnams kun 'grub ste/ the tsom med par mdo la 'grub/ /bdag nyid gnas su mchod pa ste/ /phyi rol nam yang

ma yin no/ /grub pa'i khrag 'thung de nyid kyi/ /gsang sngags rtsa ba brgyad ldan pa/ o~M na mo b+ha ga wa te bI re shA ya huM hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA kalpa ag ni san+ni b+hA ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M dza Ta mu ku To da ka TA ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M daMSh+TA ka rA lo grab+hI Sha na mu khA ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sa ha

sra b+hu dza b+hA su rA ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pa ra shu pa sho d+ya ta shU la kha T+wA~M ga d+hA ri Ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M byA g+h+ra dzi na aM ba ra d+ha rA ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA d+hU mrAn+d+ha kA ra wa pu ShA ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ 'di ni khrag 'thung gsang sngags te/ bdag nyid bsgom zhing mchod par bya/ o~M na mo b+ha ga wa ti

badzra bA rA hi baM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M Ar+ya a pa rA dzi te trai lo gya mA te ma hA bi d+ye shwa ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sarba b+hU ta b+ha yA ba he ma hA badzre hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzrA sa ne a dzi te a pa rA dzi te wa sh+yaM ka ri ne tra b+h+rA ma Ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sho Sha Ni ro Sha Ni kro d+ha ni ka rA li ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M trA sa ni mA ra

Ni su pra b+he da ni pa rA dza ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bi dza ye dzaM b+ha ni staM b+ha ni mo ha ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra bA rA hi ma hA yo gi ni kA me shwa ri kha ge hu~M hU~M phaT na maHni thams cad du bya'o/ /gsang sngags 'di yis las kun bya/ /A li kA li rdo rje ni/ /phag mo bdag nyid bsgoms byas

nas/ /rtsa ba brgyad kyi sngags ldan pas/ /bdag nyid kyang ni mchod par bya/ /zhal bzhi byin brlabs byas nas su/ o~M sum+b+ha ni sum+b+has mchod/ /yang na zhal bzhi kun rdo rje/ /de yi lte bar he ru dpal/ /bdag nyid bsgom pa byas nas ni/ /'khor dang

bcas pa'ang de bzhin bsgom/ /ba sha la sogs bza' zhing bsgrub/ /bde gshegs bstan la 'gro ba gdug /skye ba can ni bshar grags/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog dang / /mtshams med pa ni byed pa dang / /gang zhig slob dpon smod pa dang / /theg pa chen po smod pa dang / /

phyugs de rnams ni bsad nas kyang / /rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'/ /phyugs de rnams ni dgug pa yang / /sgrub pos sngon du bskyed pas bya/ /phyugs bdun dang ni de bzhin phyugs/ /bong bu mi dang ru sbal dang / /khyi dang rnga mo

ce sbyang rta/ /phyugs kyi mar me 'di rnams ni/ /grub pa'i dbye ba'i yan lag grags/ /rigs kyi kha dog dbye ba'i phyugs/ /rkang bzhi rnam la glang po che/ /bya rnams las ni dang sgyur te/ /dud 'gro rnams las mchu g.yo ba'i/ /lha rnams kha ru lta bshos

te/ /'di ni phyugs kyi brtag par bshad/ /grub pa'i sgrub pa rnam bshad/ /bya rog bya skya ce spyang dang / /skye gnyis dang sngags chen po dang / /khrung khrung bzhad dang kang bu ka/ /bzang dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya/ /dngos grub 'dod pas bsgom bya ba/ /khyi mo

nag mo'i 'o ma dang / /sran ma nag po 'bras dang ldan/ /ro yi khar ni sbyin sreg bya//sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad par bya/ /de nas ro de langs nas su/ /ci bgyi zhes ni smrar 'gyur zhing / /sa 'og 'gro ba'am ral gri'am/ /tshar gcod phan 'dogs nyid dang ni/ /ri lu mig

sman gser rnams sam/ /rkang mgyogs dag gam bcud kyis len/ /gcig cig sbyin par byas nas ni/ /'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /steng dang 'og tu pho nya 'grub/ /rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rnal

'byor gyi sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /srung dang phyir zlog rim pa ni/ /rgyud gzhan las ni sbas pa yi/ /srung ba'i mchog ni rnyed dka' ba/ /rgyud 'dir rab tu bshad par bya/ /nges brjod rgyud

ni bla ma'i bla/ /the tshom za bar mi bya ste/ /sems can rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /pad+ma'i lte bar ge sar can/ /de rgyab sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /gnod mdzes gsang sngags yang dag sbyar/ /de yi phyi rol ska rags bya/ /'dab ma bcu

drug bri bar bya/ /der ni cha rnams rnam bkod de/ /de yis phyi rol yongs su bskor/ /mkhas pas lte bar bri ba ni/ /rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa/ /de yi lte bar dgod pa ni/ /hU~M ni 'jigs pa rnam 'jigs pa/ hU~M gi lte bar yi ge ba~M/ /ba~M gyi lte bar yi ge gsum/ /bsgrub

bya'i ming dang spel zhing bri/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni bzhi po dag /de yi g.yon nas dgod bskor ba/ DA~M la~M kha~M rU~M de ru dgod/ /r-i r-I l-i l-I lhan cig tu/ /mkha' 'gro dgod cing ming dang ni/ /rnam par spel zhing bri bar bya/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rim ci bzhin/ /mkhas

pas 'dab mar dgod bya ba/ /kha~M pra~M shar gyi 'dab ma la/ /byang du ka~M tsa~M nyid yin te/ /nub tu ka~M pa~M kho na'o/ /lho ru ba~M ma~M nyid yin no/ /me sogs dbang ldan phyogs rnams su/ /su~M ba~M i~M kha~M ba~M la~M hra~M/ /'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /yi ge hU~M dang spel nas su/ /sa bon

dag ni bri bar bya/ /ka~M kha~M ga~M g+ha~M nga~M / tsa~M tsha~M dza~M/ 'di dag ni pad+ma'i ska rags su bri'o/ /rdo rje cha ni bcu gnyis pa/ /bskor la bin dus rnam par brgyan/ /'dab ma'i phyi rol bcu drug tu/ /'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bri/ /de 'dir shar phyogs lha sogs pa/ /g.yon nas

bskor zhing dgod par bya/ /mkha' 'gro dang ni dpa' bo'o/ /A~M A ba~M ma~M ba~M ma~M pa~M su~M su~M shA~M ba~M su~M mu~M ha~M bi~M kha~M/ ma~M tsa~M ra~M kha~M ha~M sa~M a~M tsi~M ha~M su~M pa~M ma~M baiM tsa~M ba~M ma~M/ 'di ni hri dang spel nas su/ /o~M dang spel zhing bri bar bya/ /bsgrub pa'i ming ni nang du bya/ /ji lta'i las kyi rjes

'brang bri/ /dz+ha~M nya~M Ta~M Tha~M Da~M D+ha~M Na~M/ ta~M tha~M da~M d+ha~M na~M/ pa~M pha~M ba~M b+ha~M ma~M/ phyi rol du ska rags bri'o/ /'khor lo'i phyi rol gru bzhi pa'i/ /nang du sgo ni 'brel bar bri/ /ji ltar/ /khwa gdong la sogs rim pa'i bar/ /gshin rje 'joms sogs sa bon dgod/ /ka~M a~M

swA~M sU~M ya~M ya~M ya~M ya~M/ ya~M ra~M la~M wa~M sha~M Sha~M sa~M ha~M sbyar zhing / /hU~M hU~M phaT dang rnam par spel/ /ming dang yang ni spel bar bya/ /sgo yi steng du rtse bzhi pa'i/ /rdo rje phyed pa bri bar bya/ /zur rnams su ni nyi zla dang / /rdo rje phyed pa bri bar bya/ /de steng rkang brgyad kyis brjod

pa'i/ /khro bo brgyad pa'i zhal du blta/ /phyi rol ska rags dbus dag tu/ /phyir zlog 'di dag bri bar bya/ /na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA gtsit+ta badzra he ru kA nAM/ o~M hU~M badzra he ru ka tsakra wa rti sarba lo ki ka lo kod ta rA Ni/ yan+t+ra man+t+ra tan+t+ra tsUr+NaN pra yo gA dI ni ye na ke na tsid kri tA ni sarbA

Ni A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/ tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ b+ha k+Sha ya b+ha k+Sha ya/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM/ dz+nauM dz+NauM/ ma tha ma tha/ bid+h+wan sa ya bid+h+wan ya/ sha ta sa ha sra d+ha tsUr+NaN ya/ o~M phaT/ badzra he ru koSh+NI Sha tsakra bar+t+ti ta s+ye ba mu khaM tsak+Shur

ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hU~M hU~M/ a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru hU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M swA hA/ 'di yis yongs su bskor byas nas/ /k+Sha yi lto ba'i dbus su dgod/ /yi ge k+Sha yi phyi rol du/ /thA yis yongs su bskor byas nas/ /dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid kyis yongs bskor/ /he ru kar bdag

bsgoms byas nas/ /yi ge bdun pa'i sngags kyang bzla/ /o~M hrIHha ha a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru shAn+tiM ku ru/ hU~M hU~M pA paM phaT/ rigs ngan yang na bram ze'am/ /rgyal po'i bu mo'i khyad par du/ /rang byung me tog blangs nas su/ /glang chen me tog dang

bsres dang / /byang chub sems ni mnyam ldan pa/ /ro tsa na dang lhan cig sbyar/ /pad+ma rdo rje chu de bzhin/ /mig sman chen po dang bsres nas/ /lha mchog 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par bskor/ /mi yi pags pa'am gro ga'am/ /yang na

gos kyang rung / /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /mar dang 'o ma blangs nas su/ /gsang sngags rkang pa brgyad ni brjod/ /de bzhin brtul zhugs can gyis mchod/ /gser ram dngul gyi bum pa dag /ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chus/ /gang

ba'i dbus su bcug nas su/ /'khor lo srad bu dkar pos dkri/ /phreng ba'i gsang sngags de la bzla/ /de nas dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ nad yod pa ni nad med byed/ /nad med pa yang nad du byed/ /myos byed chang gi dbus su ni/ /mkhas pas de la bcug

nas ni/ /nad med nad du byed pa ste/ /ji lta'i las kyi rjes su 'brang / /gang yang rung ba'i las rnams la/ /phreng ba'i sngags kyis rnam par bskor/ /rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /mgo bo'i nang du sbas byas na/ /mkha' 'gros de la byin rlabs ni/ /gdon

mi za bar byed par 'gyur/ /ci 'dod thams cad 'grub 'gyur te/ /bgegs med par ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las srung ba'i phyir zlog gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas de yi bsgom pa bshad/ /sems

can kun la phan 'dogs pa'i/ /skad cig gis ni bdag nyid dag /lha mo phyir bzlog rim pa ste/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bcu drug/ /gdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /bgegs ni pad+ma'i 'og mnan nas/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor dbus na gnas/ /dkar zhing sngo la dmar dang ser/ /steng gi zhal gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /na bza' dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /'chi ba yang dag 'tsho ba'i mchog /

spyan gsum pa la 'jam pa'i ngag /gzhan ni gdug cing gtum pa la/ /sdigs mdzub rdo rje gsor mdzad cing / /dril bu zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /rdo rje ral gri mdung dang ni/ /dgra sta thod pa lcags kyu dang / /gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /mda' ni

dam par 'gengs par byed/ /tho ba 'khor lo mi 'jigs pa/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'o/ /yang na 'di la zhal brgyad pa/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i ngos dag tu/ /g.yas pa sngo zhing dmar la ser/ /drag shul ha har bzhad pa'o/ /g.yon pa

ljang zhing dmar ba dang / /dud kha dag gi mdog can yin/ /steng ni mdzes shing zhi ba ste/ /sku lus zla ba'i mdog can no/ /de yi thugs kar 'khor lo ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /dad pas shin tu mnyam bzhag ste/ /'chi ba 'tsho ba'i rig

sngags bzla/ /o~M a mr-i ta su mu khe dzI baM/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba baMdzra pad+ma sa ma yo ge ma hA bo d+hi tsid+ta bi sbA pi ta mUr te hu~M hU~M/ a A/ aM aHhe swA hA/ 'di ni khri tsam bzlas byas pas/ /'chi ba thams cad 'tsho bar byed/ /dus

min 'chi ba zhi 'gyur zhing / /'chi ba las ni nges par slong / /gzhan du rnal 'byor ma dgyes nas/ /rmad du byung bar mdzad pa ni/ /so so nas ni gar mdzad cing / /hi hi dag gis dga' ba dang / /ho ho dag gis dgyes pa dang / /he he dag gis tshig tu smra/ /
