hU~M hU~M dag gis rdzogs pa'o/ /hU~M hU~M dag ni bsam gtan no/ /phaT phaT dag gis gsod pa dang / /hU~M hU~M phaT kyis phur bu'o/ /dzaHdzaHdag gis legs par drongs/ /sa sa dag ni bden par byed/ /nges par legs so zhes pa'i sgra'o/ hU~M baM dag ni gsod pa'o/ /hU~M

bruM hU~M hU~M hU~M dag ni thal bar rlog pa'o/ /ha ha dag gis gsal bar byed pa'o/ /b+huM b+huM dag ni gzi byin byed/ hriM hriM dag gis legs par drongs/ /t+r+yaM t+r+yaM dag ni mchod pa'o/ /saM saM dag gis dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras bu ster ba'o/ /hi hi dag ni rmongs ba'o/ /

laM laM dag ni shis pa'o/ /di di dag ni 'dzin pa'o/ /dziM dziM dag ni legs par drongs/ /hU~M hU~M dag ni 'khor ba'o/ /hri hri dag ni gsod pa'o/ /dzaM dzaM dag ni rmugs par mdzad pa'o/ /ho ho mdzad pa rjes su chags par bya'o/ /haM haM dag ni srung ba'o/ /ho ho dag ni dgyes

pa'o/ /TaM TaM dag ni gdug pa'o/ /gUM gUM dag ni me tog go/ /gaM gaM ni dri'o/ /raM raM ni gsang ba'o/ /'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /zhi ba la sogs cho ga yi/ /rim pa 'di la rjes su gnas/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las 'chi

ba slong bar byed pa'i las thams cad byed pa sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan gsang bshad bya ba/ /sngags kyi de nyid cho ga'i rim/ /rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste/ /gsang ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad/ /rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba

mchog /rnal 'byor ma yi brgyud pa'i rim/ /gsang zhing gsang la mchog tu gsang / /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsam gtan bsgom pa'i mchog yin te/ /bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas/ /mkha' 'gro mas ni yongs su khyab/ /sku lus dmar po

'jigs pa che/ /ye shes lnga las nges byung ba/ /dmar zhing sngo la ljang ba dang / /ser zhing zhi la steng zhal dkar/ /spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu gnyis/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /'jigs byed che dang dus mtshan dag /skyabs su 'ongs nas

zhabs 'og gnon/ /phyag rgya drug dang zla ba phyed/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang / /glang po'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /ral gri mdung ni 'jigs pa'i mchog /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i

mchog /cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /de mdun rdo rje phag mo ni/ /de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog /

cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pa/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /k+ShaHyi ye shes las byung ba/ /de yi sku dang zhal phyag mtshan/ /zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /bcu gnyis cha las nges 'byung ba/ /dam tshig sems dpa' bde ba che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nges 'byung ba/ /sngags kyi rgyud ni 'di ru bzla/ /o~M shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM/ a A/ i I/ u U/

e ai/ o au/ aM aH/ DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M a A aM aHhu~M hU~M phaT/ /o~M a A aM aHhuM hU~M phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M badzra wA rA hi/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH/ hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M badzra bai ro tsa nI ye/ a A/ aM aH/ hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ lha mo'i snying

bo dang nye ba'i snying po'o/ /o~M DA ki ni riM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M lA me r-IM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M khaN+Da ro he l-iM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rU pi Ni l-IM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M khaN+Da ka pA la kaM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pra~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kang kA la khaM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsa~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA kang kA la ga~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pra~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bi kaT da~MSh+Ti g+ha~M

hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su ra bai ri ni nga~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M biM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M a mi tA p+ha tsa~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra pra b+ha tsha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M la~Mhu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra de ha dza~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hU~M hU~M hra~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M a~M ku ri ka dz+ha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M aiM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra dzA Ti la nya~M hu~M

hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA bi ra Ta~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra hU~M kA ra Tha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su b+ha dra Da~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sh+ya~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra b+ha dra D+ha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra ba Na~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M haM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bi rU pA k+Shi ta~M

hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma hA ba la tha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsaM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rat+na badzra da~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ha ya grI ba d+ha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M A kA sha gar+b+ha na~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsaM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M he ru ka pa~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su~M hu~M hU~M phaT/

o~M pad+ma na rte shwa ra pha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bai ro tsa na ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsaM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra satra b+ha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ra~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M la~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M la~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M wa~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M Sha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hu~M hU~M phaT/

saM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M haM hu~M hU~M phaT/ 'di dag ni dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor gyi snying po'i gsang sngags gsang ba'i mchog tu gyur pa de nyid sbas pa 'khor lo gsum gyi yin te/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni sngon po ste/ /

rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /'jigs byed chen po bzhin rnam bsgyur/ /zhe sdang gis khyab bde chen po/ /gsung gi 'khor lo dpa' bo dkar/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dmar po ste/ /pad+ma dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /'dod chags gis khyab bde chen po/ /sku yi 'khor lo'i

dpa' bo ser/ /mkha' 'gro ma dkar me yi mdog /gti mug gis khyab bde ba che/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha mo rnams/ /sna tshogs mdog can snod chen po'o/ /khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams/ /dmar ser dkar la ljang khu'o/ /gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo

rnams/ /sngo zhing ser la ljang ba dang / /de bzhin dkar ba'i mdog can no/ /'khor la sogs pa thams cad kun/ /spyan gsum g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /dpa' bo stag gi pags mnabs shing / /lha mo thams cad gcer bu ste/ /skra grol ba ni rnam

par mdzes/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin cing / /dpa' bo dang ni lha mo rnams/ /thod pa rdo rje pad+ma dang / /'khor lo

yang ni de bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs khwa gdong dang / /gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /me long dri dang ro dang reg /gos mchog yid du 'ong ba dang / /cang te'u dang ni dril bu 'dzin/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni thod pa dang / /kha

T+wA~M g.yang 'dzin mdzad cing / /dril bu cang te'u gri gug bsnams/ /khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams/ /phyag mtshan 'di yis rab tu brtag /thams cad gdan la bzhugs/ /phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /thugs kyi 'khor lo drag po ste/ /

gsung gi 'khor lo bskyod pa'i zhal/ /sku yi 'khor lo zhi ba ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni bzhin rnam bsgyur/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsgoms nas ni/ /dbus kyi gtso bor rnam par brtag /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /khro bo sna tshogs du ma'am/ /kha

cig de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ /ma mo rigs kyi khyad par dang / /'od zer can nam skul byed ma/ /shes rab pha rol phyin de bzhin/ /gang dang gang dag sgom pa yi/ /yid kyi dbang po sbyor ba dag /de yis dregs par byas pa ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs

can rin chen bzhin/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'gro bar gnas/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad/ /bde ba chen pos kun khyab yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i dam tshig

gi de kho na nyid kyi sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro'i rigs kyi cho ga'i rim/ /sna tshogs du ma'i rigs su bshad/ /mdor bsdus na ni gsum dang lnga/ /drug tu yang ni rab tu grags/ /

rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bla ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma 'khor la sogs kun/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /rigs las yang dag 'byung ba yin/ /sku kun so sor 'byung ba ste/ /gzhan du thams cad ma mo'i rigs/ /dga' zhing dgyes la yid 'ong ba/ /yid las

skye zhing 'byung ba yin/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i rigs kyi bdag pos de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i sa bon 'di bshad cing bstan pa/ hU~M bru~M A~M hrIM khA~M bA~M/ de nas sngags chen bshad pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sras po rnams/ /rab tu g.yo zhing brgyal nas

kyang / /rdo rje'i ye shes rjes su dran/ /mi 'khrugs pa dang rtag pa'i rigs/ /rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te/ /'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas sku lus kyang / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab tu grags/ /thog mar rdo rje mkha' 'gro

ste/ /gnyis pa sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin/ /gsum pa rin chen mkha' 'gro ste/ /bzhi pa pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro yin/ /lnga pa sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste/ drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /lnga po he ru kar shes bya/ /rdo rje dpa' bo yang de nyid/ /

nam mkha'i zas kyis longs spyod cing / /bzla ba'i zas kyis longs kyang spyad/ /sprul pa'i longs spyod nam mkha' ste/ /pad+ma'i zas kyis longs spyod cing / /sna tshogs longs spyod sprul pa ste/ /sna tshogs rigs kyi mchog dam pa/ /mkha' mnyam dri med rnam par dag /

gangs kyi rang bzhin lta bur bsil/ /dag pa'i mdog can mchog gi mdog /zla ba'i zer dang 'dra ba'i mdog /spyan gsum skal ba sna tshogs bzang / /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus na gnas/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /thams

cad ral pa'i cod pan can/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'ang de bzhin te/ /phyag rgya drug ni thams cad rgya/ /rang gi gdan la legs par bzhugs/ /glang po seng ge rta dang ni/ /rma bya dang ni nam mkha' lding / /de yi steng du gdan/ /bsgoms na dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /

rdo rje lag gis sa la reg /rdo rje dril bu dkur bsten cing / /zhal gyi mchu ni rnam par sgyur/ /'khor lo dril bu 'gying dang bcas/ /rin chen dril bu'ang de bzhin te/ /pad+ma'i dril bu'i rim pa dang / /dril bu sna tshogs rdo rje nyid/ /thams cad snyems par rnam bsgoms

te/ /rigs kyi rdo rje mchog dam pa/ /dkyil 'khor drug ni bri bar bya/ /sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje 'khor los bskor ba ste/ /rin chen pad+mas de bzhin bskor/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba ste/ /dbus su rdo rjes bskor bar bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor

bri ba ni/ /khang pa brtsegs pa yid 'ong mchog /rigs drug dag ni rnam par dgod/ /der ni gnas sogs rim pa dgod/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /de yi shar phyogs kyi sgo la/ /pul+lI ra ma ya na thod pa'i dum bu

dang / rab gtum ma'o/ /byang du dzA baM d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma'o/ /nub tu au T+yan na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma'o/ /lho ru ar bu da na mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste dbus ni sa dang po rab tu dga' ba ste/ dpa' bo

sku mdog nag po/ mkha' 'gro ma thal ba dang / sprin gyi mdog can dpa' bo ni rdo rje dang / rdo rje dril bu dang / mkha' 'gro ma ni thod pa dang / rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro bde

ba chen po'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor go dA war ni lha dgra dang / dpa' ba'i blo can ma'o/ /byang du rA me shwa ri na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma'o/ /nub tu de bI ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang / lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /lho ru mA la ba na rdo rje sku dang / shing grib ma'o/ /

dpa' bo'i sku lus dkar po/ mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'o/ /dri ma med pa'i sa ni dbus ma ste sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /'od byed pa'i sa'i dbus na rin chen mkha' 'gro ste/ shar gyi sgo ru kA ma rU pa na myu gu can dang sa srung ma'o/ /byang du o tre na rdo rje ral pa can

dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'o/ /nub tu tri sha ku ni na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /lho ru ko sa la na rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste dpa' bo ser po/ mkha' 'gro ma ljang gu'o/ /'od 'phro ba'i sa'i dbus su pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro/ de'i shar phyogs

kyi sgor ka ling ga na rab dang / sngo sangs lha mo'o/ /byang du lam bA ka na rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang ma'o/ /nub tu kAM tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma'o/ /lho ru hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma ste dpa' bo dmar po/ mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar mo'o/ /

sbyang dka' ba'i sa'i dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro/ de'i shar gyi sgor pre ta pu ri na stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /byang du gr-i ha de wa na rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma'o/ /nub tu sau rASh+Ta na rta mgrin dang / chang 'tshong ma'o/ /lho ru su bar+N+Na dwI pa na nam

mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /dpa' bo nag po mkha' 'gro ma ser mo'o/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa'i dbus su sna tshogs mkha' 'gro/ de'i shar phyogs kyi sgor nA ga ra na he ru ka dang rab dpa' ma'o/ /byang du sin+d+hu na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug

dang / stobs can ma'o/ /nub tu ma ru ta na rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los sgyur ma'o/ /lho ru ku lu tA na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson chen mo ste/ dpa' bo ni sna tshogs kyi mdog can la mkha' 'gro ma dud pa'i mdog can no/ /dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol

du/ /phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /de yi phyi rol kun rdo rje/ /zur du mkha' 'gro ma yang bri/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /thod pa bzhi ni mtshams su bri/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mtshams su ni/ /ring du song sa mkha'

'gro ma/ /lA ma mi g.yo ba yi sa/ /legs pa'i blo gros dum skyes ma/ /gzugs can ma ni chos kyi sprin/ /sngo zhing ser la ljang ba dang / /bzhi pa dmar ba'i mdog can yin/ /khwa gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrog ma/ /gshin rje

sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyed ni bud med dbang phyug zhal/ /dpa' bo thams cad g.yas brkyang gnas/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos 'chang skra grol ba/ /yid

'ong mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs/ /thams cad steng du bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni rnam par bsgom/ /pad+ma la gnas 'khor lo ni/ /dkyil 'khor sdom pa'i mchog yin no/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u ni phyag g.yas na/ /'di ltar mkha'

'gro ma yi gzugs/ /phyag mtshan dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /khwa gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /lcags kyu zhags pa la sogs mtshan/ /g.yon pa kha T+wAM g.yas par ni/ /ji srid zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu yang ni de bzhin no/ /gshin rje sreg

sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /me long dang ni pi wang dang / /dri dang ro ni g.yas pa na/ /g.yon la thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i/ /rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ /thod pa'i steng na yang dag gnas/ /'khor lo so sor bsgoms nas ni/ /'khor

dang bcas pas yongs su khyab/ /ye shes sems dpa' thugs kar blta/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /bsgoms pas thim par byas nas su/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis/ /dbang bskur nas ni rim par spro/ /oM

AHbaM hU~M/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /srog dang stsol ba rim pas bya/ /mnyam par spros nas dbang bskur byin/ /ji ltar rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dogs pa med par bzlas bsgom bya/ /ji ltar gsang sngags rjes mthun par/ /dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa

bya/ /o~M shrI ma hA su kha badzras twa DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra a hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI bud+d+ha DA ka a la la la a DA ki nI dzA lasam+ba ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI rat+na DA ka trA~M A A/ DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI pad+ma DA ka hrIM hrIM a hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra DA ka AH

hU~M phaT hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+bar hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI bi shwa DA ka ho kha~M da~M DA ki nI dzAl sam+ba ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M kha~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pa~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsa~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ka~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pra~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ba~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bya~M hU~M phaT/ o~M a~M hU~M

phaT/ o~M kha~M hU~M phaT/ o~M b+ha~M hU~M phaT/ o~M la~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ba~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tra~M hU~M phaT/ o~M A+e~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ba~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsa~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sh+ya~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ba~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ha~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ba~M

hU~M phaT/ o~M kha~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsa~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ra~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kha~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ha~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shauM hU~M phaT/ o~M aM hU~M phaT/ o~M tsa~M hU~M phaT/ o~M he~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pha~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bai~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsa~M hU~M phaT/ o~M b+ha~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M hU~M

phaT/ o~M Ta~M hU~M phaT/ o~M la~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kha~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rU~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ka~M hU~M phaT/ o~M U~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shwa~M hU~M phaT/ o~M su~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya~M hU~M phaT/ 'khor la sogs pa thams cad kun/ /bsgom

la gnas nas bzlas pa bya/ /'khor los sgyur drug lhan cig tu/ /mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma bzlas bya/ /dam tshig chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /dam tshig dam tshig mchog gyur pa/ /gnyis med 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gsang sngags bzlas na dngos grub 'gyur/ /zla

drung nges te gzhan min par/ /'khor los sgyur drug dngos grub 'thob/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang / /pad+ma gar dbang rgyal bo dang / /dbang phyug rta mchog he ru ka/ /gnas sogs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas nges par bsgoms nas

ni/ /rim par sbyor ba'i rim pa dang / /brgyud pa'i gnas kyi rim dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi bka' dag ni/ /bla ma'i brgyud bas 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan du sngags pa 'khor byed cing / /bka' yi nam yang mthong ma yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma

las rigs drug gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i bka'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor lam ni rnyed dka' ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor snying po/ /gnas kyi rnal 'byor rjes mthun par/ /yi ge las byung cig car tshul/ /cig car mtshan ma phyag mtshan yin/ /

cig car rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /bde ba chen po bla na med/ /de ru 'jug cing de yi tshul/ /cig car he ru ka dpal mchog /ston ka'i nam mkha' dri med ltar/ /zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa/ /phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /

'jigs shing rab tu 'jigs par mdzad/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /spyan gsum rnal 'byor ma yi gtso/ /zhal gdong g.yon dkar g.yas dmar te/ /steng gi zhal ni ser la mdzes/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi byin rlabs can/ /

stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /zhabs kyis pad+mar gnon par bzhugs/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam pas 'khyud/ /phag mo yi ni byin pas 'khril/ /gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pas/ /

dbu skra grol ba phyogs gos can/ /sku mdog mnyam zhing mtshungs par ldan/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /de yi zhal dang phyag mtshan can/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste/ /tho ba mdung ste gzhan

du ni/ /tshangs pa'i mgo bos brgyan pa la/ /zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la brgyan/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /'og pag dag gis sku rags byas/ /dpung rgyan rdo rjes

mtshan pa ste/ /sngags pa'i gtso bos gsang sngags ni/ /'di ltar cho ga'i snying po shes/ /phag mo bde bar gnas pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa rnam par spangs/ /phag mo rgyal ba'i mtshan sogs las/ /cang te'u gri gug rnams kyis brgyan/ /bcom ldan 'das ni

lte ba'i dbus/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad yid 'ong ba/ /sna tshogs pad+ma mdog mdzes la/ /thams cad rnam dag mchog dam pa/ /shar gyi 'dab sogs phyogs cha la/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhi po dgod/ /shar du mkha' 'gro ma dgod cing / /byang du lA ma de bzhin te/ /

nub tu dum skyes ma yin no/ /lho ru gzugs can ma yin te/ /sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dag ni bzhi pa'o/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /spyan gsum drag po gzi brjid can/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs/ /skra grol ba ni yid 'ong ba/ /

phyogs kyi gos can mgo yi phreng / /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /de bzhin gzhu dang mda' 'dzin cing / /rdo rje mdung mchog phyag na 'dzin/ /snyems pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing / /thugs rje chags

pas rnam par myos/ /sngo ba dang ni ser ba dang / /ljang gu steng gi zhal dkar po/ /ser zhing sngo la ljang ba dang / /steng gi zhal gdong drag la dmar/ /dmar dang sngo dang ljang ba dang / /steng gi zhal ni dkar la zhi/ /ljang dang dmar dang sngo ba dang / /steng

gi zhal ni ser po mchog /bdud bzhi po ni zhabs kyis gnon/ /bcom ldan 'das la gdong gis lta/ /zur gyi char ni bum pa dag /ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba/ /de yi steng du thod pa ni/ /byang chub 'o mas rab bkang ba/ /phyi rol dam tshig gsum 'khor lo/ /khang

pa brtsegs pa legs par mdzes/ /shar phyogs su ni gau ri ste/ /byang du de bzhin tsau ri ma/ /nub tu rab rmongs ma yin no/ /lho ru yang ni ro langs ma/ /me la sbos byed ma yin te/ /bden bral du ni gtum mo yin/ /rlung phyogs sme mo nyid yin te/ /dbang ldan he ru ka ma ste/ /de

bzhin rnal 'byor ma brgyad ni/ /dkar mo ser la sngo ljang gu'o/ /skul byed dmar la sngo ljang gu/ /rab rmongs ma ni sngo ser ljang / /ro langs ma ni dkar sngo ljang / /spos byed ma ni sna tshogs mdog /dmar dang sngo dang ljang gu'o/ /gtum mo yang ni ljang sngo ser/ /sme mo yang ni dud

sngo ljang / /he ru ka ma sngo ljang dmar/ /'di ltar de dag thams cad kyang / /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos 'chang gar dang bcas/ /gdan la legs par bzhugs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /kha T+wAM thod pa dril bu dang / /cang te'u zhags pa

lcags kyu thogs/ /thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /mi bskyod pa yi cod pan byas/ /'di ltar gnas dang nye gnas kyi/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /'di ltar thugs kyi 'khor lor ni/ /lha mo dkar mo la sogs pa/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rab tu bshad/ /bsnyen

pas bka' drin stsol mdzad de/ /thogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'grub/ /lha mo mkha' spyod grub nas ni/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i go 'phang rnyed/ /de yi phyi rol gsung 'khor lo/ /shar du pi wang stangs stabs ma/ /byang du gling bu'i stangs stabs ma/ /nub tu rdza rnga che stangs stabs/ /

lho ru rdza rnga'i stangs stabs te/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang gu/ /me sogs rdo rje bzhad ma ste/ /rdo rje sgeg ma rdo rje glu/ /rdo rje gar te dmar ba dang / /sngo dang ser dang ljang gu'o/ /de dag zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang / /thod pa yi ni phreng

ba can/ /spyan gsum pa la yid 'ong ba/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /tsham ngam lag pa'i stangs stabs kyis/ /rdo rje dril bu stangs stabs can/ /mkhrig ma mnyam par byas nas ni/ /pad+ma bskor ba'i stangs stabs can/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni/ /tshan+do dang ni

tshan+do ha/ /de dag 'od dpag med dbu brgyan/ /sku yi 'khor lo'i shar du ni/ /me tog ma byang bdug pa ma/ /nub tu mar me lho ru dri/ /ser dang dud kha dmar dkar po/ /me long ro dang reg bya chos/ /me phyogs la sogs mtshams su ste/ /zla ba'i mdog can dmar

ljang dkar/ /de dag spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang / /zhabs kyis kun tu gar byed cing / /phyag tu mchod pa thogs nas ni/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /cang te'u ni phyag na bsnams/ /thod pa yi ni phreng ba can/ /lha mo de dag 'du sa dang / /nye

ba'i 'du sa dur khrod dang / /nye ba'i dur khrod dag yin te/ /rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan byas/ /sgo rnams rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /rdo rje zhags pa rdo rje sgrog /rdo rje dril bu de bzhin te/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar dang ser/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi phyogs kyang de bzhin no/ /

me la sogs pa'i mtshams su ni/ /gshin rje sreg la sogs pa dag /dmar dang sngo dang dud kha ser/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /rang gi mtshan ma cang te'u dang / /gri gug dang ni mgo bo 'chang / /spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste/ /gcer bu gar gyis gnas pas bzhugs/ /

thams cad phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /thod pa yi ni phreng ba can/ /rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can/ /ji lta'i rim pas rjes su gnas/ /de yi snying gar ye shes sems/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum/ /gtso bo'i bdag po bsgom par bya/ /dkar dang dmar dang sngo ba yi/ /

dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma lhan cig /ji lta bu yi bsgoms pa na/ /rjes su bstan pa'i bsgoms pa las/ /ye shes lcags kyu dag gis ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni/ /ji ltar rim pas mchod dbang bskur/ /gcig tu bsdus te bstims nas su/ /

ji lta'i rim pa bsgoms nas su/ /ye shes bzlas pa dag kyang bya/ /spro bsdu srog dang rtsol ba yis/ /'thor 'thung rim pas byas pa yi/ /slob dpon gyis ni bzlas pa bya/ /o~M AHhU~M hU~M/ 'di lta bu yi rim pa yis/ /grangs med par ni byas nas su/ /ji srid skyo bar ma

gyur par/ /gong gi dam tshig 'khor lo ni/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa bya/ /dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni/ /sdom pa mchog gi bzlas pa bya/ /o~M shrI badzra he he ru ru k+Sh+mAM hU~M hU~M phaT DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba raM swA hA/ o~M badzra bA rA hi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M lA me hu~M hU~M phaT/

o~M khaN+Da ro he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rU pi Ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hu~M gau ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsau ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bet+tA li hu~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M puk+ka si hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M tsaN+DA li hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M g+has ma ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M he ru ka sa na ni b+he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra bI ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra baM she hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M

badzra mr-i daM he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra murdze hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra hA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra lA s+yai hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra bI te hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra nr-i t+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra puSh+pe hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra d+hU be hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra dI pe hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra gan+d+he hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rU ba badzri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ra sa

badzri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M spar+sha badzri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M d+harma d+hU tu badzri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra aM ku sha dzaHhu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra pA sha hU~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra spo Ta baM hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra A be sha hoHhu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma dA D+hi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma dU ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma daMSh+Ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya ma ma tha ni

hu~M hU~M phaT/ dam tshig can gyis tshig dag pas/ /mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tu bzla/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can/ /rang gi thabs dang rigs pa'i lus/ /gnyis su med par mnyam pa'i bdag /khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pas/ /

'gro ba gsum po bcas par ni/ /he ru kar ni byas nas kyang / /sa rnams gsum po ma lus par/ /thams cad der ni bsdus nas kyang / /sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas/ /'di ni rnal 'byor cho ga ste/ /'khor lo bsgom pa'i bzlas pa'o/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba

yis/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba na/ /dam tshig can nyid langs dus su/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /mkha' 'gro dang ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun gyis gsol ba gdab par bya/ /khro bo bde ba'i dgyes pa yi/ /longs spyod las

ni byung ba yi/ /rab rmongs ma yis bsnyen byas nas/ /bde ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te/ /ra ma he nad Ta na su ra A ma hA su hu ba ra dzo i ni ka ma la su hu/ a la la hoH/ su ra a ut+ta ma ma hU~M/ ma hA sidz+dza/ u ma dzo i ni dza la ma ho/ A I/ a A ra ho/ a ru he byi nu su ba

ya nA ha/ su ra a su hu de hi bar TA i ni/ dzA la su hu bi sa pha na ta ro Na Na pa de hi ma hA su hU madz+dza mu hU mo k+Shu pa la k+kha u/ tu tu sa hU Na i su hU/ badz+dzi u mo khu su hU/ i na i du/ khe la tha i mo khu su hU/ ba sa i paM ka u madz+dza ta nu na ba rA/ a pa da traM/ b+hu dza ta nu

muny+dza ma hA su hU/ i la da ra pA ya/ u ma hU/ a ra bI a gi a paM u ra su/ 'di yis mgon po bskul nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges pa ste/ /snyan cing 'jam pa'i mgrin pa'i dbyangs/ /dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu blangs pas/ /mkha' 'gro'i dra ba dri med rnams/ /

gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yin/ /rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba/ /sbyor bas dngos grub thams cad 'grub/ /dgyes pa 'di yis bskul na ni/ /bde ba chen po stsol ba yin/ /sbyor ba yi ni dus dag tu/ /rdo rje can gyis rab tu sbyar/ /thog ma dbus dang mthar thug par/ /

yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags bzla/ /'khor lo dag ni brtan byas te/ /dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te/ /khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /thams cad snying gar brtan byas te/ /bsgoms pas thams cad brtan par 'gyur/ /

gal te bdag nyid dngos grub 'dod/ /dngos grub thams cad gnas pa yin/ /o~M badzra he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ badzra he ru ka twe no pa tiSh+Tha drI D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hiM me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM

shri yaHku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha hoH/ b+ha ga bA na/ badzra he ru ka mA me muny+tsa he ru ka b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa aHhU~M phaT swA hA/ 'dis ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing / /yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa/ /he ru ka mchog rang nyid yin/ /phyir bzlog pa ni gang yin pa/ /bcu drug 'dab ma

la bkod cing / /rjes su bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun/ /bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya/ /rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni/ /khams gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te/ /bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshan nyid

de/ /de ltar srid pa'ang stong pa yin/ /bsgoms pas bdag nyid yang dag gnas/ /'dir ni bka' thub bshad pa med/ /phreng ba med cing sngags kyang med/ /gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang / /cho ga'i rim pa'i gzhi yang med/ /rnal 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med/ /g.yas

brkyang zhabs kyi rim pa'ang med/ /rdo rje chen po dngos 'dzin pa/ /rang byung dngos grub kun mdzad pa/ /'gog pa nyid kyang mdzad pa med/ /bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsgom/ /yi ge gnas kyi mchog

gyur pa/ /lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa ni/ /de yi dbus su rnam par bsam/ /sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa can/ /de yi lus las 'das gyur te/ /sems kyi dngos kyang btsal du med/ /chags pa med cing chags bral med/ /chags bral dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /snying gi

pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /brtags pas legs par rnyed pa ni/ /yid kyis ngal bsos byas pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ma kun bud med yin/ /phyag rgya mchog tu bshad pa'o/ /zla ba'i steng du brgya phyed brgyan/ /ye shes sems ni bsam pa ni/ /mchog ste spyad par bya ba med/ /bla ma'i

man ngag lam dang ni/ /sems ni mchog tu 'bad pa yis/ /'di ltar zhi ba'i gnas de ni/ /'jig rten du mas ma rtogs te/ /sbyor dang sbyor ba bral byas nas/ /go 'phang gcig pus khyab pa yin/ /'di ltar byang chub 'bras bu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ /dang por dbyangs kyi

yi ge las byung gzhan du yang / /stegs ngan gzhung lugs log pa'i blo gros de nyid ni/ /ma ning shes rab long ba gzugs bzhin 'bras bu med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sku gsung thugs kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas sbyor ba

bshad bya ba/ /thod pa sangs rgyas mchog dam pa/ /de nyid sbyor ba kun gyi mchog /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba/ /gsang ba legs par sba bya zhing / /gang gis su la'ang mi bstan no/ /de nyid mchog gi bsgom bzung ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi snying la gnas/ /gsang

ba brtan par sba bya zhing / /bla ma'i ngag ni bsgom par bya/ /dur khrod gnas ni yid 'ong ba/ /sgrub pa po yis nges brtan pa/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sa dang gnas kyi rim pa dag /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /yi ge hU~M ni bsgom par bya/ /de yis khyad par bdag

nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog /gnas med zhi zhing dag pa ste/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs yin/ /A li kA li las rang byung / /gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba ste/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /'dzam bu'i mdog

can mnyam pas khyab/ /'od zer phreng bas kun tu 'khrigs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhad pa'i zhal/ /sems dpa' kun gyi bsgom pa ste/ /gnyis med chos ni bla na med/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /na ra'i pags pa steng du brkyang / /

thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi phyag g.yon thod pa ni/ /rkang gis rab tu gang ba dang / /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /ye shes 'chi med lngas bsres pa/ /kha T+wAM ga ni

lha'i rnal 'byor/ /thod pa dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs dag pa ste/ /'jigs pa ma lus mi 'jigs grol/ /gdug cing 'jigs pa ma lus kun/ /'dir ni zhabs kyis gnon par mdzad/ /gdug pas 'jigs pa thams cad spong / /

zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan/ /rdo rje phreng bas dpral ba mdzes/ /rkang rgyan yid 'ong rgyan cha can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi/ /lte ba'i dbus nas bzhengs pa ni/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /chags pa zhe sdang zhabs kyis gnon/ /

ye shes sems dpa' de gzugs can/ /yi ge hU~M las byung bar bsgom/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i snying ga ru/ /he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom/ /gsung gi 'khor lo kha la bsgom/ /sku yi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin/ /sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba dang / /phyag drug pa la zhal gsum pa//rdo

rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'chang / /rang rig lus dang yang dag 'dus/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus dag tu/ /yi ge gsum sogs las byung

ba/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rang gi mtshan ma'i mchog dang ldan/ /gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba/ /sdom pa gsum gyi mchog dam pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod/ /thod pa bzhi po

mchog yin te/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni kha dog ser/ /lA ma pa la sha yi mdog /dum skyes ma ni sngon po ste/ /gzugs can ma ni dmar la 'bar/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs mchog yin te/ /sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi/ /khwa gdong la sogs mkha'

'gro ma/ /sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu drag po'i gzugs can no/ /mtshams su gshin rje sreg la sogs/ /rab 'jigs shin tu 'jigs pa ste/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bzhin te/ /cang te'u dang ni gri gug nyid/ /bdud ni

bzhi po'i steng na bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /me long ro dang dri dang ni/ /reg gi mchod pa bzhi po ste/ /sa bcu dag gi rim pa dang / /sku gsung thugs

kyi sbyor ba yis/ /phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun/ /byang chub phyogs kyi rnam par dag /ka la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi/ /mgo la bin dus mnan pa ste/ /gsal byed hU~M gnyis dang yang sbyar/ /mthar ni phaT dang rab tu sbyar/ /dpa' bo kun gyi gsang sngags ni/ /'dod pa'i

'bras bu thams cad ster/ /gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yi ming / /mthar ni hU~M hU~M phaT yin te/ /'di ltar rab gtum mkha' 'gro ma/ /sngags kyi de nyid bde ba ster/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /hU~M AHo~M/ 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ /pad+ma'i 'dab la mkha' 'gro

ma/ /gsal byed ma ning dang bcas pa/ hU~M ni gnyis pa nyid yin te/ /mkhas pas mthar ni phaT dang sbyar/ khwa gdong la sogs gsang sngags ni/ /ya ra la wa/ /gsal byed dang ni bcas pa ste/ /mthar ni hU~M dang phaT dang sbyar/ /gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa/ /

sha Sha sa ha/ gsal byed dang ni hU~M gnyis dang / /phaT kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /dbus su sangs rgyas thod pa yi/ /gsang sngags de bzhin rjes su dran/ /oM aM AM/ iM IM/ uM uM/ e ai/ aM eH/ Sha swA hA/ khams dang phung po skye mched la/ /go cha rnams

ni sbyar bar bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo dam tshig dag /mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par bya/ /mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags rnams/ /rang ming gsal byed hU~M byas te/ /'di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar/ /sangs rgyas thod pa las byung ba/ /rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste/ /

thams cad rim pa bzhin du sbyar/ /'thor 'thung du ni rab sbyar bas/ /gsang ba bzhi po bzla bar bya/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa dag /'dir ni cho ga'i sbyor ba yis/ /dus bzhi dag tu sbyar nas su/ /dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya/ /dam tshig

mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /dam tshig can gyi gsang sngags kun/ /sangs rgyas thod pa mchog yin te/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag /dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bya zhing / /ye shes 'chi med lnga yi mchog /

yang na rang ming bzlas pa bya/ /sngags kyi de nyid bzlas par bya/ /o~M shrI bud+d+ha ka pA li bruM AHhU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba raM hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di ni yid 'ong sbyor ba'i mchog /rnal 'byor ma yi ye shes mchog /gang du dam tshig nyams pa la/ /sbyor ba 'di ni sbyin par bya/ /zhi bar

gyur nas bla med pa/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dbang yang bskur/ /dus bzhi dag tu rim pa yis/ /phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya/ /yang na dam tshig sdom pa blang / /bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab/ /bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste/ /dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams/ /bla ma mgon pos

skyabs mdzod cig /gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can/ /'gro ba'i gtso la skyabs su mchi/ /de ni tho tsom med byas nas/ /nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig las ldang ba sangs rgyas thod pa

bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed dka' ba/ /gsang sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang / /'gro ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog yin/ /

mi zad gnyis med rnam par dag /thog mar dbus mthar dri ma med/ /a yi ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams/ /phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan/ /rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med/ /ral

pa zla phyed dbu la brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /ral gri lcags kyu phyag na

bsnams/ /rin chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog /ye shes sems dpa' snying ga ru/ /'khor lo gsum gyi mchog kyang bsgom/ /hU~M las thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ /

de yi phyag mtshan sngon po dang / /AHlas gsung gi 'khor lo ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan dmar po'o/ /oM las sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mnyam sbyor/ /sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med/ /ra~M las phyag rgya chen po ste/ /lte ba'i dbus

su rnam par bsam/ /i las b+ha ga pad+ma ste/ /byang chub zla ba dri ma med/ /u ni snying gar bsam pa ste/ /e ni mgo la rnam par dgod/ /ai ni spyi gtsug dag tu dgod/ /o ni mig tu dgod pa ste/ /aM ni go char byas nas su/ /a ni mdun gyi mtshon cha'o/ /l-i las lha mo

spyan yin te/ /r-i las dam tshig sgrol ma yin/ /l-I las lha mo gos dkar mo/ /r-I las rin chen yang dag 'byung / /rin chen sgron dang ye shes sgron/ /dkar zhing pa la sha yi mdog /dmar zhing 'dzam bu chu bo'i mdog /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum dgyes

pas rnam par myos/ /thams cad phyogs kyi gos can te/ /rang gi thabs dang mnyam par ldan/ /'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /pad+ma dmar po rin chen dang / /rdo rje dril bu lhan cig sbyar/ /'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ral gri mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ /gzhu ni

'gugs par 'dzin pa ste/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /thod pa yi ni cod pan can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste/ /dbus su gtso bo'i zla ba'i gdan/ /zur la mchod pa rnam pa bzhi/ /

phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /me long dang ni pi wang dang / /dril bu dung dang bcud kyis len/ /chang gi btung ba lag pas mchod/ /gzhan du ji ltar bdag po bzhin/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /

skyil krung phyed par legs par bzhugs/ /lag pa snyim pa'i thal mo yis/ /mchod pa lag tu thogs nas ni/ /'di lta'i cho gas thams cad mkhyen/ /A li de nyid dri ma med/ /gsang ba mchog ni rnyed dka' ba/ /rdo rje sems dpas bshad pa yin/ /sngags

kyi de nyid cho ga dag /sku gsung thugs su yang dag sbyar/ /o~M shrI ma hA su kha badzra sa twa AH/ A hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba raM swA hA/ /oM sid+d+ha lo tsa ni l-i AHhU~M swA hA/ /o~M sa ma ya tA te tut+ta re tu re r-i AHhU~M swA hA/ /o~M rat+na dzA li ni r-I AH

hU~M swA hA/ /o~M rU pa badzri b+h+ruM/ o~M shab+ha badzri hU~M/ o~M ra sa badzri hrIH thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog /b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas par bsgom/ /A li rdo rje gsang ba che/ /sems can kun gyi snying la gnas/ /gang gis dngos po kun gsang ba/ /de

yi gsang ba bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis dus bzhi ru/ /bzlas dang bsgom par ldan par bya/ /som nyi thams cad spangs nas ni/ /sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan/ /ye shes 'khor lo mthong nas ni/ /dam tshig can gyis mchod dbang bskur/ /de dag gcig

tu bstims nas su/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad rdo rje 'dzin lta bu/ /'das pa dang ni da ltar dang / /ma 'ongs pa yi dus gsum po/ /de ltar sems can gsum po la/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas/ /lhan cig

skyes dga' dag pa'i bdag /thog ma med pa'i mchog yin no/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyu bla ma'i bla ma las rdo rje sems dpa' skyed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas mchog gi cho ga bshad/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa ni/ /ma~M gi ye shes las byung ba'i/ /

'jam pa'i rdo rje bde ba che/ /zhal drug phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /sku mdog dkar po dri ma med/ /spyan gsum rdo rje skyil krung can/ /phyag rgya drug ni 'bar bas brgyan/ /mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin/ /ral pa'i thor

tshugs bcings pa ste/ /dkar dang sngo dang ngur smrig nyid/ /ser dang ljang gu de bzhin te/ /steng gi zhal ni zhi ba ste/ /lha yi dngos grub 'bras bu stsol/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /ral gri po ti 'dzin pa ste/ /ut+pa la dang lcags kyu nyid/ /ye shes lus can rnam par bsgom/ /

sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ni/ /'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par bsgom/ /sngar bshad gnas kyi sbyor ba yis/ /ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' ltar/ /gsang sngags 'di ni rjes su dran/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i gsang ba ni/ /gsang gsum ye shes dam tshig can/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'o/ /

o~M shrI ma hA su kha many+dzu badzra a maM hUM DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra swA hA/ rang gis dbang bskur byas nas ni/ /brtul zhugs chen po gsang sngags bzla/ /gsang gsum 'khor lo spros nas ni/ /khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya/ /'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /gang gis su la'ang bstan mi bya/ /

mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /yi ge dgu pa bsgrub pa ste/ /k+Sha yi ye shes las byung ba/ /gdug pa thams cad za byed pa/ /za byed mkha' 'gro za byed cing / /rnam rtog

zos shing zad par byed/ /mkha' mnyam stong pa las byung ba/ /nam mkha'i longs spyod za byed cing / /zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam sgyur/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /gdug pa'i bdud ni za byed cing / /'jigs byed dang ni

'jigs byed mo/ /kha sbub zhabs kyis mnan par bzhugs/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba phyed las nye bar mdzes/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa mnan/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku lus

brgyan/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /'jigs byed rab tu cher 'jigs shing / /sngo dang dud kha ljang khu dang / /dmar dang lnga pa ser po'o/ /drug pa dag ni bong bu'i mgo/ /steng gi zhal gdong rab tu 'jigs/ /thal ba sprin gyi mdog can la/ /gdug pa thams cad

rab 'joms ma/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /dgyes pa'i longs spyod longs spyod cing / /pang du rdo rje phag mo ni/ /de mdog steng zhal phag mgo ste/ /gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan/ /skra grol ba dang phyogs gos can/ /byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam

par 'khril/ /thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /tshangs pa'i pags pa mnabs pa ste/ /rdo rje mdung dang cang te'u dang / /gri gug zhags pa mgo bo dang / /phyag tu ral gri 'phyar ba ste/ /drag po gdug pa kun 'joms pa/ /snying gar

ye shes mkha' 'gro ni/ /khwa gdong la sogs yongs kyis khyab/ /'khor lo 'dab brgyad dbus dag tu/ /g.yon nas g.yas su bskor nas ni/ /dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod/ /mkha' 'gro ma mchog dgod par bya/ /ya~M ra~M la~M wa~M/ sha~M Sha~M sa~M ha~M/ ye shes 'khor lo mkha'

'gro dgod/ /zhag bdun bar du bsgoms nas ni/ /gang yang thun ni bzhi yi rim/ /chu 'gram dang ni dur khrod du/ /bsgoms pas dngos grub nges par rnyed/ /'phrog pa dang ni gsod byed cing / /gang du las ni ci 'dod pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los 'grub/ /las 'dir

yid gnyis dpyod pa med/ /sngo dang pa la sha yi mdog /dmar dang bzhi pa ser po ste/ /gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni/ /sna tshogs mdog can mdzes pa'i zhal/ /dmar dang sngo dang dud kha ste/ /zhal mdog dkar po mchog tu mdzes/ /thams cad spyan gsum pa yi zhal/ /

skra grol ba la phyogs gos can/ /khwa gdong g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal/ /'ug gdong zhal yang de bzhin te/ /gsum pa khyi yi zhal gdong yin/ /bzhi pa phag gi zhal gdong ste/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gdong ni/ /drag mo'i gzugs can cho ga bzhin/ /gshin

rje sreg sogs zhal gdong ni/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa gnyis de bzhin/ /thug ri rnga mo rta dang ni/ /seng ge ra dang glang ma he/ /gzhan yang dom gyi zhal yin te/ /thams cad kyang ni mnyam par bya/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /dril

bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gdan la gar gyis bzhugs/ /mi'u thung la skye gnas ring / /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /thugs rje'i ro yis rnam par myos/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang

ba ni/ /sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya/ /hU~M A o~M/ 'di ni gsang bar bshad pa ste/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo dbus/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro snying ga ru/ /mkha' 'gro'i yi ge'i 'khor lo ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /mchod cing thim par rnam par bsgom/ /mnyam

par bzhag nas yi ge rnams/ /srog dang rtsol bas gsang sngags bzla/ /rang gi 'thor 'thung byas nas su/ /gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes spro/ /o~M shrI k+Sha DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ /thog mar gsal byed ming dang hU~M/ /mthar ni phaT dang rnam par sbyar/ /mkha'

'gro zla bas bshad pa yi/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol/ /mchog 'di dag ni gsang ba ste/ /su la yang ni sbyin mi bya/ /zhag bdun gyis ni dbang 'gyur te/ /rtse gcig pa yis bsgoms na ni/ /'khor lo gsum gsang mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /dngos grub myur du thob

par 'gyur/ /nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las k+Sha'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba/ /A li mkha' 'gro bsgrub pa ste/ /A li ye shes las byung ba/ /A li mkha' 'gro mchog dam pa/ /zhal brgyad

pa la phyag bcu drug /spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching / /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi gtsug mnan/ /dpral ba la ni rdo

rje phreng / /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid/ /sred dang phrag dog dus mtshan nyid/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad/ /gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / /bgegs kyi mgo bo'i phreng ba

can/ /sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes/ /dkar ba'i mdog can rked pa phra/ /lha yi gzi brjid 'bar ba can/ /sngo zhing ser la dud kha dang / /g.yas pa'i zhal yang de bzhin te/ /ljang gu dmar dang ser skya ste/ /g.yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs

mdzes/ /steng gi thal ka sprin mdog zhi/ /chags shing rjes su chags pas blta/ /thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs/ /sku lus ldem zhing 'jo bag can/ /A li mkha' 'gro ma yi sku/ /phyag gnyis pa la gcer bu'i lus/ /thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan/ /skra grol

ba yis rnam par myos/ /spyan gsum nag po 'jigs pa can/ /de yi mdog can sku rags can/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /gnyis med sbyor bas yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan/ /lha mo'i ku tsa 'tshir ba'o/ /ji ltar mkha' 'gro'i

phyag rgya ltar/ /mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin sbyar/ /phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang pa la/ /khyab 'jug pags pa mnabs pa yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /ral gri dang ni thod pa 'chang / /mdung rtse gsum pa cang te'u nyid/ /dgra sta lcags kyu de bzhin te/ /zhags

pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid/ /snying gar rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa'i/ /'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /de mdog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang / /phyag dang phyag rgya de

bzhin te/ /shar du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi ge i'i rigs las byung ba'o/ /byang phyogs su sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge I las byung ste bzhugs pa'o/ /nub phyogs su nam mkha'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge e dang

sbyar bar bya'o/ /lho phyogs su gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge ai las yang dag par bzhugs pa'o/ /me'i phyogs la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su/ mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po dgod par bya ste/ thog ma che ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ yi ge

u dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /bden bral du drag po mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge U dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su dpa' bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge o dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /dbang ldan du khro bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge au dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /

de bzhin 'dir ni mtshams bzhi ru/ dbang ldan la sogs phyogs dgod pa/ yi ge raM las dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge l-i las dur khrod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / /yi ge r-I las rnal 'byor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / /yi ge

l-I las gtum pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma ni de kun gyi/ /yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /thams cad spyan gsum rnam sgyur la/ /sku lus dkar po thams cad zhal/ /sngo dang ljang khu gnyis med bde/ /

g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gnyis ni/ /mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya/ /phyogs kyi gos can gar dang bcas/ /skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u dang ni gri gug mchog /mdung dang mgo bo thams cad kun/ /sna tshogs mdog dang

phyag mtshan bsnams/ /ro yi mgo yi steng bzhugs shing / /thugs rje'i ro ni yongs su rdzogs/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste/ /thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste/ /thams cad a la la yi sgra/ /o~M ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /AHni gsung du 'gyur ba

yin/ /a ni sku yi rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo'i dbus/ /'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa ste/ /rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /'khor la sogs pa thams

cad dgod/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /gcig pu chos kyi ro yang bsgom/ /ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi sngags kyi 'thor 'thung bya/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /'khor lo mchog gi tshogs dang spro/ /mchog de mthong na slar yang bsdu/ /

yan lag bcu gnyis mchog dam pa/ /sa ni bcu gnyis dag nyid de/ /rdo rje sa ni bcu gsum pa/ /rab tu dga' dang dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro ba/ /sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur/ /ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /

gzugs med pa dang ye shes ldan/ /de ltar sa ni bcu gnyis po/ /'khor lo'i lha mo rnam par dgod/ /dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sa dbus su'o/ /'khor la sogs pa kun gyi sngags/ /ming dang gsal byed hU~M byas te/ /de dag mthar

ni phaT dang sbyar/ /sngags kyi gtso bos gsang sngags ni/ /rang snying rang gi sa bon dgod/ /sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar/ /ye shes 'khor lo 'di mthong nas/ /gcig tu bsdus te mchod par bya/ /bdag gis phyi dang nang du yang / /mnyam par bzhag ste mi smra bzla/ /

rang gi 'thor 'thung byas nas ni/ /blo ldan srog rtsol bzlas pa bya/ /oM shrI A li DA ka a a aM hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+bar hU~M phaT swA hA/ srid pa ma lus thams cad kun/ /dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ /sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid/ /sbyor ba yi ni bdag nyid rnams/ /

sems can khams ni cha gnas pas/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid sbyor zhing mchod par bya/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sems kyis ni/ /sgom zhing rab tu bsgoms byas te/ /sngags dang dbyibs dang chos nyid de/ /chos gcig ro ni stong pa yin/ /chos rnams

bdag med nyid yin te/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni/ /rjes su brtag par bya ba yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba chen po'i gsang ba A li'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste le'u sum cu pa'o// //de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba/ /sna tshogs gar gyi

dbang phyug mchog /thams cad mchog ste rnal 'byor che/ /dngos grub chen po legs stsol la/ /skyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /siM o~M dwaM las rdo rje 'byung / /de nyid yongs gyur bdag nyid de/ /gsal

byed mkha' 'gro mchog gyur pa/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog /thams cad rigs kyi mchog dam pa/ /zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis/ /spyan gsum pa la g.yo ba'i sgra/ /zla ba byed pa zhi ba 'dzin/ /thod pa'i phreng bas spud pa ste/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la 'chang / /spyi

gtsug ral pa 'ching ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la mtshan/ /lha yi rgyan gyis spud pa ste/ /skal ngan mu stegs can rnams ni/ /zhabs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu mnan/ /lta ba lnga yi rim pa dag /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar zhabs can/ /zhabs

drug gis ni rnam par brgyan/ /khyab 'jug gi ni pags pa mnabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste/ /rdo rje lha mos rnam par 'khyud/ /gcer bu 'og pag ska rags can/ /skra grol ba la spyan gsum can/ /mchu dang mchu ni rnam 'tshir zhing / /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'khril/ /

byang chub yan lag gnas 'tshir zhing / /byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril/ /thugs rje chags pa'i ro yis bde/ /tshangs pa'i pags pa'i yan lag ni/ /phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang nas 'dzin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'chang / /dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo thogs/ /mdung

rtse gsum dang ral gri dang / /cang te'u zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams/ /dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba nyid/ /ser dang dud kha ngur smrig ste/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag tu/ /pi la dang ni nye bi la/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni gnyis po sbyar/ /chos kyi mchog ces bya ba yi/ /rdo rje

mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni/ /yi ge Ni las yang dag 'byung / /g.yon gyi phyogs su dgod par bya/ /yi ge si las nges byung ba/ /rgya mtsho'i mchog ces bya ba yi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni/ /sna tshogs mdog can sna tshogs zhal/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /

skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa ste/ /zhabs ni gar dang bcas pa'o/ /zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa/ /spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bzhugs/ /mgrin pa dag ni drug dang bzhi/ /phyag rgya lnga yis

rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i ska rags can/ /rkang gdub g.yer ka'i sil sgra can/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /'khyud pa yi ni mchog dam pa/ /rdo rje gsor zhing

sdigs mdzub kyis/ /gnyis su med par rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa gnyis med rnam brgyan te/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /thod pa dang ni gri gug mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi dbu rgyan can/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro

ma dbus su/ /'khor lo gsum gyi thabs kyang bsgom/ /o~M gyi ye shes mkha' 'gro ni/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro ni/ /rang gi snying gar de dag bsgom/ /sngar bshad sbyor ba'i rim pa yis/ /gnas la sogs pa'i rjes rim

pa/ /de ru bsam zhing rnam bsgoms te/ /gsum po'i rim pa rjes su spro/ /des ni dngos grub gnyis med pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig bsgom/ /ye shes 'khor lo'i ro rnams ni/ /bsgoms la gsang sngags bzlas par bya/ /o~M shrI pra Na bod DA ka A A o~M hU~M DA ki

nI dzA la sam+ba ra o~M swA hA/ o~M hriM d+harma ut+ta me/ ma hA badzra DA ki nI ye dwaM hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M sIM sA gar ut+ta me ma hA badzra DA ki ni ya sIM hU~M phaT swA hA/ gsang gsum ye shes bzlas na ni/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma bzla bya/ /gsal byed rang ming hU~M gnyis dang / /mthar ni phaT dang

sbyar bar bya/ /gsang gsum 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni/ /gsum po bsdu zhing bsgoms nas su/ /dam tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba yis/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /byang chub zla ba dri ma med/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo nA da gsum/ /gtso bo dag ni gsum yin te/ /

mkha' 'gro ma gsum gsum mkha' 'gro/ /sdud cing skyed par mdzad pa ste/ /b+ha gar rdo rje phag mo ni/ /gsang ba gsum du rnam par bsgom/ /de nyid sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /des na nga rgyal rnam spangs nas/ /dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin bsgom dang bzlas

pa bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing / /'o ma sna tshogs las byung ba/ /bram ze che dang sbrang rtsi mar/ /ma hA mAng sa mnyam ldan pa/ /de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te/ /bza' bdag ni bza' bar bya/ /'du 'dzi med cing sred pa med/ /yongs su gzung ba'i

'khor yang med/ /longs spyod min pas longs spyod la/ /'chi ba med pa'i zas bza' zhing / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang bsten/ /longs spyod med pa'i zas bza' zhing / /rnal 'byor sgom pa'i sgom yang btung / /gzhan du gang yang btung ba min/ /nang gi

bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /bcom ldan mkha' 'gro pi la ba/ /rnal 'byor ma ni nye pi la/ /thabs ni pi la bar zhes bya/ /shes rab nye ba'i pi la ba/ /grong khyer mthar ni pi la nyid/ /grong gi mtha' ni nye pi la/ /zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor

ba/ /pi la dang ni nye pi yin/ /skad cig sbyor ba pi la ba/ /dga' ba nye ba'i pi la ste/ /mthu stobs du ma ldan par ni/ /skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin/ /pa shu thams cad bza' bya yin/ /lha bshos dag kyang de bzhin bsgrub/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma 'dus nas/ /dus la

mthun pa 'dus byas nas/ /glu dang gar dang bza' ba dang / /'dus pa mchog gis mchod par bya/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /dam tshig gi ni spyad pa spyod/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsal byed mkha' 'gro'i sgrub pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u

sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub sbyor ba'i rim pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro sbyor/ /dam tshig mchog gi sdom pa yin/ /chos rnams kun gyi sdom pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba che/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus

gnas pa/ /dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog dam pa/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo che/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /dbus su nyi ma'i gdan yang mdzes/ /A li kA li mnyam par ldan/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/ /

byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas ni/ /rang gi sa bon las bskyed de/ /yi ge hi las yang dag byung / /dus mtha'i me ltar rab tu 'jigs/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /spyan gsum ljags ni bskyod pa'i zhal/ /gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og

gnon/ /khro ba dang ni bzhad pa'i zhal/ /bskal pa'i mthar yang 'khrug pa ste/ /ral pa yi ni dbu rgyan can/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /'jigs byed chen po'i pags pa yis/ /rked par ska rags bcings pa yin/ /

thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'chang / /dpral ba la ni rdo rje phreng / /khro bo mthong nas rnam par brtag /lha rnams thams cad tshar yang gcod/ /keng rus can gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /'chi ba 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog /gdug pa thams cad

nges par gnon/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis spud pa ste/ /phyag drug pa la zhal lnga pa/ /sna tshogs ro yi bcud mchog can/ /sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang khu dkar po zhi ba ste/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /phag mo yi ni sku lus

khyab/ /lha chen pags pa 'dzin mdzad cing / /bla re tshul du brkyang bar mdzad/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /drug pa na ni cang te'u dang / /zhabs g.yon du ni dus mtshan mnan/ /g.yas pa yis ni 'jigs byed de/ /zhabs kyis 'og tu mnan mdzad cing / /rmongs shing

rab tu myos par mdzad/ /rdo rje phag mo de mdog can/ /skra grol ba dang gcer bu ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyis ska rags can/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /mgul nas 'khyud cing myos pa ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan phyag rgya

bsnams/ /gri gug cang te'u mchog kyang 'dzin/ /drug pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo /'di 'drar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ /mkhas pas re'u mig dbus su dgod/ /shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ste/ /byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro yin/ /nub tu pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ste/ /lho ru

rin chen mkha' 'gro yin/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba dang / /ljang khu dang ni ser po'o/ /'khor lo dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /ljang khu ser po dmar po sngo/ /dkar po steng ltas dril bu dang / /sna tshogs rdo rje bde chen 'khyud/ /

g.yas brkyang ba yi tshul gyis bzhugs/ /dmar sngo ser dang ljang khu dang / /dkar po yang ni de bzhin no/ /pad+ma dril bus snyoms 'jug cing / /lha mo'i nu ma 'tshir ba'o/ /ser po sngon po de bzhin dmar/ /ljang khu dkar po'i kha dog ste/ /rin chen dril bus snyoms par 'jug /

g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yin te/ /sdoms pa lnga yang de nyid do/ /me dang bden bral rlung dang ni/ /dbang ldan de ni bzhi po ru/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro las mkha' 'gro/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro rin chen mkha'/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag

drug pa/ /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos can gar mchog can/ /mgo yi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje mda' la

sogs pas brgyan/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na mdzes/ /'dod pa thams cad stsol mdzad cing / /thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs/ /thugs rje'i 'dod pas rnam par myos/ /cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur can/ /dgyes pa stsol bas bde ba ste/ /de ltar sna tshogs du ma yis/ /

dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongs su khyab/ /du ma'i gzugs dang gzugs sdug ma/ /rdo rje mchu dang 'od byed ma/ /rta gdong dang ni drag po'i gdong / /rdo rje drag mo snyan grags ma/ /rdo rje pho nya rdo rje sen/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma de bzhin/ /kam po tsi yang de bzhin te/ /rdo rje ro

langs ma dang ni/ /rdo rje ma mo'ang de bzhin te/ /dri can ma dang 'jigs byed zhal/ /zla ba'i spyi gtsug de bzhin te/ /khro gnyer can dang sna tshogs gzugs/ /rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang ni/ /sgyu 'phrul lha mo grags byed ma/ /na lar ki dang ser skya

ma/ /rdo rje 'bar ma thal sbyor ma/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed ma nyid de/ /dkyil 'khor 'grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni de dag kun/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam sgyur/ /gsus pa 'phyang la skra grol ba/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan

rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos can gar mchog ste/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad ro yi gdan la bzhugs/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'phrog pa/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /zhags

pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /rdo rje mchog ni gsor mdzad cing / /dril bu dang ni cang te'u mchog /zhal gsum dpa' zhing sgeg pa ste/ /thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs/ /spyan ni zur gyis gzigs mdzad cing / /dgyes pa'i rtsol bas g.yo ba ste/ /dngos grub

thams cad stsol mdzad cing / /sgrub pa po kun rjes su chags/ /zla ba drug gis sgrub pa po/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'grub/ /yid gnyis med par dngos grub mchog /mkha' 'gro thod par byed pa yin/ /dus 'dir de ma thag tu yang / /mkha' la spyod par the tshom med/ /

nang gi pho brang de nyid ni/ /re'u mig dgu sogs sgo dang bcas/ /sgo ru lha mo bzhi bkod la/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub ster/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri/ /snam bu'i mtshams bzhi de ru ni/ /lha mo nyi shu dgod bya zhing / /mkha' 'gro ma sogs phyogs mtshams

su/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu brdag /sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis

brgyan cing / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab po/ /de yi nang du re'u mig dgu/ /sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste/ /'di ltar mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma/ /dra ba'i sdom pa stong pa ste/ /byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun/ /chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin/ /dbus su sa ni bcu

gsum ste/ /phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas/ /dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod/ /'di ltar sbyor bas rnam dag par/ /sdom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /de ni thugs kyi ye shes te/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /phung po khams dang skye mched la/ /cho ga

gnyis po sbyar bar bya/ /ye shes mchog gi sdom pa ste/ /gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod/ /phyed dang phyed du rnam par dgod/ /mkha' 'gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus/ /dam tshig rnal 'byor 'byung ba che/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni/ /zhabs bsil byas nas

gzhug par bya/ /ye shes chu yis dbang bskur nas/ /gtso bo dag ni rnam par bsgom/ /bdag med chos kyi ro kun gyi/ /dam tshig mchog ni dri ma med/ /ba spu khung bu thams cad las/ /dam tshig gsang ba gsum spros nas/ /sems can ma lus dam tshig gi/ /mkha'

'gro ru ni rab gnas bya/ /'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang / /gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya/ /sngon grub pa yi mkha' 'gro ni/ /byin brlabs gnas su dgod par bya/ /'di ni rdo rje theg chen te/ /mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs/ /sdom pa mchog ni bzlas pa

yis/ /bla na med pa'i go 'phang ster/ /dus bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par/ /skyo ba med par rtag tu bsgom/ /lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis/ /'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro/ /ba spu'i khung bu las mdun du/ /bde mchog spros nas mchod par bya/ /rdo rje gsum ni dbang

bskur nas/ /'gog pa'i khro bo rnam par bsgom/ /ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu/ /sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur bzla/ /'gro zhing 'ong ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi smra rdo rje brtul zhugs che/ /zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang / /mthu dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /g.yo zhing ldeg par byed pa

dang / /'khrug cing g.yengs dang gzhug pa dang / /nad med pa ni nad yod byed/ /nad yod pa ni nad med byed/ /de ltar sgom pa byas nas ni/ /las 'dir the tshom med pa yin/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /bsgom dang bzlas la dga' ba dang / /dam tshig zas la dga' ba ni/ /

thogs pa med par tshe yang brtan/ /'di ltar rang gi cho gas bzlas/ /sangs rgyas gnas su legs par 'jug /der ni dam tshig 'khor lo ni/ /mkhas pas bsgom mchod bzlas pa bya/ /gsang sngags 'di dag bshad par bya/ /o~M shrI badzra DA ka a d+hi hU~M/ DA ki nI dzA

la sam+ba ra hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI bud+d+ha DA ka a b+h+ru~M hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI karma DA ka a khaM hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI pad+ma DA ka hri hU~M DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI rat+na DA ka aM hU~M DA ki nI la sam+ba ra hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ mkha' 'gro

bzhi po de dag dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /mgrin pa mnyam par bsnol ba ste/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /de yi mdog dag phyag dang zhal/ /phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par bsgom/ /lha mo mngon du byas nas

ni/ /snying po'i gsang sngags so so yin/ o~M shrI badzra bA rA hi ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI DA ki ni DA~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI lA me lA~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI khaN+Da ro he kha~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI rU pi Ni rU~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di ni lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi'o/ /mtshams kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i

sngags ni/ o~M shrI bud+d+ha DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI karma DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI pad+ma DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI rat+na DA ki ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ sgo ru mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster/ /bzhi po sna tshogs mdog can te/ /ji

bzhin rigs kyis kun la khyab/ o~M hU~M rU be hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hU~M su rU pe hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra du n+ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pra b+hA ka ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ shar phyogs kyi ni snam bu la/ /lha mo bzhi po dgod pa ste/ /sku lus dkar po'i mdog can la/ /de yi gsang sngags bshad pa yin/ /

o~M badzra ba Da ba mu khi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M g+ho mu khi hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra g+ho Ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ya sha spi ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ lho phyogs ni snam bu la/ /lha po bzhi po dgod par bya/ /sku mdog dag ni ser ba ste/ /de yi sngags su bshad pa yin/ o~M badzra dU ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra na khi

hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kau mA ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra kaM bo dzi hu~M hU~M phaT/ nub phyogs kyi ni snam bu la lha mo bzhi po sku mdog dmar po can gyi sngags yin no/ o~M badzra be tA li hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra sI ka hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra gar Da ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra bi ma ba dA ne hu~M hU~M phaT/ byang gi

snam bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang gu de'i gsang sngags bzhad pa yin no/ /o~M tsan+d+ra she kha re hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M b+h+r-i ku Ti hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bi shwa rU pe hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra ka ta ya ni hu~M hU~M phaT/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can

te/ de'i sngags bshad pa/ o~M badzra shr-iM kha le hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra mA le hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzra ya sha ska ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M badzrA na lArke hu~M hU~M phaT/ sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi po sna tshogs pa'i mdog can drag po'i gzugs dang ldan pa ste/ de'i sngags su bshad pa/ shar du

o~M badzra ping+ga le dzaHhu~M hU~M phaT/ lho ru o~M badzra dz+wa la ni hU~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ nub tu o~M badzra kuN+Da li baM hu~M hU~M phaT/ byang du o~M badzra b+hai ra ba ho hu~M hU~M phaT/ thams cad gsal byed mtha' ru ni/ /shrI ni sbyar zhing mchog rim bzhin/ /sngags pas de ltar bzlas na ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dra ba

yi/ /sdom pa'i dngos grub thob pa ste/ /zla ba drug gis bde dbang 'gyur/ /gcig tu byas te bsdus na ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po gzi byin can/ /dra ba'i mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad ni/ /khri'am 'bum du bzlas na ni/ /gsang sngags

rgyal po 'grub pa yin/ /snying po dag ni bzlas pa yis/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma grub cing / /rang nyid ji ltar 'dod par gyur/ /gzhan gyi lus su zhugs 'gro zhing / /mi snang ba dag thob nas ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa yin/ /mngon

par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig gi sdom pa 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i cho ga'i rim/ /sngar bshad sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yi/ /lung la sogs

pa'i rim pa bya/ /rnal 'byor lung ni mi shes pa/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs can yin te/ /rtag tu lung ni spang mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su 'gro/ /shes rab pha rol

phyin dmigs na/ /rnal 'byor gyi ni dngos grub 'grub/ /cig car 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gi lus ni rnam par bsam/ /sngo zhing drag la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /gtum zhing 'jigs la 'jigs par mdzad/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /ral pa zla phyed

spyi gtsug 'ching / /sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa gnon/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /baM hU~M badzra las byung sku lus can/ /phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /skyil krung phyed pas

legs par gnas/ /spyan gsum drag po'i sku lus can/ /mgrin pa bzhi la zhal bzhi pa/ /bcu gnyis phyag dang yang dag ldan/ /stong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog /gdug pa kun gyi thod pa'i phreng / /dus mtha' las byung do shal can/ /gdug pa kun ni zhabs

'og gnon/ /nyon mongs 'jigs byed mgo bo dang / /sred pa gti mug phrag dog ste/ /dus mtshan mo ni khas bub la/ /gdug pa'i bgegs ni 'jigs pa can/ /thams cad zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon/ /nam mkha' dang ni skye ba dang / /dkar ba dang ni dmar ba dang / /

ljang gu steng du bltas pa'i zhal/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa/ /phag mo dag dang bde bar 'khyud/ /kun tu gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /chos rnams kun gyi ro gcig tu/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba/ /dpal gyi bde ba chen po ni/ /rdo rje he ru ka nyid yin/ /thod pa dang

ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo khar gsil dang / /lhung bzed mdung dang zhags pa dang / /lcags kyu mgo bo cang te'u dang / /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis/ /na ra'i pags pa brkyang nas mnabs/ /shar du mA tang gI dang Dom+bi kA/ /ra dza kI dang puk+ka sI/ /kha Ta

kI dang sha ba rI/ /dzi bA rI dang sa ma rI/ /lha mo brgyad po de dag ni/ /ji bzhin rim pas rjes su dgod/ /ser dang sngo dang de bzhin dmar/ /dud pa yi ni mdog can te/ /dmar dang ljang dang dud kha'i mdog /brgyad pa dkar po nyid yin no/ /sgo rnams su ni dgod bya ba/ /

khrag 'thung rdo rje gtum mo dang / /rdo rje sring mchog ma dang ni/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed drag mo ste/ /gdul dka' thams cad gsol mdzad cing / /thal ba sprin mdog ljang gu dang / /dmar dang sngo dang lhag par 'jigs/ /brgyad pa'i dbus su chos khar gsil/ /thod pa cang te'u

gri gug ste/ /phrag pa'i steng du gos 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi/ /thod pa kha T+wAM mi 'jigs pa/ /chos kyi khar gsil cang te'u/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /gdan gyi steng du ni/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /bsod snyoms pa dang

chos gos gsum/ /phyis mi len dang cog pu pa/ /gzhi ji bzhin dang stan gcig pa/ /bla gab med dang shing drung pa/ /dgon pa pa dang dur khrod dang / /khrod pa dang ni phying pa pa'o/ /'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnam dag bsgom/ /ye shes mnyam

pa'i dam tshig mchog /ro gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom/ o~M shrI ma hA su kha badzra he he ru ru ka~M AHhu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ma~M ma tA~M gI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M Da~M badzra Da~M bi nI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ra~M rA dza kI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bu~M puk+ka sI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M kha~M kha Ta kI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M sha~M sha ba rI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M dziM dzi ba rI hu~M

hU~M phaT/ o~M sa~M sa ma rI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M heM he ru kI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M ba~M badzra tsaN DI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M hU~M badzra rUk+Sha sI hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M b+hai badzra b+hai ra pI hu~M hU~M phaT/ de kun gcer pu skra grol ba/ /spyan gsum pa la zhi ba ste/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs lce skyod cing / /phyag rgya lnga yis sku lus

brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /bzhad dang zhi dang snying rje dang / /sgeg pa dang ni rngam pa dang / /drag cing khro ba'i nyams can te/ /bzlas dang bsgom pa spro zhing bsdu/ /lus ngag yid la bde bar gnas/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/ /gdul ba'i thabs kyis

bde ba yi/ /yul la yongs su sbyong lan/ /bla med ye shes 'bras bu 'theb/ /sems can thams cad 'di yis bde/ /'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis/ /ye shes 'bras bu rnyed pa yin/ /'du ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /mchog gi go 'phang thob

pa lo/ /mngon par brjed pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sbyangs pa'i yon tan skyed pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /char dbab cho ga'i rim pa ni/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad mchog gi/ /lte ba ge sar bcas pa la/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje

che/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can/ /phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum 'jigs pa'ang rab tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje mtshon ni gsor mdzad cing / /sdigs mdzub zhags par ldan pa dang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /lcags kyu dang ni mdung bsnams

shing / /dpa' bo'i pags pa mnabs shing 'dzin/ /cang te'u dang ni brgyad par bshad/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni/ /chu lta 'jigs pa myos pa gnon/ /zla ba phyed par la pa 'ching / /sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par brgyan/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /

thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pa na mchog /mchus gnon zhal gdong rnam sgyur zhing / /khro bar pa lta zhing 'jigs par gzigs/ /'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad bri/ /mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang / /

'jog po pad+ma pad+ma che/ /dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu/ /dga' bo dang ni brgyad yin te/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang / /ser dang dud pa'i mdog can te/ /lnga dgu dang ni ser po ste/ /thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs pa/ /'jig

pas bka' drin slong bar byed/ /skrag bas blta zhing gnas pa'o/ /bcom ldan sku lus sngon po can/ /'jigs shing shin tu 'jigs par mdzad/ /g.yas pa dud kha dmar po ste/ /g.yon pa ljang gu dud kha'o/ /steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding gdong / /zhal rnam sgyur zhing

'jigs pa'o/ /nyi ma dmar po'i gzi brjid can/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis nyi mnyam 'od/ /phag mo dag gis mgul 'khyud cing / /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /bde chen mchog ni bcu gnyis pa/ /gri gug tshangs pa'i mgo

bo dang / /rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan/ /lha mo'i mchu ni rnam par 'tshir/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang / /spyan gsum pa la ska rags can/ /'dzam bu'i chu bo mchog gi sku/ /gnyis su med par sbyor bar gnas/ /klu ni rang gi chung mar bcas/ /chu lha'ang chung mar

bcas pa dag /chu lha'i lus ni dkar po can/ /bka' drin dag ni slong bar byed/ /snying gar ye shes 'khor lo dag /de mdog phyag dang zhal yang bskyed/ /de yi snying ga hU~M nA~M hU~M dgod cing / /lus ngag yid kyang de bzhin te/ /klu yi rang snying de nyid la/ /hU~M nA~M hU~M ni

rnam par dgod/ /gsang sngags rgyal po'i cho ga ni/ /khro bo'i tshig ltar bzlas brjod bya/ /chu bo'i 'gram mam rgya mtsho 'am/ /khron pa'am klu yi mtsho dang ni/ /rdzing bu lteng ka rnams su ni/ /blo can khro bo'i bzlas pa bya/ /yang na klu yi gnas su ni/ /sgom pa bzlas

pa dag la 'jug /o~M shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hU~M nA~M nA ga bar ShA pa ya hU~M DA ki nI dzAl sam+ba ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di dag bsgoms te khri tsam bzla/ /dus bzhi dag tu stong du'o/ /zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang / /sa rnams kun tu char 'bab 'gyur/ /dam tshig sbyin sreg mchod

dus su/ /glu dang gar ni nyer ldan pas/ /'o ma dag ni bza' zhing btung / /rnal 'byor pas ni klu brgyad bzla/ /'o ma'i khrus kyi cho ga yis/ /'o mas sbyin sreg bsregs blugs bya/ /'o ma'i shing gi bud shing bya/ /'o ma'i shing gi yam shing dang / /'o mar bcas pas sbyin

sreg bya/ /bum pa 'o mas yongs su dgang / /me sogs mtshams dang phyogs rnams su/ /'o mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ o~M a~M a na nA ya hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ o~M ba~M bu su kai hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ o~M ta~M tak+Sha ka hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ o~M pa~M pad+ma hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ o~M ma~M ma hA pad+ma hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/

o~M sha~M sha~M kha pA la hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ o~M ka~M karko Ta hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ o~M a~M a na ba tap+ta hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ o~M hU~M ba~M ba ru NA ya nA gA d+hi pa ta ye nA ga bar+Sha pa ta ye hU~M nA~M hU~M swA hA/ 'di bzlas khro ba dang bcas pas/ /kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsam bya/ /'o ma 'bras rnying zas su bza'/ /

dbang po thul cing yongs mi smra/ /bri gzugs spangs pa'i mngon sum du/ /khri tsam bzlas na mngon du 'gyur/ /mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing / /smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te/ /'di la the tshom ma byed cig /dngul gyi snod kyi nang du ni/ /yungs kar dang ni chu blugs la/ /

de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas te/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la dri chu dang 'o ma bsres pas khrus byas te/ chu 'gram gyi sa sbrus pa las klu'i gzugs byas la nub tu mgo bstan te/ mgo bo dgu la chus dbang bskur te/ /de nas chu bo'i nang du gzhug go /de ma thag tu

lhas char 'bebs shing / 'dzam bu'i gling du char 'bebs 'gyur/ /sa rnams 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhing / /nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar byed/ /sems can thams cad bde reg gnas/ /phan tshun khro bo'i gzugs can ni/ /bdag bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /rang gi

snying ga kho nar ni/ /he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yis/ /char pa yang ni 'bab par 'gyur/ /ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongs su bzlas na ser ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ /cang te'u la yongs su bzlas na me mched pa'i me rengs par 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa la yongs su bzlas na

'gugs par byed do/ /thod pa la yongs su bzlas na khrag 'gugs par byed do/ /dgra sta la yongs su bzlas na gsod par byed do/ /kha T+wA~M ga la yongs su bzlas na zhi bar byed do/ /gri gug la yongs su bzlas na 'jig rten gsum du rgyu ba gsod par byed do/ /mgo bo la yongs

su bzlas na 'chi ba slong bar byed do/ /rdo rje gsor zhing yongs su bzlas na sa 'og gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /dril bu la yongs su bzlas na mi dga' ba yongs su 'gugs par byed do/ /glang po che'i pags pa la yongs su bzlas te bting na bar snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ /dpag tshad

stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar ldog go /phyag rgya drug la yongs su bzlas na pha rol gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sa steng du ni kun spyod cing / /ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las char dbab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba mchog ni mdor bsdus nas/ /skad cig gis ni bdag sgom pa/ /he ru ka dpal gzugs su bya/ /sngo zhing drag po rnam sgyur ba/ /drag po spyan gsum zhal drug mchog /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dbu mchog la/ /

thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sku la mgo bo'i do shal can/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /phag mo yis ni sku la brgyan/ /zhabs gcig pa ni bzhengs pa ste/ /g.yas pa ser la dud pa'i

mdog /g.yon pa dmar la ljang gu'o/ /steng gi zhal ni rta gdong ste/ /dkar zhing sprin mdog drag cing 'jigs/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /lha mo mchu ni 'tshir ba ste/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs 'dzin cing / /thod pa dang ni
