kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin/ /gri gug zhags pa de bzhin te/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu bshad/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang / /zhabs gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom/ /

glang po'i gdong dang bye'u'i gdong / /seng ge'i gdong yang de bzhin te/ /dang po khyi yi gdong yin te/ /gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin/ /gsum pa phag gi gdong yin te/ /bzhi pa khwa yi gdong can no/ /gnas kyi dbyibs kyi chos bdag nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni

chen po 'dzin/ /mtha' yas rnam rgyal grags pa ste/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad pa/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang / /de bzhin sgom zhing rnam bsgom ste/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin/ /bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol/ /mngon par brjod

pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phag mo'i mchog ni bsgrub pa ste/ /skyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid sgom zhing rnam par bsgom/ /sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis

gzi/ /sku lus sin dur 'dra mi g.yo/ /me tog ban+du ka lta bu/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /dbu skra

mdzes pas 'khril ba ste/ /thabs kyi zhal mchu rnam 'tshir zhing / /mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa ste/ /rna ba'i mthar thug 'gengs par byed/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /lcags kyu mchog gis 'gugs pa ste/ /pad+ma dmar po'i dbus bzhugs shing / /'dod pa thams

cad rab tu stsol/ /yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /zhal drug lha mo'i sku lus 'byung / /steng gi zhal ni phag rgod gdong / /drag po gzi brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi/ /shar gyi 'dab la rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog /g.yon pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dam tshig mchog /nub kyi phyogs

su rdo rje gzi brjid mchog /lho yi phyogs su rdo rje rin chen mchog /me yi phyogs su rdo rje ye shes mchog /bden bral phyogs su rdo rje rig mchog ma/ /rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje grub mchog ma/ /dbang ldan phyogs su rdo rje thal mchog ma/ /sgo la rdo rje 'bar mchog ma/ /rdo rje gzi

brjid mchog ma ste/ /rdo rje khro bo mchog ma dang / /rdo rje mche ba mchog ma'o/ /lha mo de dag thams cad kyang / /dmar ba'i mdog can zhal gsum pa/ /phyag drug pa la spyan gsum pa/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste/ /thams cad

rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing / /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /rang gi lus kyi thabs la 'khril/ /zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu dang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /grwa bzhi dag tu mda' gzhu dag /yongs su 'gengs pa gnas par gzhag /sgo ru g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis

bzhugs/ /gcer bu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal/ /thams cad gdan la bzhugs/ /rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub dang / /zhags pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ /gzhan yang phan tshun dag tu yang / /ji ltar 'khor la sogs phyag 'tshal/ /de snying ye shes lha

mo ni/ /sku gsung thugs dang bcas par bsgom/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyi ro ni mnyam par thim/ /ye shes bzlas pa spros nas ni/ /cho ga'i rim pas yang dag bsdu/ /dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis/ /zla ba'i de nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /

o~M shrI badzra bA rA hi A baM hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra gu h+yot+ta me hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M shrI badzra sa ma yot+ta me hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra te dza ut+ta me hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra rat+not+ta me hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra dz+nyA na ut+ta me hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra bad+yI ut+ta me hu~M hU~M phaT

swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra sid+d+hot+ta me hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra b+ha smot+ta me hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra dz+wa lot+ta me dzaHhu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra a mr-i tot+ta me hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra kro d+hot+ta me ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI badzra daMSh+T+rot+ta me hoHhu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di dag lta'i rim pa

yis/ /bsgom pa dang ni bzlas pa bya/ /bsdu dang spro ba byas nas ni/ /chos rnams kun dang chos can ni/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor bas dag /sems can thams cad rab tu brtag /rnal 'byor gnas ni chos yin te/ /gsang ba gsum la rab tu gzhug /gsang gsum

gnas ni chos yin te/ /chos kyang de bzhin de lta bu/ /bdag med chos ni chos yin te/ /chos las chos ni yong ma yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas

gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma drug cho ga'i rim/ /pad+ma 'dab lnga bris nas ni/ /lte ba ge sar khyab par ni/ /de yi dbus su phag mo ni/ /dmar zhing sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug mdzes/ /spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste/ /thod

pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /skyil krung phyed pa gang dang bcas/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku brgyan cing / /mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste/ /gdug pa'i bdud ni thams cad dang / /dus mtshan kha sbub byas pa la/ /zhabs

kyis kyang ni mnan par bzhugs/ /dmar dang sngo dang ljang ba ste/ /sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /thod dang ni kha TAM 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /mgo bo dang ni gri gug 'dzin/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /snying gar ye

shes dam tshig ni/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor las byung / /shar phyogs lha mo ya mi ni/ /g.yon du bskor nas rnam par dgod/ /rmongs byed mdangs skyod byed ma/ /skrag byed mdang tsaN+Di ka/ /spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /sngo dang

dkar dag ser ba dang / /ljang khu dud pa'i mdog can te/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan//phyogs kyi gos can gar gyi mchog /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mi

bskyod pa yi cod pa na 'chang / /thugs rje'i nyams kyi bde ba ste/ /gnyis med sbyor bas mnyam par ldan/ /rdo rje sems sogs mchog de nyid/ /phag mo dang ni rdo rje sems/ /ya mi ni dang rnam snang mdzad/ /rmongs byed ma dang pad+ma'i gar/ /skyod byed ma dang khrag 'thung

ste/ /skrag byed rdo rje nyi ma dang / /tsaN+Di ka dang rta mchog ste/ /rdo rje sems sku dkar po ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad ser po yin/ /pad+ma gar dbang dmar po ste/ he ru ka dpal sngon po yin/ /rdo rje nyi ma dmar po ste/ /rta mchog dag ni ljang gu'o/ /yang na so sor bsgom

par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum pa/ /phyag drug spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bu thong kha T+wAM/ /ral gri cang te'u mgo bo 'chang / /na ra'i pags mnabs gar dang bcas/ /rnam snang la sogs dpa' bo kun/ /zhal

gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM dang / /cang te'u dril bus mtshan pa'i mchog /yang na thams cad phyag bcu gnyis/ /zhal gdod drug par bsgom par bya/ /de dag gsang sngags 'di yin te/ /o~M shrI o~M ba~M ba~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI ha~M yoM yaM hu~M

hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI hrIM mo~M maM hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI hreM hriM saM hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI hU~M hU~M sa~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shrI phaT phaT tsa~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ de dag ni rnal 'byor ma drug gi gsang sngags so/ o~M haHba~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M na maHhi b+h+ru~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M swA hA hu hri hu~M hU~M phaT swA

hA/ o~M bau She Ta he hi hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M hU~M hU~M ho tra~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M phaT ha~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di ni dpa' bo drug gi sngags/ /bzlas pa dag ni bsgoms tsam gyis/ /'khor lo drug ni mchog grub cing / /'khor los sgyur ba thob pa ste/ /'khor los sgyur drug rgyal por

'gyur/ /mi pham rgyal ba yang dag rdzogs/ /stobs chen rtsal mchog rnyed pa yin/ /phyag mtshan drug la rtag mchod cing / /chog bzhin du mngon bsngags na/ /de ni myur du grub nas ni/ /rnal 'byor rgyal po'i mchog kyang thob/ /mi snang la sogs grub nas ni/ /

khams gsum dag tu rnam par spyod/ /'gro ba drug gi sems can grol/ /bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs/ /yang na 'khor lo zur drug la/ /bde ba chen po rnam snang mdzad/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje 'chag rgyal po/ /'khor los sgyur ba bdag po ni/ /gur gum gyi

ni mdog lta bu/ /gzi mdangs 'bar ba'i 'od can te/ /phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang ngo bo/ /rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'khyud/ /ral gri po ti kha T+wAM ga/ /thod pa lcags kyu zhags pa dang / ut+pa la dang

cang te'u/ /gur gum mdog dang sngo ba dang / /dmar dang ljang gu steng zhal dkar/ /chos kyi dbyings ni dag pa che/ /sems can khams ni rab grol byed/ /shar sogs g.yon bskor dgod pa ni/ /rta mchog tsa ba'i ka dang bcas/ /de dag de ru dgod byas pas/ /

'jam pa'i rdo rje rang nyid 'grub/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /sngo dang dmar dang dkar sngo ljang / /yan lag drug tu dpa' bo dag /mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig bcas/ /rdo rje sems dang phag mo dang / /rnam snang mdzad dang ya mi ni/ /pad+ma gar

dbang rmongs byed bcas/ /khrag 'thung dang ni skyod byed ma/ /rdo rje nyi ma skrag byed ma/ /ljang dang dud pa'i mdog can te/ /de lta'i sku mdog rnam par bsgom/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa'o/ /lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o/ /thod pa dang ni gri gug 'dzin/ /dpa'

bo thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ /rang gi phyag mtshan gnyis med sbyor/ /dril bu lhan cig yang dag ldan/ /cang te'u ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /stag gi pags pa'i shams thabs can/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /mgo bo'i

do shal 'dzin pa ste/ /thams cad steng du bzhugs/ /dbus su 'jigs byed dus mtshan gnon/ /lha mos byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril/ /skra grol ba la phyogs gos can/ /snying gar ye shes dam tshig ni/ /sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar/ /go cha

gnyis pa yang dag sbyar/ /gnas kyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni//dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnam dgod/ /gsang ba gsum ni snying gar gnas/ /khwa gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyi rol sgo ru rnam par dgod//zur du gshin rje sreg la sogs/ /thams

cad gcer bu rnam par bsgom/ /sngar bshad mdog dang phyag mtshan te/ /gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas/ /drag po skra ni grol ba ste/ /thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /rang gi phyi dag nang du yang / /pha rol phyin

drug rnam par dag /sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya/ /spro zing bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzlas pa bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzlas na/ /sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs spros nas/ /'gro ba gsum po rdzogs

par byas/ /nang gi bdag nyid bsgoms pa yis/ /'khor lo gsum gsang bsgoms nas bzla/ /de nyid gsum dang sngags lhan cig /dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /hu~M hU~M phaT ni mtha' ru ste/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bzlas pa bya/ /rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni/ /

dam tshig can gyis de bzla bya/ /o~M shrI many+dzu badzra AHhU~M ma~M hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M haHbadzra satwa hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M ba~M badzra bA rA hi hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M na maHhi badzra bai ro tsan hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M haM yoM ya ma ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M swA hA hu pad+ma narte shwa ri hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M hrIM moM mo ha ni

hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M bau ShaT he he ru ka hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M hrI hrIM saM tsa la ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M hU~M hU~M ho badzra sU r+ya hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M hU~M hU~M saM trA sa ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M phaT haM par mA shwa hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M kA kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M u lU

kA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M shwA nA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M sU ka ra s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M ya ma dA D+hi hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M ya ma dU ti hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M ya ma daMSh+T+ri Ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M ya ma ma tha ni hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ g.yon dang g.yas kyi lag gnyis su/ /go cha gnyis po bkod nas ni/ /gang zhig ji ltar

'dod pa ru/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa yin/ /the tshom med par las byas na/ /nges par dngos grub gzhan du min/ /yang na mgon pos bcu'i dbang / /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab

drug pa ste/ /thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang / /ye shes sgo skyong rnam dag pa'o/ /rab tu dga' dang dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can/ /sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur/ /ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /'di yis rnam

par dag pa bsgom/ /gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi pa ni/ /'phags pa'i bden par rnam par bsgom/ /sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang / /'gog pa dang ni lam rnams te/ /bcom ldan 'jam po'i rdo rje dpal/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam dag ste/ /ye shes rang gi

ngo bo yin/ /'di ltar rnam par dag pa bsgom/ /gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i lam/ /gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /rnal 'byor stobs kyis gsang ba mchog /sgrub pas rjes su bstan pa dang / /ji bzhin bdag po'i dbye ba dang / /bla ma'i rim pa

legs par bslabs/ /'di ltar cho ga gnyis med par/ /sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchog yin te/ /dngos grub kun gyi thabs kyi rgyu/ /rnal 'byor ma thugs gsang ba che/ /las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu ster/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gnyis su med

pa'i go cha'i sbyor bskyed pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /brda ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /brda ni yongs su mi shes par/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub mi 'grub ste/ /'di ni des par shes pa na/ /dngos grub 'grub

par the tshom med/ /dwa zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad/ /di zhes bya ba bud med yin/ /pu zhes bya ba gnon pa yin/ /su zhes bya ba za ba nyid/ /ma zhes bya ba ma ru bshad/ /ya zhes bya ba chung ma nyid/ /b+ha zhes bya ba sring mo yin/ /b+hi zhes bya ba mdza' mor bshad/ /lu

zhes bya ba bu mo yin/ /sri zhes bya ba khrag tu bshad/ /so ni zhi ba'i btung ba yin/ /pe zhes bya ba thug pa ste/ /pi zhes bya ba de bzhin sha/ /bzhes bya ba za ba yin/ /b+hu zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin/ /pi zhes bya ba dur khrod yin/ /du zhes bya ba ro yin no/ /TI zhes

bya ba rnal 'byor ma/ /gA zhes bya ba lA ma yin/ /tri zhes bya ba gzugs can ma/ /ku zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma/ /ha ni khaN+Da ro nyid ma/ /dza zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis/ /bzhes bya ba gsong por smra/ /swa zhes bya ba legs 'ongs yin/ /mi zhes bya ba nya yin la/ /

byo zhes bya ba bza' ba min/ /phyo zhes bya ba btung ba min/ /ga ni bgrod dang bgrod min yin/ /ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin/ /sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro/ /ra zhes bya ba khyo med mo/ /du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo/ /su zhes bya ba skal bzang mo/ /na zhes bya bskal ngan

ma/ /sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can/ /a zhes bya ba dam tshig med/ /I zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin/ /na zhes bya ba ma 'ongs yin/ /so zhes bya ba chags pa yin/ /'di dag yi ge'i brnga yin te/ /dbang bskur dus su rnal 'byor pas/ /bza' dang bza' med

sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni mchog yin te/ /dam tshig mchog ni shes pa dang / /dam tshig can gyi dam tshig dus/ /dam tshig 'khor lo 'dus pa dang / /dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya/ /ma dad pa la sbyin mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las brda'i

le'u ste su bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob/ /bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar zhing / /pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mig /rtag tu gos

ni dkar la dga'/ /tsan+dan sar pa'i dri dang ldan/ /bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'/ /de rigs las byung shes par bya/ /bud gang btso ma'i gser 'dra zhing / /dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'/ /dzA ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan/ /de yang bzang po'i rjes 'gror 'gyur/ /

thams cad ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs/ /dri dang gos ni sngo la dga'/ /ut+pal sngon po'i dri yod pa/ /de ni dpa' bo bzang rjes 'gro/ /bud med pad dkar 'dra mdog gang / /rtag tu pad+ma'i rtsa ba dri/ /de yang de bzhin dpa' mo'i blo/ /dmar zhing ser skya'i bud med gang / /gzugs

bzang gos ni dmar ba dang / /ma la ki dang ut+pal dri/ /de ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin/ /ser zhing ljang ba'i bud med gang / /gos ni dkar la dga' ba dang / /mgo la me tog dri dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs rigs rdzes 'gro yin/ /bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar/ /de'i

mdog can gyi gos 'chang zhing / /rtag tu ga bur dri dang ldan/ /rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro zhing / /rnal 'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni/ /de ltar bdun po ngas bshad pa/ /g.yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'/ /rang gi mdog gis rigs drug ldan/ /rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge

yang / /kha dog drug tu 'gyur ba yin/ /rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang / /rang rig las byung tshig tu smra/ /g.yon las 'gro ba'i bud med gang / /rnal 'byor pa la g.yon la rtag /lag pa g.yon gyis mtshon pa dang / /g.yon nas ltabs rnam par

blta/ /lha mo rnams dang gar smra ba/ /de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad/ /bud med gang byas de nyan cing / /rigs kyis bon rab tu smra/ /rigs kyi bya ba mi spong ste/ /rang gis bstan bshad mi 'dor la/ /rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos/ /de ni dam tshig ldan par

bshad/ /phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba/ /g.yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu 'dud/ /lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba/ /de ni nges par bde bar 'gro/ /mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni/ /rkang pas ri mo 'dri byed cing / /mgo ni 'phrul par byed pa dang / /zur gyis lta zhing

lag pa ston/ /sgrub pa po la kh+y+da par du/ /de yis rang rig dran pa dang / /mkhur ba'am kos ko dag dang ni/ /sna dag tu ni thal mo ston/ /zur gyis lta zhing lan cig bsngags/ /zlos shing rigs la rnam par blta/ /bden par 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /nges par

dam tshig can yin na/ /de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang dag 'byung / /ya mi nI dang skrag byed ma/ /'dod ldan phag mo 'jigs gzugs can/ /kun tu spyod pa bsur/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnam pa bdun/ /mdor

bsdus rang mtshan bshad pa yin/ /gzugs can ma dang tsum pi kA/ /lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo/ /mi ldog e hi kA lha mo/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni mdun du bshad/ /mngon par bzhes pas blta ba dang / /smin ma 'degs par gar byed cing / /sngon bzhin gzugs

ni sdus byed la/ /phyis ni 'jigs par byed pa dag /gzugs can ma ni yin par bshad/ /gnyis med dpa' bos bsnyen par bya/ /sdug pa'am yang na mi sdug pa/ /byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pa na/ /de ni tsum pa kA+er shes bya/ /mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid

yin/ /zas mi lta bar zur du blta/ /khro gnyer dang ni gdong dag dang / /smin ma sgyur zhig sdigs mdzub dang / /'di ni gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin/ /'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa/ /de ni lA ma yin par bstan//phag dang dred dang byil dang / /ce spyang rigs dang

stag dag dang / /thams cad der ni 'jigs byed pa/ /yongs su gyur par de bshad do/ /shin tu dga' bas rgod pa dang / /song nas slar yang mi ldog la/ /rjes su chags pas/ /la bar rgod/ /dum skyes mar ni de bshad do/ /yid ni kun tu skyo ba dang / /rkang pa

lag pas bong ba 'am/ /gos mtha' 'am yang na shing dag gis/ /des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /mi ldog par ni shes bya ste/ /bsgrub min par ni de bshad do/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs phyag rgya/ /dpa' bos bsnyen cing mtshan ma blta/ /thod pa dgra sta mche ba

dang / /ral gri kun tu skrag byed yin/ /rdo rje dang ni dung nyid dang / /rigs kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan ma'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro

rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /gang zhig yag dag shes pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o/ /dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang / /pad+ma'i dri ni rnam par gtong / /lta stangs rang bzhin zhi ba dang / /zhes pas lta ba'i rjes 'gro ba/ /bud med gang gi sen

mo dmar/ /mig ni kun tu zhen pa dang / /khyim du pad+ma 'dri ba ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang rigs byung yin/ /smin ma'i dbus na rtse gsum yod/ /lus ni sngo ba sangs skya ba dang / /rtag tu rdo rje rigs bsgom pa/ /gang gi khyim du rdo rje 'dri/ /rtag tu mchod pa byed pa yi/ /mkha'

'gro ma de dpal ldan ni/ /he ru ka yi rigs byung yin/ /gang gi dpral bar rtse gsum ni/ /mdung thung dag ni snang 'gyur zhing / /mig dmar mdog ni dmar ser dang / /de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar/ /ra skyes khyim bya dag la yang / /rtag tu yid ni dgar 'gyur zhing / /de

yi khyim du rdo rje mtshan/ /rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed pa/ /shrI he ru ka'i rigs byung ba/ /mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi za/ /'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am/ /lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba/ /sprin sngon dag dang 'dra ba ni/ /rtag tu dpral bar 'chang

byed pa/ /skal ba chen po kun tshogs shing / /mchog tu bden pa gang yin dang / /khyim du 'khor lo 'dri byed cing / /rtag tu de la mchod byed pa/ /rdo rje phag mo rigs byung ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni stobs kyis dregs/ /gang zhig mig sman gnas 'dra zhing / /so

ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang / /rtag tu gdug par gyur pa dang / /sems stobs ldan par gyur pa dang / /rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang / /mang du smra bar mi byed cing / /khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba dang / /rtag tu dge bas mchod byed pa/ /rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba/ /stong phrag

bcu dang lda pa yin/ /ser zhing gser gyi mdog 'drar snang / /mig mi g.yo zhing kha spu ser/ /rdo rje gang gi dpral ba 'am/ /lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba/ /rtag tu rgyal srid dag la gnas/ /snyems shing bden par smra ba dang / /mA li ka yi dri 'byung zhing / /gang

gi khyim du rdo rje ni/ /rtag tu 'dri zhing cher mchod pa/ /dum skyes ma yi rigs las byung / /rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyug mchog /gang zhig rta par sha la dga'/ /skem zhing mig sman gnag pa'i mdog /dpral bar mdung rtse lta bu yod/ /gang zhig gdug pa'i

las la dga'/ /rtag tu dur khrod dag tu 'gro/ /'jigs pa med cing brtse med de/ /gang gis dpral bar thig le dang / /khyim du thod pa 'dri zhing mchod/ /dpal ldan he ru ka de yi/ /mkha' 'gro'i rigs las byung ba yin/ /sprin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang / /so

ni mi mnyam par gnas shing / /rtag tu gtug pa'i las la dga'/ /g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dang / /de yi khyim du dgra sta ni/ /'dri zhing rtag tu mchod byed pa/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro mar ni the tshom med/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi

tshogs 'di dag /shrI he ru ka'i rigs las byung / /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /mtshan nyid yang dag bshad pa yin/ /mgon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /

sgrub pa po yis lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid kyi ni khyad par dang / /yang lag tshogs ni shes bya ba'o/ /gang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun tu zlum por snang 'gyur zhing / /kha yi sma ra rtag tu yod/ /sbu dang smin ma ring ba dang / /gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba dang / /

mi 'khrugs bden par smra ba dang / /rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'/ /dpa' bo sring mor de shes bya/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyar sbyin bya ba/ /yang na ru sbal phyag rgya bya/ /pags pa bum pa spyi blugs nyid/ /phyag rgya'i lan du shes par bya/ /de ni tshes bcu'i res dag la/ /khyim

du pad+ma 'dri bar 'gyur/ /lA ma yi ni bud med kyi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /gsus pa rlo zhing mig dkyus ring / /mig ni dmar zhing zer skyar gnas/ /phyug cing skal bzang dpal yon can/ /ser zhing tsam pa lta bur snang / /shin tu ring min thung ba 'ang min/ /

sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'/ /dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing / /mtshams kyi gyen du bltas pa nas/ /dgod cing dga' ba nyid dag dang / /lam ni rnam par gnon cing gnas/ /g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyi ni/ /gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'/ /de lta'i rab

dregs mthong na ni/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa yis/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bstan par bya/ /g.yon pa dag ni yongs bzlog pa/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi dang ni tshes brgyad na /de ni dus tshigs yin par

bshad/ /khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang / /bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod/ /'jig rten dbang phyug lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /gang gi mkhur tshos dag tu ni/ /khung bar snang ba gnas gyur cing / /de bzhin rtag tu dmar zhing ser/ /mig ni ljang

ser dag tu snang / /skra ni de bzhin 'khyil ba dang / /mgo dang dpral bar dar bcings snang / /ri mo gcig pa rab tu gnas/ /de bzhin mgrin pa ring pa dang / /rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing / /dgod cing glu ni len pa nyid/ /lan 'ga' zhig ni khro ba

dang / /sems ni rnam par g.yo ba dang / /rtsod pa la ni dga' ba ste/ /'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong na ni/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis/ /dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su ldog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lam ni yin par

bshad/ /thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang / /rtag tu gos ser la dga' zhing / /phrag pa dag na gos kyang 'chang / /de 'dra'i bud med mthong na ni/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan bya zhing / /'bad pa yis ni gnyis pa yang / /dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa

ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi de yi dus yin te/ /de yi khyim du rdo rje 'dri/ /shrI he ru ka lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /lus kun la ni ba sbu yod/ /mig ni gnag cing ser ba dang / /sbom zhing rnam sgyur mi bzad pa/ /bzhin 'phel che

zhing kha che la/ /ma mchu rlo zhing kha dog nag /mig zlum sna ni nyams pa dang / /rtag tu glu ni mkhas pa dang / /sprin gyi mdog can yid 'phrog pa/ /'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong na ni/ /glu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis/ /mdung gi phyag rgya

bstan par bya/ /g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /tshes grangs bcu gcig de yi dus/ /khyim du mche ba 'dri bar byed/ /rdo rje phag mo lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla las lA ma'i

mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi brnga rnams te/ /gang zhig spun dag sring mo ru/ /yang dag shes par 'gyur ba'o/ /gang zhig lag g.yon ston pa ni/ /gsor por smra ba ston pa yin/ /

gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni/ /gsong por smra ba lan 'gyur yin/ /gang zhig lto ba rdebs pa ni/ /bdag ni bkres par ston pa yin/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston pa ni/ /nam mkha' las ni 'ongs zhes pa'o/ /gang zhig khar ni sor mo 'dzud/ /zos zin zhes ni

smra ba yin/ /gang zhig lce ni bskyod pa dag /za'o zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig pus mo la reg pa/ /ngal lo zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig sor mo'i rtse la reg /ngal sos zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig so ni 'cha' byed pa/ /sha za'o zhes ni smra ba yin/ /

lag pa g.yas pa ston pa ni/ /'di ltar gyis zhes ston pa yin/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa ni/ /bcings so zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig mkha' lding ston pa ni/ /grol lo zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig khu tshur ston pa ni/ /de la pa ta ti bstan bya/ /gang

zhig skra ni ston pa la/ /rnam par 'gyur ba bltas nas ni/ /kha T+wAM ga ni de la bstan/ /gang zig yan lag bskyod pa dang / /de la mche ba bstan par bya/ /gang zhig lag pas lag pa ston/ /gtor ma za zhes smra ba yin/ /gang zhig lag pa g.yas pa ston/ /de

ltar gyis shig smra ba yin/ /gang zhig rna ba la reg pa/ /gnas par bya zhes ston pa yin/ /gang zhig sen mos sen mo reg /shi yis khyer zhes bya ba yin/ /gang zhig sa 'dri dkyil 'khor du/ /de ring 'jug ces smra ba yin/ /gang zhig nu ma la reg pa/ /bdag

gi du ni srungs zhes bya/ /gang zhig mthe g.yon sa la 'dri/ /gnyen dag srungs shig pa ru bshad/ /gang zhig mig ni rnam 'dzums pa/ /de ltar bya zhes smra ba yin/ /gang zhig tshigs la reg khyed pa/ /bde bar nyal zhes smra ba yin/ /pho nya ma ni gang yang rung / /de

dag kun gyis yang dag spyad/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las brnga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas yan lag phyag rgya yi/ /mtshan nyi dag yis bshad par bya/ /bud gang spyi gtsug reg byed pa/ /mgo bo de la bstan par bya/ /gang

zhig dpral ba ston pa ni/ /de lam bur tshos bstan par bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston pa la/ /de la lce ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mchu ni ston byed pa/ /de la dpung pa bstan par bya/ /gang zhig rked rgyab ston byed pa/ /de la sa ni bstan par bya/ /

gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa/ /de la kos ko bstan par bya/ /gang zhig lto ba ston byed pa/ /de la lte ba bstan par bya/ /gang zhig gsang ba ston byed pa/ /de la ling ga bstan par bya/ /gang zhig brla ni ston byed pa/ /de la 'og ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig pus mo

ston byed pa/ /de la byin pa bstan par bya/ /gang zhig rkang pa ston byed pa/ /de la rkang mthil bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sor tshigs snyon byed pa/ /de la sen mo bstan par bya/ /gang zhigs ni ston byed pa/ /de la nam mkha' bstan par bya/ /gang zhig nam mkha' ston

byed pa/ /de la nyi ma bstan par bya/ /gang zhig chu bo ston byed pa/ /de la rgya mtsho bstan par bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /yan

lag ji bzhin phyag rgya'i mchog /gang zhig shes pas spun nam ni/ /sring mor the tshom med 'gyur ro/ /sor mo gcig ni ston pa yis/ /legs par 'ongs zhes smra ba yin/ /sor mo gnyis ni bstan pa yis/ /legs 'ongs lan ni smra ba yin/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma

kun gyi/ /yan lag phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug mig gi rgya/ /sngags pas gang la de bstan te/ /de mod ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar/ /dbang du 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa/ /de la mdzub mo bstan par bya/ /gang

zhig srin lag ston byed pa/ /de la lce ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig pa ti sa ston pa/ /de la mdun ni bstan par bya/ gang zhig spyi bo ston byed pa/ /de la mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya/ /gang zhigs ni ston byed pa/ /de la mkha' ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig khro

gnyer ston byed pa/ /de la mtshams ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston byed pa/ /de la mchu ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa/ /de la kha ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa/ /de la ste ba bstan par bya/ /'di ni rnal 'byor

ma kun gyi/ /rim bzhin yan lag phyag rgya yin/ /'di dag rtag bstan gsang ba pa/ /yang dag lta bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' 'gro ma'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan

yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid do/ /gang gi ring nas dpa' bo dang / /dpa' mo sring mor shes 'gyur ba'o/ /dam tshig can gang rjes chags pa/ /rnal 'bor longs spyod sa gzhi yin/ /gzhir ni sa gzhi byas nas su/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sdom pa

mchod/ /go bzlog pa yis lta ba ni/ /bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur ba nyid/ /rtag tu bzhin gyi smin ma g.yo/ /sna tshogs myur du shes bya ba/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro las byung ba'i/ /rnam sgyur 'khyim par shes bya ste/ /ri mo gsum pa yongs su zlum/ /mkha' 'gro ma

rnams nges 'gro ba'i/ /de yi mtshan ma shes par bya/ /gal te ldog par gyur na ni/ /sngar bshad don ni btang bar 'gyur/ /de yi dngos ni 'jig gyur pa/ /rdo rje lta bur gsal ba yin// sgra ni khu byug skang lta bur/ /gsal bde ni rtag tu gyur/ /'di ni mtshan ma'i

khyim du ni/ /rdo rje lta bu me longs bcas/ /ral gri 'dra ba'i me long bcas/ /phyag mtshan mdung 'drar rtag tu 'byung / /de gsal me long yin zhes bya/ /mtshan mar byas pa'i gzugs dag ni/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa/ /'di ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /

mchog yin par ni shes par bya/ /po taM gi zhes bya ba ni/ /gsong por smra ba'o/ /pra ti pa taM gi zhes bya ba ni/ /gsong par smra ba'i lan no/ /ga mu zhes bya ba ni 'gro'o zhes bya ba yin no/ /luM kaM zhas bya ba ni 'ong ngo zhes bya ba yin no/ /de hi zhes bya ba ni zas zhes bya ba

yin no/ /gri ha na zhes bya ba ni bram ze zhes bya ba yin no/ /pi ra NaM zhes bya ba ni snying nyid do/ /mar Na zhes bya ba ni sgra ngan no/ /gAn d+ha zhes bya ba'i kar ni ka'o/ /shi ro ni no/ /ka ra ni lto ba'o/ /ba ra ni sgra'o/ /shra ra ma No ni rna ba'o/ /a

mri ta swA ni bsrubs pa'o/ /sa ma ga ma ni mi'o/ /ta li ka ni mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /na ra ka ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /a mo ka ni dur khrod do/ /ka li ka ni sgo'o/ /shwa sa ni bram ze'i rigs so/ /pa ri d+hi ni rgyal rigs so/ /bi ra ti ni rje'u rigs so/ /krur ni dmangs rigs so/ /

a na tas+thA ni sme sha can no/ /pa shu li ka ni khyim mo/ /TA ka ni sring mo'o/ /me la pa ka ni chu'o/ /gri ha ra Na ni rdo rje chu gtong ba'o/ /lce so la reg pa ni ltogs par ston pa'o//tri sh+na ni dris bsgo ba'o/ /ku ta ni gnas che ge mo nas 'ongs so zhes bya ba'o/ /ki ra na ni me tog go/ /

tu mu la ni rgod pa'o/ /tan ta ni char dbab pa bzlog pa'o/ tr-i pa ta ni zhu ba'o/ /d+hu r+yo ni shes pa'o/ /nri ha ni sprin no/ /d+hu pa ni bdug pa'o/ /sa nu ni ri bo'o/ /sa ri ta ni chu bo'o/ /a gu li ni yan lag go/ /ba da na ni gdong ngo / /dzA ti ka ni lce'o/ /an ta na ni so'o/ /

pak+Shi ni rgyal mtshan no/ /tshan+do ni phreng ba'o/ /tsa la ni rlung ngo / /pa shu ni so/ /yan ti ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /sa na ma ni bzhi mdo'o/ /phal ku shaM ni skye bo'o/ /ma hA k+Sha ra ba ni phyugs chen po'o/ /ga ni sa skyes so/ /na ni mi'o/ /go ni khyu mchog go/ /ma ni ma

he'o/ /b+ha ni bza' ba'o/ /ha ni rnam grangs so/ /ad+h+ya ni rgyal po'o/ /kha la reg pa ni zos so zhes pa'o/ /lce la reg pa ni ngoms so zhes pa'o/ /na sti ni snying po'o/ /hri ni ngo tsha'o/ /me thun gyis shig pa'o/ /brla la reg pa ni stong pa'o/ /steng du gcig go/ /

'og tu med pa'o/ /phyag rgya dang rgya'i lan no/ /dpa' bo'i gsung gi gsang ba'i brda'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni/ /rnyed dka'i dam

tshig nga yis bshad/ /skyes pa'am bud med g.yon nas 'gro/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ /khyim dang zhing du rnam gnas pa/ /shin tu ring yang shes par 'gyur/ /he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med/ /slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid ni/ /rgyud 'di ru ni sgrub pa po/ /

legs par gyur pa nyid yin te/ /brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya/ /nus pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /pho nya me brgyad 'di dag ni/ /mos dag dad pa 'phel byed pa/ /rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu/ /dam tshig rnams kyang skyod ba'o/ /lha mo gzhan dag kun sbyor ba'i/ /'dod

la rmongs par gyur pa dang //gnyis su med dang thogs med dang / /dam tshig spyad par spyad pa dang / /bud med dbang phyug shin tu spyor/ /tshangs pa spyod pa de bzhin gzhi/ /khro med rgyun gyi kun tu spyod/ /'di brgyad dam tshig kun spyod yin/ /sgrub pa la ni gnas pa yi/ /

sgrub pa po yis rtag shes bya/ /rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste/ /rgyu med pa ni gzhom mi bya/ /dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi/ /mig dang lag pas ma yin no/ /gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing / /rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya/ /blo ldan mthe chung bskyod par ni/ /pho nya mo rnams yang dag

gnas/ /dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste/ /sgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas/ /mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang / /gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi'o/ /yul yul du ni dka' thub can/ /pho nya'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma brtag /pho nya ral gri so 'dra zhing / /dag byed bsod

nams 'phel byed yin/ /de bzhin pho nya legs 'dres pas/ /sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob/ /bzlas mchod bsam gtan med par yang / /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa pos/ /mchod pa nyid la rab tu 'jug /'di las gzhan

pa'i mchod med de/ /de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin/ /pho nya'i lam la dga' ba dang / /sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson/ /rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /zas la rtag tu spyad par bya/ /sgrub pa po ni legs pa ru/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i rigs rnams ni/ /

kun la nye bar spyad bya zhing / /bza' min par ni mi brtag go/ /'di nyid du ni de dbyer med/ /pho nya mo yi sgrub pa nyid/ /dngos grub cho ga la spyod tshe/ /pho nya gcig pu kho na yin/ /byang chub phyogs kyi dngos grub ni/ /sgrub pa dag dang nye ba dang / /bla

ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i/ /dbang bskur bas ni sngags legs ldan/ /pho nya rnams su yang dag bshad/ /phyag rgya legs sbyor dang tshul dang / /chags med gtong dang tshul khrims dang / /ye shes rgyu skyes yang dag rdzogs/ /sems kyi bdag nyid nang par langs/ /

lus kyi bya ba kun byas te/ /lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni/ /lus la gnas par kun tu spyad/ /dag byed byas pa'i lus kyis ni/ /rtag tu sngags ni brjod par bya/ /rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan cing / /mtshon cha rnams ni 'gom mi bya/ /dam tshig can la

khro mi bya/ /mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya/ /de dang lhan cig bde bar bya/ /bdag gi don dang gzhan don du/ /dam tshig spyod pa nyid du bya/ /'di la lhan cig longs spyod bya/ /mtshan mo rtag par nam mkha'i gos/ /gnag dang dmar bar rtag 'gyur bya/ /

srog chags yan lag las byung gyon/ /bde ba 'dod pas bde thob 'gyur/ /mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spang gtsang / /shrI he ru kas byin brlabs pas/ /phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /dus kun tu ni yang dag ldan/ /rigs dang rigs min ngor mi blta/ /spyi gtsug

la sogs bcing pa spang / /pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin/ /gnyis pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod/ /zas gcig tu ni za ba nyid/ /gtsang sbra gsum pa yin par bshad/ /gtsang sbra 'di dag rab sbyangs pas/ /gtsang ma'i dag pa'i rim thob na/ /dngos grub gang las

'byung mi 'gyur/ /de nyid bsdus las gang gsungs dang / /de bzhin bde mchog las gang gsungs/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las yang dag bshad/ /de bzhin dpal mchog dang po dang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid las gsungs/ /bzlas dang brtul zhugs sogs pa 'grub/ /

de 'dir bsam gtan tsam gyis ni/ /sngags pas skad cig gis 'grub 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor lam la dga' bas kyang / /gtsang sbra 'di ni yang dag spyad/ /gsod nams gtsang sbra las byung gang / /sgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po/ /stong phrag gcig pa'i zhal min par/ /

kha gcig gis ni brjod mi nus/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che/ /rnam dag mtshan nyid kun sgrub pa/ /bde ba'i bsod nams chu 'thung pa/ /dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed yin/ /reg pa dang ni smras pas kyang / /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing / /lus ngag skyon ni

med pa yi/ /gang zhig spyod pa byed pa yi/ /mi mtshog sdig pa thams cad ni/ /rnam dag bdag nyid bde gshegs kyi/ /sa rnams kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /skye zhing skye bar de bzhin gshegs/ /rigs 'gyur chos ldan rgyal por 'gyur/ /de ltar rtag tu mchod

byas nas/ /dad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas mchod pa rnam dag pas/ /mya ngan 'das las byung dpa' bo/ /de bzhin bdag nyid mchod pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun tshogs sras bcas dang / /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma/ /brtan pa dag dang g.yo ba dang / /

spun gyi mchod pa'i dus 'dzin pa/ /zla ba'i dus la gnas pa yi/ /spun dang bu dag lhan cig tu/ /bde dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba/ /sngags dang de bzhin phyag rgya dang / /ye shes der ni bstan mi bya/ /dag byed zas la spyod pa ni/ /rtag tu dam tshig spyod byas

'gyur/ /gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya/ /man ngag rnam par nyams mi bya/ /dam tshig gnas la ci rigs par/ /man ngag rnams kyang sbyin par bya/ /pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la/ /'dod pa rmongs pas 'gro mi byed/ /rtag tu pho nya chags bral ba/ /mi

'da' ba yis longs spyod bya/ /skye gnas dman la mi gnas pa//bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas/ /'khor lo'am de bzhin grub pa la/ /dka' ba nges par zad par 'gyur/ /mchog dang tha ma lhan cig 'gags

te ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rtag g.yon nas spyod/ /rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du 'dor/ /lag pa g.yon pa yongs su bsgyur/ /g.yon gyi phyed ni rab mchod byed/ /lus ni g.yon ni rnam par gnon/ /g.yon pa yis ni tshim dang za/ /brtul

zhugs mnyams brtul zhugs rdzogs/ /sgrub pa po ni dam tshig brtson/ /dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang / /lhan cig zas la spyod par byed/ /rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa'i/ /rigs ni rnam pa bzhi ru bsgrags/ /rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa'i/ /rnal 'byor bsgrub

la rab tu mchod/ /ba lang sha dang rta sha dang / /khyi sha dag dang sna tshogs pas/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyi zas/ /sngags pas phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /shrI he ru ka'i sprul pa yi/ /

nyer spyod bstan bcos kun la brtag /rtag tu de dag gzung zhing bsrung / /las rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /bgegs med ji bzhin 'grub 'gyur bar/ /'dir ni gzhan dag 'gyur ma yin/ /'di ni pho nya mchog bzang po/ /brtson zhing lhan cig ldan par yin/ /ma

chags dga' ba'i longs spyod rdzogs/ /rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam dbye nyid/ /bla ma'i man ngag la dga' zhing / /de yi don ni mchog mtshungs pa'o/ /spun dang yang na pha dang ni/ /bdag po nyid du skad cig mthong / /lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la/ /rtsub cing spu ni dmar

ser yin/ /dngos grub kun gyi thun mong du/ /bzlas dang brtul zhugs la rtag dga'/ /dran pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ /pho nya la sogs gnas dang bcas/ /mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed

pa'i/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /rnal 'byor 'bras bu rab ster ba/ /gsang sngags 'di las byung ba yin/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya dang bral gsang sngags ni/ /lus can rnams la byin mi rlob/ /ji

srid 'gro ba'i bya ba dag /shin tu sbyor bas rtogs par bya/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa/ /rnal 'byor pa la gang zhig sdang / /khyi yi skye gnas brgyar skye ste/ /sme sha can du skye bar 'gyur/ /dper na la la mar 'dod pas/ /'bad pas chu ni bsrubs gyur kyang / /

mar sar 'byung mar mi 'gyur gyi /lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad/ /'dzin cing mchod par byed pa ni/ /'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i/ /rnal 'byor gzhan la sten pa ni/ /gzhan du de bzhin don med 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor che mchog dpa' bo ni/ /yul phyogs

gang na gnas gyur pa/ /rigs ngan kla klo yin na yang / /yul de yongs su brtags pa yin/ /sems can rjes su bzung ba'i rgyur/ /da rung rang ni rtag tu gnas/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las pho nya'i grangs kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po mchog /dpa' bo rnams kyi khyad par ni/ /gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten gsum po g.yo byed cing / /rjes su dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /yang dag dngos grub rim gyis ster/ o~M sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra

war+N+Na nI ye hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni gsang sngags che/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog /sngags chen bklags pas 'grub pa ste/ /'dod pa thams cad 'grub pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dum skyes ma dang lA ma'ang de/ /o~M hrIHha ha hu~M

hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni gsang sngags che/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog /'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub/ /gsang sngags kun gyi gsang sngags gtso/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa/ /dpa' bo kun gyi snying po mchog /gsang sngags de dag

mchog dam pa/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/ /dpa' bo'i sdom pa mchog yin no/ /'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te/ /'di ni sngags su grags pa yin/ /sa 'og dang ni mtho ris dang / /ji ltar mtshams kyang de bzhin te/ /gang yang

ji bzhin las rnams kyis/ /'jig rten gsum po 'grub pa yin/ /de yis thams cad grub nas ni/ /gsang sngags mchog ni bla med pas/ /'jig rten gsum po 'grub pa yin/ /gang gis bla na med pa dag /sgrub pa pos ni thams cad 'grub/ /mkha'

'gro ma dang dpa' bo kun/ /mdor bsdus rgyas par ma yin no/ /ri mo mdzes par bris nas ni/ /sna tshogs me tog 'bras bur ldan/ /de yi steng du dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang dum skyes ma/ /dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo nyid/ /

ha ha he he zhes bzhad pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' bo'i rigs/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /sngar bshad dpa' bo dpa' ba'i mchog /dpa' bo'i mchog ni thams cad nyid/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' bo rnams/ /de yis 'gro ba grangs med khyab/ /dpa' bo dang ni

mkha' 'gro nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang de bzhin te/ /'khor lo'i gnas su rnam par blta/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub byed cing / /'khor lor bzhugs la rtag tu mchod/ /legs par mnyam bzhag 'dod pa 'grub/ /sngar

bshad cho ga bzhin bzlas shing / /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /bsams pas 'khor lo chen po yi/ /dngos grub kyang ni thams cad 'grub/ /sangs rgyas bye bas gsungs pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni re re la/ /'khor gyi grangs kyang bye ba snyed/ /rnal 'byor ma

dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma ni khyad par du/ /dngos grub thams cad byed pa dge/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo'i las kyi rim pa sgrub pa rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //

de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sku gzugs ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni/ /dung chen dag ni kho na las/ /mkhas pas gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /yan lag dang ni nying lag mchog /mos pa'i yid ni sngon 'gro ba'i/ /rnal 'byor

pas ni gzung zhing bsgrub/ /dri chen chu dang rak+ta dang / /shu krar bcas pas mchod par bya/ /na ra dpal chen bdug spos ni/ /dpa' bo'i las kyi sgrub pa ste/ /bla ma yi ni go 'phang 'grub/ /de nas bdag nyid mchod byas te/ /'dod pa thams cad 'thob 'gyur zhing / /

rgyal po'i bud med rnyed par 'gyur/ /ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /lag pa'i mchod pa rab tu bya/ /pags chen ri mo bris nas ni/ /sgrub pa po yis mnyam bzhag na/ /zhag bdun gyis ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /the tshom med par rnam par spyod/ /rnal 'byor ma

dang bla ma mchod/ /mkha' 'gro'i gnas su de bzhin skye/ /des ni bde ba rnyed nas kyang / /las ni rtag tu byed par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bla ma mchod nas ni/ /de yi dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni sgrub pa yis/ /glang po'i pags la sku gzugs bri/ /

rnal 'byor ma yi sgrub pa yis/ /ba lang pags la ri mo bri/ /mkha' spyod dag ni sgrub pa yis/ /rta yi pags la ri mo bri/ /sa la spyod pa'i sgrub pa yis/ /ma he'i pags la ri mo bri/ /sa 'og spyod pa'i sgrub pa yis/ /phag gi pags la ri mo bri/ /gnod sbyin

mo ni sgrub pa yis/ /shing spang leb la sku gzugs bri/ /lha yi bu mo sgrub pa yis/ /tsam pa'i spang leb sku gzugs bri/ /klu mo sgrub pa dag gis ni/ /klu shing spang leb ri mo bri/ /mi ni bsgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /dur khrod gos la sku gzugs bri/ /pha rol blta

ba'i sgrub pa dag /bong bu'i pags la sku gzugs bri/ /nor rnams bsgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /byi ba'i pags la sku gzugs bri/ /chang ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /spre'u'i pags la sku gzugs bri/ /khrag ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /thod pa la ni sku gzugs

bri/ /sa bon 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /phug ron pags la sku gzugs bri/ /lha ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /thang shing spang leb sku gzugs bri/ /grong khyer 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /ce spyang pags la sku gzugs bri/ /zhi ba'i las la bram ze mo/ /zla

mtshan byung dus gos la bri/ /des na zhi bar gyur pa yin/ /rgyas pa rgyal rigs mo yi ni/ /zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri/ /dbang la rje'u rigs mo yi ni/ /zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri/ /mngon spyod la ni dmangs rigs kyi/ /zla mtshan byung dus gos la

bri/ /brgyal bar bya ba dag la ni/ /rgyal mtshan gos la ri mo bri/ /rengs par bya ba rdo leb ste/ /dgar ba la ni rnga mo'i pags/ /dgug pa la ni seng ge'i'o/ /las kun la ni bya yi pags/ /yang na lcags ni kho na'o/ /gzhan du sna tshogs las rnams ni/ /dran

pa tsam gyis nges par 'grub/ /bgegs rnams med par bya ba'i phyir/ /ri bong pags pa dag la bri/ /bgegs ni ldang bar byed pa la/ /shi ba'i pags pa rnams la bri/ /gser dang dngul la sogs pa la/ /zangs dang shel dang thang shing dang / /rdo rje las ni bya ba

ste/ /dngos grub mchog ni khyad par yin/ /tsan+dan dang ni thang shing dang / /tsan+dan dmar po tsam pa ka /a sho ka ni grub pa'o/ /shrI br-i k+Sha ni nor sbyin 'gyur/ /a ga ru dang sta rga shing / /'o ma shing gi bye brag dang / /stag pa'i shing la sogs pa rnams/ /grub

pa yi ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /sbal pa'i rus pa las byas dang / /klu shing dag gi bye brag dang / /ru sbal rus pa glang po'i so/ /khyad par du ni char yang 'bebs/ /bram ze'i rus pa zhi ba ste/ /glang po'i rus pa rgyas pa yin/ /dbang la rta yi rus pa ste/ /gsad pa

la ni ma he'i rus/ /dgar ba la ni rnga mo'i rus/ /sdang la rta dang ma he'o/ /rengs par bya la khyi yi rus/ /dgug pa la ni seng ge'i rus/ /sa yi 'og tu 'gro ba la/ /phag gi rus pa dag la bya/ /sa dkar dag las byas pa ni/ /rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyas

pa la ni ser ba'i sa/ /dbang la dmar po'i sa yin la/ /gsod pa la ni sa nag ste/ /'di ni mdor bsdus cho ga'o/ /dri chen chu dang zhag dang khrag /mig sman chen po de bzhin te/ /mi yi rus pa brdar ba yis/ /mdog tu lhan cig sbyar nas kyang / /rang byung me tog sa

bon dang / /rigs ngan dang ni bram ze dang / /gdol pa mo dang g.yung mo dang / /khrus mkhan ma dang gar mkhan ma/ /ma'am yang na sring mo 'am/ /bu mo yi ni bye brag gi/ /'di dag drung du blangs nas su/ /shu kra rak+ta'i khyad par dag /sna tshogs 'di dag bsres nas

kyang / /cho ga bzhin du sku gzugs 'dri/ /grog mkhar gyi ni sa dag la/ /shi ba'i skra dang rus pa yis/ /pir gyis dam pa bri bar bya/ /thig skud shi ba'i skud pa yis/ /sku gzugs thig skud mchog yin no/ /phreng sogs bsnyen nas ni/ /ba sas kyang ni

mar me bya/ /dpa' bo chen po'i bdug spos dang / /rkang gis lha bshos bya ba ste/ /dri chen rdo rje chu yi dri/ /thod pa dag gi bum pa ste/ /ar+g+ha'i snod ni thod pa'o/ /ar+g+ha rus pa'i tsUr+N+Na ste/ /'bad pas skyes bu dbul 'byin no/ /ji ltar nus pa dag tu spyad/ /sna

tshogs phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par ni/ /sku gzugs yang ni ri mo'am/ /gzhan yang mkhas pas cho ga bya/ /ji lta'i las kyi rjes mthun par/ /de lta'i gos kyi rjes 'chang zhing / /gcer bu skra ni grol ba dang / /gzugs mdog dag ni bsgyur

nas kyang / /gtso bo dang ni rnal 'byor pa/ /slob dpon yang ni de bzhin te/ /phyag rgya'i rigs par gnas nas su/ /dri chen chu dang dpa' bo bzang / /mnyam par bzhag nas bzlas pa bya/ /rnam pa du ma bye brag gi/ /glu dang gar ni rnam pa dang / /bza' btung

mchog ni spyad par bya/ /de dag rdzogs kyi bar bya ste/ /de 'di cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /rab tu gnas pa'i dus dag tu/ /nyis 'gyur tshogs kyis spel ba ste/ /gdu bu dang ni kang ka dang / /dpung rgyan gos kyi bye brag dang / /sor gdub dang ni mchod phyir thogs/ /rkang

rgyan dang ni thod pa dang / /gdugs dang rnga yab de bzhin te/ /sna tshogs skyes bu sbyin zhing dbul/ /sna tshogs dpa' bo mchog dam pa/ /myos byed btung ba'i bye brag rnams/ /dam tshig cho ga'i mchog rnams dang / /sna tshogs ro dang bcud rnams dang / /sna tshogs me tog

mchog rnams dang / /lha mo mchog gi lus rnams dang / /rol mo sna tshogs sgra rnams dang / /slob dpon phyag rgyar sbyor ba dang / /slob ma'i tshogs kyi khyad par rnams/ /bza' ba'i mchod pa dag gis mchod/ /bdug pa'i dri mchog rnams dang ni/ /sna

tshogs rgyal ba'i bdug pa dang / /khyad par du ni mar me'i phreng / /gdugs dang bla re de bzhin te/ /me long dang ni rnga yab dang / /dra ba dang ni dra phyed dang / /chun po dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /bum pa ras dang ldan pa dag /ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba/ /rin chen lnga

dang sman dang ni/ /dri yi bye brag dag gis ni/ /ar+g+ha'i snod ni khyad par du/ /tsu ta pa la ba lnga dang / /aM bu dzaM bu ka dam+ba/ /bil ba bI dza pu ras dgang / /ba la mo ta kri tany+dzaH /ke dri ka ri kar ldan pa/ /e ka bI ra sa ha de/ /sman rnams kun shes bya ba la/ /lnga po de dag

shes bya ste/ /mkhas pas bum par gzhug par bya/ /gser dang dzA ti pha la dang / /gla gor zho sha de bzhin no/ /gser gyi mchod phyir thogs dang ni/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /sgrub pa po kun gcer bu yis/ /bkra shis glu yis glu len zhing / /rnam par dag

pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dad pa'i blo ni sngon 'gro bas/ /dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du/ /sna tshogs rgya che'i mchod par bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las ras ris la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas

gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /mngon mtho he ru ka zhes bya/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa yin/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag sgrub pa pos/ /dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya/ /dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du/ /dbang bskur

dngos grub 'thob mi 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi mtshal dang ga pur bcas/ /dmar dang tsan+dan sbyar ba ni/ /tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa ni/ /thams cad bcud kyis len du gnas/ /thams cad rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'dzin/ /sbom po mtha' ltag rtse sbyar bas/ /rnal 'byor rim pas

rtag tu spyad/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na/ /dngos grub rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni mi 'chi bcu phyed 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad 'jug pa yin/ /mchod bzhi de bzhin dpa' bo ni/ /dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i

de nyid 'dzin/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzla/ /'khor lo'i gsang sngags 'bum bzlas shing / /rang gi lha'i yang 'bum du bzla/ /gzhan ni khri ru bzla bar bya/ /bka' bzhin 'khor lo bri bya zhing / /mdangs ldan mi mchog dag gis ni/ /

dkyil 'khor bri zhing dgod par bya/ /sngar bshad gnas ni gang yin pa/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /sa ni yongs su sbyar bar bya/ /brdung zhing legs par brdungs nas su/ /mnyam zhing zug rngu rnam par spang / /sa la ma lhung lci ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nye

bar byug /dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang / /mi 'chi bcu phyed bcas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nyer byugs te/ /der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag brtsam/ /dur khrod du ni kun spyod cing / /ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang / /dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa yis/ /slob dpon

legs par mnyam bzhag ste/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan/ /mtshan ma ngan pa kun spangs shing / /yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes/ /khro med gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang / /

sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro/ /thod pas spyi bor brgyan byas shing / /yan lag thal bas byugs pa dang / /gug skyed dag gis lus brgyan cing / /rus phreng rus par yang dag gnas/ /dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang / /rus pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /kha T+wAM

ga ni lag na gnas/ /bdag nyid shrI he ru kar ni/ /byas nas de yi 'og tu ni/ /dpal ldan he ru ka dran bya/ /'khor lo 'di yi snying gar dgod/ /de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas/ /ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod/ /'og tu'ang mtshon cha dgod par bya/ /'khor

lo'i bdag nyid bkod nas ni/ /steng du mda' yi dra ba dang / /bdag nyid mtshon cha'i dra ba bya/ /de ltar go bgos sum cu ni/ /rtsa gsum pas kyang gzhig mi nus/ /de ltar bdag nyid rab bsrungs shing / /sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas/ /dngos

grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas sems med srad bu la/ /ru d+hi ra ni chen pos brlan/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung grong mchog gi/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya/ /gru bzhi pa la khru brgyad pa/ /sgo bzhi kun nas

zur bzhi pa/ /sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam spyod cing / /mkha' 'gro dra ba bde mchog bzlas/ /de yi dbus su bzhag pa ni/ /'dab chags lte ba 'bar dang bcas/ /ge sar yang dag ldan pa yi/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /lte bar dgod bya dpa' bo ni/ /'jigs

byed chen po'i gzugs can la/ /mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar/ /ha ha zhes byar sgra cher bzhad/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /bzang po spyan gsum zhal bzhi mnga'/ /glang po'i pags pa rnam par bgos/ /smin ma bzang po rdo rje 'byes/ /phyag na kha T+wAM ga bsnams

shing / /brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni/ /rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba/ /rab 'jigs 'jigs byed che la phyogs/ /spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can bya/ /ka pA la ni an+t+ras bkang / /kha nas ru d+hi ra 'dzag cing / /lha dang lha min mir

bcas dang / /phyogs kun tu ni sdigs mdzub byed/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /phag mo yi ni rigs las byung / /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams ni/ /'khor lo'i lte bar mchod par bya/ /de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' bo yang / /'khor lor yang dag gnas pa

mchod/ /sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod/ /gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya/ /de nas bum pa bya ba ni/ /rtsa ba nag po la sogs med/ /mu tig gser dang rin chen dang / /byi ru dngul dang zangs ma ste/ /bza' ba kun gyis legs bkang ba'i/ /snod ni steng du

gzhag par bya/ /mgrin pa srad bus dkri ba dang / /kha ni 'dab mas brgyan par bya/ /gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa/ /brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod/ /gos zung gis ni dkris pa yi/ /bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhag /gser ram dngul lam rin chen nam/ /

mu tig rnams ni mdzes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen dang / /gser rnams kyis ni mdzes par spyad/ /grong mchog yid 'ong mchod nas ni/ /grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /bdag nyid kyi ni gdong lus kun/ /dri yi chu yis legs par bsang / /gal te

dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /mar me brgya ni dbul bar bya/ /nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /yid kyis thams cad steng du dgod/ /sa stengs mkha' 'gro ma gang yin/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu dgod par bya/ /gang yang sa 'og rnams su dgod/ /ma mo

thams cad phyogs dang ni/ /phyogs mtshams rnams su dgod par bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dri dang me tog bdug spos dang / /mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing / /dpal ldan khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor gnas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mchod bya/ /rgyal

mtshan dmar dang de bzhin ser/ /dkar dang gnag dang ser skya dang / /de bzhin gos ni sna tshogs dang / /me tog phreng ba du ma dang / /bla re dag dang dar bcas pa'i/ /mda' ni shin tu mdzes pa dang / /de bzhin bza' bca' btung ba yis/ /rab mnyam bzhag ste mchod

par bya/ /de nas sgrub pos dngos grub kyi/ /dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya/ /grub 'dod shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /ci nus par ni bla ma mchod/ /dril dbyangs me tog spos kyis brgyan/ /shin tu sgra snyan dril bu dkrol/ /sgrub pa po yis rnga brdung zhing / /ha

ha zhes ni brjod par bya/ /de ltar cho ga bzhin dkyil 'khor/ /'dod pa kun ldan mchod nas ni/ /de yi bu sdug gdong la ni/ /dar gyis legs par bkab nas su/ /me tog gis bkang thal mo dag /pad+mas gtor nas bskor ba ni/ /g.yon phyogs bskor nas

phyag byas te/ /hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra yang brjod/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis/ /dngos grub sras po gzhag par bya/ /thal mo me tog gtor nas ni/ /gang du 'babs pa'i bsam pa ni/ /skor ba dag kyang byas nas su/ /shin tu mnyam par

bzhag pa yis/ /sgrub pa po yis byas nas gzhug /de nas yon thogs grong khyer du/ /g.yas pa'i phyogs su brten nas ni/ /snyim pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor dor/ /dkyil 'khor gang du me tog babs/ /de yi rigs ni bstan par bya/ /de nas slob dpon legs par

ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag ste phyag rgya mchod/ /de nas slob ma gnyis pa la/ /mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis/ /de la thig le bya ba yin/ /de nas slob ma'i gdong phye la/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya/ /gang gi lha yi gnas gang yin/ /der de yang

dag bstan par bya/ /slob dpon dang ni lhan cig tu/ /rab tu btud pa byas nas ni/ /g.yon nas brtsams pa'i rim pa yis/ /de nas bskor ba rab tu bya/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la/ /ji bzhin cho gas phyag bya'o/ /de nas bla ma dag la yon/ /de bzhin gshegs

pas gsungs pa dbul/ /gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang / /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang / /glang po rta 'am yul 'khor ram/ /rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang / /mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang / /gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs/ /

chung ma bzang dang bu mo nyid/ /bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams/ /phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya/ /deng nas brtsams te bran du ni/ /khyed la bdag ni 'bul lags zhes/ /blo ldan kun nas dang ba yis/ /bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bya/ /de ltar nges par bya ba ni/ /sgrub pa po

yis rab nges byas/ /de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig /de dang rnam spyod 'gro ba kun/ /sgrub pa po ni de dag gi/ /ci bgyi byed par the tshom

med/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni 'grub 'gyur na/ /'jig rten gsum du mi zlogs shing / /mi snang phug dang gnas mkha' rgyu/ /rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len/ /sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis/ /rtag par rgyun du bskyed par 'gyur/ /gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang / /nam

mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi khyad par du/ /des gnon 'gro ba thams cad kyang / /lan cig bltas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /skad cig gis ni sbyor nyid skyed/ /sngags pas dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod/ /mkha'

la khu tshur gyis rdeg dang / /smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thung dang mtshungs/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang / /sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin/ /gang zhig rtag tu 'dod gyur pa/ /de ni lha mi zil gnon 'gro/ /de nyid bsdus par gyur pa'am/ /gsang ba'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las/ /

dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung / /de kun dpal ldan khrag 'thung gnas/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas

gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sbyor ba'i mtshams dang yang dag ldan/ /chu med pa ni mtshams yin te/ /gos pa med cing chags spangs pa/ /mtshams ni 'byung po thams cad pa/ /de ni sems can thams cad de/ /mtshams ni srid pa dag pa ste/ /dbyangs skyong he ru ka nyid

yin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom zhing bzla/ /cig car 'byung bar snang ba ste/ /dung dang kun da'i mdog kyang 'dzin/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa ste/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams/ /

skra grol dpral bar thod pa ste/ /spyi gtsug tu ni zla ba'o/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag ldan/ /mtshams rnams grub pa'i mchog dam pa/ /thun bzhi ru ni bya ba'o/ /dga' ba bzhi po dga' ba dang / /lte ba'i snying pad nu ma'i dbus/ /lce yi rtsa dang mgo steng du/ /dga' ba dang ni

mchog dga' nyid/ /dam par dga' dang lhan cig skyes/ /dang po 'dab ma drug cu bzhi/ /gnyis pa brgyad pa mchog yin te/ /gsum pa 'dab ma bcu drug pa/ /bzhi pa sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab/ /phag mo'i lte ba'i rtsar gnas pa/ /lhan cig skyes dga'

khrag 'thung mchog /sbyor ba'i dus kyi mtshams su ni/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom bya/ /sdug bsngal sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /kun 'byung chos kyi 'khor lo yin/ /'gog pa longs spyod 'khor lo ste/ /lam ni bde ba chen po yin/ /de ltar mtshams su byin

brlabs nas/ /rnal 'byor nges pa byas pa ste/ /dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba dang / /spyan gsum thugs rje stong pa'i nyams/ /rnam thar gsum dang sku gsum gyis/ /yongs su dag par rim par sbyor/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /mgo bo gri

gug phyag na bsnams/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /zla ba pad dbus su/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can yin/ /dgyes pa'i nyams kyis myos pa ste/ /dus rtag tu ni mtshams bsgoms na/ /sdom pa mchog ni grub pa yin/ /dri chen rdo rje chu dang ni/ /

rin chen snang ba mtha' yas dang / /don yod grub pa'ang de bzhin te/ /de dag rtag tu bsres nas su/ /rnal 'byor rtag tu mtshams la 'dud/ /gsang sngags 'di dag rtag tu yang / /he ru ka ni dbyangs skyong mchog /o~M shrI he ru kA ya bid ma he bid+yA rA dza ya bid ma he ta bI rA pra dzo da

ya AHhU~M/ rtag tu mtshams ni rnam bsgoms na/ /dbyangs skyong mchog gi bzlas pa bya/ /dbyangs skyong ming ni rig byed de/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ /dus min 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing / /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang yang 'grub/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /don

ni sngags pas rtag tu smra/ /dngos grub 'di ni rab tu 'grub/ /de ma thag tu grub chen bcas/ /'jig rten gsum po 'grub pa yin/ /sgrub po'i dbang pos rnam bsgoms te/ /khrag 'thung cho ga bzhin shes nas/ /zhag gsum brtul zhugs la gnas na/ /lha yi gnas su

'gro ba yin/ /lha yi ye shes thob nas ni/ /lha yi lus kyi mchog kyang 'dzin/ /ngag rnams kun la dbang thob cing / /thams cad mkhyen par gyur nas su/ /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /sangs rgyas lha yis bsten pa ste/ /srid par sangs rgyas rol par mdzad/ /

nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du yang / /phyag rgya lhan cig 'byung ba spyad/ /mthong nas sring mo yang dag bsgrub/ /zhag gsum bar du mchod byas nas/ /rdo rje he ru ka dpal lha/ /thams cad kyang ni 'byon par 'gyur/ /pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni/ /de yis phyag ni byas nas

kyang / /sgrub pos rtag tu mchod par bya/ /sgrub po 'dod la dga' bas ni/ /mod la dpa' bos thams cad mkhyen/ /gtso bo thams cad 'dzin pa ste/ /khams gsum kun tu rnam spyod cing / /sgrub pa po ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /'di ni dpal chen dpa' bo ste/ /gnyis pa thams

cad rnam par spangs/ /de ni rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sa gzhi ska rags kyis bskor ba/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams kyang / /sgrub pa po ni de nyid kyi/ /mod la dbang du gyur pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dbyangs skyong gi mtshams kyi le'u ste lnga bcu

pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /yi ge bdun pa sgom pa ste/ /yi ge hU~M las yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba che/ /phyag drug zhal gsum spyan gsum pa/ /mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan cing / /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan/ /A li kA li las byung

gtso/ /phag mo dang ni mnyam par ldan/ /stong zhing thugs rjes khyab pa ste/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan/ /na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /g.yas pa'i phyag na mdung rtse gsum/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol/ /thod

pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang / /zla ba phyed pa'i spyi gtsug 'chang / /phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan/ /'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa dag /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi steng bzhugs/ /'khor lo

drug gi dbus su bzhugs/ /rnal 'byor ma drug mnyam par sbyar/ /myur du dngos grub stsol ba yin/ /dang po khrag 'thung lha mo ste/ /gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma/ /gsum pa drag gtum ma yin te/ /bzhi pa rdo rje nyi ma mo/ /lnga pa rdo rje drag mo

ste/ /drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /g.yon gyi phyogs nas dgod par bya/ /lha mo de dag cher gtum zhing / /spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa yin/ /thams cad nyi stengs bzhugs/ /sngo zhing ser la ljang ba dang / /dmar

dang dud kha de bzhin dkar/ /cang te'u dang ni dril bu 'dzin/ /thams cad na ra'i pags pa 'dzin/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul gyis bzhugs/ /yi ge drug las yang dag byung / /lha mo gzigs pa mtshan ma yin/ /ji

ltar mgon po'i mdog bzhin du/ /phag mo yang ni de bzhin te/ /phyag rgya phyag mtshan de bzhin no/ /sngo dang ser dang ljang ba dang / /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /lha mo'i byin par mnyam par 'khril/ /mchog tu dga' bar rnam par mos/ /o~M hrIHha ha hu~M hU~M

phaT/ /yi ge de las mkha' 'gro ma/ /yan lag drug pa rnam par bsgom/ /bdun pa dbus su dgod pa ni/ /yi ge hU~M las he ru ka /dbus su dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o/ /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan

lag ni rdo rje he ru ka ma'o/ /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o/ /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni drag gtum ma'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje nyi ma ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni

rdo rje drag mo'o/ /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste/ byang chub yan lag 'di bdun bsgom/ /ji lta'i rim pas sbyor zhing bsgom/ /gsang sngags gzhal med pa bzlas shing / /khro bo kun gyi gnas mchog ste/ /bsod nams chung

ba'i sgrub pos kyang / /zla phyed nang du dngos grub ste/ /rtag tu zhag re bsgoms pa ni/ /zhag bdun gyis ni the tshom med/ /dpyid zla tha nya la ni/ /ma sring bu mo tsha mo dang / /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /nyin mtshan bzlas shing bsgoms byas pas/ /tho rangs

dpal khrag 'thung mnyam 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las nye ba'i snying po bsgoms pas skyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //gzhan yang snying po bshad bya ba/ /sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa/ /hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba/ /bde

ba chen po bde las byung / /sngo zhing dkar la drag po ste/ /zhal brgyad pa la shin tu 'jigs/ /spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu drug /mgo yi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba phyed pa'i ral pa 'chang / /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /

phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /'jigs byed chen po 'jigs pa ni/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnon/ /dus mtshan shin tu 'jigs pa yang / /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnon/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /phag mo yi ni ku tsa 'tshir/ /tshangs

lpags bshus nas rgyan du 'dzin/ /mdung rtse gsum dang dgra sta dang / /kha T+wAM cang te'u gri gug mchog /brgyad pa la ni lcags kyu thogs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag rnams de bzhin no/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /mgo bo zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /tho ba sdigs mdzub

dam pa ste/ /shrI yi ye shes yang dag rdzogs/ /pang du phag mo'i gzugs yin te/ /drag cing dmar la dkar ba yin/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /skra grol ba la spyan gsum pa/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi zhal dang phyag tu gnas/ /

dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /phyogs kyi gos can chags pas gzigs/ /rked pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya yang che/ /sngo zhing dkar la de bzhin dmar/ /ser zhing ljang la dud ka ste/ /du ba thal ba sprin gyi mdog /'di 'dra'i

zhal dang gzugs su gnas/ /lha mo mda' dang gzhu 'dzin cing / /tshangs pa'i pags pa rnam par spangs/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su bzhugs/ /'khor lo brgyad pa'i dbus bzhugs par/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnam par

bsgom/ /pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /bcom ldan 'das ni nges par dgod/ /o~M ni shar gyi 'dab ma la/ /gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod/ /ba ni byang gi 'dab la ste/ /rta gdong mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod/ /dzra ni rdo rje drag mo ste/ /mkha' 'gro nub tu dgod

par bya/ /he ru lho phyogs 'dab la dgod/ /gser gyi mdog can mkha' 'gro ma/ /ser dang sngo bsangs dkar dang dmar/ /zhal gsum rnam sgyur drag po ste/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /ro yi steng du bzhugs pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis bdud bzhi 'joms/ /

thod pa'i phreng ba drag po ste/ /pad+ma sbom po'i 'dab ma la/ /chags pa'i spyan gyis gzigs shing bzhed/ /thugs rje'i nyams kyis bde ba yin/ /mda' dang gzhu yang 'chang ba ste/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i mchog /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM bsnams/ /cang te'u ni

sgra yang sgrogs/ /ser dang ljang gu sngo ba dang / /sngo bsangs dmar dang dkar ba dang / /dkar dang ljang gu sngo ba dang / /dmar dang sngo dang ljang ba ste/ /'di ltar mdog ni khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag /byang chub

sems kyis gang bar bzhag /shar gyi phyogs su he yin te/ /ming ni he li ka zhes bya/ /byang gi phyogs su ru yin te/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ru tsa kI/ /nub kyi phyogs su ru yin te/ /ru tsa ka ma lI zhes bya/ /lho yi phyogs su ka yin te/ /keng rus ma zhes grags pa

yin/ /me yi phyogs su hU~M mdzad ma/ /bden bral phyogs su phaT mdzad ma/ /rlung gi phyogs su Da ma ri/ /dbang ldan ki li ki la ste/ /de brgyad lha mo chen mo ste/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ji ltar zhal dang gzugs bzhin du/ /de bzhin 'dir yang 'gyur

ba yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos can g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag ldan/ /

drag cing gtum la rab 'jigs par/ /thams cad ro yi steng bzhugs bsgom/ /spyan gsum pa la chags par myos/ /dbang ldan zur la ut+pal sngon po zhes bya ba/ /rlung gi phyogs la dra ba'i mchog ces bya ba ste/ /bden bral phyogs la gsus pa 'phyang ma zhes bya ba/ /me

yi phyogs la sha ba ri zhes bya ba ste/ /ser dang sngo bsangs sngo ba dang / /dmar ser dang ni bzhi pa ste/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /gri gug cang te'u mchog yin te/ /bzhi pa rdo rje mdung yin no/ /phyogs kyi gos can chags pas rol/ /bzang mo lto ba 'phyang ma ste/ /

skye gnas ring la rgya yang che/ /spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur zhing drag /skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spud pa'o/ /shar sgor ba~M las gtum ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / lho'i sgor ra~M las rol

gtum mo zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / nub kyi sgor sa las 'bar ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dgod do/ /byang gi sgor ha las phreng ba rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ sngo dang dkar ser nyid yin te/ /lcags kyu dang ni cang te'u 'dzin/ /

thod pa kha T+wAM ga bsnams te/ /gri gug mgo bo sdigs mdzub dang / /dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba dang / /zhags pa dang ni cang te'u 'dzin/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /sdigs mdzub gri gug mgo bo 'dzin/ /dmar dang sngo dang ljang gu ste/ /lcags sgrog cang te'u

gri gug dang / /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /mgo bo dang ni sdigs mdzub mchog /ljang dang dkar po 'dres pa dang / /ser dang dmar ba'i zhal mchog yin/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa dang / /mgo bo dang ni sdigs mdzub phyag /

skra grol ba la gdug pa che/ /spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal/ /zhal gdangs ljags ni bskyod pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /ro dang pad+ma'i

nyi dbus bzhugs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing / /mgo bo'i do shal rnams kyis brgyan/ /mi bskyod pa yi cod pan 'chang / /rnam sgyur spyan ni g.yo ba ste/ /yi ge nyi shu gnyis las byung / /snying gar mchog ni

bsgom par bya/ /'di ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis mchog /o~M shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hU~M DA ki nI dzA la saM bar hU~M phaT swA hA/ yi ge re re dgod pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying de bzhin/ /hU~M shrI lha dang lha mo ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor

ba'o/ /dbus su rnam dag bcom ldan 'das/ /sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya/ /rnam par thar brgyad sgo sna tshogs/ /gzugs su lta ba stong pa ste/ /nang gzugs med par phyi rol gzugs su blta ba'ang stong pa yin/ /sdug dang mi sdug mthong bar byed pa blta

ba'ang stong pa yin/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dag tu blta ba'ang stong pa ste/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag tu blta ba'ang stong pa yin/ /ci yang med pa'i skye mched dag tu blta ba'ang stong pa yin/ /'du shes med cing 'du shes med min skye mched

rnams kyang stong pa'o/ /'du shes dang ni tshor ba'ang 'gog par lta ba stong pa yin/ /phyag bcu drug pa'ang stong pa ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus

byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi

dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ ci ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du/ /phag mo yang ni de bzhin te/ /gnyis med gzugs can bcom ldan 'das/ /he ru ka dpal rnam par shes/ /phag mo nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /

lha mo bzhi yi rnam dag pa/ /gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni/ /don rnams so so yang dag rig /rta gdong ma gang yin pa'o/ /chos rnams so so yang dag rig /rdo rje drag mo mkha' 'gro ma/ /nges tshig so so yang dag rig /gser mdog can gyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /

spobs pa so so yang dag rig /lha mo de dag 'dab ma'i dbus/ /rton pa rnam pa bzhi po ni/ /he li ka ni don la rton pa ste/ /ru tsa ki ni tshig 'bru rton pa yin/ /ru tsa ka mi le ni ye shes rton/ /keng rus ma ni rnam shes rton pa yin/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho

phyogs kyi ni 'khor lo la/ /chos kyi mdo ni bzhi po dgod/ hU~M ni 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o/ /phaT ni 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o/ /Da ma ri ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'o/ /ki li kI la ni chos thams cad zhi ba'o/ /me dang bden bral rlung dang ni/ /dbang

ldan 'khor lo de dag kun/ /lha mo yis ni rnam par dag /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po'i chos thams cad rtogs pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni ut+pa la sngon po ma'o/ /chos thams cad ston pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni dran pa'i mchog go /nges par 'byung ba'i lam la 'jug pa

la 'jigs pa med pa ni gsus pa 'phyang ma'o/ /zag pa zad pa shes pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni sa ba ri ma'o/ /mtshams su dkyil 'khor lha mo ni/ /'di yis zur bzhi rnam par dag /sgo bzhi dag tu lha mo ni/ /gtum byed ma ste dad pa'i dbang po'o/ /rol gtum

ma ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ /'bar mchog ma ni dran pa'i dbang po'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'o/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams ni/ /'phags

pa shes rab bcom ldan ma/ /rdo rje phag mo nyid yin no/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi snying po bsgoms pas skyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor

dag ni rnam dag pa/ /'byung ba kun gyi spyan yin te/ /rnam par snang mdzad thig tu grags/ /b+ha gas khyab pa'i rim pa ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig tu shes/ /dus ni sna tshogs rigs su shes/ /mchod pa sna tshogs cho ga bzhin/ /pul+lI ra ma pad+ma ma'o/ /dzA lan

d+ha ra thugs 'khor lo/ /u T+yan gsung gi 'khor lo ste/ /arbu da ni sku'i 'khor lo/ /go dA ba ri zur bzhi po/ /ra me shwa rA me phyogs so/ /de bI ko Ti bden bral yin/ /mA la ba ni rlung gi zur/ /dbang ldan kA ma rU pa ste/ /grwa bzhi rnam par dag pa ni/ /'di la the

tshom med pa yin/ /o tre dag ni shar gyi sgo'o/ /tri sha ku ni lho phyogs sgo/ /ko sa la ni nub kyi sgo'o/ /ka ling+ga ni byang sgo ste/ /shar gyi rta babs lam+bA ka /kAM tsi lho yi rta babs yin/ /hi ma la ya nub phyogs so/ /pre ta pu ri byang yin te/ /gri ha de ba lha snam bu/ /

sau rASh+Na ni rin chen sa/ /su bar dwI pa dra ba phyed/ /nA ga ra ni rnga yab dang / /dril bu rgyal mtshan ba dan no/ /sin+dU rdo rje thig zlum po/ /ma ru ti ni sgo khyud do/ /ku lu tA ni rdo rje dang / /rin po che dang dkyil 'khor gyi/ /thig ni bla na med pa yin/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs

bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan zhing / /dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan zhing / /sku yi 'khor lo'i sku nyid ni/ /don yod grub pa rnam par spyod/ /gsung gi

'khor lo 'od dpag med/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo mi bskyod pa/ /pad+ma'i dbus ni rin chen 'dzin/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul can ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsgom/ /tshor ba sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /'du shes gsung gi 'khor lo yin/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo 'du byed de/ /

rnam shes pad+ma gdon mi za/ /ri mo lnga pa mchog gyur pa/ /de yis rnam dag rang bzhin can/ /sa dang ri mo thams cad kun/ /dpa' bos yongs su dag par bsgom/ /ri mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa/ /de dag dpa' bos rnam par dag /'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma yis dag /lte

bar phag mo'i sa bon k+ShaH /he ru ka dpal mchog yin no/ /'dab ma mkha' 'gro ma yis dag /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag /dkyil 'khor snying po mdor bsdu na/ /dkyil 'khor dang po yi ge ste/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis

pa phyag mtshan yin/ /gsum pa lag pa'i phyag rgyar bshad/ /bzhi pa gzugs su gyur pa ste/ /lnga pa me tog mchod pa yin/ /drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /dbus ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /pad+ma'i lte ba dang bcas pa/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo dri ma med/ /gsung

gi 'khor lo 'od byed pa/ /sku yi 'khor lo 'od 'phro ba/ /zur bzhi pa ni sbyang dka' ba/ /ring du song ba sgo bzhi yin/ /zur gyi cha ni mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros rdo rje'i thig /chos kyi sprin ni rta babs yin/ /'di lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /rtag tu bsgom zhing

mchod par bya/ /dngos grub rgya chen 'thob par 'gyur/ /sdom pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi de nyid ni/ /he ru ka dpal ye shes mchog /b+ha ga'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /phag mo'i sku lus mchog gyur pa/ /de ni dkyil 'khor 'dus pa ste/ /

dkyil 'khor bde chen mchog yin no/ /dkyil 'khor dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med kha sbyor dkyil 'khor yin/ /bdag gi de nyid ting 'dzin yin/ /lha yi de nyid de bzhin te/ /sngags kyi de nyid phyag rgya yin/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog /yan

lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing / /rtog dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs/ /phyi mo'i thig le las 'das shing / /de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /chos rnams thams cad brtag tu med/ /chos dang chos min rnam par spyod/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa

ni/ /rnam dag nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ /chags dang chags med chags par mnyam/ /pad+ma rA ga chu mnyam byung / /rang sems chags pa dmar po'i mchog /de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te/ /yid ni khams rnams thams cad de/ /gzugs

dang gzugs med dri ma med/ /bskul zhing sad pa yid yin te/ /sems ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin/ /dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor b+ha ga yin par bshad/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub sems yin te/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba/ /sa 'og sa stengs

sa blar khyab/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dkyil 'khor gyi sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /sems can kun la phan stsol pa/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer

mchog /dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa/ /dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje che/ /zhal bzhi pa la rnam par 'gyur/ /de la lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs 'khor lo lte bar bcas/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad pa ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor

dbus su ni/ /'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus dag tu/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam 'dres pa/ /lha yi bzhugs gnas nyi shu pa/ /lte ba'i dbus su bstan pa ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /hU~M las he ru kar byas te/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag

brgyad pa/ /spyan gsum sku lus dkar po ste/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /phag mo yi ni ku tsa'ang 'tshir/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /gdug pa kun gyi klad pa la/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan/ /'jigs

byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /brgyal zhing rnam par myos pa yi/ /klad pa la ni zhabs kyis mnan/ /gcer bu 'o dod 'bod pa mnan/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste/ /lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin pa dang / /gzhan yang cang te'u de bzhin te/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga yang 'dzin/ /

gzhan du yang ni mgo bo 'chang / /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'chang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /mi bskyod pa yis spyi gtsug brgyan/ /tshangs pa'i do shal 'dzin pa ste/ /bdag gi khro bo bdun spros nas/ /ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin
