du/ /phag mo mchog dang de bzhin te/ /sku lus nag po dmar ba'i mdangs/ /gzi byin mdangs kyis mdzes pa ste/ /gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga /dril bu cang te'u mdung dang ni/ /lcags kyu zhags pa de bzhin no/ /lha mo phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ /dkar zhing sngo la ljang ba'o/ /

steng gi zhal ni dmar po mdzes/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni/ /ser zhing ljang ba'i gzugs can te/ /gzhan du bdag po ji bzhin du/ /phag mo yang ni de bzhin gyur/ /gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste/ /ma nyams dum bu'i ska rags can/ /pad+ma bzhi la mkha'

'gro ma/ /zur la bum pa thod pa ste/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo sngar bshad pa'o/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ /gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo gnyis/ /shar dang byang nub lho ru'o/ /sgo rnams su ni sgo srung ste/ /khwa gdong la sogs thams cad do/ /zur la gshin

rje sreg la sogs/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i khyad par ni/ /rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste/ /kha cig rnal 'byor ma ru 'dod/ /bla ma'i gnas kyi rjes rim pa/ /sngar bshad sna tshogs rigs rnams ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pas bsgom par bya/ /gzhan yang zhal dang mdog rnams ni/ /

mkha' 'gro ma yi mdog bzhin dang / /phyag mtshan phyag rgyar sngar bshad bzhin/ /gnas sogs rim pa de ltar dgod/ /sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin/ /gsang sngags ji bzhin rim par dgod/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don/ /sgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /

A li kA li'i nang byung ba/ /sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya/ /chos dbyings grong khyer rnam dag par/ /sems can khams ni rab tu 'jug /rnal 'byor 'di ni gsang ba ste/ /su la yang ni bstan mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las chos kyi dbyings kyi grong

khyer sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /b+ha ga pad+ma sgom pa ni/ /rdo rje snying pos zhus pa las/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /yang dag gsang ba nges gsang ba/ /A li kA li zur gsum gnas/ /pad+ma 'dab

gsum rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje phag mo he ru ka /lte ba la ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro lA ma dang / /gsum pa dum skyes ma nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das ni dmar la sngo/ /phag mo yang ni dmar sngo ste/ /mkha' 'gro sngo la ser ba dang / /lA ma ljang la ser ba

ste/ /dum skyes ma ni dmar la ser/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /bcom ldan mgon po zhal bzhi pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /dril bu rdo rjes legs par mtshon/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sna tshogs rdo

rjes mtshan pa ste/ /zhi ba zla ba phyed pa 'chang / /mi 'khrugs pa ni spyi gtsug 'ching / /rtag par gsang ba'i gos mnabs shing / /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /phag mo'i zhal mtshan de yin te/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud cing / /gcer bu dbu skra

grol ba la/ /spyan gsum pa la legs chags 'khril/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnyis/ /zhabs kyis rnam par gnon pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /sku lus phyag rgya drug 'dzin zhing / /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / /thugs rje'i chags

pas rnam par myos/ /g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon ljang gu/ /steng ni sngo skya sku lus dkar/ /gzugs can ma ni b+ha gar brtag /A li kA li b+ha ga'i mchog /gzhan yang zur gsum dbus dag tu/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs

pad+ma dag tu btag /dbus su he ru ka phag mo/ /'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma sogs dgod/ /zur du thod pa dkar po dag /thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' la spyod/ /shar gyi zur la sku 'khor lo/ /rlung gi zur gyi 'khor lo la/ /khwa gdong la sogs rnam brgyad do/ /gsung gi

'khor lo bden bral zur/ /'khor lo bzhi po zur gsum la/ /shar ni sku yi mkha' 'gro ste/ /rlung phyogs gshin rje'i mkha' 'gro'o/ /bden bral gsung gi mkha' 'gro ste/ /dbus su rdo rje he ru ka /sngo zhing dkar po dud ka dang / /sngo zhing dmar ba bzhi po yin/ /

rang gi phyag mtshan mnyam par ldan/ /gzhan du rang bdag mdog bzhin du/ /dpa' bo 'khor lo mdog de bzhin/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dmar ba'i mdog can rnam par bsam/ /dpa' bo'i mdog ni nag po la/ /gnyis med 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /

sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dag /sku lus dkar po rnam par bsam/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog /dpa' bo gnyis ni rab tu sbyor/ /khwa gdong gshin rje brtan la sogs/ /gzugs gnyis phyed ni bud med nyid/ /rang gi thabs dang lhan cig tu/ /dgyes shing

chags pas rnam par myos/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ljang gu'o/ /sngar bshad rim pa'i mtshan ma rnams/ /de yang rigs kyi dbye bas so/ /thams cad gdan la bzhugs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thams

cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing / /phyag rgya drug gi bdag po dgod/ /thams cad rang rigs cod pan can/ /ji lta ba yi rim pas bsgom/ /mkha' 'gro'i dus kyi sbyor ba yis/ /ji lta'i rjes su rnam bsgoms nas/ /go cha'i gsang sngags dgod par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi

rim pa dag /sngar bshad cho ga'i sbyor ba yis/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag rim pa bsgom/ /gsang zhing sba ba'i zhi gnas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi bde 'khor lo/ /rtag tu mnyam par bzhag nas su/ /sbyor ba'i mchog ni rtag tu bsgom/ /'di ni su la'ang mi bstan te/ /de nyid su la'ang brjod

mi bya/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba dag /rtag tu bsgoms na dngos grub 'gyur/ /dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bya zhing / /bza' dang bca' ba'ang spyad par bya/ /'gro zhing 'gro zhing dus kun du/ /'char nub dag tu rnam par sbyang / /gang zhig ye shes 'di nyan pa/ /sngags pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /

mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba sbyor ba'i sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i ye shes mchog gyur pa/ /rigs lnga gsang sngags rgya che ba'i/ /sgom pa bdag gis bshad pa

yin/ /log pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /gang la'ang khyod kyis bshad mi bya/ /bla ma'i rim las ji ltar bstan/ /gang gis myur du shes 'gyur ba/ /skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu/ /sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul zhing / /dad pa yang dag bskyed pa dang / /rnal 'byor spyod tshul gnas

pa yin/ /lkugs shing glen la sdig ngan can/ /byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /sems can yongs su ma smin dang / /phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'chal pa/ /de dag kun gyis mi shes te/ /mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang / /khengs pa la ni rtag par dga'/ /nga rgyal la

sogs gdug sems can/ /de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi/ /spyod yul gsang ba mi shes so/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag 'jug /slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis/ /myur du dngos grub skyed byed de/ /'phral du yid ches byed pa yin/ /sna tshogs sdom pa shes pa yis/ /

cho ga'i bya ba bstan par bya/ /srid pa gsum po ma lus ni/ /de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shes/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /thos pa dang ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba/ /de ltar de ni the tshom med/ /lha rnams bzlog ste bkod pa dang / /sngags kyi dbye ba

bzlog pa dang / /dkyil 'khor kun yang bzlog pa dang / /so so bsgom pa'ang mi bya ste/ /bzlog pa'i yi ge btus nas ni/ /sgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa de/ /snying po thams cad sgrub pa yin/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yi ni/ /sems ni yongs

su smin pa dag /'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi/ /dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin/ /bde gshegs dbugs 'byin gsungs pa yin/ /dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa/ /bsod nams chung ba'i sngags pas kyang / /nga dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /de na srung med

bza' ba med/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor bdag po med/ /bzlas dang brtul zhugs sbyin sreg med/ /mdor na sems bsdus tshul can yin/ /bzung byas rnam shes ye shes ni/ /bla mas bstan las brtson las te/ /phyi rol gyi ni bstan bcos la/ /lam de shin

tu ring ba yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis ni/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la brtson pa//ston pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin/ /dpa' bo'i de nyid bstan pa dang / /skad cig rnam par rnal 'byor bdag /skad cig rnam par phyag rgyar ldan/ /kun nas thams cad

skad cig ste/ /skad cig gis ni gsang sngags brjod/ /pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /bdag nyid kyis ni gsol ba gdab/ /bcom ldan lha mos zhus pa ni/ /go 'phang rgya che gnyis med pa/ /'di ni 'byung po kun la gnas/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rol/ /rdo

rje snying pos gsungs pa ni/ /ci rigs bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /brtags pa'i yid kyis gzung bar gyis/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs par/ /gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid/ /dkyil 'khor lus ni yin par bshad/ /de ni sgo dgu dag tu 'gyur/ /

de la lte ba'i 'khor lo che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad/ /rdo rje can ni der zhugs pa/ /cha med cha ni rnam spangs pa/ /lus can rnams kyi nang na rol/ /lus las 'das shing gos pa med/ /la lar gzugs can dag tu bzhugs/ /la lar sna dang ngag

dag dang / /la lar rna bar sgra dag dang / /la lar dri chen rdo rje chu/ /la lar tshor bar bcas pa'i sems/ /la lar skom dang la lar bkres/ /la lar khro dang la lar zhi/ /la lar bde la rnam par gzigs/ /la lar bud med 'dod chags te/ /la lar gsod dang

'joms pa ste/ /la lar rol mo rdung bar mdzad/ /la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas/ /la lar rol cing spyod par 'gyur/ /la lar srog tu rnam par gnas/ /la lar sa dang chu dang me/ /la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga/ /la lar rigs kyi bye brag gis/ /bram ze dang ni

gdol pa dag /la lar ma dang sring mo ru/ /la lar chung ma bu mo ru/ /la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang / /khyab 'jug dang ni nyi ma nyid/ /la lar zla ba skar mar bcas/ /la lar nyin dang mtshan mor gyur/ /la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun/ /byed

pa po dang mi zad rgyal/ /la lar zhi ba'i dbang gis zhum/ /mi gsal stong pa'i rdo rje can/ /la lar byang chub chen por gshegs/ /la lar pha rol bdud las rgyal/ /la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa'o/ /la lar nad chen gyis zin pa/ /la

lar rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /la lar sngo dang le brgan dang / /la lar dkar dang ser ba'o/ /la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ /la lar spyan dang mA ma kI/ /la lar dka' zlog zhi ba mo/ /la lar 'dab chags mkha' lding dang / /nam mkha' dang

ni mkha' 'gro nyid/ /la lar klu dang sbrul chen po/ /la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang ni/ /la lar rmi lam mthong ba dang / /la lar gnyid kyis log pa nas/ /la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang / /la lar khrag dang pags par 'gyur/ /la lar mya ngan du ba dang / /la lar

sreg pa'i me dag yin/ /la lar mtho ris skye ba ste/ /rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu/ /thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs 'di la/ /lha gang cha ni rnam spangs pa'i/ /de yi sgyu ma'i sna tshogs 'di'o/ /rtag pa min pa rdo rje can/ /gzugs med par ni b+ha ga'i nang / /lte ba'i

nang na pad+ma che/ /bcu drug thig gis thig gdab bar/ /yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas/ /kha sbyar bya ba byas pa yin/ /de dbus rtag tu gsang ba che/ /'byin dang sdud par byed pa'o/ /de nyid rang nyid rdo rje can/ /gcig pu rang byung che ba'i lha/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun

dngos zhes/ /mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba'i mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad pa'am/ /mi 'gyur ba yi lam bshad pa/ /skra yi nyag ma brgya yi cha/ /mchog gi gzugs can bsam

pa ste/ /stong pa ma yin dmigs su med/ /yi ge med cing stong pa'ang med/ /gos pa med cing sa bon med/ /gzugs med mtshan ma'ang med pa ste/ /rnam shes rang gi dngos po ni/ /rnam shes ye shes dag tu gzung / /thams cad gsal byed sgron ma ni/ /dang po'i

mtshan ma dag tu blta/ /gsal byed klog gi cha tsam ste/ /mtshan ma gnyis pa dag tu brtag /dkar po'i 'od kyi tshul can ni/ /phyogs bcu dag tu blta byas te/ /nyon mongs 'byin pa gsungs pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag /'dod pa'i lha yi

longs spyod ni/ /bzhi pa rnam shes dag tu bstan/ /gzugs dang reg sogs lha mo ni/ /phyogs kyi ye shes lnga po yin/ /drug pa gzugs med ye shes te/ /bdun pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings/ /brgyad par rang nyid 'dod bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu dag

yin no/ /sbas pa lta dang lag pa dang / /'khyud dang gnyis gnyis la sogs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin gsungs/ /dgu pa bla ma bla ma ste/ /thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin/ /rnam pa gzhan dag rtswa dang 'dra/ /de nyid srog chags rnams

kyi srog /de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin/ /de nyid thams cad khyab byed de/ /lus kun la ni rnam par gnas/ /de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te/ /he ru ka dpal yin par bshad/ /skyes pa ma ning la sogs nyid/ /phra ba'i snying po'ang 'dzin pa yin/ /ye shes rtag tu

'byung de la/ /gang zhig sa la gnas rnams dang / /bstan bcos dag ni ma lus dang / /rig byed grub mthar gnas pa rnams/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu/ /de med par ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rig byed grub pa'i mtha' rnams la/ /'di ni snying po rab tu bshad/ /

'dug dang ldang ba nyid dang ni/ /'jug pa rdzogs pa nyid dag dang / /byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang / /ting 'dzin mchod pa bsdus pa yin/ /de nas cho ga ming gzhan pa/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /de nyid du ni kun skyes pa/ /'byin dang sdud par byed

pa yin/ a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+ShaH/ 'di ni bcom ldan lha de yin/ /mchog nyid

lhag par gnas pa yin/ /lha kun gyi ni bskyed pa dang / /bsgrubs byas de bzhin shes byas nas/ /don dam mchog kyang de bzhin te/ /brgyad cu rtsa bzhi theg pa ste/ /sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas na/ /des ni 'di ni nges rgyal te/ /thams cad shes rab thabs kyis 'gro/ /

thog mar gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /dge dang mi dge gang yin pa/ /de ni lha tshogs rgyan yin te/ /ska rags gnas rnams thams cad yin/ /rtag tu 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/ /chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa yin/ /A li kA li mdun bsams na/ /rnal 'byor

chen po ngal bsos te/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid de/ /sems kyang brtag par mi bya'o/ /sems de nyid kyang mi bsam ste/ /des na 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis rgyud kun las gsang ba/ /khyod la yang ni bshad pa yin/ /'di ni 'bad pas sba bya ste/ /

gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i sdom/ /rnal 'byor ma sogs thams cad dang / /dpa' bo'i yan lag thams cad kyi/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bras bu 'thob/ /srid pa'i nang nas 'byung ba yin/ /bla ma'i rgyud kyi thabs la ni/ /bsnyen bkur med pa la mi bshad/ /gal

te bshad na sdug bsngal zhing / /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems kyang 'khor/ /sems ni rnam 'khor rnal 'byor pa/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi mthong ngo / /ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang / /kun smra bsten pa'i gtam yang rjod par byed/ /lam yang ma bshad

'ching bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad/ /he ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag /sku kun brtan g.yo bdag nyid can/ /gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med/ /zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya/ /nye ba'i zhing ni 'od

'phro ba/ /'dun pa mngon du gyur pa nyid/ /nye ba'i 'dun pa sbyang dka' ba/ /'dus pa ring du song ba yin/ /nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba/ /dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid/ /nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/ /shrI he ru ka'i gzhung spyod pa/ /'di ni nang gi bdag

nyid can/ /pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor ma ni brda yi skad/ /mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og tu/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag /thog med dus su gang bstan pa/ /phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che/ /

'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing / /kun tu mig dang mgo bo'i zhal/ /kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na/ /thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba/ /bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te/ /sgrub pa

po la phan pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste/ /dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni/ /nga yis rgyud du sbas pa yin/ /gos ni phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /shes rab yan lag phur bu dra/ /A li kA

li zhes brjod pa/ /rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro yin/ /'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas/ /ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid/ /bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das/ /lag pa'i mchod pas dbang bskur ba/ /go cha chen pos yang dag bsrung / /sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa

yin/ /de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin/ /mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing / /skye dang rga bar bde gshegs kyi/ /rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur/ /de

ltar cho ga ldan byas na/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /zla ba nya la sa steng du/ /'di ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/ /de yi bsod nams gyur pa yin/ /lha klu mi la sogs pa kun/ /de yi bsod nams gang gyur des/ /bdag gzhan yang dag ye shes ldan/ /

bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam/ /klog cing 'don dang bris pa yis/ /mtho ris longs spyod 'thob 'gyur ba'am/ /yang na 'khor los sgyur ba 'thob/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs mkha' 'gro/ /lag na

me tog sna tshogs thogs/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang / /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs glu yi mchod pas mchod/ /'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su 'khyer/ /de 'dra'i dpal chen rnal 'byor pa/ /sa stengs su ni rnyed

par dka'/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i yi ge skyed cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /cho ga'i rim bzhin sngags btu ba/ /gcig tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mkhas pas sa ni

mnyam nas su/ /bshang gci yis ni byug par bya/ /ma hA rak+ta byugs nas kyang / /bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas/ /rigs ngan shan pa mo blangs nas/ /me tog la sogs gdab par bya/ /dpa' bo chen po'i bdug spos dbul/ /zhag la sogs pa mar me sbar/ /cang

te'u dril bu brdung bar bya/ /glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya/ /lha yi rol mo'i bye brag dang / /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /lus ni phyag rgya drug dang ldan/ /A li kA li mnyam byas te/ /sde tshan la ni thim par bya/ /bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas la/ /thub pa'i mchog

gis rgyas par bya/ /der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya/ /don 'dod thams cad grub byed pa/ /bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ /bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin

dang / /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang / /sum cu pa ni yang dag blang / /nyi shu drug pa nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed dang / /de nas sum cu rtsa gsum dang / /dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa

dang / /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /dang po yi ni gsum pa nyid/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /lnga

pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /dang po yi ni dang po dang / /de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid dang / /de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa/ /gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /bzhi pa'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /uSh+ma yi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /dang po'i

dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo / /dang po yi ni gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /de bzhin sum cu rtsa gcig blang / /lnga pa ni nyid dag dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin

dang / /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang / /yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /uSh+ma Na ni tha ma nyid/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang / /gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bdun

pa/ /an+ta s+thA yi dang po dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /an+ta s+thA yi gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin yang ni sum cu pa/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /uSh+ma yi ni dang po nyid/ /de bzhin yi ge bya nyid dang / /bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /uSh+ma'i dang po gang yin dang / /de

bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ /dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang / /gsum pa'i dang po nyid dag dang / /dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gang yin dang / /an+ta s+thA yi gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa'i yang ni lnga pa dang / /yi ge bya ni de nas blang / /dang po yi ni bzhi

pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dag /de nas brgyad pa nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /nyi shu rtsa gsum pa yang blang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /slar yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /de bzhin

nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga yang dag blang / /sum cu rtsa gsum nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa blang / /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang / /

de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /an+ta s+thA yi bzhi pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /uSh+ma yi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /thog ma yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /thog

ma yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /bzhi pa yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la/ /bzhi pa

yi ni gnas su bya/ /lnga pa yi ni thog ma la/ /steng du sbyar zhing me dang bcas/ /uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi thog ma dang / /bzhi pa yi ni thog ma la/ /gzi brjid can gyis gdan du byas/ /bdun pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /drug pa yi yang dang po ste/ /ka dang sha yi yi ge ni/ /

thog ma dag ni blangs nas su/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi dang po ste/ /de bzhin yang ni bsdus te blang / /drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /bdun pa yi ni dang po dang / /uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa blang / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dag /rdo rje sems dpas phye ba yin/ /uSh+ma Na yi

bzhi pa nyid/ /nyi ma yang ni gdan du byas/ /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /me yi 'og tu sbyar bar bya/ /gshegs su gsol dang yang dag ldan/ /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa nyid/ /drug pa yi ni gnyis de bzhin/ /bcu gcig pa dang nyi shu gnyis/ /

gsum pa'i dang po blangs nas ni/ /bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bdun pa'i bzhi pa blang bar bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig de blangs nas/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi yang thog ma dang / /gnyis pa yi ni yi ge drug /

lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /k+Sha yi yi ge de bzhin no/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi de blangs nas/ /slar yang bsdu ba bshad pa yin/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Na ni gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /nyi mas slar yang gdab par bya/ /

yi ge nyi shu btab nas ni/ /bcu drug pa yis stan du bya/ /'og tu me yi gzi brjid can/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /nyi shu rtsa lnga pa yis dbye/ /

bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /gnyis pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /nyi ma'i bu yis rnam par dbye/ /uSh+ma Na yi bzhi pa dang / /dang po yi ni gsum pa la/ /gzi brjid kyis ni gdan du byas/ /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /bco lnga pa yis gdan gnyis bya/ /uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa

nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni thog ma la/ /bcu drug pa yis gdan du bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig de yis blangs/ /bzhi pa yi ni thog ma dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /gsum pa yi ni

gsum pa dang / /dang po yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa nyid/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig de bzhin te/ /nyi ma yis ni mnyam par mnan/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /gzi brjid kyis ni gsal bar bya/ /mthar

gnas pa yi thog mar shes/ /der yang bcu drug pa yis gdab/ /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /dang po yi ni gnyis pa dang / /thog ma yi yang dang po dang / /bzhi pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /thog ma yi yang dang po dang / /gnyis pa yi yang

dang po dang / /de bzhin du ni bcu bzhi pa'o/ /bcu bzhi uSh+ma bzhi pa dang / /nyi shu rtsa bdun gdan du byas/ /ya sogs brgyad po'i sa bon dang / /nyi ma yi ni gzi brjid can/ /gsum pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yis gdan du bya/ /gnyis pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /

gsum pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /ka sha'i yi ge sa bon te/ /nyi shu lnga pa gdan du bya/ /slar yang bsdu bar bya ba ste/ /sku ni legs par btu ba ste/ /dbang chen gyis ni gdan du bya/ /uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /ya tshogs brgyad po'i

sa bon dang / /de bzhin sum cu gsum pa nyid/ /sum cu rtsa gsum de bzhin te/ /lnga pa'i bdag nyid kun bsdu ba'o/ /de nas kyang ni btu bya ba/ /gnyis pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Na yi gsum pa dang / /de

bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi pa ste/ /ka ra kar/ /ku ru ku ru/ /ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ /trA sa ya trA sa ya/ /k+Sho b+ha ya/ /k+Sho b+ha ya/ /hrau hrau/ hraH

hraH/ pheM pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ /b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra/ an+t+ra/ mA lA ba laM bi ne/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sap+ta pA tA la ga ta/ b+hU dzig sarbaM bA/ /ta rdza ya ta rdza ya/ /A kaD+D+h+ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ hrIM hrIM/ dz+Nau dz+No/ k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM/ hI hI/ hU~M hU~M/ ki li ki li/ si li si li/ hi li hi li/

d+hi li d+hi li/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ /rig pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags te/ /bya ba thams cad sgrub byed pa'o/ /'di las shin tu mchog gyur pa/ /'jig rten gsum na yod min te/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung sngags shes na/ /gzhan dag snying po med rtswar mtshungs/ /rtsa ba'i sngags su

bshad pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i rdo rgyus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis/ /snying po'i yig bdun nye snying po/ /ya tshogs brgyad po'i sa bon dang / /de bzhin

gug skyed bcu gnyis kyis/ /yi ge bar ma dor byas pa/ /yan lag drug ni he ru ka /dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /re'u mig drug tu bsgom pa ste/ /he ru ka yi bdag por 'gyur/ /yi ge gcig tu yang dag gnas/ /o~M na maHswA hA bau Sha Ta/ /hUM hUM phaT dang yang dag

ldan/ /sgrub pos snying por shes par bya/ /dang po snying ga nyid du ste/ /gnyis pa spyi bor shes par bya/ /gsum pa spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar/ /bzhi pa go char gyur pa yin/ /lnga pa mig tu gyur pa ste/ /drug pa mtshon cha zhes byar 'dod/ /de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum

nyid/ /yi ge gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge drug pas brgyan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pa nyid kyang ni/ /yi ge bdun pa nyid kyang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ /mkhas pas yi ge brgyad par sbyar/ /

dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba'i/ /yi ge dgu pas brgyan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni/ /yi ge nyi shu gcig pa gzung / /mkhas pas yi ge bcu bzhi pa/ /yi ge nyi shu pa dang sbyar/ /

dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge bco lnga pa ru sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bco lngar yang dag ldan/ /yi ge bcu drug pa mdzes bya/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa'i/ /yi ge bcu bdun pa ru 'dod/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge brgyad pa ru sbyar/ /

dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge nyi shu gcig par sbyar/ /phyi mo'i lnga pa dang yang sbyar/ /yi ge nyi shu gsum par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa nyid ni/ /yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar/ /sde tshan dang po blangs nas ni/ /yi ge nyi shu lnga par sbyar/ /dbyangs

yig gnyis pa dang ldan par/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug 'gyur/ /yi ge nyi shu brgyad dag ni/ /yi ge bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /gsum pa'i dang por yang dag ldan/ /'og gi cha ni me dang bcas/ /de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gcig par/ /dbyangs

yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /yi ge sum cu gnyis pa yang / /dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan par bya/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum pa/ /nyi mar yang dag ldan par bya/ /phyi mo'i bzhi pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge sum cu bzhir ldan pa'i/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /

phyi mo'i lnga pa nyid dag ni/ /sum cu bdun par yang dag ldan/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams sgrub byed yin/ /sum cu brgyad pa nyid dag ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni/ /'di nyid yin bar the tshom med/ /bzhi bcu rtsa

gnyis pa nyid ni/ /me dang 'og tu bsgrub par bya/ /bzhi bcu gsum pa nyid dag ni/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang sbyar/ /yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa ni/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag kyang / /bzhi bcu rtsa drug par ldan pa/ /

dpa' bo thams cad rab mchod cing / /bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'dod/ /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis/ /mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /lnga bcu rtsa gnyis

pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /lha rnams thams cad 'grub byed pa/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'ang / /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang sbyar/ /yi ge rnams las 'di mchog ste/ /dgra rnams nges par gsod byed yin/ /sde

tshan bzhi las bya nyid do/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs yig drug pa dag dang sbyar/ /an+ta s+thA yi bzhi pa dang / /dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yin/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur/ /yi ge drug

cu rtsa gcig nyid/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /'di nyid mchog ni yin par bshad/ /de bzhin drug cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mchog tu 'dod/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa gsum nyid/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig dag

dang ldan/ /mdzes pa'i yi ge kun mchog yin/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phye ba dag /dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /grub sbyin thar pa chen po'o/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa lnga pa/ /me la gnas par yang dag ldan/ /dbyangs yig gsum

pa dang sbyar ba/ /dngos grub kun sbyin bde gshegs gsungs/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba/ /bya ba kun las grub sbyin par/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa bdun pa/ /yi ge gnyis pa yang

dag ldan/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dgos pa kun/ /'di nyid byed par the tshom med/ /drug cu brgyad pa nyid dag las/ /der ni yi ge ba sbyar ba/ /'og gi char ni brtag par bya/ /yi ge bdun cu rtsa gcig pa/ /yi ge gnyis par yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge kun la mdzes

pa ni/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /sum cu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba dag /gdod nas grub pa yin par ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs/ /yi ge bdun cu lnga pa nyid/ /ma mo'i drug pa dang ldan pa/ /'di ni rnal 'byor

mchog yin te/ /dge ba kun las dam pa yin/ /bdun cu rtsa drug pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing / /'og tu me dang ldan pa las/ /gzhan dag mdzes pa yod ma yin/ /yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun pa/ /der ni da dang sbyar bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzes

par 'dod/ /bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /rgyu yi mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' yis khyad par dbye/ /gdod nas grub byed 'di yin te/ /dngos grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o/ /yi ge

brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar/ /phyi mo yi ni lnga pa la/ /de bzhin yi ge brgyad cu brgyad/ /ma mo yi ni lnga pa dang / /brgyad cu dgu pa de bzhin te/ /ma mo lnga pa blangs byas te/ /de bzhin yi ge dgu bcu pa/ /ma mo'i lnga pa blangs byas

te/ /yi ge dgu bcu gcig par sbyor/ /ma mo yi ni gnyis pa dang / /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa yi/ /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa/ /gdug pa thams cad skrag byed pa/ /ma mo kun gyi bde ba'i gnas/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum

pa/ /yi ge gnyis pa dag dang ldan/ /ma mo bcu gsum pa nyid ni/ /yi ge lnga pa dag dang sbyar/ /gdug pa thams cad 'khrug byed de/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba'i gnas/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa yis ni/ /yi ge brgyad pa dag dang sbyar/ /

lnga pa yis rab tu sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa nyid ni/ /yi ge dgu pa dag dang sbyar/ /steng du thig le yang dag gnas/ /yi ge dag ni bsgrub pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par yin/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ /yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar/ /

steng du bin dus rnam par brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig pa/ /yi ge bcu gsum pa dang sbyar/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /'byung po kun ni skrag byed cing / /sgrub pa pos ni dga' ba yin/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pa la/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis sbyar/ /

dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge sum cu gsum dang sbyar/ /ma mo gnyis pa nyid dag dang / /yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhir sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pa dag dang ni/ /yi ge sum cu drug dang sbyar/ /dang po yi ni gnyis pa dag /yi ge sum cu bdun dang sbyar/ /dbyangs

kyi yi ge gsum pa ni/ /yi ge bzhi bcu dang sbyar ba/ /ma mo bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ /yi ge bzhi bcu gcig dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni/ /yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis par sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa dag dang ni/ /yi ge bzhi bcu bzhi dang sbyar/ /ma

mo'i gnyis pa nyid dang yang / /yi ge bzhi bcu brgyad par sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag /yi ge bzhi bcu dgu dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag /yi ge lnga bcu gnyis par sbyar/ /phyi mo'i lnga pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge lnga bcu lnga dang sbyar/ /yi ge

lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ /thig les mgo la mnan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag /yi ge

drug cu drug cu sbyar/ phyi mo gnyis pa nyid kyang ni/ /yi ge drug cu bdun dang sbyar/ /gdug pa'i dngos grub kun 'grub cing / /sgrub pa po la dpal yang stsol/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa dang / /yi ge bdun cu pa dang sbyar/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /phyi

mo yi ni bzhi pa yis/ /yi ge bdun cu gsum dang sbyar/ /bco lnga pa ni rab blangs te/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dang ni/ /yi ge bdun cu bzhi par sbyar/ /phyi mo'i bcu bzhi dag dang ni/ /yi ge bdun cu gsum dang sbyar/ /de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs

kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni/ /yi ge bdun cu bzhi dang sbyar/ /phyi mo'i yi ge gnyis pa yang / /yi ge bdun cu bdun dang sbyar/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa yang / /yi ge bdun cu brgyad dang sbyar/ /thig le gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan/ /

phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa yang / /yi ge bdun cu dgu dang sbyar/ /ma mo'i bzhi pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge brgyad cu pa dang sbyar/ /thig les mgo la mnan par bya/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pa dag kyang ni/ /yi ge bdun cu dgu dang sbyar/ /thig le sgra yis bskyed pa ste/ /thig

les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa dag /yi ge bcu drug pa dang sbyar/ /'og dang steng gi yi ge grangs/ /dgu bcu rtsa bdun bshad pa ste/ /'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags su/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya/ /dngos grub kyi ni gnas yin

zhing / /mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa na/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung lha rigs rgyal/ /bklags pas grub pa don yod pa/ /o~M ni dang por sbyar bar bya/ /hU~M hU~M phaT ni mthar sbyar ba/ /'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te/ /grub pa thams cad grub byed yin/ /de nas rang

gi bdag nyid kyi/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dra ba yi/ /'khor lo bde mchog yin par 'dod/ /hA swA raM ba saM la dzA nI ki DA Tapha hU~M hU~M kaM ru ru he he dzra ba shrI o~M/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /Tapha hU~M hU~M ha ha

hrIHo~M/ /yi ge ba~M dang yoM dang ni/ /yi ge ma~M dang hri nyid dang / /hU~M dang phaT ces bshad pa yin/ o~M baM badzra bA rA hi/ /haM yoM ya mi ni/ hrIM moM mo ha ni/ hreM hreM saM/ tsal ni/ /hU~M hU~M saM trA sa ni/ /phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka/ rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu bsgrags/ /re'u mig

drug la rnam par bsgom/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las go cha'i snying po sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi/ /snying po bla med bshad par bya/ /o~M badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hU~M hUM phaT swA hA/ lha mo'i snying po'i sbyor ba ni/ /bcu

gsum pa ni bdag nyid dge/ /pad+ma dbus su phag mo ste/ /'dab ma la ni lha mo dgod/ /sgo bzhi dag gi phyogs su ni/ /lha mo'i snying po rnam par bsgom/ /o~M las byung ba'i rta gdong dang / /rdo rje snying po gdug pa'i sgra/ /drag po yang ni g.yo ma dang / /mi 'phrog ma dang

dri med ma/ /hU~M mdzad ma dang ldan lha mo/ /bsregs blugs ma dang phaT byed ma/ /rang byung ma dang bcu gnyis te/ /ha mdzad g.yas pa'i gtso bo yin/ /rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar ba dang / /ljang khu steng zhal dkar

po ste/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing thod phreng can/ /gsus pa rlo zhing skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos can 'dzin pa ste/ /rang gi thabs dang sbyor bas gnas/ /'jigs byed tsa muN+Di 'jigs myos/ /

zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon pas bzhugs/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /mdung dang gri gug cang te'u dang / /rdo rje dril bu zhags pa dang / /lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /dgra sta dang ni sdigs mdzub dang / /na ra'i pags pa steng du brkyang / /ska rags dang ni dpung rgyan dang / /

phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /thugs rje khro gnyer 'jigs pa ste/ /'dab la lha mo thams cad dgod/ /ma mo dag ni brgyad pa ste/ /ser dang dmar dang ljang ba dang / /lho ni sngo ba'i mdog can te/ /me phyogs dmar la dud kha ste/ /

sngo ba dang ni dkar ba dang / /dbang ldan du ni dgod pa ste/ /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /skyil krung phyed pas legs par bzhugs/ /thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can/ /phyogs kyi gos can bzhin rnam sgyur/ /thams cad gdan la

bzhugs/ /thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos/ /rdo rje'i mchog ni gar mdzad cing / /thod pa rak+tas bkang ba dang / /dril bu cang te'u sgra yang sgrogs/ /lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin/ /sgo rnams su ni sgo srung ste/ /dbang po'i steng du rnam par bzhugs/ /g.yas

brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la dbu skra brdzes/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spud pa ste/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /rdo rje mgo bo phyag na bsnams/ /thams cad rnam sgyur gsus pa 'phyang / /thams cad mgo bo'i phreng

bas brgyan/ /sngo dang ljang dang dkar po ste/ /ser zhing phyag bzhi mdog gnyis pa/ /gcer bu pad+ma'i rgya yang che/ /rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ /thams cad rang thabs gnyis pa ste/ /bcu gsum pa ni rnam par bsgom/ /snying po mchog ni sgom pa yin/ /'dod

pa thams cad rab tu stsol/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las go cha dang lha mo'i snying po sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /shin tu rnyed dka'i dgod pa ste/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /myur du dngos

grub 'grub pa'o/ /sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong / /tsan+dan gyis ni nye bar bsku/ /dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni/ /me tog sil ma gcal dgram zhing / /spos kyi dri yis nyams dgar bya/ /bdag gi bya ba kun byas shing / /phyogs bcing ba ni byas nas su/ /de nas rdza rnga'i

bcing byas te/ /re mig bzhi bcu dgu zlum la/ /yi ge'i phyi mo dgod par bya/ /der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed btu/ /rim bzhin 'byung dang rim min sa/ /dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pos so/ /thub pa de lta'i grangs 'gyur las/ /re'u mig

sum cu gnyis pa blang / /lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya/ /brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye/ /re'u mig sum cu drug pa blang / /gsum pa yis ni khyad par dbye/ /de nas sum cu gnyis pa blang / /lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya/ /de

nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung / /nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar/ /sum cu rtsa gsum yang dag blang / /re'u mig bco lnga pa yir ldan/ /lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas/ /de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /re'u

mig gi ni bcu dgu pa/ /me yi bu dang yang dag ldan/ /re'u mig gsum par rnam par dbye/ /ya tshan brgyad po'i sa bon la/ /re'u mig sum cu drug pa dang / /yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger 'gyur/ /slar yang yi ge de dag nyid/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /de nas rang

byung blangs nas su/ /re'u mig la ni lnga par sbyar/ /spyi bor thig le dag dang sbyar/ /de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /don kun grub byed ces bya ba'i/ /tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad/ /re'u mig bcu dgu pa nyid la/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun pa

yis phye/ /gsum pa dag dang yang dag ldan/ /sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te/ /re'u mig ni gnyis par sbyar/ /nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan/ /mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin/ /lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu

ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste btu/ /de nas bzlog pas gzung / /re'u mig las ni dang po nyid/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /de nas nyi shu gnyis pa bzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi/ /tshig ni

gsum pa yin par bshad/ /re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang / /re'u mig sum cu drug pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang / /sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang / /re'u mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan/ /re'u mig las ni bcu pa nyid/ /bzlog pa sgrub pos

blang / /re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa/ /re'u mig nyi shu gsum pa la/ /gnyis pa dag ni yang dag ldan/ /steng du thig les brgyan par bya/ /de nas chu yi sa bon gzung / /brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /me yi bu yis khyad par dbye/ /yi ge hU~M phaT mtha' ru sbyar/ /

'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya/ /sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'o/ /o~M ni sku la gsal byed yin/ /hU~M dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar/ /rig rgyal 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags/ /'di ni ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang / /bde

mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed du/ /khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru/ /dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i don du ni/ /gdug pa kun la khyad par du/ /'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang / /brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sha chen dag gis

thams cad kun/ /rdo rje yang ni med par bshad/ /rnal 'byor thun mong brjod pa ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bskyed pa'o/ /o~M sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M grih+Na grih+Na hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badzra hu~M hU~M phaT/ 'di ni

gdug pa thams cad du/ /'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi sa yi mchog /pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad rnam par bsgom/ /gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon/ /phyag ni bcu drug yang dag ldan/ /zhal brgyad pa la

bzhin rnam sgyur/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /thams cad kun gyis rnam par spud/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug /sku lus drag po thugs rje'i nyams/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi

gnas pa yis/ /dbang ldan gyi ni thod pa gnon/ /u mA mchog gi ku tsa gnon/ /khros pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/ /sku la mgo yi do shal can/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la bcings/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal de bzhin te/ /

lcags kyu sdigs mdzub 'ching pa ste/ /dpral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas/ /thugs ka dpral ba phyag rgya ste/ /bgegs ni rnam par gnon pa yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /ral gri lcags kyu 'chang ba ste/ /mdung dang mgo bo cang te'u

dang / /na ra'i pags pa'i steng du ste/ /phyag ni bcu drug de bzhin no/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /rang rig gnyis med bde ba'i sku/ /sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang / /dmar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes/ /dkar dang sngo dang ser ba dang / /steng gi zhal

ni dmar po ste/ /spyan gsum pa la dmar ba'i spyan/ /khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngon/ /bskyod pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni/ /mi g.yo ba yi rdo rje ste/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang / /dud kha ngur smrig bsres

pa ste/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni/ /bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon/ /na ra'i rus pas sku brgyan cing / /sna tshogs khro bo'i rigs kyang 'phro/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje

sdigs mdzub brkyang ba ste/ /rang gi rig dang gnyis med 'khyud/ /khro bo'i lta bas gzigs mdzad cing / /dril bu phyag mtshan yang dag ldan/ /'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba ste/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya yis/ /khro bo thams cad bcings pa yin/ /stag gi

pags pa gos su mnabs/ /spyan gsum mi bzad 'jigs pa ste/ /tho ba dbyug to mda' dang ni/ /ral gri dril bu de bzhin te/ /yang na rdo rje dril bu dang / /thams cad khro bo'i rigs rjes 'gro/ /'khyud pa'i phyag kyang de bzhin te/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /

thams cad spyan gsum dngos grub mchog /sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor dngos grub mchog dam pa/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag /yi ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /o~M sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M grih+Na grih+Na hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M grih+Na pa

ya grih+NA pa ya hu~M hU~M phaT/ o~M A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badzra hu~M hU~M phaT/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mthong nas/ /thams cad bskyed par rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor chen por sbyor ba ste/ /kha sbyar lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dkyil 'khor yin/ /snying po mchog

gi sgom pa yin/ /de bzhin khyi dang phag gi sha/ /zangs kyi gtsug pud can de bzhin/ /mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la/ /bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya/ /ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing / /rgyal srid thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur/ /dung dang nya phyis mu tig ste/ /

gsum char rgyu las byung yin na/ /chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi/ /thod pa la ni su zhig smod/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas/ /dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang yin par bshad/ /khrag 'thung rdo rje can rnam pa/ /mngon par brjod pa'i

rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las srung ba zhal bzhi par byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rgyus kyis bris pa rdo rje hU~M mdzad skyed pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sde tshan brgyad ni rnam sgom pa/ /mkha' dbyings pad+ma'i dbus gnas

par/ /khrag 'thung rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa/ /spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /zhal rnam sgyur zhing 'jigs pa ste/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /

drag po zla ba phyed pa 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /ral pa'i cod pan 'ching ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /rig pa gnyis med bde ba'i nyams/ /sku la thod rlon do shal can/ /thugs rje'i nyams kyis

khyab par myos/ /dkar dang sngo dang sprin gyi gzugs/ /sku ni sgeg cing ldem bag can/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag ni/ /ser dang dmar dang ljang ba dang / /dud pa yi ni mdog can no/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam ldan pas/ /rang gi rig dang yang dag 'khril/ /

tshangs lpags bshus nas mnabs par mdzad/ /rgyab tu nges par 'dzin pa yin/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /mdung dang cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa dag ni 'dzin pa ste/ /bcom ldan ba~M hU~M nges 'byung ba/ /'jigs byed rang gi chung mar

bcas/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par sbyar/ /shar 'dab lha mor dgod pa ste/ /ji srid lho phyogs de bzhin te/ /me la sogs pa'ang dgod par bya/ /de srid dbang ldan sogs de bzhin/ /a yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /ka yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ /tsa yi

mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /Ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dag ste/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /sngo ba'i mdog can lho phyogs so/ /dmar dang dud kha ljang gu dang / /ser po dbang ldan yang dag gnas/ /ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /pa yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ /de

nas ya yi mkha' 'gro ma/ /sha yi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad pa/ /de dag kun ni spyan gsum ste/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po yi/ /rkang pa g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnon/ /rnam sgyur mche ba rnam gtsigs zhal/ /phyogs kyi gos

mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /skra grol thugs rje khro bo bzhin/ /drag po yul 'khrug byed pa ste/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /'gro ba thams cad smon byed de/ /thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /

dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan pa/ /sde tshan mkha' 'gro bde ba ste/ /'di dag rnal 'byor ma yis bsgom/ /yang na phag mo dgod bya ste/ /bdag mo yang ni gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag po ste/ /mkhas pas kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs su

sbyor ba dag /sa 'og sa steng rab tu 'khrug /oM AHa ka tsa Ta ta ya sha hu~M hU~M phaT/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba'i bdag /ma lus ji snyed 'di yis 'grub/ /sde tshan mkha' 'gro dam pa mchog /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ a sha/ kA shaM tsarma tsa/ TaM ta

pa ka /ta pa sa ta tha/ pa ba na dza~M yaM ma b+ha haM tsa/ shar b+ha tsa ta tha/ sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa ni/ /rtag tu dus su 'di brgyad bza'/ /rgas dang na dang 'chi med par/ /skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur/ /chang gi btung ba dang bcas pa/ /zos pa tsam gyis dbang du

'gyur/ /de ma rnyed na'ang sA lus bya/ /skye ba bdun pa'i nang gnas shing / /phyugs ni zas su rtag spyad na/ /skad cig gis ni mkha' spyod 'gyur/ /'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sde tshan gyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug cu

rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor mchog gis ga rda ba/ /dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor sngar bshad do/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs mkha' 'gro ni/ /ga rda ba yi gzugs su bya/ /phag mo'i gzugs

ni de nyid kyang / /zhal ni ga rda ba ru bya/ /sngar bshad gnas dang phyag mtshan dang / /zhal ni gzhan yang rtogs par bya/ /sngar bshad mtshan ma'i rim pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni lag mdung thogs/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo thams cad kun/ /mkha' lding gdong ni

'jigs pa can/ /gsung gi 'khor lo rma bya'i gdong / /sku yi 'khor lo seng ge'i gdong / /khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa dang / /khwa yi zhal gdong de bzhin te/ /zur la gshin rje sreg sogs kun/ /ma he zhal gdong yin/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams

kyang / /spyan gsum mig ni shin tu dmar/ /'di ni rnal 'byor mchog dam pa/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed/ /rnal 'byor blo gros dngos grub dag /rnal 'byor mchog ni ster bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag dang / /ngag gi dngos grub rab tu

ster/ /ma thos pa yi chos ston pas/ /sems can rnams ni srid las grol/ /bla na med pa nyid bstan pas/ /mi snang la sogs dngos grub 'gyur/ /su yang rung bas 'jig rten gsum/ /de kun de ma thag tu mthong / /sngar bshad dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i/ /

gsang sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /mkha' 'gro ma mo de bzhin no/ /sngar bshad sngags kyi bdag po rnams/ /bzlas na dngos grub rab ster zhing / /rtag tu bde ba thams cad 'thob/ /rnal 'byor nye snying bzlas na ni/ /garda'i dngos grub mkha' la

'gro/ /brtul zhugs med pa'ang brtul zhugs 'thob/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur/ /dbul po'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /nad yod pa yang nad med 'gyur/ /long ba yis kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur/ /bong bu'i sha dang rta sha

dang / /khyi dang ba lang glang po mi/ /rnga mo ce spyang de bzhin te/ /brgyad po'ang mnyam pa mchog yin no/ /rnal 'byor bdag gis de brgyad bza'/ /dri chen chu dang sbrang rtsi mar/ /bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas nas/ /yang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /gzugs

yongs bsgyur ba'i dngos grub cing / /rang gi gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /rnal 'byor gang dang gar gnas par/ /bza' ba yang ni bza' bar bshad/ /'gro dang mi 'gro de bzhin te/ /btung zhing btung zhing dngos grub 'gyur/ /ma dang bu mo sring mo dang / /rang gi gnyen

dang tsha mo dang / /blo ldan ji ltar 'dod pa yis/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya chen po 'grub/ /garda'i mkha' 'gro bsgoms na ni/ /myur du 'gugs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /mchog 'di yang ni gsang ba ste/ /su la yang ni brjod mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla

ma las ji ltar 'dod pa'i bong bu'i mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro lnga yi rnam sgom pa/ /rigs las skyed pa'i cho ga yin/ /gdan dang phyag mtshan sa bon te/ /'di ni sa

bon mchog gyur pa'o/ /nga nya Na na ma zhes pa/ /'di ni sa bon mchog grub pa/ /nga ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/ /nya ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin/ /Na ni rin chen mkha' 'gro ste/ /na ni pad+ma mkha' 'gro yin/ /ma ni sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste/ /mkha' 'gro lnga ni

mchog yin te/ /zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang / /chags dang phrag dog de bzhin te/ /rigs ni lnga po 'di dag gis/ /'dod las grol ba'i 'bras bu stsol/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / /pad+ma ral gri lnga pa yin/ /sngo dang dkar ba nyid dang ni/ /ser

dang dmar po ljang gu dang / /rdo rje'i phyag rgya byang chub mchog /rin chen phyag rgya'ang de bzhin te/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa ste/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya lnga pa yin/ /glang po seng ge rta dang ni/ /rma bya mkha' lding de bzhin te/ /khyab 'jug tshangs pa nyi ma dang / /dbang

phyug che dbang po yang de/ /rang rig yan lag dang bcas pa/ /gnyis med bde bas yang dag gnas/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang du yang ni de bzhin 'dir/ /dpa' bo'i 'khor dang bcas par dgod/ /lnga po yang dag lnga sangs rgyas/ /lnga po bdag nyid

lnga yin no/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar du'o/ /lho dang nub dang de bzhin te/ /byang na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /yang na dbus su zla ba ste/ /shar du yang ni nyi ma'i gdan/ /de dag dpa' bor gyur pa ste/ /'di lta ste/ rdo rje

thod pa dang / rdo rje mkha' mnyam dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sra ba dang / bzhi po de dag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ glang po che'i gdan khri bya'o/ /rdo rje zla ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje sgra dang / de dag ni sangs

rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ seng ge'i gdan khri'o/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje srin dang / rdo rje Ta ha ra dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / de dag ni rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ rta'i gdan khri'o/ /rdo rje me dpal dang / rdo rje 'joms pa dang / rdo rje sreg

byed dang / rdo rje dri bral dang / de dag ni pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor te/ rma bya'i gdan khri'o/ /rdo rje ba dan dang / rdo rje glu dang / rdo rje dpa' bo dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / de dag ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ mkha' lding gi gdan khri'o/ /dpa' bo

de dag kyang rang gi rigs dang / thod pa'i phreng ba can spyan gsum pa/ rang gi shes rab dang 'khyud pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba/ stag gi

pags pa gos su mnabs pa/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ thod pa dang kha T+wA~M ga 'dzin pa/ cang te'u'i sgra hU~M dang bcas pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal gyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ ral pa dang zla ba 'dzin

pa'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po/ byang ljang gu/ nub dmar po/ lho ser po/ las kyi mkha' 'gro'i shar ser po/ byang sngon po/ nub dkar po/ lho dmar po/ pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po/ byang ljang khu/ nub sngon po/ lho

ser po/ rin chen mkha' 'gro'i shar ljang gu/ byang ser po/ nub dkar po/ lho sngon po/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i shar sngon po/ byang ljang gu/ nub dmar po/ lho ser po/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang / /pad+ma

rin chen phreng ba yi/ /chas ni yongs su bskor bar bya/ /grwa bzhir ma mo bzhi bsgom ste/ /ma mo rmongs byed ma dang ni/ /ma mo zhe sdang nyid yin te/ /chags pa yi ni ma mo dang / /phrag dog ma mo de bzhin te/ /me yi phyogs la sogs par dgod/ /dkar

dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang / /skra grol ma la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /spyan gsum pa la gcer bu ste/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa yin/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa/ /gdan la rnam par bzhugs/ /dbang chen me dang chu dang ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor

dag tu gnas/ /rigs kyi gdan la bzhugs pa yin/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dang / /ral gri thod pa kha T+wA~M ga /gri gug yang ni phyag na 'chang / /ma ning las byung lha mo bsgom/ /thod pa yi ni phreng ba can/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod

sbyin dang / rdo rje srung ba dang / rdo rje 'gying ba dang / rdo rje rta gdong dang / rdo rje dred gdong dang / rdo rje bde mchog dang / rdo rje dam tshig dang / rdo rje rta mchog ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po de dag ni/ /sgo rnams dang ni mtshams su ste/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar

ser po/ /dmar dang sngo dang dud kha dkar/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu thod pa kha T+wA~M ga /cang te'u yang ni de bzhin te/ /tho ba dbyug tho mdung dang ni/ /dgra sta thod pa kha T+wA~M ga /mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /zhal gcig

pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /thod pa yi ni phreng ba 'chang / /mgo bo'i do shal rnam par brgyan/ /nyi ma pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis

bzhugs/ /phyogs skyong brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs rnam sgyur zhal/ /spyan gsum rang rigs cod pan can/ /rang gi rig dang gnyis med sbyor/ /snying rje yi ni nyams can te/ /phyi rol rdo rje kyis/ /yongs su

bskor bar bsgom par bya/ /thog mar gsal byed ming dang hU~M/ /mtha' ru phaT dang sbyar bar bya/ /sngar bshad cho ga'i srung ba bya/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /lus ngag yid la bsgom par bya/ /mkha' 'gro zhal drug phyag bcu gnyis/ /

rang gi mtshan ma dril bu yis/ /gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan/ /mdung dang lcags kyu thod pa dang / /kha T+wA~M ga dang mgo bo dang / /cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang / /na ra'i pags pa 'dzin pa yin/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang gu/ /dud

kha dang ni dkar ba dang / /dkar dang sngo dang ser dmar dang / /ljang dang thal ba'i mdog lta bu'o/ /ser dang sngo dang dkar ba dang / /dmar dang ljang gu pad+ma'i mdog /dmar dang dkar dang sngon po dang / /ser dang ljang dang nam mkha'i mdog /

ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba dang / /sngo dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog /de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yi ni/ /zhal mdog gi ni khyad par yin/ /yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsgom/ /phreng ba'i gsang sngags ming dang bcas/ /mkhas pas zur bzhi

mtshams nas so/ /mthar ni hu~M hU~M phaT dang sbyar/ /o~M ma hA su kha badzra DA ka hU~M/ DA ki nI dzA la sa~M pa ra AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M ma hA su kha bud+d+ha DA ka b+h+ru~M DA ki nI dzAl saM par AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M ma hA su khar rat+na DA ka hra~M ki nI dzA la sa~M ba ra A hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M ma hA su

kha pad+ma DA ka hrIHDA ki nI dzA la sa~M ba ra AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M ma hA su kha bi shwa DA ka kha~M DA ki nI dzA la sa~M ba ra AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ de dag ni mkha' 'gro lnga'i snying po'i gsang sngags te/ 'di ni ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa yin no/ /o~M badzra DA ka nga~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bud+d+ha DA

ka nya~M hU~M phaT/ o~M rat+na DA ka Na~M hU~M phaT/ o~M pad+ma DA ka Na~M hU~M phaT/ o~M bi shwa DA ka ma~M hU~M phaT/ /ye shes dam tshig ro gcig pa/ /mkhas pas bsgom par byas nas su/ /dam tshig gis ni legs dbang bskur/ /sna tshogs mchod pa rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor

dag ni thams cad kyang / /go 'phang dran nas dbang yang bskur/ /sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog /de bzhin 'khyud dang tsu mA na/ /b+ha ga ling ga'i sbyor ba dag /ye shes rnam smin dpa' ba'i mchog /shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya drug /rnam par

blta zhing nges par brtag /dga' ba dang po ye shes te/ /mchog tu dga' ba mnyam par sbyor/ /bde bar dga' bar grub pa che/ /lhan cig skyes dga' bla med yin/ /sbyor ba dang ni shin tu sbyor/ /sbyor ba che dang ye shes sbyor/ /de dag cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /

thig le'i gzhung gi sbyor shes na/ /phra ba'i sbyor bas blta bar bya/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang thob/ /cho ga nges par bsgrubs nas ni/ /myur du rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub/ /'di ni nges pa kho na'o/ /mngon

par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i ye shes kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /ye

shes zla ba rnam par bsgom/ /a yi yi ge las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /kha ba kun+da'i mdog lta bu/ /dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i mnyam/ /sna

tshogs pad+ma zla dbus bzhugs/ /stong pa'i ye shes las byung ba/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching / /thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rang gi lus dang sbyor bar gnas/ /

snying rje chags dang mngon gyur pa/ /dkar zhing sngo la dmar ba'i zhal/ /rnam thar gsum gyi rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /lha mo'i mchu ni rnam 'tshir te/ /rdo rje mdung dang thod pa dang / /kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa 'dzin/ /yi ge AHdang nyi

dbus bzhugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /i las rdo rje zla ba ste/ /I las rdo rje sgyu 'phrul lo/ /e las chos kyi rdo rje ste/ /ai las sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul ma/ /lha mo bzhi po de dag ni/ /de yi zhal mdog 'dzin pa'o/ /skra grol

ba la mig po che/ /snying rje chags pas rnam par myos/ /rang gi thabs dang lhan cig bcas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs steng du bsgom/ /gtso bo shes rab skyil mo krung / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag

rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan/ /mdung dang gri gug phyag na bsnams/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ji ltar dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor bzhin/ /de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /

lha mo bzhi yi kha sbyar gsang / /snying po sbyor ba mchog yin no/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /gsang ba kun gyi mchog de nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po mchog /gsang ba'i

ye shes dam tshig ste/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin/ /u ni snying khar bsgom pa ste/ /U ni mgo bor de bzhin no/ /o ni spyi gtsug dag tu ste/ /au ni mig tu dgod par bya/ /oM ni go char dgod pa ste/ /aHni mtshon du rnam par

dgod/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par gnas/ /ye shes dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /bla med mchod dang dbang yang bskur/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyang de bzhin mnyam

pa yin/ /dngos po kun ni ro gcig ste/ /gnyis su med pa'i mchog grub pa/ /dam tshig thun mtshams bzhin du ste/ /dus bzhi dag tu rnam par bsgom/ /kha sbyor bzhi yi sbyor ba ni/ /thun bzhi la ni rnam par bsam/ /snying rjes kun la

'gro bya zhing / /cha med par ni rnam par bsgom/ /thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /shes rab cha med rjes su 'gro/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sbyor/ /bdag nyid rdo rje bdag po yin/ /bgrang du med pa'i rus pa yin/ /ye shes bzlas pa yin

par bshad/ /bzlas pa ye shes bsgom pa ste/ /sprul pa drug ni spro ba'o/ /de bas dam tshig bzlas pa ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya/ /o~M AHa A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ o~M aH/ hU~M swA hA/ dung chen phreng ba blangs

nas ni/ /rtag tu gsang sngags rgyal po bzla/ /dag byed bsod nams chen po ste/ /dge zhing nyes pa 'joms pa yin/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed cing / /dge ba kun gyi 'bras bu ste/ /gsang sngags kun gyi ston pa ste/ /rnam

par dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po yi/ /dgyes pa'i bde ba las byung ba/ /lha mo bzhi po dga' ba ste/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog tu bde/ /rigs kyi bde ba bcom ldan 'das/ /rang byung rdo rje sems dpa'

yin/ /mdon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las lha mo bzhi'i gsang ba kha sbyor gyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhin pa'o// //de nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa/ /gdug pa thams cad za byed pa/ /ma rungs phyi dang nang 'joms

pa/ /nam mkha' stong pa lta bu las/ /yi ge k+Sha las mngon byung zhing / /mkha' 'gro'i dra ba bde mchog ni/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /g.yas brkyang pa yis bzhugs pa la/ /ma rungs

bdud kyi dgra gnon cing / /phyag rgya chen po mnyam ldan pas/ /thod pa dril bus yang dag 'khyud/ /thod pa'i dbus su yid 'ong ba'i/ /rdo rje mchog gis rnam par mtshan/ /ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba/ /lag pa g.yas par bzhag

nas ni/ /sna tshogs pa yi sku lus la/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku yang brgyan/ /zhal gdong mche ba rnam gtsigs shing / /spyi gtsug thod pas rgyan du byas/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'chang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i

dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sgom pa yin/ /dogs pa rnam par spangs shing yongs su dag pa'i blos/ /rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma'i khyad par med par byed/ /byams dang snying rje'i rgyan gyis lus la rgyan du byas/ /'dzem med bde ba'i rnal

'byor legs par bslabs pa'i bdag /shin tu 'jigs pa'i dud 'gro'i dur khrod chen po na/ /ro langs srin po sna tshogs sgra rnams sgrogs par byed/ /pheM gyi sgra byed pa yi 'jigs pas khyad par byed/ /gzhan yang sgrub po rnal 'byor mthun pa'i

yul du bsgrub/ /yang na zhal ni bzhi pa dang / /'di la phyag brgyad rnam par bsgom/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar ser po/ /zhal dag bsgyur zhing 'jigs par mdzad/ /mdung dang rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga /cang te'u mgo bo gri

gug thogs/ /sna tshogs phyag la bskyod pa'i ljags/ /ha hA hi hI hu~M hU~M dang / /phaT ces bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing / /dpa' bo gcig pu 'jigs mdzad pas/ /gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /

khro bo'i sprin ni mkhas pas spro/ /bsam gtan dga' ba bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /khro bo yi ni sku ru bsgrub/ /dam tshig bza' zhing bzlas pa bya/ /dam tshig kha sbyar byas nas bzla/ /mnyam par gnas shing bzlas nas su/ /chos rnams ma

lus bsgom par bya/ /o~M ak+Sha hU~M phaT/ srid gsum sdig pa zad byed cing / /mtshams med lnga yang zad par byed/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed cing / /srid pa dag kyang sbyong bar byed/ /sbyor ba yi ni mchog dam pa/ /bklags

tsam gyis ni nges par 'grub/ /gdug cing gnod byed sems can dang / /ma rungs las la chags pa dang / /log par lta dang bcas pa las/ /'di dag nges par bza' bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sprul ba'i rgyan rnams spro/ /khams

gsum dag ni sgrol bar byed/ /sngags pas sngags kyi mchog de ni/ /ming dang bcas pas lhan cig bzla/ /o~M phaT che ge mo b+ha k+Sha ya phaT/ k+ShAHhU~M phaT/ /bdag nyid khro bo'i sems kyis ni/ /mA~M sa bza' zhing gcer bu dang / /skra

grol ro la mnan pa dang / /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin/ /gsang sngags cho ga bzhin du ni/ /khri phrag stong du bzla zhing bsgom/ /rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni/ /khams gsum po dag gsod par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma

ni 'khor bcas pas/ /bza' bar yang ni rnam par bsam/ /bdag nyid rdo rje khab thogs pa'i/ /khro bo snying du gzhug par bya/ /snying dang rgyu ma rkang dang rus/ /sha dang khrag rnams 'dral byed cing / /mtshams med lnga rnams byed

pa dang / /gdug pa can rnams bza' bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro lte bar bzhugs nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig sbyor/ /rdo rje blo ldan rab sbyor bas/ /zhag bdun gyis ni phebs par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan byas pa tsam gyis ni/ /

gdug pa bdag gis zos par 'gyur/ /nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed dang / /las 'di dag la 'jug par bya/ /gcer bu skra grol byed pa yis/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su kha bltas te/ /khyim bya'i stan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /me yi gsang sngags

bzla bar bya/ /phaT hU~M ra~M ra~M ra~M/ mtshams med pa 'di zhes bya ba/ /ra~M ra~M ra~M hU~M phaT/ ji bzhin bzlas pa byas tsam gyis/ /nyin zhag bcu bzhi dag gis ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum pa'ang / /'chi bar yang ni the tshom med/ /gal te

sdig can slar log na/ /'di la zhi ba'i las rnams bya/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa cher byas nas/ /'dis kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ o~M swA hA/ a A ba~M a mu ka~M pA pa bI ra ho b+ha bi Sh+D+ya ti ta s+ya/ /si ba shAn+tiM b+ha ban+tu/ ba~M a~M aHo~M swA hA/ /'o ma

btung zhing gos dkar gyon/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis stong nyid gnas/ /dkar po'i dri yis lus byug go /bya rog khyi dang byi la dang / /na ku la yi sha rnams bza'/ /thams cad rab tu gnas gyur te/ /'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med/ /mngon

par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bdag po'i kha sbyar gnon pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /srid pa'i nang na skye ba bdun/ /sna tshogs pa shu'i dam tshig ni/ /lha yi

gzugs can yid 'phrogs pa/ /lha yi gzugs can gzi brjid dpal/ /ba shu'i nang na rgyal po yin/ /skal bzang yid 'ong bde bar 'gro/ /skra yi myu gu de bzhin ring / /mig ni dkyus ring mig kyang dmar/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i gzugs/ /de yi lus la rdul

zhim 'byung / /lus las lha yi dri 'byung zhing / /kha yi dbugs ni ga bur dri/ /ldan pas sbrang ma rtag tu 'khor/ /gcin dang phyi sa gla rtsi bro/ /tshig ni 'jam par gyur pa dang / /lag pa dang ni rkang pa 'jam/ /ut+pa la yi dri dang ldan/ /skra dkar gnyer ma las rnam grol/ /lus

kyang snum zhing mnyen pa dang / /snying dang thod pa lte ba ste/ /des na ro tsa na ru 'gyur/ /grib bdun ngang pa'i 'gros su 'gro/ /snying rje'i bsam pa can yin te/ /dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu dad/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims dag dang ldan/ /'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas

rtogs na/ /mi gsod me yis tshig mi 'gyur/ /srog chags sna tshogs gdug pa dag /gang yang rung bas za mi nus/ /de ni mtshan mo mi mthong ste/ /mi snang ba yi dbang phyug mchog /'di 'dra sngags pas rtogs nas ni/ /bdag gis

blangs te sbyin pa spyad/ /dri chen chu dang byang chub sems/ /mkhas pas blangs te ril bu bya/ /lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris te/ /blo dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyar nas/ /nye ba'i snying po lan 'bum bzlas/ /de 'di lag

tu byin nas ni/ /sbyin pa 'di las bdag la byin/ /de 'di de ma thag tu yang / /mi bskyod pa yi bya ba rnyed/ /de ni dben par khyer nas su/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub par bya/ /gzhan yang las rnams rab bshad bya/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i mchog

dam pa/ /de yi spyi bo'i skra bcad nas/ /gzhan yang dud 'gro'i spu dang ni/ /de bsres the gur byas nas su/ /gang gi mgul du bcings byas pas/ /de 'dra ba yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyang byed pa yin/ /de yi pags pa blangs nas ni/ /

de la he ru ka dpal bri/ /mngon sum khro bo'i dngos grub ni/ /he ru ka dpal byed pa yin/ /rkang lag pags pa blangs nas ni/ /'byung po'i skra dang bcas bsres nas/ /phye ma'i ril bur byas nas su/ /mngon par bsngags te cho ga bya/ /mkhas pas rgyal gyi nyi

ma la/ /lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas/ /lag pa g.yon pas de blangs te/ /the bong sbas pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /khu tshur de ni mgor bzhag na/ /de ma thag tu rkun ma rengs/ /rang gi lag gis dpung gnyis blangs/ /rang skra zhags pa blangs

nas thogs/ /g.yas pa lcags kyu thogs nas ni/ /the gu lnga yis rnam par dkri/ /phyogs gar nor gyis gang ba yi/ /de yi phyogs mthong blang bar bya/ /khyim du bkod cing steng 'dug nas/ /sngags bzlas nas ni mkha' la spyod/ /o~M dzaHa

p+pa~M ba hU~M ba hU~M ba rA na du khe tsa ri dza ri hrIHswA hA/ nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos/ /yid la gang 'dod ci yang rung / /de dag thams cad myur du 'gugs/ /khyim ni gang bar yongs su mthong / /mA~M sa dag ni zos nas su/ /lha yi lus su 'gyur

ba yin/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje'i lus gyur te/ /des ni shi ba dbang du 'gyur/ /chu ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas/ /skra dang bsres nas de bsgril te/ /the gu cho ga bzhin du ni/ /bsgril nas zhags pa dag tu bya/ /g.yas brkyang gnas shing khro gnas par/ /

gang gi ming gi bzlas brjod kyis/ /zhags pa btab na de ma thag /lha mo 'gugs shing de mdun gnas/ /de yi rus pa'i phye ma yis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /'di la dkyil 'khor dngos grub ni/ /ci 'dod pa ni de la gnas/ /

gzhan yang rgyan du byed pa dang / /rdo rje mtshan gyis mdzes par bya/ /chu ba dag gis mchod phyir thogs/ /de ru bdar ba'i tsan+dan gyis/ /byugs pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ni/ /mkha' la spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /sgrub pa til mar chen po yi/ /mig

sman nges par byas nas ni/ /grib ma yang ni mthong mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor zhag gis bskus na ni/ /mtshan mo'ang nyin par lta bur 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rkang dag zos nas ni/ /tshim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /ji srid gnas par mi bkres shing / /

yid gzhungs dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor sngon gyi skye ba dran/ /rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyu ma phye mar byas nas su/ /mkhas pas grib ma la yang bskam/ /gang gis mgo la gzhag pa na/ /de ma thag tu dbang du 'gugs/ /sngags pas glo ba zos

na ni/ /de ma thag tu nad med 'gyur/ /rkang pa blangs nas sar bsnun na/ /char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed/ /blo ldan gsang ba blangs nas bskam/ /tsan+dan dmar po dang bsres nas/ /de ni phye mar byas nas su/ /bud med gang la byin na ni/ /'dod pas

gdungs pa'i bud med gang / /dbang du gyur te mngag gzhug byed/ /pus mo'i rus pa kI la ya/ /sor ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam zhig /gang gi ming bcas sbas pa yis/ /de yi rigs brgyud med par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor dzi hwa zos na ni/ /ngag gi dngos grub dag tu 'gyur/ /

rnal 'byor hr-i da zos na ni/ /sems ni thub pa nyid du 'gyur/ /so yi rgyal po bzhi po dag /steng 'og dag ni blangs nas kyang / /bung ba yi ni gshog pa dang / /tshub ma'i 'dab ma rdul dang ni/ /rdul 'dis bsgrub pa byas na ni/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rmongs/ /rtsa rnams phye mar byas pa

yi/ /bud med thams cad skams par 'gyur/ /rang byung me tog ro tsa na/ /a lag ta dang gur gum gyis/ /thig le sngags pas sbyar na ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'ang dbang du 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor mig 'bras phye ma yis/ /pha rol sde ni 'byed par

'gyur/ /nu ma zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /de ma thag tu 'o ma 'gugs/ /rnal 'byor mtshan ni zos tsam gyis/ /bud med sa bon mod la 'gugs/ /rnal 'byor so dang sen mo phyes/ /gang dang gang gis mgo la gtor/ /grub pa brgyad po 'grub pa yin/ /

pha dang bu ni yin na yang / /rnam par sdang bar byas par 'gyur/ /mchu phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /kha ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin/ /sna phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbugs ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin/ /rna ba'i sbyor bas 'on par 'gyur/ /

mgo bo'i pags pas mngon btags te/ /kha yi drung du mngon bzlas na/ /lha rnams kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur/ /thod pa yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /rak+ta 'gugs par byed pa yin/ /thod pa kha ni sbub pa yis/ /gnod par byas pa kho na yin/ /in+d+ra

ba ru ro tsa na/ /de gnyis gcig tu bsres byas nas/ /gang la thig le gcig gyur na/ /dbang po'i gnas ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /ro tsa na dang myang spras dag /lhan cig tu ni byugs pa yis/ /thub pa med pa'i stobs 'gyur te/ /pha rol dag

ni gnon par 'gyur/ /pu tran dza li ro tsa na/ /lhan cig tu ni phyer byas nas/ /bud med gang la phyes gtor na/ /de ni 'dod pas myos gyur nas/ /ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du gnas/ /ro tsa na dang pu tras gnyis/ /lhan cig tu ni bskus pa yis/ /

'byung po kun dang 'byung mo rnams/ /ci bgyi zhes ni smra bzhin du/ /de yi drung du 'khod par 'gyur/ /ci 'dod pa dag ster bar 'gyur/ /ro tsa na dang dzi ban ti/ /lhan cig tu ni phyer byas te/ /shi ba'i mig dang mig sman sbyar/ /bskal par

gnas kyi bar du ni/ /'tsho bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /chu srin lag ni ro tsa na/ /lhan cig tu ni phyer byas nas/ /nA ga ma do lhan cig tu/ /ril bu dag tu byas nas kyang / /rdo rje gzi brjid dang bsres nas/ /mig gi sman ni byas gyur na/ /

nor skyong gi ni glang po yang / /mngon sum du ni gnas nas kyang / /de la bdag gis zhon na ni/ /glang chen 'khor ni mang po dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol sde ni 'joms byed cing / /gzhan gyi yul la dbang byed pa'i/ /ci 'dod pa ni

ster bar 'gyur/ /brah+ma daN+Di ro tsa ni/ /lhan cig tu ni sbyor ba yis/ /rig byed rgol ba med par 'gyur/ /rma bya'i mkhris pa'i ro tsa na/ /ri bong khrag dang lhan cig tu/ /ril bu rtag tu bsgrubs byas nas/ /rma bya'i mjug mas bcings na ni/ /bung ba bzhin du 'phur

'gyur te/ /lha rnams 'gugs pa'i dngos grub cing / /rig pa 'dzin pa 'ongs par 'gyur/ /de yi lan ni 'ga' tsam gyis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur/ /lha yi gzhal med khang 'phrog cing / /lha yi bu mo'ang 'gugs par 'gyur/ /'dod na dbang du sdod byed cing / /mi 'dod sems

can don yang byed/ /mjug ma thur bltas byas na ni/ /gter rnams kyang ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /blangs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /sa 'og gter gyi sgo dag la/ /mjug ma skor ba byas na ni/ /sgo dbye bas ni 'jug par bya/ /lha min bu mo lhan

cig rol/ /lha yi bcud dang bcud kyis len/ /'phrog cing des ni zos gyur te/ /'dod pa'i lha yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /grub pa'i rdzas ni blangs pa yis/ /sems can don rnams byed cing 'gro/ /de nas yan lag lnga pa yi/ /cho ga dag tu 'gyur ba ni/ /spu dang pags

pa sha dang ni/ /rus pa rkang pa blangs nas su/ /dri chen chu dang shu kra dang / /mtshal rnams dag ni lhan cig tu/ /ril bu byas nas bsgrub par bya/ /lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas/ /kha yi nang du sbas na ni/ /nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ro tsa na dang lhan

cig tu/ /khams gsum du ni rgyal chen 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las skye ba bdun pa'i phyugs chen sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rang gi chos kyi yid sgom pa/ /rang gi chos kyi

yi ger sbyor/ /bdag med chos ni yang dag bsgom/ /rang chos yi ge mchog dga' ba/ /chos kyi sku lus rang byung yin/ /yi ge he las nges byung ba/ /he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom/ /yi ge hi las nges byung ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /hU~M gi ye

shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par bsgom/ /hUM gi yi ge las byung ba/ /mi bskyod pa ni rnam par bsgom/ /ba~M gyi ye shes las bskyed pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /o~M b+hU~M oM b+hU~M las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /aM trA~M ra~M

swa las byung ba/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /hriM hriM a las nges 'byung ba/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /kha~M ho ha ha~M las byung ba/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /DA las mkha' 'gro ma nyid do/ ya~M las rnal 'byor ma de bzhin/ /b+h+rU~M las

lha mo sa la spyod/ /ba~M las mkha' la spyod pa yin/ /ma~M las ma mo nyid yin te/ /dpa' bo'i btsun mo snyan grags ma/ /he ni thugs kyi gtso bo ste/ /ru las ngag ni byung ba yin/ /ka ni lus kyi rdo rje ste/ /yig gsum las byung he ru ka /ma~M las 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste/ /

sa~M las kun tu bzang po yin/ /la~M las 'jig rten mgon po ste/ /k+ShiM las sa yi snying po'o/ /ba~M las phyag na rdo rje ste/ /me~M las byams pa nyid yin te/ /kha~M las nam mkha'i snying por grags/ /ga~M las nam mkha'i mdzod yin no/ /sa~M las sgrib pa kun sel

ba/ ga~M las spos kyi glang po yin/ dz+nyA~M las ye shes tog kyang yin/ /a~M las blo gros mi zad pa/ /pra~M las spobs pa brtsegs pa ste/ /sa~M las ngan song kun 'dren pa/ /sa~M las ngan song kun 'joms pa/ /dza~M las dra ba can gyi 'od/ /tsa~M las zla ba'i

'od yin te/ /ra~M las byung ba'i rin chen 'od/ /sU~M las nyi ma'i 'od yin no/ /ba~M las rdo rje 'od kyang yin/ /ma~M las mthu chen thob pa ste/ su~M ni su d+ha na yin no/ ba~M las bzang skyong nyid yin te/ sa~M las blo gros rgya mtsho'o/ /kun tu bzang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /'jig

rten mgon po sa snying po/ /phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang / /nam mkha'i snying po nam mkha' mdzod/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / /spos kyi glang po nyid yin te/ /mi zad pa dang ye shes tog /spobs pa brtsegs pa mchog yin te/ /mya ngan kun 'joms nyid yin no/ /ngan

song kun 'dren nyid dang ni/ /dra ba zla ba rin chen dang / /nyi ma rdo rje 'od mchog ste/ /su d+ha na dang rin chen thob/ /rgya mtsho dang ni bzang skyong ngo / /de dag sngon nyid grub pa ste/ /phreng ba'i gsang sngags rnam par sbyar/ /de dag dam tshig tu bshad de/ /dngos grub kyi ni grub pa stsol/ /rdo rje

pho nya ma nyid dang / /skul byed dang ni rin chen sgron/ /rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te/ /ro langs rdo rje gzhon nu ma/ /ka~M po dzi dang de bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ma de bzhin/ /ye shes sgron dang rdor 'jigs ma/ /ye shes sgron dang rgyal byed ma/ /sgrol ma dang ni gos dkar mo/ /spyan dang mA ma kI mchog

dang / /rgyal mtshan so sor 'brang ma dang / /rma bya dang ni ri khrod ma/ /lu gu rgyud dang phyir zlog ma/ /lha mo gtsug tor rdor 'jigs ma/ /sngon grub pa yi lha mo ste/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol/ /gsal byed ming dang bcas par ni/ /mthar ni hUM phaT sbyar bar bya/ /mtha'

mar swA hA mnyam par sbyar/ /sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /gshin rje'i gshed dang rta mchog rgyal/ /bgegs ni gnon par mdzad pa yin/ /shes rab mthar byed bzhi po ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /'dod rgyal dbyug sngon stobs po che/ /brgyad par

mi g.yo grags pa ste/ /khro bo chen po sngon grub pa/ /gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon/ /dkar mo sogs dam tshig lha mo/ /khrag 'thung lha mo brgyad pa yin/ /sngar bshad mkha' 'gro ma rnams te/ /khro bo brgyad dang gnyis med gnas/ /rtsa ba'i

brgyad dang ldan pa'i sngags/ /ming dang yang dag sbyar bar bya/ /gsal byed oM ni kun du yang / /mthar ni hU~M phaT swA hAr sbyar/ /gsal byed ming dang hUM dang ni/ /mthar ni phaT dang swA hAr sbyar/ /gzugs dang sgra yi lha mo dang / /dri dang ro yi lha mo ste/ /

'dab ma bzhi la rnam par sbyar/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ma/ /reg pas reg pa'i rdo rjer grags/ /gnyis su med par yang dag gnas/ /dbus su khrag 'thung rgyal po ni/ /lha mo'i reg pas bde bar bzhugs/ /snying po chos kyi dbyings su grags/ /shes

rab pha rol phyin las byung / /ye shes sems dpa' gnyis med bzhugs/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbyings ma ste/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i ye shes ni/ /chos kyi dbyings de mi dmigs pa'o/ /de ni gsang ba de nyid mchog /rdo rje can ni yang dag stsol/ /che ba'i mchog ni 'dus pa ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde

ba'i mchog /sbyor ba rgyud kyi rjes 'brang ba/ /bgrod dang bgrod min rnal 'byor ma/ /rig pa'i rgya mtsho mchog yin te/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro nyung zad cig /sgyu 'phrul sdom pa'i rgyud yin no/ /rnal 'byor ma ni 'byung ba'i rgyud/ /gsang ba'i rgya mtsho rgyud yin te/ /nges brjod rgyud ni bla med pa/ /'dus pa mchog

ni bshad pa yin/ /ji ltar bsam pa'i khyad par gyis/ /sems can rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur/ /'dus pa mchog gi dam pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ster/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga bshad pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag /ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni/ /bdag po nyid du bya ba yin/ /ji ltar
