ming gi rjes mthun par/ /nges brjod rgyud kyi rim pa dag /rdo rje sgrub pa po yis ni/ /nges brjod rgyud kyi las rnams bya/ /yid kyis dogs pa kun spangs te/ /gnyis su med pa'i sgom pa nyid/ /theg pa chen po'i dam pa mchog /dngos grub che dang ldan par 'gro/ /de nas phyag mtshan mchog

bshad bya/ /gzugs dang mdog gi cho ga'i rim/ /yi ge he las nges 'byung ba/ /bdag nyid he ru kar bsgom bya/ /sku lus dkar la drag shul che/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa ste/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal lnga pa/ /phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /ral pa

zla phyed dbu la bcings/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i do shal gyis brgyan pa/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu steng zhal sngo ba'o/ /bzhad dang dpa' dang sgeg pa dang / /rngam dang zhi dang drag po

ste/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /rdo rje reg pas gnyis med gnas/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa mchog kyang 'dzin/ /bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu stsol/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /rdo rje mdung ni phyag mchog ste/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis/ /bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og gnon/ /

reg pa'i rdo rje ljang ba dang / /dkar ba'i mdangs kyi gzugs can la/ /ljang dang ser dang dmar ba dang / /dkar ba'i g.yon pa'i zhal gdong ste/ /steng gi zhal gdong sngo la 'jigs/ /skra grol ba ni rnam par myos/ /seng ge'i rnam grol phyag rgya can/ /

byin pa gnyis ni legs par 'khril/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste/ /rdo rje thod par mnyam par ldan/ /dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan/ /mdung dang kha T+wA~M phyag na bsnams/ /chags pa chen po me yi 'od/ /phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams/ /

gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / /sna tshogs sems can 'dul bar mdzad/ /thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su yang / /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil na bzhugs/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /zhabs kyis gnon par rnam par bsgom/ /'khor

kun dag ni zhal gsum pa/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /drag cing zhi ba nyid yin te/ /rigs gsum gyis ni phye ba'i gzugs/ /rigs gsum gyi ni phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /lha mos phye ba'i gzugs can ni/ /dam tshig gnyis su med par sbyor/ /thams cad gdan la bzhugs/ /

g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis gnon/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /shes rab thabs ni rnam par bsgom/ /mtshams rnams su ni bum pa dag /thod pa zla ba yongs su gang / /zur rnams su ni sgo srung ste/ /ji ltar mdog gi cha rnams so/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi

zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba zhabs 'og gnon/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /thugs rje khro bas rnam par myos/ /dkar po la sogs mdog sbyor ba/ /ji ltar g.yas pa'i zhal rim bzhin/ /phyag rgya rim pa'ang de bzhin no/ /lugs 'byung lugs

las bzlog par ni/ /'khor sogs mchog kyang dgod par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil na/ /rang gi byin rlabs 'chang ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sba/ /'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ /bla ma'i ngag la gnas pa yin/ /

rnal 'byor ma yi drin yin no/ /gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag dgod/ /shes rab thabs bdag 'gro ba yin/ /sa bcu pa yi mchog kyang 'gugs/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /sbyor ba gsum gyi rnam dag don/ /'di ni dri med

sgom pa mchog /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag nyid chos kyi yi ge las bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba/ /bdag nyid cho ga'i sgom pa'i rim/ /mA ma kI

dang spyan dang ni/ /lha mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ /'od zer can dang dzam+b+ha la/ /lha mo skul byed sa 'dzin ma/ /rang gi sa bon las byung ba/ /phyag bcu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis

bzhugs/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas/ /rig byed bzhi yi zhal gdong ste/ /phyogs kyi gos can ro yi gdan/ /skra grol ba la 'jigs pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /khro bas blta zhing thugs rje'i nyams/ /shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo/ /de nyid ye shes

mchog las byung / /so so yang dag sbyor ba'i bdag /de nyid ye shes gdon mi za/ /khro bo sna tshogs gzugs can ni/ /dpa' bo rang nyid las byung ba/ /khro mchog mkha' 'gro 'byung ba yang / /gos pa med par nyams pa yi/ /bdag po nyid du sbyar bar bya/ /bdag nyid

sgom pa nyid yin no/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya/ /phra ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje can/ /snying ga'i pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro thugs brtse can/ /'di nyid du ni gnas mdzad cing / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems/ /

'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas/ /'di nyid kyis mchod pa nyid kyis/ /mchod 'os thams cad mchod pa yin/ /gang zhig 'di la rtag blta ba/ /de ni rgyal bas mchod par bzhed/ /nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yis/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod/ /de bas rdo rje

mchod pa yis/ /yid 'dod rnams kyi lus la 'dod/ /mchod pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /gang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag /de ni pha rol gzhan du 'dod/ /dngos med bzhi la dgod pa yin/ /lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa yi/ /

mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o/ /sngags dang de nyid bstan pa yi/ /bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i/ /rgyud ni don dam ma yin te/ /don dam yang dag skyes pa na/ /ston pa med cing bstan pa'ang med/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba

yi/ /gnas sogs 'di nyid la gnas te/ /de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid/ /skyo bya de nyid can gyis min/ /gal te de nyid med gyur na/ /de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya/ /'on te de nyid ldan gyur na/ /de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas mchog

rnams/ /bstan pas dri ma med par 'gyur/ /yang na mi nus bag med pa'i/ /mi yi gnas ni bsgrags par bya/ /nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te/ /bsam gtan las gzhan bde med phyir/ /de bas bsam gtan mchog

gzhol bya/ /rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor/ /de yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur/ /de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni/ /rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can/ /rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni/ /thugs rje thugs gdungs ring po nas/ /rdo

rje rnal 'byor can dag gzigs/ /de rnams dgyes pas dngos grub mchog /ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur/ /des ni rje btsun ye shes kyang / /rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya/ /sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs spyad pa yi/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir

spongs la/ /de nyid brtul zhugs la dgar bya/ /gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas pa/ /rnam pa des byas brtul zhugs can/ /bsam gtan zas mchog gzhol 'gyur bas/ /smyon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis/ /gcer bu 'am yang gcer bu min/ /gang rung ji lta de ltar 'gyur/ /

rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs la/ /de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam/ /lkugs pa'i dngos por gyur pa yis/ /zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis nyer bsten na/ /rnal 'byor chen mo 'di gsal 'gyur/ /ye shes sgron ma'i mchog mthong na/ /rnal 'byor

ma rnams legs 'dus te/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' bar/ /ngang pa'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhin no/ /mig 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten du/ /'gro kun don ni byed pa'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni/ /mngon 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /spyod pa 'di la nges par

ni/ /ji skad bshad pa der 'gyur bar/ /sems ni dag par gyis shig ces/ /sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs/ /gang gis rmad byung snying rjer ldan/ /gang gis gsung ba de nyid 'gyur/ /rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni snying gar dgod/ /

snying gar rdo rje lcags kyur sbyor/ /thugs kyi rdo rjes nang sbyar te/ /gzhan yang rdo rje dgod bya ba/ /chos kyi dbyings su rnam par brtag /rang gis nam mkhar sbyor nas su/ /gzi brjid gzugs ni 'dzin par bsgom/ /rang gi chos kyi yid dgod pa/ /rang drod rang bzhin

dri ma med/ /rang gi sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi chos kyi yi ge bsgom/ /ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa yi/ /gzhan nyid gzugs kyi sgom pa la/ /yid kyi gti mug grub pa yi/ /dbang po gzhan ma bsgom par bya/ /ji lta ji ltar mos pa yis/ /gzhan nyid gzugs la

blta bar bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin

bdag med chos rnams ni/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /stong nyid ye shas rdo rje yis/ /stong nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /legs so bya ba rnams byin nas/ /rgyud skyes pa yi sbyor ba las/ /legs so legs so ye shes che/ /nges par brjod pa mchog gi

mchog /legs so rdo rje tshul drag po/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bka' drin rab/ /legs so gnyis med sbyor ba ni/ /mchog dang mchog ni grub pa la/ /legs so zhes bya nges par sbyor/ /'dod pa med pa'i sgom pa ni/ /

legs so thams cad 'gro ba'i mgon/ /theg pa chen po bstan pa 'di/ /gnyis med ye shes mchog dang ni/ /man ngag thob pa'i dang po ste/ /legs so rdo rje bla ma kun/ /de la bstan pa rnal 'byor ma/ /legs so 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la/ /dngos

grub bla na med pa byin/ /rdzogs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rdo rje rnams nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla na med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom

pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba gsang ba'i yang gsang ba bde mchog rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po the tshom med par de kho na sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ drug cu rtsa dgu

pa'o// //mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba las gsang ba'i bde mchog gi rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs / /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI pang+ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod

kyi lots+tsha ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ phyis paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na shrI dang / lots+tsha ba khyung po chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis kyang zhus pa'o/ /phyis paN+Di ta A nan+da dang / lo chung gis chad lhag rnams bsabs
nas/ zhus dag byas nas legs par bcos te gtan la phab/ /'di las zab pa med do// //
